
-----title

id='poem_sentence_23_1371454_comment'></div>盖闻虚名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371454_comment'></div>惟守职业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371454_comment'></div>实无<span id='poem_sentence_31_1371454_comment'></div>伏遇陛下应运重光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371454_comment'></div>物无废滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371454_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371454", 1371454, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>收拾</span>耆旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371454_comment'></div>尘忝班行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371454_comment'></div>既幸逢时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371454_comment'></div>常思展效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371454_comment'></div>在集贤院四换星霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371454_comment'></div>供进新书二千馀卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371454_comment'></div>儒臣之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371454_comment'></div>甘老于典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371454_comment'></div>优诏忽临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371454_comment'></div>又委之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371454", 1371454, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>符竹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371454_comment'></div>分忧诚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371454_comment'></div>恋阙滋深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371454_comment'></div>石室之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371454_comment'></div>空留笔札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371454_comment'></div>金闺之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371454_comment'></div>已去姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371454_comment'></div>本末可明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371454_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371454", 1371454, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>申雪</span>无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371454_comment'></div>岂意圣慈宏纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371454_comment'></div>不隔卑微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371454_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1371454", 1371454, id='poem_sentence_56_1371454_comment'></div>臣礼兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371454_comment'></div>不敢尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371454_comment'></div>空怀诚恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371454_comment'></div>谢恩而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371454_comment'></div>生光于九陌之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371454_comment'></div>授训而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371454_comment'></div>布政于五湖之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371454_comment'></div>臣即以今月六日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371454_comment'></div>伏以水灾之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371454_comment'></div>物力素空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371454_comment'></div>臣谨扬皇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371454_comment'></div>慰彼黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371454_comment'></div>臣闻有味之物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371454_comment'></div>蠹虫必生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371454_comment'></div>有才之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371454_comment'></div>谗言必至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371454_comment'></div>事理如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371454_comment'></div>古今同途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371454_comment'></div>了然辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371454_comment'></div>惟在明圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371454_comment'></div>伏惟陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371454_comment'></div>察臣此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371454_comment'></div>则天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371454_comment'></div>无不幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371454_comment'></div>江海远地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371454_comment'></div>孤危小臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371454_comment'></div>虽雨露之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371454_comment'></div>幽遐必被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371454_comment'></div>而犬马之恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371454_comment'></div>亲近为荣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1371454_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年2月7日</a>　抵任苏州时，水患成灾。二月七日，刘禹锡奏请救济。作品：《苏州上后谢宰相状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第205页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏州上后谢宰相状</a><span class='authorDate'>（832年2月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371513")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371513'>朝议大夫使持节苏州诸军事守苏州刺史上柱国刘某。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371513_comment'></div>某今月六日到州上讫。某山东一书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371513_comment'></div>潦倒疏阔。在少壮日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371513_comment'></div>犹不逮人。况今衰迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371513_comment'></div>智力愈短。相公哀怜不遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371513_comment'></div>擢授名邦。实荷宏奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371513_comment'></div>惭非器使。伏以当州繇大●8AE6之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371513_comment'></div>物力萧然。肌寒殒仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371513_comment'></div>相枕于野。誓当悉心条理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371513_comment'></div>续具奏论。才术素空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371513_comment'></div>忧劳方始。惧无闻问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371513_comment'></div>忝负恩知。不任瞻望恳迫之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371513_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1371513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年2月9日</a>　抵任苏州后，二月九日，上状举人自代。作品：《苏州举韦中丞自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第204页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏州举韦中丞自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（832年2月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371512")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371512'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371512'>苏州状上中书门下诸道盐铁转运江淮留后朝议郎守太仆少卿兼御史中丞上柱国赐紫金鱼袋韦应物。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371512_comment'></div>臣蒙恩授苏州刺史。伏准建中元年正月五日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371512_comment'></div>刺史上后举一人自代者。前件官历掌剧务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371512_comment'></div>皆有美名。执心不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371512_comment'></div>临事能断。今领职虽重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371512_comment'></div>本官尚轻。伏以当州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371512", 1371512, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>口赋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371512_comment'></div>首出诸郡。况经灾沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371512_comment'></div>切在抚绥。尚省无能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371512_comment'></div>辄敢公举。司榷筦之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371512_comment'></div>诚藉时才。流岂弟之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371512_comment'></div>实惟邦本。非敢臆说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371512_comment'></div>以塞诏书。今具奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371512_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1371512_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年2月</a>　二月抵任苏州未十日，登楼见白居易诗有感，题诗以寄。作品：《到郡未浃日登西楼见乐天题诗因即事以寄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷32第443页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年3月24日</a>　三月二十四日，朝廷赐米赈苏州水灾，上表谢。作品：《苏州谢赈赐表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷15第187页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371471' id='poem_sentence_1_1371471_comment'></div>恩降九天。泽流万姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371471_comment'></div>伏以臣当州去年灾沴尤甚。水潦虽退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371471_comment'></div>流佣尚多。臣前月到任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371471_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。阖境老幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371471_comment'></div>无不涕零。询访里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371471_comment'></div>备知凋瘵。方具事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371471_comment'></div>便欲奏论。圣慈忧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371471_comment'></div>照烛幽远。特有赈恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371471_comment'></div>救其灾荒。苍生荷再造之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371471_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371471", 1371471, id='poem_sentence_13_1371471_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年</a>　张祜自长安寄诗与刘禹锡。<br /><a href="javascript: class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371556")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371556_comment'></div>休上人赋别怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371556_comment'></div>约法师哭范尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371556_comment'></div>咸为当时才士之所倾叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371556_comment'></div>厥后比比有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371556_comment'></div>上人生于会稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371556_comment'></div>本汤氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371556_comment'></div>聪察嗜学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371556_comment'></div>不肯为凡夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371556_comment'></div>因辞父兄出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371556_comment'></div>号灵澈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371556_comment'></div>字源澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371556_comment'></div>虽受经论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371556_comment'></div>一心好篇章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371556_comment'></div>从越客严维学为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371556_comment'></div>遂籍籍有闻。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1371556_comment'></div>与长老诗僧皎然游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371556_comment'></div>讲艺益至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371556_comment'></div>以是上人之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371556_comment'></div>由三公而飏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371556_comment'></div>如云得风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371556_comment'></div>柯叶张王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371556_comment'></div>以文章接才子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371637_comment'></div>大和之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371637_comment'></div>再遂良觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371637_comment'></div>分务东洛。<div id='poem_sentence_30_1371637_comment'></div>公为宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371637_comment'></div>蔚然贵臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371637_comment'></div>绶紫须白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371637_comment'></div>俄俱西还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371637_comment'></div>列于清班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371637_comment'></div>来访书殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371637_comment'></div>登楼看山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371637_comment'></div>见领八屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371637_comment'></div>循街九关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371637_comment'></div>贺迁闽越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371637_comment'></div>红旆双殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371637_comment'></div>克有淑声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371637_comment'></div>搢绅之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371637_comment'></div>茕嫠鼓舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371637_comment'></div>强悍低跧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371637_comment'></div>延平古津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371637_comment'></div>峭壁孱颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371637_comment'></div>岂意龙剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371637_comment'></div>沈晶不还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371637_comment'></div>复魄侯堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371637_comment'></div>归舟建浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371637_comment'></div>双表何在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371637_comment'></div>虎邱之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371637_comment'></div>恭承嘉命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371637_comment'></div>来牧吾土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371637_comment'></div>言念昔游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371637_comment'></div>忽成千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371637_comment'></div>哀哉孝嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371637_comment'></div>率礼无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371637_comment'></div>言奉几席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371637_comment'></div>归乎洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371637_comment'></div>敬陈奠筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371637_comment'></div>泣对灵帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371637_comment'></div>平生不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371637_comment'></div>歆此一卮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371637_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1371637_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371638' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371638?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭虢州杨庶子文</a><span class='authorDate'>（832年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371638")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371638_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371638'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371638'>维大和六年月日。苏州刺史刘禹锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371638_comment'></div>谨遣军吏某乙具少牢清酌之奠。敬祭于故虢州杨公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371638_comment'></div>呜呼。利剑多缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371638_comment'></div>真玉喜折。俊人不寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371638_comment'></div>为气所齧。子之少孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371638_comment'></div>率性自然。早有名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371638_comment'></div>结交世贤。席势驰声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371638_comment'></div>龙秋鸟仙。试文再售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371638_comment'></div>毛翮愈鲜。历佐侯藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371638_comment'></div>拾遗君前。伏閤论事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371638_comment'></div>侵及内权。克扬直声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371638_comment'></div>不愠左迁。一斥于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371638_comment'></div>君门邈然。五剖竹符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371638_comment'></div>皆有声绩。南湘潜化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371638_comment'></div>巴人哑哑。比阳布和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371638_comment'></div>战地尽辟。寿春<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371638", 1371638, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>武断</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371638_comment'></div>奸吏夺魄。荣波砥平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371638_comment'></div>士庶同适。朝典陟明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371638_comment'></div>俾临本州。锡以贵绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371638_comment'></div>腰金昼游。舆疾而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371638_comment'></div>风烟为愁。静治三载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371638_comment'></div>卧分主忧。直气潜销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371638_comment'></div>颓几不留。九天难问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371638_comment'></div>万国同休。呜呼惜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371638_comment'></div>与君交欢。已过三纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371638_comment'></div>维私之爱。与众无比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371638_comment'></div>乃命长嗣。为君半子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371638_comment'></div>谁无外姻。君实知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371638_comment'></div>昔与君游。俱为壮年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371638_comment'></div>怒人言命。笑人言天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371638_comment'></div>阅事未多。信书太坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371638_comment'></div>方阶尺木。已坠九泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371638_comment'></div>诵年易深。潜病难痊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371638_comment'></div>不见南楚。方知北轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371638_comment'></div>呜呼嗟哉。见几不早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371638_comment'></div>追悔已晚。犹希苟老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371638_comment'></div>容或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371638", 1371638, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>宣展</span>。以闲相期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371638_comment'></div>以晦相勉。一邱可乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371638_comment'></div>万累皆遣。玩图散秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371638_comment'></div>婆娑京辇。天命不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371638_comment'></div>愿言莫展。呜呼痛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371638_comment'></div>君卧宏农。予来姑苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371638_comment'></div>飞书相约。言念鼎湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371638_comment'></div>我车载脂。为子疾驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371638_comment'></div>入境阒寂。唯逢素书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371638_comment'></div>发函惊视。翰不自濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371638_comment'></div>相去一舍。岂无肩舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371638_comment'></div>君为病婴。我为吏拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371638_comment'></div>两不如意。嗟哉命夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371638_comment'></div>君今往矣。无复可道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371638_comment'></div>我今泛然。一委元造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371638_comment'></div>平生亲友。零落太早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371638_comment'></div>无望拔茅。尽悲宿草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371638_comment'></div>到郡浃辰。君不起闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371638_comment'></div>寝门一恸。我哀如焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371638_comment'></div>彭彭輤车。来葬洛滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371638_comment'></div>敬修赙礼。泣送行人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371638_comment'></div>万夫之羞。荐君明魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371638_comment'></div>三赤之板。写予哀文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371638_comment'></div>凄凉山河。惨淡风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371638_comment'></div>已矣长别。嗟我杨君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371638_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1371638_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_0_17292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17292'>一生不得文章力，百口空为饱煖家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17292'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(72, "poem_sentence_2_17292")'>绮季</span>衣冠称鬓面，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8863, "poem_sentence_2_17292")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17292", 17292, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>吴公</span></span>政事副词华。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17292'>还思谢病吟归去，同醉城东桃李花。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17292'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17292_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年</a>　禹锡与白居易唱和甚多，居易编为《吴洛寄和卷》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年</a>　禹锡将其与李德裕的唱和诗篇，编为《吴蜀集》作品：《吴蜀集引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第589页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371560' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371560' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371560?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴蜀集引</a><span class='authorDate'>（832年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371560")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371560_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371560'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371560'>长庆四年。余为历阳守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371560_comment'></div>今丞相赵郡李公。时镇南徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371560_comment'></div>每赋诗。飞函相示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371560_comment'></div>且命同作。尔后出处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371560", 1371560, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>乖远</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371560_comment'></div>亦如邻封。凡酬唱始于江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371560_comment'></div>而终于剑外。故以吴蜀为目云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371560_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1371560_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年2月5日</a>　在苏州刺史任。二月五日，将其与令狐楚的唱和诗篇，编为《彭阳唱和集》作品：《彭阳唱和集引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第587页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371558' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371558' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371558?labeling=true' target='_blank'>彭阳唱和集引</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年2月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371558")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371558_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371558'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371558'>丞相彭阳公。始由贡士以文章为羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371558_comment'></div>怒飞于冥冥。及贵为元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371558_comment'></div>以篇咏佐琴壶。取适乎閒宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371558_comment'></div>锵然如朱弦玉磬。故名闻于世间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371558_comment'></div>鄙人少时。亦尝以词艺梯而航之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371558_comment'></div>中途见险。流落不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371558_comment'></div>而胸中之气。伊郁蜿蜒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371558_comment'></div>泄为章句。以遣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371558", 1371558, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>愁沮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371558_comment'></div>悽然如燋桐孤竹。亦名闻于世间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371558_comment'></div>虽穷达异趣。而音英同域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371558_comment'></div>故相遇甚欢。其会面必抒怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371558_comment'></div>其离居必寄兴。重酬累赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371558_comment'></div>体备今古。好事者多传布之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371558_comment'></div>今年公在并州。余守吴门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371558_comment'></div>相去迥远。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371558", 1371558, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>音徽</span>如近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371558_comment'></div>且有书来抵曰。三川守白君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371558_comment'></div>编录与吾子赠答。缄缥囊以遗余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371558_comment'></div>白君为词以冠其前。号曰刘白集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371558_comment'></div>悠悠思与所赋。亦盈于巾箱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371558_comment'></div>盍次第之。以塞三川之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371558_comment'></div>于是缉缀。凡百有馀篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371558_comment'></div>以彭阳唱和集为目。勒成两轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371558_comment'></div>尔后继赋。附于左方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371558_comment'></div>大和七年二月五日。中山刘禹锡述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371558_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371558_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年2月</a>　二月，李德裕自西川入为大夫，拜相，刘禹锡献启以贺。作品：《贺门下李相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第221页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371538' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371538")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371538'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371538'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371538_comment'></div>伏以圣君当功成恺乐之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371538_comment'></div>而求贤愈切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371538_comment'></div>思治益深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371538_comment'></div>是上元垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371538_comment'></div>欲速致太平之明效。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371538_comment'></div>天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371538_comment'></div>视仁寿之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371538_comment'></div>其犹寻尺。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1371538_comment'></div>惟所措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371538_comment'></div>日月亭午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371538_comment'></div>物无邪阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371538_comment'></div>圣贤合德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371538_comment'></div>人识正道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371538_comment'></div>虽居畎亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371538_comment'></div>足以咏歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371538_comment'></div>某遐守要荒。<div class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17354")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17354_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_17354_0'>① （一作酬乐天初冬早寒见寄）。（一作元稹诗）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17354'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17354'>乍起衣犹冷，微吟帽半欹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17354'>霜凝南屋瓦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17354", 17354, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>鸡唱</span>后园枝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17354'>洛水碧云晓，吴宫黄叶时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17354'>两传千里意，书札不如诗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17354'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年11月27日</a>　十一月，禹锡以政最，赐紫金鱼袋。二十七日，刘禹锡上表谢恩。作品：《苏州谢恩赐加章服表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第189页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371460' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371460' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371460?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏州谢恩赐加章服表</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年11月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371460")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371460_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371460'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371460'>臣某言。伏奉去年十一月二十七日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371460_comment'></div>加臣赐紫金鱼袋。馀如故者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371460_comment'></div>恩降重霄。荣沾陋质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371460_comment'></div>既黩陟明之典。恐兴彼己之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371460_comment'></div>宠过若惊。喜深生惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371460_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣起自书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371460_comment'></div>业文入仕。德宗朝为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371460_comment'></div>以孤直在台。顺宗朝为郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371460_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371460", 1371460, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>缘累</span>出省。宪宗皇帝后知其冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371460_comment'></div>特降敕书。追赴京国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371460_comment'></div>缘有虚称。恐居清班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371460_comment'></div>务进者争先。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371460", 1371460, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>上封</span>者潜毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371460_comment'></div>巧言易信。孤愤难申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371460_comment'></div>俄复一麾。外转三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371460_comment'></div>伏遇陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371460", 1371460, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>膺期</span>御宇。大振<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371460", 1371460, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>滞淹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371460_comment'></div>哀臣宿旧。猥见收拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371460_comment'></div>职兼书殿。官忝仪曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371460_comment'></div>微劳未宣。薄命多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371460_comment'></div>又离省署。重领郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371460_comment'></div>延英面辞。亲承教诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371460_comment'></div>衔命即路。星言载驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371460_comment'></div>到任之初。便逢灾疫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371460_comment'></div>奉宣圣泽。恭守诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371460_comment'></div>上禀睿谟。下求人瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371460_comment'></div>才术虽短。忧劳则深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371460_comment'></div>幸免流离。渐臻完复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371460_comment'></div>皆承圣化所及。遂使人心获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371460_comment'></div>岂由微臣薄劣能致。臣素乏亲党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371460_comment'></div>家本孤贫。年衰无酒色之娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371460_comment'></div>性拙无博奕之艺。自领大郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371460_comment'></div>又逢时灾。昼夜苦心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371460_comment'></div>寝食忘味。曾经诬毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371460_comment'></div>每事防虞。惟托神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371460_comment'></div>更无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371460", 1371460, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>媒援</span>。岂期片善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371460_comment'></div>上达宸聪。回日月之重光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371460_comment'></div>烛江湘之下国。丝纶褒异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371460_comment'></div>苦节既彰。印绶炜煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371460_comment'></div>老容如少。望云天而拜舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371460_comment'></div>岂尽丹诚。视环玦以徘徊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371460_comment'></div>空嗟白首。无任感激屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371460_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371460_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年12月</a>　十一月，以政最，赐紫金鱼袋。十二月日，刘禹锡上状谢。作品：《苏州加章服谢宰相状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第206页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371514'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371514_comment'></div>某素乏吏才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371514_comment'></div>谬居剧郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371514_comment'></div>以无庸之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371514_comment'></div>当难治之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371514_comment'></div>恭守诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371514_comment'></div>勤求人瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371514_comment'></div>伏以圣德柔远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371514_comment'></div>皇明烛幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371514_comment'></div>凡有上陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371514_comment'></div>皆可其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371514_comment'></div>遂令管见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371514_comment'></div>得及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371514", 1371514, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>疲黎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371514_comment'></div>自承雨露之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371514_comment'></div>非有循良之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371514_comment'></div>猥蒙朝奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371514_comment'></div>特降<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371514", 1371514, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>命书</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371514_comment'></div>顾缝掖之腐儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371514_comment'></div>被华章之贵服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371514_comment'></div>有黩陟明之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371514_comment'></div>诚招彼己之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371514_comment'></div>限以守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371514_comment'></div>不获拜谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371514_comment'></div>瞻望荣感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371514_comment'></div>心魂载驰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371514_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年12月</a>　十一月，以政最，赐紫金鱼袋。十二月，白居易寄诗以贺，刘禹锡答之。作品：《酬乐天见贻贺金紫之什》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷32第451页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天贻贺金紫之什</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17371")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17371_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17371'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(265, "poem_allusion_17371")'>白凤</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17371'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17371'>久学文章含<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(265, "poem_sentence_0_17371")'>白凤</span>，却因政事赐金鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17371'>郡人未识闻谣咏，天子知名与诏书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17371'>珍重贺诗呈锦绣，愿言归计并园庐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17371'>旧来词客多无位，金紫同游谁得如。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17371'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　在苏州刺史任。本年，禹锡自编《刘氏集略》作品：《刘氏集略说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷20第250页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371591' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371591' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371591?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘氏集略说</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371591")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371591_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371591'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371591'>子刘子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371591_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>五达</span>之井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371591_comment'></div>百汲而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>盈科</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371591_comment'></div>未必凉而甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371591_comment'></div>所处之势然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371591_comment'></div>人之词待扣而扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371591_comment'></div>犹井之利汲耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371591_comment'></div>始余为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>童儿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371591_comment'></div>居江湖间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371591_comment'></div>喜与属词者游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371591_comment'></div>谬以为可教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371591_comment'></div>视长者所行止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371591_comment'></div>必操觚从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371591_comment'></div>及冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371591_comment'></div>举秀才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371591_comment'></div>一幸而中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371591_comment'></div>说有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371591_comment'></div>惧不厌于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371591_comment'></div>亟以口誉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371591_comment'></div>长安中多循空言以为诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371591_comment'></div>果有名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371591_comment'></div>益与曹辈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>畋渔</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>书林</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371591_comment'></div>宵语途话。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371591_comment'></div>琴酒调谑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371591_comment'></div>一出于文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371591_comment'></div>俄被召为记室参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371591_comment'></div>会出师淮上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371591_comment'></div>恒磨墨于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>楯鼻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371591_comment'></div>或寝止群书中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371591_comment'></div>居一二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371591_comment'></div>由甸服升诸朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371591_comment'></div>凡三进班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371591_comment'></div>而所掌犹外府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371591_comment'></div>或官课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371591_comment'></div>或为人所倩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371591_comment'></div>昌言奏记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371591_comment'></div>移让告谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371591_comment'></div>奠神志葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371591_comment'></div>咸猥并焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371591_comment'></div>及谪于沅湘间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371591_comment'></div>为江山风物之所荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371591_comment'></div>往往指事成歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371591_comment'></div>或读书有所感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371591_comment'></div>辄立评议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371591_comment'></div>穷愁著书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371591_comment'></div>古儒者之大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371591_comment'></div>非高冠长剑之比耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371591_comment'></div>前年蒙恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371591_comment'></div>授以郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371591_comment'></div>居海壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371591_comment'></div>多雨慝作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371591_comment'></div>适晴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371591_comment'></div>喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371591_comment'></div>躬晒书于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371591_comment'></div>得已书四十通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371591_comment'></div>逌尔自哂曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371591_comment'></div>道不加益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371591_comment'></div>焉用是空文为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371591_comment'></div>真可供酱蒙药楮耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371591_comment'></div>它日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371591_comment'></div>子婿博陵崔生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371591", 1371591, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>关言</span>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371591_comment'></div>某也向游京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371591_comment'></div>伟人多问丈人新书几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371591_comment'></div>且欲取去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371591_comment'></div>而某应曰无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371591_comment'></div>辄愧起于颜间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371591_comment'></div>今当复西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371591_comment'></div>期有以弭愧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371591_comment'></div>繇是删取四之一为集略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371591_comment'></div>以贻此郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371591_comment'></div>非敢行乎远也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1371591_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　在苏州刺史任。为李绛编辑遗集。作品：《唐故相国李公集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷19第224页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371550'>天以正气付伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371550_comment'></div>必饰之使光耀于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371550_comment'></div>粹和絪缊积于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371550_comment'></div>铿锵发越形乎外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371550_comment'></div>文之细大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371550_comment'></div>视道之行止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371550_comment'></div>故得其位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371550_comment'></div>文非空言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371550_comment'></div>咸系于吁谟宥密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371550_comment'></div>庸可不纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371550_comment'></div>惟唐以神武定天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371550_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371550", 1371550, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>群慝</span>既詟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371550_comment'></div>骤示以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371550_comment'></div>韶英之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371550_comment'></div>与钲鼓相袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371550_comment'></div>故起文章为大臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371550_comment'></div>魏文贞以谏诤显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371550_comment'></div>马高唐以智略奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371550_comment'></div>岑江陵以润色闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371550_comment'></div>无草昧汗马之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371550_comment'></div>而任遇在功臣上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371550_comment'></div>唐之贵文至矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371550_comment'></div>后王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371550", 1371550, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>纂承</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371550_comment'></div>多以国柄付文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371550_comment'></div>元和初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371550_comment'></div>宪宗遵圣祖故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371550_comment'></div>视有宰相器者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371550_comment'></div>贮之内庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371550_comment'></div>繇是释笔砚而操化权者十八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371550_comment'></div>公实得时而光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371550_comment'></div>公讳绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371550_comment'></div>字深之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371550_comment'></div>赵郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371550_comment'></div>在贡士中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371550_comment'></div>杰然有奇表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371550_comment'></div>既登太常第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371550_comment'></div>又以词赋升甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371550_comment'></div>授秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371550_comment'></div>岁满从调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371550_comment'></div>有司设甲乙问以观决断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371550_comment'></div>复居高品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371550_comment'></div>补渭南尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371550_comment'></div>擢拜监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371550_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371550_comment'></div>以本官充翰林学士居中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371550_comment'></div>转尚书主客员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371550_comment'></div>历司勋郎中知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371550_comment'></div>迁中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371550_comment'></div>风仪峻整。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371550_comment'></div>敷奏谠切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371550_comment'></div>言事感动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371550_comment'></div>上辄目送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371550_comment'></div>一旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371550_comment'></div>召至浴堂门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371550_comment'></div>与语半日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371550_comment'></div>曰将移用于大位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371550_comment'></div>宜稔熟民听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371550_comment'></div>遂出为户部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371550_comment'></div>迁中书侍郎同平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371550_comment'></div>毅然有直声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371550_comment'></div>及册免而闻望益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371550_comment'></div>居保釐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371550_comment'></div>登斋坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371550_comment'></div>皆再焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371550_comment'></div>大和三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371550_comment'></div>以司空镇南郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371550_comment'></div>居二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371550_comment'></div>坐气刚玉折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371550_comment'></div>海内冤惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371550_comment'></div>词赋诏诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371550_comment'></div>封章启事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371550_comment'></div>歌诗赠饯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371550_comment'></div>金石飏功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371550_comment'></div>凡四百馀篇。<div id='poem_sentence_91_1371550_comment'></div>诚贯理直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371550_comment'></div>感通神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371550_comment'></div>龙鳞收怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371550_comment'></div>天日回照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371550_comment'></div>古所谓<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_97_1371550_comment'></div>始愚与公为布衣游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371550_comment'></div>及仕畿服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371550_comment'></div>幸公同邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371550_comment'></div>而不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1371550", 1371550, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>名数</span>革初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371550_comment'></div>今考其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371550_comment'></div>至论事疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371550_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1371550", 1371550, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>感人肺肝</span>。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　在苏州刺史任。成都府新寺成，禹锡作文以记。作品：《成都府新修福成寺记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷4第61页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371563?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成都府新修福成寺记</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371563")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371563'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371563'>益城右门。大逵坦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371563_comment'></div>西驰曰石笋街。街之北有仁祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371563_comment'></div>形焉直启。曰福成寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371563_comment'></div>寺之殿台与城之楼。交错相辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371563_comment'></div>绣于碧霄。望之如昆阆间物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371563_comment'></div>大和四年。蜀帅非将材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371563_comment'></div>不修边备。南诏君长谍得内空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371563_comment'></div>乘隙坌入。斗于城下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371563_comment'></div>或纵火以骇众。此寺乃焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371563_comment'></div>高门修廊。委为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371563", 1371563, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>寒烬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371563_comment'></div>如是者再岁。帝念坤维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371563_comment'></div>丞相复来。山川如迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371563_comment'></div>父老相识。环视故地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371563_comment'></div>寺为燋墟。载兴起废之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371563_comment'></div>爰有植因之愿。乃命主俸吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371563_comment'></div>以吾缗钱三十万为经营之基。自公来思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371563_comment'></div>蜀号无事。时康岁稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371563_comment'></div>人乐檀施。公言既先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371563_comment'></div>应如决川。乃倾囊褚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371563_comment'></div>乃出怀袖。胜因化愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371563_comment'></div>慧力摄悭。男奔女骤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371563_comment'></div>急于徵令。匠者度材以指众徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371563_comment'></div>艺者运思以役众技。斤锯磨砻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371563_comment'></div>丁丁登登。陶者储精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371563_comment'></div>圬者效能。歘自火宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371563_comment'></div>复为金绳。沿故鼎新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371563_comment'></div>因毁成妍。华夷纵观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371563_comment'></div>万目同耸。既告讫役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371563_comment'></div>公来庆成。云鲜日润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371563_comment'></div>辉映前后。于是都人舞忭而谣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371563_comment'></div>昔公去此。福成以燬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371563_comment'></div>今公重还。福成复完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371563_comment'></div>民安军治。亦如此寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371563_comment'></div>庸可勿纪乎。公实闻斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371563_comment'></div>遂折简见命。谨月而日之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371563_comment'></div>时大和某年某月日。大檀越具官封爵段氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371563_comment'></div>其他发大愿者。程功董事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371563_comment'></div>自中贵人及宾介将吏若僧徒。偕籍之而刻于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371563_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1371563_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　在苏州刺史任。为奚陟作碑文。作品：《唐故朝议郎守尚书吏部侍郎上柱国赐紫金鱼袋赠司空奚公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷2第29页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故朝议郎守尚书吏部侍郎上柱国赐紫金鱼袋赠司空奚公神道碑</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371617'>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371617_comment'></div>有唐清臣尚书吏部侍郎奚公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371617_comment'></div>贞元十五年十月甲子薨于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371617_comment'></div>诏赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371617_comment'></div>太常考行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371617_comment'></div>谥曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371617_comment'></div>是岁腊月丁酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371617_comment'></div>葬于万年县之某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371617_comment'></div>后三十有四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371617_comment'></div>子为诸侯为大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371617_comment'></div>门户有炜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371617_comment'></div>于是门下生琢石纪德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371617_comment'></div>下古以降为谯郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371617_comment'></div>或因仕适楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371617_comment'></div>复之秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371617_comment'></div>今为京兆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371617_comment'></div>隋唐之际。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　是年，权礼部侍郎顾少连知贡举，放进士三十二人，其中柳宗元与刘禹锡交最密。作品：《平权衡赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第615页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='inlineComment2'>（以昼夜平分钧铢取则为韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（793年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371394")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371394_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371394'>惟天垂象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371394_comment'></div>惟圣作程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371394_comment'></div>播二气而是分晷度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371394_comment'></div>立五则而在审权衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371394_comment'></div>上穆天时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371394_comment'></div>应阴阳之克正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371394_comment'></div>下统人极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371394_comment'></div>俾准绳而惟平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371394_comment'></div>于是黍累无差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371394_comment'></div>毫釐必究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371394_comment'></div>等度量而化通远迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371394_comment'></div>体平均而势行宇宙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371394_comment'></div>当其夹钟中律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371394_comment'></div>南吕戒候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371394_comment'></div>铜浑应节于寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371394_comment'></div>玉漏方齐乎宵昼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371394_comment'></div>繇是命有司而申令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371394_comment'></div>考前王而是遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371394_comment'></div>权轻重以审则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371394_comment'></div>中规矩而和钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371394_comment'></div>事垂文兮风传乎千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371394_comment'></div>道如砥兮日用于兆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371394_comment'></div>懿夫正以处中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371394_comment'></div>平而立矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371394_comment'></div>命其同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371394_comment'></div>有虞之制克彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371394_comment'></div>称其谨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371394_comment'></div>宣父之言可取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371394_comment'></div>故能用该仁里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371394_comment'></div>象合天文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371394_comment'></div>既左旋而右折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371394_comment'></div>量轻并而重分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371394_comment'></div>持平罔亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371394_comment'></div>可为范于秉钧之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371394_comment'></div>立信惟一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371394_comment'></div>将有助于执契之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371394_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371394_comment'></div>则何以悬之而息彼奸诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371394_comment'></div>正之而协于晨夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371394_comment'></div>得平则正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371394_comment'></div>我之道兮允执厥中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371394_comment'></div>益寡裒多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371394_comment'></div>众所用兮不言而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371394_comment'></div>化之有孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371394_comment'></div>功莫可踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371394_comment'></div>立规程罔惭夫龟镜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371394_comment'></div>揣钧石宁失乎锱铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371394_comment'></div>匪假垂钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371394_comment'></div>而其用不匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371394_comment'></div>何劳剖斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371394_comment'></div>而所争自无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371394_comment'></div>方今百度惟贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371394_comment'></div>万邦承则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371394_comment'></div>顺时设教兮靡不获所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371394_comment'></div>同律和声兮允臻其极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371394_comment'></div>玉衡正而三阶以平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371394_comment'></div>七政齐而庶政不忒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371394_comment'></div>美君臣之同体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371394_comment'></div>犹权衡以合德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371394_comment'></div>宰准绳之在心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371394_comment'></div>庶轻重之不惑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1371394_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　与李绛同登宏辞科。<br /></div><div class='label1' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371524?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献权舍人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（794年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371524")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371524_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371524'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371524'>禹锡在儿童时。已蒙见器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371524_comment'></div>终荷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371524", 1371524, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>荐宠</span>。始见知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371524_comment'></div>众之指目。忝阁下门客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371524_comment'></div>惧无以报称。故厚自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371524", 1371524, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>淬琢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371524_comment'></div>靡遗分阴。乃今道未施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371524_comment'></div>所蓄者志。见志之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371524_comment'></div>匪文谓何。是用颛颛恳恳于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371524_comment'></div>思有所寓。非笃好其章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371524_comment'></div>沈溺于浮华。时态众尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371524_comment'></div>病未能也。故拙于用誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371524_comment'></div>直绳朗鉴。乐所趋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371524_comment'></div>故锐于求益。今谨录近所论撰凡十数篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371524_comment'></div>蕲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371524", 1371524, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>端较</span>是非。敢关于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371524_comment'></div>犹夫矿朴。纳于容范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371524_comment'></div>尝闻昔宋广平之沈下僚也。苏公味道时为绣衣直指使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371524_comment'></div>广平投以梅花赋。苏盛称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371524_comment'></div>自是方列于闻人之目。是知英贤卓荦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371524_comment'></div>可外文字。然犹用片言借说于先达之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371524_comment'></div>席其势而后骧首当时。矧碌碌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371524_comment'></div>畴能自异。今阁下之名之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371524_comment'></div>过于苏公之曩日。而鄙生所赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371524_comment'></div>或钜于梅花。则沈泥干霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371524_comment'></div>悬在指顾间。其词汰而喻僣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371524_comment'></div>诚黩礼也。繄游藩之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371524_comment'></div>觊尚旧而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371524", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371505'>具官臣某。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371505_comment'></div>臣今日至长乐驿。高品某奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371505_comment'></div>赐臣酒食者。伏以恩降王人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371505_comment'></div>荣分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371505", 1371505, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>御膳</span>。未展仪于双阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371505_comment'></div>先受赐于八珍。品越脤膰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371505_comment'></div>味兼醪醴。顿惊凡口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371505_comment'></div>倍益欢心。无任欣跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371505_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1371526_comment'></div>兼示移群从书。明所以去河南从京兆为望之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371526_comment'></div>于古仪为得。然而通行之自久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371526_comment'></div>或献疑焉。是以前书不敢不逡巡牢让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371526_comment'></div>亦有以发閤下之雄辨。使㬭然为世程者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371472_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371472_comment'></div>伏以方隅入贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371472_comment'></div>采撷至珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371472_comment'></div>自远爰来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371472_comment'></div>以新为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371472_comment'></div>捧而观妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371472_comment'></div>饮以涤烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371472_comment'></div>顾兰露而惭芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371472_comment'></div>岂蔗浆而齐味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371472_comment'></div>既荣凡口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371472_comment'></div>倍切丹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371472_comment'></div>臣无任欢跃感恩之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1371472_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1371473_comment'></div>伏以贡自外方。名殊众品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371473_comment'></div>效参药石。芳越椒兰。<div class='inline' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371417'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371417'>臣某言。臣伏闻陛下式遵典章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371417_comment'></div>正位宸极。臣闻大明继照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371417_comment'></div>虽昧者必昭其视。震雷发声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371417_comment'></div>虽聩者必达其听。是以圣人鼓万物而耳目咸革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371417_comment'></div>感人心而天下太平。致理兴邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371417_comment'></div>率由兹道。中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371417_comment'></div>伏惟陛下绍累圣之鸿绪。冠前王之盛烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371417_comment'></div>自宣猷上嗣。育德储闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371417_comment'></div>仁孝表于域中。慈俭章于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371417_comment'></div>由是馁者思食。瘠者思丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371417_comment'></div>曶爽咸耀于光明。枯朽更延于惠泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371417_comment'></div>禺禺亿兆。咸沐惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371417_comment'></div>鼓舞而四表欢心。运行而二仪贞观。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　夏秋间，为杜佑拟表。作品：《为杜司徒让淮南立去思碑表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷13第153页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为杜司徒让淮南立去思碑表</a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371445")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371445'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371445'>臣某言。伏见淮南节度使王锷所奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371445_comment'></div>当道将吏僧道耆老等请为臣立去思碑。伏奉圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371445_comment'></div>允其所奏。内惟菲薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371445_comment'></div>声绩无闻。祗荷恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371445_comment'></div>惭惧交至。臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371445_comment'></div>臣伏蒙先朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371445", 1371445, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>过奖</span>。累典方隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371445_comment'></div>顷镇江都。十有四载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371445_comment'></div>数周星纪。水旱备经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371445_comment'></div>境接淮濆。兵戈时起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371445_comment'></div>至于邑里。粗免流离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371445_comment'></div>非臣所能。悉禀圣化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371445_comment'></div>在唐尧可封之日。奚假吏才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371445_comment'></div>当汉宣责实之时。皆承诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371445_comment'></div>王锷与臣交代。辄有上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371445_comment'></div>况以去思为名。惭无可纪之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371445_comment'></div>伏以建碑示后。甲令垂文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371445_comment'></div>苟非至公。翻益贻诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371445_comment'></div>臣伏览故事。宋璟自广州都督入拜尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371445_comment'></div>南海之人。请为刊石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371445_comment'></div>璟自逊让。至于再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371445_comment'></div>虽勒其文。竟从降制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371445_comment'></div>著在国史。举为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371445_comment'></div>璟非苟荣。人益见德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371445_comment'></div>臣才诚不逮。心实慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371445_comment'></div>伏乞圣慈。赐寝前命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371445_comment'></div>情非饰让。义在徇公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371445_comment'></div>无任恳款之至。谨奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371445_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1371445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_3_1371418_comment'></div>卓哉冠鸿名而超古始者。孰若今之盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371418_comment'></div>陛下孝至通三。上极于君父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371418_comment'></div>德均吹万。下被于生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371418_comment'></div>大圣所以宣昭。庶品由其利见。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　春，至长安后，再游玄都观，有感作诗。作品：《再游玄都观并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷24第308页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_16885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_16885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/16885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再游玄都观<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_16885")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_16885_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_16885'>并引：余贞元二十一年为屯田员外郎时，此观未有花。是岁出牧连州，寻贬朗州司马，居十年，召至京师，人人皆言「有道士手植仙桃，满观如红霞」，遂有前篇以志一时之事，旋又出牧。今十有四年，复为主客郎中，重游玄都观，荡然无复一树，为兔葵燕麦动摇于春风耳，因再题二十八字，以俟后游，时大和二年三月。</div><div id='poem_preface_16885_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_16885'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2354, target='_blank'>授仓部郎中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371402")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371402'>敕。周制仓人以辨于邦用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371402_comment'></div>廪人以待乎匪颁。后代或均输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371402_comment'></div>或平籴。皆周官仓廪之职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371402_comment'></div>于戏。王者藏于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371402_comment'></div>吾何私焉。收敛以时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371402_comment'></div>储蓄必谨。俾夫凶荒无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371402_comment'></div>贫富克均。宜味京坻之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371402_comment'></div>勿守豆区之限。可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371402_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1371402_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371403?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授主客郎中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371403")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371403'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371403'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371403_comment'></div>汉制尚书郎四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371403_comment'></div>一人主营部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371403_comment'></div>成帝又置客曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371403_comment'></div>主外国戎狄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371403_comment'></div>皆今主客之任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371403_comment'></div>其后或东西列职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371403_comment'></div>左右分名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371403_comment'></div>统彼行人之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371403_comment'></div>绥其外臣之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371403_comment'></div>朝聘则定位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371403_comment'></div>宴会则辨仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371403_comment'></div>穆我四门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371403_comment'></div>深于九译。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371403_comment'></div>用委稿街之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371403_comment'></div>克资粉署之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371403_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1371403_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371404?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授比部郎中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371404")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div
