class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371404_comment'></div>汉以计相经国用。或考百官之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371404_comment'></div>或制三年之期。稽以簿书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371404_comment'></div>辨其名物。俾夫会算必得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371404_comment'></div>经费无差。充选望郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371404_comment'></div>以临计吏。可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371404_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1371404_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371405?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授屯田郎中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371405")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371405'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371405'>敕。诗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371405_comment'></div>雨我公田。遂及我私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371405_comment'></div>盖美大田之盛。思贤主之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371405_comment'></div>人必先公而后私者。借力而耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371405_comment'></div>其来尚矣。周以司徒莅职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371405_comment'></div>汉以侍郎训田。今则务切如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371405_comment'></div>任专列宿。总于豫政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371405_comment'></div>克藉公才。可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371405_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1371405_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371406?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟太子太傅制</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371406")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371406_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371406'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371406'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371406_comment'></div>太子太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371406_comment'></div>古今之重任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371406_comment'></div>其使吾子目见正事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371406_comment'></div>耳闻正道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371406_comment'></div>左右前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371406_comment'></div>无非正人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371406_comment'></div>繄尔太傅之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371406_comment'></div>久虚其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371406_comment'></div>式伫端人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371406_comment'></div>以尔命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371406_comment'></div>朕无惭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371406_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1371406_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371407?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟太子太保制</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371407")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371407_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371407'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371407'>敕。礼云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371407_comment'></div>三王之教太子。入则有保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371407_comment'></div>出则有师。是以教谕而德成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371407_comment'></div>其实一焉。必择恭敬温文以辅道其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371407_comment'></div>使吾太子观尔之道景行之。无人则虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371407_comment'></div>不求充位。校德而命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371407_comment'></div>其称厥官。可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371407_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1371407_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　春，拟册文。作品：《拟册皇太子文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第619页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《拟册齐王文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第620页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《拟册楚王文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第620页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《拟册邠王文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第621页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《拟册晋王文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第621页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《拟公主册文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第622页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371408?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟册皇太子文</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371408")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371408'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371408'>维某年月日。皇帝若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371408_comment'></div>于戏。易云明两作离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371408_comment'></div>大人以继明照于四方。盖所以毓其明德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371408_comment'></div>继于正体。邦本由是固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371408_comment'></div>万方由是宁。粤祖宗之阐帝业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371408_comment'></div>亦莫不由此而继于明德。肆予一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371408_comment'></div>绪承大宝。纂奉丕构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371408_comment'></div>惧有失坠。以贻先帝之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371408_comment'></div>永怀主器以继明。用副予不德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371408_comment'></div>咨尔元子王某。袭列圣之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371408_comment'></div>体健行之质。吹铜禀异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371408_comment'></div>辨日耀奇。早习德成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371408_comment'></div>克敬师保。事业可大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371408_comment'></div>和顺积中。天纵温文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371408_comment'></div>生知孝悌。洎分茅土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371408_comment'></div>望出东平。符彩昭彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371408_comment'></div>礼乐文错。固可正位重震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371408_comment'></div>为天下之储君。人神叶从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371408_comment'></div>德任相称。仰稽令典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371408_comment'></div>光载盛仪。是用册命尔为皇太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371408_comment'></div>往钦哉。夫富贵莫大于家天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371408_comment'></div>忠孝莫大于敬君亲。俟尔一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371408_comment'></div>贞于万国。必咨正事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371408_comment'></div>必近正人。必杜逸游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371408_comment'></div>必乐善道。求谏如不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371408_comment'></div>恶佞如探汤。懋尔厥修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371408_comment'></div>惟怀克和。以贰于朕躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371408_comment'></div>无忝祖宗之烈。可不慎欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371408_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371408_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371409?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟册齐王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371409")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371409_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371409'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371409'>维某年月日。皇帝若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371409_comment'></div>启兹东国。境于青州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371409_comment'></div>略嵎夷。导潍淄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371409_comment'></div>盐絺贡庭。檿丝入篚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371409_comment'></div>粤在少昊。为爽鸠之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371409_comment'></div>沃若殷商。乃薄姑之邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371409_comment'></div>周实太公之国。积海岱之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371409_comment'></div>习戎革之盛。因俗简礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371409_comment'></div>其政易成。咨尔第二子某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371409_comment'></div>直谅多闻。温裕有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371409_comment'></div>乐于为善。力其未能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371409_comment'></div>行本贞廉。言依忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371409_comment'></div>固可锡兹青社。俾藩于东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371409_comment'></div>是用命使某官某乙。持节册命尔为齐王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371409_comment'></div>往钦哉。宜听朕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371409_comment'></div>夫敬人可以理国。后已可以得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371409_comment'></div>谓己不明。任贤良以为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371409_comment'></div>谓己不德。资师傅以为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371409_comment'></div>国安则备尔忠孝。人散则忝尔君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371409_comment'></div>慎乃厥修。无替休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371409_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371409_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371410' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371410' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371410?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟册楚王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371410'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371410'>惟某年月日。皇帝若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371410_comment'></div>衡岳峙灵。云梦润德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371410_comment'></div>锡十朋以备神物。包三脊以供王祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371410_comment'></div>浮江潜汉。实曰渚宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371410_comment'></div>俗轻而佻。上难其化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371410_comment'></div>咨尔第三子某。正性自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371410_comment'></div>懿行克修。旷淡居心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371410_comment'></div>宽裕推己。移此成器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371410_comment'></div>绥于荆蛮。锡尔赤社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371410_comment'></div>以屏南土。是用命使某官某乙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371410_comment'></div>持节册命尔为楚王。往钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371410_comment'></div>宜听朕命。于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371410_comment'></div>布政在宽。革俗先信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371410_comment'></div>分吾之忧。以惠黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371410_comment'></div>励尔之志。以报君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371410_comment'></div>为子为臣。克忠克孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371410_comment'></div>臻于二德。在理一邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371410_comment'></div>祗敬勿休。无忝我命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371410_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1371410_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371411' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371411?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟册邠王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371411")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371411_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371411'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371411'>惟某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371411_comment'></div>皇帝若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371411_comment'></div>朕读诗至豳风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371411_comment'></div>见古公亶父之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371411_comment'></div>然后知王业之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371411_comment'></div>仰惟我高祖太宗之栉沐风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371411_comment'></div>以启天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371411_comment'></div>是用兢惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371411_comment'></div>若坠泉谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371411_comment'></div>豳之旧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371411_comment'></div>积德之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371411_comment'></div>俗厚而忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371411_comment'></div>人悦其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371411_comment'></div>王于兹土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371411_comment'></div>克懋贤戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371411_comment'></div>咨尔第四子某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371411_comment'></div>质重性和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371411_comment'></div>神清气茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371411_comment'></div>威仪俨若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371411_comment'></div>恬淡寡言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371411_comment'></div>介然风规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371411_comment'></div>坐镇流俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371411_comment'></div>固可将吾勤俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371411_comment'></div>宣化豳郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371411_comment'></div>锡尔白社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371411_comment'></div>藩于西土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371411_comment'></div>是用命使某官某乙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371411_comment'></div>持节册命尔为邠王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371411_comment'></div>往钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371411_comment'></div>宜听朕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371411_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371411_comment'></div>播种者后稷公刘之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371411_comment'></div>善继者古公亶父之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371411_comment'></div>积德行义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371411_comment'></div>国人戴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371411_comment'></div>诗有七月之章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371411_comment'></div>非惟王业艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371411_comment'></div>亦俗阜化成之风也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371411_comment'></div>尔其日夜思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371411_comment'></div>训以温柔之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371411_comment'></div>无夺农时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371411_comment'></div>使独戴周德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371411_comment'></div>以忝我一人之命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371411_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371412' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371412' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371412?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟册晋王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371412")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371412_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371412'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371412'>维某年月日。皇帝若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371412_comment'></div>涉河之东。千里而广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371412_comment'></div>右浸卫水。左据常山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371412_comment'></div>蒲版唐尧所封之邱。历山虞舜隐耕之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371412_comment'></div>晋阳我高祖誓众之野。本晋国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371412_comment'></div>而谓之唐。其人忧深思远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371412_comment'></div>有帝尧之遗风焉。故我国家因之以启王业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371412_comment'></div>将我朝政。保兹旧邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371412_comment'></div>克建戚藩。以任贤德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371412_comment'></div>咨尔第五男某。和裕秉质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371412_comment'></div>端贞理身。撝谦似不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371412_comment'></div>好善如不足。行归于厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371412_comment'></div>口无择言。本孝克家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371412_comment'></div>资忠体国。固可严奉启圣之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371412_comment'></div>绥怀积德之邦。锡尔黑社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371412_comment'></div>以藩于北。是用命使某官某乙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371412_comment'></div>持节册命尔为晋王。往钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371412_comment'></div>宜听朕命。于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371412_comment'></div>践唐尧之地。理虞舜之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371412_comment'></div>开高祖之域。尔其兢兢厎慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371412_comment'></div>以临其人。思流恺悌之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371412_comment'></div>祗敬兴王之地。无一举足以忘我祖宗艰难之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371412_comment'></div>往利厥土。以孚于休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371412_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1371412_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟公主册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371413_comment'></div>桃李发咏。云日连辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371413_comment'></div>礼秩克柔。肃雍载美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371413_comment'></div>筑馆大国。建号名邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371413_comment'></div>乃躅通规。用光懿范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371413_comment'></div>咨尔长女。金枝宠爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371413_comment'></div>玉质辉奇。蕴异体和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371413_comment'></div>含章挺秀。柔顺懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371413_comment'></div>幽闲可贞。已及初笄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371413_comment'></div>言从下嫁。主之以同姓叔父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371413_comment'></div>配之以贵族闻人。式遵旧仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371413_comment'></div>锡是土宇。是用命使某官某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371413_comment'></div>持节册命尔为某公主。于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371413_comment'></div>尔其克念。以敬所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371413_comment'></div>无忝我之休命。不其猗欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_17268_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　作诗答东阳令于兴宗。作品：《答东阳于令寒碧图诗并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷25第331页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荅东阳于令寒碧图诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17257")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17257_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17257'>并引：东阳令于兴宗，丞相燕国公之犹子，生绮襦纨裤间，所见皆贵盛，而挈然有心，如山东书生。前年白有司，愿为亲民官以自效，遂补东阳。及莅官，以简易为治，故多暇日。一旦，于县五里，偶得奇境。埋没于翳荟中，于生自以有特操，而生于公侯家，由覆荫入仕。常忽忽叹息，因移是心，开抉泉石，芟去萝茑，斧凡材，畚息壤，而清溪翠岩，森立坌来，因构亭其端，题曰寒碧。碧流贯于庭中，如青龙蜿蜒。冰（案：去声。）彻射人，树石云霞裂于前，昏旦万状，惜其居地不得有闻于时，故图之。来乞辞，既无负尤物，予亦久翳萝茑者，睹之慨然，遂赋七言，以贻后之文士。</div><div id='poem_preface_17257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17257'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17257'>东阳本是佳山水，何况曾经沈隐侯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17257_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17257'>化得邦人解吟咏，如今县令亦风流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17257_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17257'>新开谭洞疑仙境，远写丹青到雍州。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17257_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17257'>落在寻常画师手，犹能三伏凛生秋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17257_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17257'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17257_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_17165'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　十月至次年正月间，有诗和令狐楚。作品：《和令狐相公寻白阁老见留小饮因赠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷33第464页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17181' id='poem_title_1371616' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371616?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐兴元节度使王公先庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（829年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371616")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371616_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371616'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371616'>唐制五等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371616_comment'></div>有爵服而无山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371616_comment'></div>登于三事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371616_comment'></div>得立四庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371616_comment'></div>备物崇祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371616_comment'></div>以交神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371616_comment'></div>敬先报本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371616_comment'></div>以辅孝治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371616_comment'></div>有国之令典也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371616_comment'></div>惟长庆三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371616_comment'></div>前相国王公始卜庙于西京崇业里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371616_comment'></div>公时镇剑南东川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371616_comment'></div>上章曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371616_comment'></div>臣涯官秩印绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371616_comment'></div>品俱第三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371616_comment'></div>请如式以奉宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371616_comment'></div>制曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371616_comment'></div>是岁仲冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371616_comment'></div>申命长男孟坚祔其主于三室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371616_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371616_comment'></div>公入为御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371616_comment'></div>复以十二月躬行烝祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371616_comment'></div>间岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371616_comment'></div>公出梁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371616_comment'></div>就拜司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371616_comment'></div>礼崇异数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371616_comment'></div>庙加祀室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371616_comment'></div>大和二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371616_comment'></div>增新室既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371616_comment'></div>祔显考于尊位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371616_comment'></div>告飨由礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371616_comment'></div>观之者以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371616", 1371616, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>世程</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371616_comment'></div>第一室曰上仪同幽州别驾府君讳元政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371616_comment'></div>以妣博陵崔氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371616_comment'></div>第二室曰湖州安吉县令赠尚书刑部员外郎府君讳寔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371616_comment'></div>以妣赠扶风县太君马氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371616_comment'></div>第三室曰朝散大夫青州司马赠户部侍郎府君讳祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371616_comment'></div>以妣赠武威郡太夫人贾氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371616_comment'></div>第四室曰温州刺史赠太尉府君讳晃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371616_comment'></div>以妣赠鲁国太夫人博陵崔氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371616_comment'></div>初周王太子晋遇浮邱公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371616_comment'></div>化为神仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371616_comment'></div>时人号曰王家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371616_comment'></div>其后遂以命氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371616_comment'></div>显于秦者曰剪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371616_comment'></div>咸世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371616_comment'></div>贞元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371616_comment'></div>德宗闻其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371616_comment'></div>自蓝田尉召入禁中视草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371616_comment'></div>厥后三典书命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371616_comment'></div>再参内庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371616_comment'></div>宪宗器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371616_comment'></div>付以国柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371616_comment'></div>翊赞有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371616_comment'></div>虽策免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371616_comment'></div>常居大僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371616_comment'></div>今年自梁州请觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371616_comment'></div>上思用旧臣为羽仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371616_comment'></div>遂领太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371616_comment'></div>其公府如故。<div id='poem_sentence_144_1371616_comment'></div>靡不扬历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371616_comment'></div>且夫起诸生至三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371616_comment'></div>而心愈卑。<div id='poem_sentence_166_1371616_comment'></div>子姓宗工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371616_comment'></div>骏奔奉事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371616_comment'></div>副笄侈袂。<div id='poem_sentence_187_1371616_comment'></div>谁无永怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371616_comment'></div>不如达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371616_comment'></div>哀与荣偕。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371565'>初摩阿迦叶受佛心印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371565_comment'></div>得其人而传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371565_comment'></div>至师子比邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371565_comment'></div>凡二十五叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371565_comment'></div>而达摩得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371565_comment'></div>东来中华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371565_comment'></div>华人奉之为第一祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371565_comment'></div>又三传至双峰信公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371565_comment'></div>双峰广其道而歧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371565_comment'></div>一为东山宗能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371565_comment'></div>秀寂其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371565_comment'></div>一为牛头宗严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371565_comment'></div>持威鹤林径山其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371565_comment'></div>分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371565", 1371565, id='poem_sentence_15_1371565_comment'></div>粲然贯珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371565_comment'></div>大师号法融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371565_comment'></div>姓韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371565_comment'></div>延陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371565_comment'></div>少为儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371565_comment'></div>博极群书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371565_comment'></div>既而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371565_comment'></div>此仁义言耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371565_comment'></div>吾志求出世间法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371565_comment'></div>遂入句曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371565_comment'></div>依僧炅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371565_comment'></div>改逢掖而缁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371565_comment'></div>徙居是山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371565_comment'></div>宴坐石室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371565_comment'></div>以慧力感通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371565_comment'></div>故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371565", 1371565, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>旱麓</span>泉涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371565_comment'></div>以神功<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371565", 1371565, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>示现</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371565_comment'></div>故皓雪莲生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371565_comment'></div>巨蛇摧伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371565_comment'></div>群鹿听法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371565_comment'></div>贞观中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371565_comment'></div>双峰过江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371565_comment'></div>望牛头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371565_comment'></div>顿锡曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371565_comment'></div>此山有道气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371565_comment'></div>宜有得之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371565_comment'></div>乃东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371565_comment'></div>果与大师相遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371565_comment'></div>性合神契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371565_comment'></div>至于无言。<div 1371565, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>密付</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1371565", 1371565, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>真印</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_16932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_16932'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_16932'>平章宅里一栏花，<span class='link' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17389")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17389_comment'></div><div "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>文房</span>隔旧宫，当时盛事尽成空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17389'>墨池半在颓垣下，书带犹生蔓草中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17389'>巡内因经九重苑，裁诗又继二南风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17389'>为兄手写殷勤句，遍历三台各一通。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17389'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　为令狐楚作先庙碑文。作品：《东都留守令狐楚家庙碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷2第22页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371615' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371615?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东都留守令狐楚家庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（829年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371615")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371615_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371615'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371615'>今上元年七月十三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371615_comment'></div>汴州刺史宣武军节度副大使知节度事汴宋亳等州观察处置使银青光禄大夫检校礼部尚书兼御史大夫上柱国彭阳县开国伯令狐公西向拜章上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371615_comment'></div>守臣楚蒙被恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371615_comment'></div>列为元侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371615_comment'></div>得立家庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371615_comment'></div>以奉常祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371615_comment'></div>制书下其奏于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371615_comment'></div>于是善相考祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371615_comment'></div>得地于京师通济里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371615_comment'></div>居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371615_comment'></div>新庙成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371615_comment'></div>公以守藩故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371615_comment'></div>申命季弟监察御史定卜牲练日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371615_comment'></div>越八月丁亥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371615_comment'></div>祔享三室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371615_comment'></div>塪墉以尚幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371615_comment'></div>设幄以迎精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371615_comment'></div>礼无尤违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371615_comment'></div>神用宁谧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371615_comment'></div>第一室曰秦州上邽县尉讳浚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371615_comment'></div>以妣太原王氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371615_comment'></div>第二室曰绵州昌明县令赠吏部尚书讳崇亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371615_comment'></div>以妣赠太原郡夫人河东柳氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371615_comment'></div>第三室曰太原府功曹参军赠太子太保讳丞简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371615_comment'></div>以妣赠魏国太夫人富春孙氏配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371615_comment'></div>明年十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371615_comment'></div>公由浚郊以介圭入觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371615_comment'></div>真拜户部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371615_comment'></div>进爵为鲁侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371615_comment'></div>既辞戎旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371615_comment'></div>得以列侯谒三庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371615_comment'></div>是岁南至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371615_comment'></div>上不视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371615_comment'></div>又得以时展祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371615_comment'></div>先期致斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371615_comment'></div>栗然以敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371615_comment'></div>既斋尽志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371615_comment'></div>歆然永思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371615_comment'></div>奉其百顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371615_comment'></div>陈以具物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371615_comment'></div>始跻而虔恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371615_comment'></div>终献而汍澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371615_comment'></div>既卒事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371615_comment'></div>顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>丽牲之石</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371615_comment'></div>宜有刊纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371615_comment'></div>乃俾家老授其牒于所知云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371615_comment'></div>令狐晋邑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371615_comment'></div>晋大夫魏颗以辅氏之功始封焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371615_comment'></div>其易名曰文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371615_comment'></div>国语所谓令狐文子是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371615_comment'></div>其先周文王之昭毕公高之裔毕万为晋卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371615_comment'></div>始封于魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371615_comment'></div>自万至颗盖四世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371615_comment'></div>其后三十七世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371615_comment'></div>蓝田侯虬仕拓跋魏为燉煌郡太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371615_comment'></div>子孙因家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371615_comment'></div>遂占数为郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371615_comment'></div>蓝田之孙熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371615_comment'></div>在隋为纳言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371615_comment'></div>惟上邽府君纳言之元孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371615_comment'></div>道克肖而位不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371615_comment'></div>惟尚书府君西州之右族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371615_comment'></div>光未耀而德已基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371615_comment'></div>惟太保府君志为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>君子儒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371615_comment'></div>以明经居上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371615_comment'></div>调补阳安县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371615_comment'></div>历正平县尉汾州司法参军陜西大都督府兵曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371615_comment'></div>终于太原府首掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371615_comment'></div>始以颛经进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371615_comment'></div>既仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371615_comment'></div>旁通百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371615_comment'></div>爱谷梁子清而婉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371615_comment'></div>左邱明国语辨而工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371615_comment'></div>司马迁史记文而不华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371615_comment'></div>咸手笔朱墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371615_comment'></div>究其微旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371615_comment'></div>恺悌以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>肥家</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371615_comment'></div>信谊以急人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371615_comment'></div>德充齿耋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371615_comment'></div>独享天爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371615_comment'></div>故休祐集于身后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371615_comment'></div>徽章流乎佳城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371615_comment'></div>凡以子贵承泽降命书告第者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371615_comment'></div>始赠尚书祠部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371615_comment'></div>再赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371615_comment'></div>三加右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371615_comment'></div>四进太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371615_comment'></div>五为上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371615_comment'></div>先夫人亦四徙封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>密印</span>累累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371615_comment'></div>邦族耸慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371615_comment'></div>生三子皆才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371615_comment'></div>彭阳公为嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371615_comment'></div>次子从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371615_comment'></div>端实肃给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371615_comment'></div>今为检校膳部郎中参河东军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371615_comment'></div>季子前所谓监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371615_comment'></div>今主柱下方书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371615_comment'></div>温敏而有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371615_comment'></div>绰绰然真令兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371615_comment'></div>惟彭阳公以词笔取科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371615_comment'></div>累参侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371615_comment'></div>由博士主尚书笺奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371615_comment'></div>典内外书命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371615_comment'></div>遂登枢衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371615_comment'></div>言文章者以为冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371615_comment'></div>拥节总戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371615_comment'></div>率身和众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371615_comment'></div>留惠于盟津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371615_comment'></div>变风于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>浚都</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371615_comment'></div>言方略者以为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371615_comment'></div>夫浚师<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>嚄唶</span>难治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371615_comment'></div>乘衅窃发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371615_comment'></div>寖成习俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371615_comment'></div>莅政五载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371615_comment'></div>饮和革心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371615_comment'></div>束马来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371615_comment'></div>熊罴陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371615_comment'></div>问公还期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371615_comment'></div>觞必祝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371615_comment'></div>留为常伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371615_comment'></div>旋命居守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371615_comment'></div>汴人闻公之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371615_comment'></div>近而愈怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371615_comment'></div>翘翘瞿瞿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371615_comment'></div>尽西其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371615_comment'></div>言遗爱者可纪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371615_comment'></div>贵而率礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371615_comment'></div>老而能慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371615_comment'></div>怵惕乎霜露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371615_comment'></div>斋庄乎庙祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371615_comment'></div>睦其仲季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371615_comment'></div>施其乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371615_comment'></div>言孝悌者归厚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371615_comment'></div>勒铭于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371615_comment'></div>以代彝鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371615_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371615_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_137_1371615'>已孤之孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371615_comment'></div>莫如备物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371615_comment'></div>显彼新庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371615_comment'></div>四阿三室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371615_comment'></div>时维仲月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371615_comment'></div>卜用柔日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371615_comment'></div>盏醴苾芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371615_comment'></div>牲牷博腯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371615_comment'></div>笾甒在堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_146_1371615", 1371615, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>萧膋</span>在庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371615_comment'></div>孝孙蒸蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371615_comment'></div>躬若捧盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371615_comment'></div>低簪委绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371615_comment'></div>荐俎登铏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371615_comment'></div>肸蚃交感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371615_comment'></div>流涕缘缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371615_comment'></div>礼以备仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371615_comment'></div>诚以致美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371615_comment'></div>祖考来格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371615_comment'></div>锡之休祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371615_comment'></div>工祝告讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371615_comment'></div>退循轩戺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371615_comment'></div>乃授风人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371615_comment'></div>作诗以纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371615_comment'></div>猗欤彭阳之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371615_comment'></div>光佐宪皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371615_comment'></div>穆穆皇皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371615_comment'></div>西省东台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371615_comment'></div>迭为侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371615_comment'></div>国之大柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371615_comment'></div>咨尔平章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371615_comment'></div>敬宗凝旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371615_comment'></div>俾镇雍邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371615_comment'></div>入为地官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371615_comment'></div>令守东州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_17453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17453'>冥鸿何所慕，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17453", 17453, href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年1月</a>　正月，诏封李永为鲁王。禹锡代裴度作表贺。作品：《为裴相公贺册鲁王表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷15第181页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_11_1371421_comment'></div>庆浃天人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371421_comment'></div>次念建封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371421_comment'></div>事兼家国。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1371635_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371635_comment'></div>天以和气钟于贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371635_comment'></div>含光不曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371635_comment'></div>煦物如春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371635_comment'></div>发自贡士。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371635_comment'></div>益部为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371635_comment'></div>斗牛之下。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年2月</a>　二月，兴元兵变，节度使李绛被杀。有文祭之。作品：《祭兴元李司空文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷40第605页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371634' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371634' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371634?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭兴元李司空文</a><span class='authorDate'>（830年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371634")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371634_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371634'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371634'>维大和四年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371634_comment'></div>礼部郎中集贤殿直学士刘禹锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371634_comment'></div>谨以清酌之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371634_comment'></div>敬祭于故相国山南西道节度使赠司空李公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371634_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371634_comment'></div>龟灵而刳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371634_comment'></div>龙知而屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371634_comment'></div>古今同之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371634_comment'></div>天不可呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371634_comment'></div>公之挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371634_comment'></div>德与位并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371634_comment'></div>如瞻日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371634_comment'></div>岂赞其明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371634_comment'></div>何以致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371634_comment'></div>姑话平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371634_comment'></div>追怀周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371634_comment'></div>弥四十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371634_comment'></div>射策校文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371634_comment'></div>接武联翩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371634_comment'></div>甸服同邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371634_comment'></div>明庭比肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371634_comment'></div>公乘迅飙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371634_comment'></div>凌厉非烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371634_comment'></div>愚触骇机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371634_comment'></div>迸落深泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371634_comment'></div>一持化权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371634_comment'></div>一谪海壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371634_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371634", 1371634, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>本同末异</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371634_comment'></div>如矢别弦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371634_comment'></div>云龙井蛙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371634_comment'></div>势不相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371634_comment'></div>二纪回泊。<div id='poem_sentence_88_1371634_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年2月</a>　二月，兴元兵变，节度使李绛被杀。刘禹锡代裴度作祭文。作品：《代裴相祭李司空文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷40第607页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371636' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371636' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371636?labeling=true' "poem_title_1371636")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371636_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371636'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371636'>四年月日。特进守司空兼门下侍郎平章事裴度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371636_comment'></div>谨以清酌少牢之奠。敬祭于故相国魏郡公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371636_comment'></div>呜呼。玉贞而折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371636_comment'></div>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371636", 1371636, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>瓦合</span>。鸾锻而萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371636_comment'></div>不同鸡群。生兮若浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371636_comment'></div>守道不屈。惟公之生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371636_comment'></div>福自维嵩。金石高韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371636_comment'></div>圭璋德容。元和之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371636_comment'></div>左右宪宗。以才视草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371636_comment'></div>以望登庸。振起直声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371636_comment'></div>激扬清风。实有正气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371636_comment'></div>号为名公。名成身退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371636_comment'></div>犹系人望。入为羽仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371636_comment'></div>出领藩方。既师百辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371636_comment'></div>又副丞相。道冠搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371636_comment'></div>事参<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371636", 1371636, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>翼亮</span>。某与公游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371636_comment'></div>四十馀年。风期合契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371636_comment'></div>禄位相先。某忝司言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371636_comment'></div>公持化权。应同宫徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371636_comment'></div>馥若兰荃。猥以姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371636_comment'></div>称于上前。发迹从微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371636_comment'></div>芳□获宣。某为免相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371636_comment'></div>待罪梁山。公拜右揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371636_comment'></div>来从东川。极其欢娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371636_comment'></div>著在诗篇。某忝三入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371636_comment'></div>公东亦还。里门相迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371636_comment'></div>宾閤常閒。退朝休浣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371636_comment'></div>道旧开颜。嗟呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371636_comment'></div>山川间之。忽在旦夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371636_comment'></div>岂意仓卒。遂成今昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371636_comment'></div>衣冠丧气。风物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371636", 1371636, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>含戚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371636_comment'></div>强魂诉天。冤血成碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371636_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。某在病中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371636_comment'></div>讣书始至。无力以哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371636_comment'></div>不言垂泪。今闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371636", 1371636, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>裧輤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371636_comment'></div>首路而归。隐几临风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371636_comment'></div>其心孔悲。嘉肴百笾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371447_comment'></div>臣去冬得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371447_comment'></div>近日加剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371447_comment'></div>西夕之景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371447_comment'></div>岂能久留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371447_comment'></div>及其未乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371447_comment'></div>披露诚恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371447_comment'></div>臣犬马之齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371447_comment'></div>六十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371447_comment'></div>寿虽不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371447_comment'></div>亦不为短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371447_comment'></div>位忝公台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371447_comment'></div>近十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371447_comment'></div>皆由际会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371447_comment'></div>非以才进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371447_comment'></div>常惧官谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371447_comment'></div>既有成例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371447_comment'></div>著于旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371447_comment'></div>伏望天恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371447_comment'></div>特赐哀允。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371447_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年6月</a>　六月，裴度被册司徒，刘禹锡作诗以贺。作品：《门下相公荣加册命天下同欢忝沐眷私辄敢申贺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷22第286页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17075' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17075' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17075?labeling=true' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17075'>册命出宸衷，官仪自古崇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17075'>特膺平土拜，光赞格天功<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作宫）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17075'>再佩扶阳印，常乘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17075", 17075, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>鲍氏骢</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17075'>七贤遗老在，犹得咏清风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17075'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17075_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>　九月前，代裴度作让官第一表。作品：《为裴相公让官第二表》<span id='poem_title_1371448' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371448?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为裴相公让官第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（830年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1371448_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371448'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371448'>臣某言。臣所献章表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371448_comment'></div>发于至诚。伏奉批答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371448_comment'></div>未蒙允许。外负<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371448", 1371448, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>公责</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371448_comment'></div>内迫私情。期于必遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371448_comment'></div>敢守难夺。臣束发已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371448_comment'></div>号为强力。及其晚节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371448_comment'></div>亦未甚衰。一朝被病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371448_comment'></div>遂至绵惙。臣自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371448", 1371448, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>思省</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371448_comment'></div>得其端倪。非因饮食不节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371448_comment'></div>无有雾露之犯。盖由才微而任重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371448_comment'></div>功薄而赏厚。窃位既久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371448_comment'></div>妨贤则多。以积年之过幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371448_comment'></div>致今日之沈疾。不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371448", 1371448, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>酌损</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371448_comment'></div>所以生灾。悟虽已晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371448_comment'></div>情实非矫。伏惟陛下念其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371448", 1371448, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>委使</span>之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371448_comment'></div>察其危苦之词。特降深恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371448_comment'></div>救臣不逮。无冒荣之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371448_comment'></div>得遂性之宜。物议不形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371448_comment'></div>病心自泰。忍死俟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371448_comment'></div>披肝再陈。伏乞圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371448_comment'></div>俯赐容纳。无任迫切恳倒之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371448_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1371448_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371449' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371449' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371449?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为裴相公让官第三表</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371449'>臣某言。得病踰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371449_comment'></div>在假三月。再有陈请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371449_comment'></div>未蒙允从。虑其奄忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371449_comment'></div>衔愧入地。伏惟圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371449_comment'></div>哀而信之。臣闻君之使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371449_comment'></div>在知其心而听其言。不以容尸禄为惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371449_comment'></div>臣之事君。在无隐情而尽忠节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371449_comment'></div>不以受非据为荣也。然后上下交感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371449_comment'></div>终始可咏。臣伏事陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371449_comment'></div>五年于兹。葵藿微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371449_comment'></div>已蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371449", 1371449, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>识察</span>。桑榆莫景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371449_comment'></div>所冀哀怜。岂令危惙之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371449_comment'></div>更惧满盈之祸。虽有药石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371449_comment'></div>安能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371449", 1371449, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>生涯</span>渐短。体羸无拜舞之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371449_comment'></div>心在有涕恋之悲。臣伏览国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371449_comment'></div>备见前事。太宗朝李靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371449_comment'></div>高宗朝刘仁轨。皆自宰臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371449_comment'></div>乞骸致政。其后知犹可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371449_comment'></div>复起于家。进退之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371449_comment'></div>曲尽情礼。君臣之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371449_comment'></div>良史美谈。伏望陛下悉臣至诚。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>　九月前，代裴度作状。作品：《为裴相公进东封图状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第202页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371504' id='poem_sentence_2_1371504_comment'></div>玄宗皇帝以天下太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371504_comment'></div>登封东岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371504_comment'></div>声名文物。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1371504_comment'></div>再阐鸿业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371504_comment'></div>祖宗盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371504_comment'></div>绍复有期。<div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17204'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17204'>谭笑在岩廊，人人尽所长。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17204'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17204_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>　在礼部郎中、集贤学士任。九月前，感物作诗。作品：《庙庭偃松诗并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷25第330页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庙庭偃松诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（830年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17216")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17216_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17216'>侍中后阁前有小松，不待年立而偃（不待特立而偃），丞相晋公为赋诗，美其犹龙蛇。然植于高檐乔木间，上嵌旁轧，盘蹙倾亚，似不得天和者。公以遂物性为意，乃加怜焉，命畚土以壮其趾，使无欹；索绹以牵其干，使不仆，盥漱之馀以润之，顾眄之辉以照之。发于仁心，感召和气，无复夭阏，坐能敷舒，向之跧蹙，化为奇古，故虽袤丈而有偃号焉。予尝诣阁白事，公为道所以，且示以诗。窃感嘉木之逢时，裴然成咏。</div><div id='poem_preface_17216_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17216'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2442, "poem_allusion_17216")'>东山</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17216'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17216'>势轧枝偏根已危，高情一见与扶持。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17216'>忽从憔悴有生意，却为离披无俗姿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17216'>影入岩廊行乐处，韵含天籁宿斋时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17216'>谢公莫道<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2442, "poem_sentence_3_17216")'>东山</span>去，待取<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作时取）</span>阴成满凤池。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17216'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>　在礼部郎中、集贤学士任。九月前，作诗。作品：《题集贤阁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷31第430页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17407' id='poem_sentence_0_17407'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2132, "poem_sentence_0_17407")'>凤池</span>西畔图书府，玉树玲珑景气闲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17407'>长听馀风送天乐，时登高阁望人寰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17407'>青山云绕栏干外，紫殿香来步武间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17407'>曾是先贤翔集地，每看壁记一惭颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>　在礼部郎中、集贤学士任。作郑州刺史壁记。作品：《郑州刺史东厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第99页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371571' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371571' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371571?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑州刺史东厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（830年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371571")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371571_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371571'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371571'>古诸侯之居。公私皆曰寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371571_comment'></div>其他室曰便坐。今凡视事之所皆曰厅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371571_comment'></div>其他室以辨方为称。今年郑州刺史杨君作东厅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371571_comment'></div>既成而落之。且以书抵余为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371571_comment'></div>桉国章。以甲乙第方域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371571_comment'></div>大凡环天子之居为雄州。郑实迩王畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371571_comment'></div>故望雄。视其版多贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371571_comment'></div>且当大逵。故务剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371571_comment'></div>君侯始来三日。司税掾举七县董租之吏累百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371571_comment'></div>君曰。此百螣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371571_comment'></div>悉罢之。用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371571", 1371571, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>户符</span>而输入益办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371571_comment'></div>司贡掾举梨林之徵请户晓。君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371571_comment'></div>尽弛之勿籍。用平贾而果益精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371571_comment'></div>里无吏迹。民去痼疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371571_comment'></div>授牍占租。如临<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371571", 1371571, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>诅盟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371571_comment'></div>土毛人力。日夕相长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371571_comment'></div>故周岁而完焉。比年而愈肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371571_comment'></div>虽军兴馈挽旁午。大将牙旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371571_comment'></div>往复相踵。而里中清夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371571_comment'></div>鸡犬音和。人既宁而物有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371571_comment'></div>政既成而日多暇。圜视旧宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371571_comment'></div>宜有以更之。且书得时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371571_comment'></div>亦以谨始。因列名氏授受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371571_comment'></div>月而日之。庶乎继践于兹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371571_comment'></div>知贯珠之首。其山望泽浸土风氓俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371571_comment'></div>与前贤之耿光。备于正位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371571_comment'></div>有天宝中词人杜頠之文在。大和四年某月日。<div class='inline' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17272")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17272_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17272'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5378, "poem_allusion_17272")'>昆山玉</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17272'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17272'>缇骑朱旗入楚城，士林皆贺振家声。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17272'>儿童但喜迎宾守，故吏犹应记姓<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作小）</span>名。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17272'>万顷水田连郭秀，四时烟月映淮清。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17272'>忆君初得<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5378, "poem_sentence_3_17272")'>昆山玉</span>，同向扬州携手行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17272'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年4月26日</a>　在礼部郎中任。四月二十六日，作壁记。作品：《天平军节度使厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第94页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371566' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371566' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371566?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天平军节度使厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年4月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371566")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371566_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371566'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371566'>元和十四年春二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371566_comment'></div>王师平河南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371566", 1371566, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>负固</span>之地十有二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371566_comment'></div>宪宗视地图户版。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371566_comment'></div>俾参其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371566_comment'></div>三月有诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371566_comment'></div>其以曹濮隶郓为一隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371566_comment'></div>桉部三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371566_comment'></div>统兵三万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371566_comment'></div>乃新其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371566_comment'></div>锡号天平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371566_comment'></div>盖承天威以平暴悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371566_comment'></div>志动扬休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371566_comment'></div>在称为雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371566_comment'></div>新邦始徕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371566_comment'></div>污浴犹用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371566_comment'></div>朝廷革之以渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371566_comment'></div>故命功臣或办吏以帅焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371566_comment'></div>大和三年冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371566_comment'></div>天平监军使以故侯病闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371566_comment'></div>上方注意治本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371566_comment'></div>乃以牙璋玉节鼎右仆射官称赐东都留守令狐公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371566_comment'></div>予择文武惟汝兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371566_comment'></div>前年镇汴州有显庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371566_comment'></div>往年弼宪宗有素贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371566_comment'></div>徒得君重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371566_comment'></div>刚吾四支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371566_comment'></div>公西拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371566_comment'></div>登车有耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371566_comment'></div>不踰旬抵治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371566_comment'></div>夹清河而域之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371566_comment'></div>惟郓州在春秋为须句之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371566_comment'></div>涉汉为济东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371566_comment'></div>盖禹贡兖州之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371566_comment'></div>宣精在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371566_comment'></div>奎为文宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371566_comment'></div>画野在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371566_comment'></div>鲁为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371566", 1371566, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>儒乡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371566_comment'></div>故其人知书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371566_comment'></div>风俗信厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371566_comment'></div>天宝末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371566_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371566", 1371566, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>大憝</span>起于幽都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371566_comment'></div>虏将因兵锋取其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371566_comment'></div>右勇左德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371566_comment'></div>积六十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371566_comment'></div>公之来思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371566_comment'></div>如古医之治剧病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371566_comment'></div>宣泄颐养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371566_comment'></div>气还神复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371566_comment'></div>大凡抗诏条国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371566_comment'></div>式于身以先之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371566_comment'></div>示菲约以裕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371566_comment'></div>信赏罚以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371566", 1371566, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>格物</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371566_comment'></div>物力日完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371566_comment'></div>人风自移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371566_comment'></div>涉月报政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371566_comment'></div>踰年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1371566", 1371566, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>鼎治</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371566_comment'></div>牙门之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371566_comment'></div>暨暨而恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371566_comment'></div>垒门之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371566_comment'></div>仡仡而和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371566_comment'></div>里门之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371566_comment'></div>阗阗而遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371566_comment'></div>劳者以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371566_comment'></div>去者以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371566_comment'></div>分星不摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371566_comment'></div>田祖降福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371566_comment'></div>凡革前非罢供第无名钱岁钜万。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371566_comment'></div>岂偶尔哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371566_comment'></div>初斯堂西墉有刺史记。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371566_comment'></div>公命愚志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371566_comment'></div>俾来者仰公知变风之自。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_17426'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17426'>公府有高政，新斋池上开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17426'>再吟佳句后，一似画图来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17426'>结搆疏林下，夤缘曲岸隈。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17426'>幽异当轩满，清光绕砌回。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17426'>潭心澄晚镜，渠口起晴雷。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17426'>游鱼惊拨剌，浴鹭喜毰毸。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17426'>为客烹林笋，因僧采石苔。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17426'>蒲根抽九节，莲萼捧重台。<div id='poem_sentence_11_17426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_16910_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_16910'>祗应随玉树，同向土中销。<div id='poem_sentence_1_16910_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_16910'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_16910_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年8月</a>　八月，京兆尹庞严卒，作诗哭之。作品：《哭庞京兆》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第415页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_17299'>俊骨英才气褎然，策名飞步冠群贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17299'>逢时已自致高位，得疾<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作病）</span>还因倚少年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17299'>天上别归京兆府，人间空数<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作叹）</span>茂陵阡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17299'>今朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17299", 17299, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>穗帐</span>哭君处，前日见铺歌舞筵。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17299'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年8月</a>　八月，京兆尹庞严卒，再作诗伤悼。作品：《再伤庞尹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第415页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_16884' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_16884' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/16884?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再伤庞尹</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
