id='poem_title_16884_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_16884'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(777, "poem_allusion_16884")'>章台</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_16884_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_16884'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_16884'>京兆归何处，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(777, "poem_sentence_0_16884")'>章台</span>空暮尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_16884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_16884'>可怜鸾镜下，哭杀画眉人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_16884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_16884'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_16884_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年8月</a>　在礼部郎中任。八月，为高陵县令刘仁师作碑文。作品：《高陵令刘君遗爱碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷2第26页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371618' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371618' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371618?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高陵令刘君遗爱碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371618")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371618_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371618'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371618'>县内之大夫。鲜有遗爱在其去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371618_comment'></div>盖邑居多豪。政出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371618", 1371618, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>权道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371618_comment'></div>非有卓然异绩。结于人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371618_comment'></div>浃于骨髓。安能久而愈思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371618_comment'></div>大和四年。高陵人李仕清等六十三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371618_comment'></div>思前令刘君之德。诣县请金石刻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371618_comment'></div>县令以状申于府。府以状考于明法吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371618_comment'></div>吏上言。谨桉天宝诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371618_comment'></div>凡以政绩将立碑者。其具所纪之文上尚书考功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371618_comment'></div>有司考其词。宜有纪者乃奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371618_comment'></div>明年八月庚午。诏曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371618_comment'></div>令书其章明有以结人心者。揭于道周云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371618_comment'></div>泾水东行注白渠。酾而为三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371618_comment'></div>以沃关中。故秦人常得善岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371618_comment'></div>桉水部式。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371618", 1371618, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>决泄</span>有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371618_comment'></div>畎浍有度。居上游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371618_comment'></div>不得拥泉而颛其腴。每岁少尹一人行视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371618_comment'></div>以诛不式。兵兴以迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371618_comment'></div>寖失根本。泾阳人果拥而颛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371618_comment'></div>公取全流。浸原为畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371618_comment'></div>私开四窦。泽不及下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371618_comment'></div>泾田独肥。他邑为枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371618_comment'></div>地力既移。地征如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371618_comment'></div>人或赴诉。泣迎尹马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371618_comment'></div>而上泾之腴。皆权倖家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371618_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371618", 1371618, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>荣势</span>足以破理。诉者复得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371618_comment'></div>繇是咋舌不敢言。吞冤含忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371618_comment'></div>家视孙子。长庆三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371618_comment'></div>高陵令刘君。励精吏治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371618_comment'></div>视人之瘼。如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371618", 1371618, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>瘭疽</span>在身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371618_comment'></div>不忘决去。乃修故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371618_comment'></div>考式文。暨前后诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371618_comment'></div>又以新意。请更水道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371618_comment'></div>入于我里。请杜私窦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371618_comment'></div>使无弃流。请遵田令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371618_comment'></div>使无越制。别白纤悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371618_comment'></div>列上便宜。掾吏依违不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371618_comment'></div>居二岁。距宝历元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371618_comment'></div>端士郑覃为京兆。秋九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371618_comment'></div>始具以闻。事下丞相御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371618_comment'></div>御史属元谷实司察视。持诏书诣白渠上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371618_comment'></div>尽得利病还奏。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371618", 1371618, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>青规</span>中上以谷奉使有状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371618_comment'></div>乃俾太常撰日。京兆下其符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371618_comment'></div>司录姚康士曹掾李绍实成之。县主簿谈孺直实董之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371618_comment'></div>冬十月。百众云奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371618_comment'></div>愤与喜并。口谣手运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371618_comment'></div>不屑鼛鼓。揆功什七八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371618_comment'></div>而泾阳人以奇计赂术士。上言白渠下高祖故墅在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371618_comment'></div>子孙当恭敬。不宜以畚锸近阡陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371618_comment'></div>上闻。命京兆立止绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371618_comment'></div>君驰诣府控告。具发其以赂致前事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371618_comment'></div>又谒丞相。请以颡血污车茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371618_comment'></div>丞相彭原公敛容谢曰。明府真爱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371618_comment'></div>陛下视元元无所⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（惨吝）</span>。第未周知情伪耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371618_comment'></div>即入言上前。翌日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371618_comment'></div>果有诏许讫役。仲冬新渠成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371618_comment'></div>涉季冬二日。新堰成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371618_comment'></div>驶流浑浑。如脉宣气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371618_comment'></div>蒿荒沤冒。迎耜释释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371618_comment'></div>开塞分寸。皆如诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371618_comment'></div>有秋之期。投锸前定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371618_comment'></div>孺直告已事。君率其寮躬劳徕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371618_comment'></div>烝徒欢呼。奋袯襫而舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371618_comment'></div>咸曰。吞恨六十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371618_comment'></div>明府雪之。擿奸犯豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371618_comment'></div>卒就施为。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371618_comment'></div>成功之难也如是。请名渠曰刘公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371618_comment'></div>而名堰曰彭城。桉股引而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371618_comment'></div>千七百步。其广四寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371618_comment'></div>而深半之。两涯夹植杞柳万本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371618_comment'></div>下垂根以作固。上生材以备用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371618_comment'></div>仍岁旱沴。而渠下田独有秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371618_comment'></div>渠成之明年。泾阳三原二邑中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371618_comment'></div>又拥其冲为七堰。以折水势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371618_comment'></div>使下流不厚。君诣京兆索言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371618_comment'></div>府命从事苏特至水滨。尽撤不当拥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371618_comment'></div>繇是邑人享其长利。生子以刘名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371618_comment'></div>君讳仁师。字行舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371618_comment'></div>彭城人。武德名臣刑部尚书德威之五代孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371618_comment'></div>大历中诗人商之犹子。少好文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371618_comment'></div>亦以筹画干东诸侯。遂参幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371618_comment'></div>历尹剧县。皆以能事见陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371618_comment'></div>率不时而迁。既有绩于高陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371618_comment'></div>转昭应令。俄兼检校水曹外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371618_comment'></div>充渠堰副使。且锡朱衣银章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371618_comment'></div>计相爱其能。表为检校屯田郎中兼侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371618_comment'></div>斡池盐于蒲。锡紫衣金章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371618_comment'></div>岁馀以课就。加司勋正郎中执法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371618_comment'></div>理人为循吏。理财为能臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371618_comment'></div>一出于清白故也。先是高陵人蒙被惠风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371618_comment'></div>而惜其舍去。发于胸怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371618_comment'></div>播为声诗。今采其旨而变其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371618_comment'></div>志于石。文曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371618_comment'></div>噫泾水之逶迤。溉我公兮及我私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371618_comment'></div>水无心兮人多僻。锢上游兮乾我泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371618_comment'></div>时逢理兮官得材。墨绶繠兮刘君来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371618_comment'></div>能爱人兮恤其隐。心既公兮言既尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371618_comment'></div>县申府兮府闻天。积愤刷兮沈疴痊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371618_comment'></div>划新渠兮百亩流。行龙蛇兮止膏油。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371618_comment'></div>遵水式兮复田制。无荒区兮有良岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371618_comment'></div>嗟刘君兮去翱翔。遗我福兮牵我肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371618_comment'></div>纪成功兮镌美石。求信词兮昭懿绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371618_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_102_1371618_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　在集贤殿四年，供进新书二千余卷。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　在长安礼部郎中任。有诗酬令狐楚。作品：《酬令狐相公见寄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷33第467页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　在长安礼部郎中任。作诗和友。作品：《和苏十郎中谢病闲居时严常侍萧给事同过访叹初有二毛之作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷24第318页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和苏十郎中谢病闲居时严常侍萧给事同过访叹初有二毛之作</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17194")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_17194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17194'>一卷素书消永日，数茎斑发<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作鬓）</span>对秋风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17194'>菱花照后容虽改，蓍草占来命已通。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17194_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　冬，在长安，作诗送友。作品：《送工部萧郎中刑部李郎中并以本官兼中丞分命充京西京北覆粮使》<span id='poem_sentence_3_17262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17262'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　在礼部郎中任，有文。作品：《国学新修五经壁本记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第97页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371562' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371562' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371562?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国学新修五经壁本记</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371562")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371562_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371562'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371562'>初。大历中名儒张参为国子司业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371562_comment'></div>始详定五经。书于论堂东西厢之壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371562_comment'></div>辨齐鲁之音取其宜。考古今之文取其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371562_comment'></div>繇是诸生之师心曲学。偏听臆说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371562_comment'></div>咸束之而归于大同。揭揭高悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371562_comment'></div>积六十岁。崩剥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371562", 1371562, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>污蔑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371562_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371562", 1371562, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>淟然</span>不鲜。今天子尚文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371562_comment'></div>尊典籍。于苑囿不加尺椽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371562_comment'></div>而成均以治。国学上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371562_comment'></div>遽赐千万。时祭酒皞实尸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371562_comment'></div>博士公肃实佐之。国庠重严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371562_comment'></div>过者必式。遂以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371562", 1371562, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>羡赢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371562_comment'></div>再新壁书。惩前土涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371562_comment'></div>不克以寿。乃析坚木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371562_comment'></div>负墉而比之。其制如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371562", 1371562, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>版牍</span>而高广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371562_comment'></div>其平如粉泽而洁滑。皆施阴关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371562_comment'></div>使众如一。附离之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371562_comment'></div>无迹而寻。堂皇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371562", 1371562, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>靓深</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371562_comment'></div>两庑相照。申命国子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371562_comment'></div>能通法书者。分章揆日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371562_comment'></div>逊其业而缮写焉。笔削既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371562_comment'></div>雠校既精。白黑彬班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371562_comment'></div>瞭然飞动。以蒙来求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371562_comment'></div>焕若星辰。以敬来趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371562_comment'></div>肃如神明。以疑来质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371562_comment'></div>决若蓍蔡。由京师而风天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371562_comment'></div>覃及九译。咸知宗师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371562_comment'></div>非止服逢掖者钻仰而已。于是学官陈师正等暨生徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371562_comment'></div>凡四百二十有八人。请金石刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371562_comment'></div>且歌之曰。我有学宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371562_comment'></div>既倾而成之。我有壁经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371562_comment'></div>既昧而明之。孰规模之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371562_comment'></div>孰发挥之。祭酒维齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371562_comment'></div>博士维韦。俾我学徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371562_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371562", 1371562, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>弦歌</span>以时。切切祁祁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371562_comment'></div>不敖不嬉。庶乎遒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371562_comment'></div>来采我诗。时余为礼部郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371562_comment'></div>凡瞽宗之事。得以关决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371562_comment'></div>故书之以移史官。宜附于艺文云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371562_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1371562_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_title_1371609' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371609?labeling=true' target='_blank'>毗卢遮那佛华藏世界图赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371609")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371609_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371609'>佛说华严经。直入妙觉。不由诸乘。非大圆智。不能信解。德宗朝有龙象观公。能于是经了第一义。居上都云华寺。名闻十方。沙门嗣肇。是其上足。以经中九会。纂成华藏图。俾人瞻礼。即色生敬。因请余赞之。即说赞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371609_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371609'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371609'>清净不染花中莲。捧持世界百亿千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371609_comment'></div>从昏至觉不依缘。初初极极性自圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371609_comment'></div>写之绡素色相全。是色非色言非言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371630_comment'></div>呜呼子厚。我有一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371630_comment'></div>君其闻否。惟君平昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371630_comment'></div>聪明绝人。今虽化去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371630_comment'></div>夫岂无物。意君所死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371630_comment'></div>乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371630", 1371630, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>形质</span>耳。魂气何托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371630_comment'></div>听予哀辞。呜呼痛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371630_comment'></div>嗟予不天。甫遭闵凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371630_comment'></div>未离所部。三使来吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371630_comment'></div>忧我衰病。谕以苦言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371630_comment'></div>情深礼至。款密重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371630_comment'></div>期以中路。更申愿言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371630_comment'></div>途次衡阳。云有柳使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371630_comment'></div>谓复前约。忽承讣书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371630_comment'></div>惊号大叫。如得狂病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371630_comment'></div>良久问故。百哀攻中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371630_comment'></div>涕洟迸落。魂魄震越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371630_comment'></div>伸纸穷竟。得君遗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371630_comment'></div>绝弦之音。悽怆彻骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371630_comment'></div>初托遗嗣。知其不孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371630_comment'></div>末言归輤。从祔先域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371630_comment'></div>凡此数事。职在吾徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371630_comment'></div>永言素交。索居多远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371630_comment'></div>鄂渚差近。表臣分深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371630_comment'></div>想其闻讣。必勇于义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371630_comment'></div>巳命所使。持书径行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371630_comment'></div>友道尚终。当必加厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371630_comment'></div>退之承命。改牧宜阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371630_comment'></div>亦驰一函。候于便道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371630_comment'></div>勒石垂后。属于伊人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371630_comment'></div>安平宣英。会有还使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371630_comment'></div>悉已如礼。形于其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371630_comment'></div>呜呼子厚。此是何事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371630_comment'></div>朋友凋落。从古所悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371630_comment'></div>不图此言。乃为君发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371630_comment'></div>自君失意。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371630", 1371630, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>沈伏</span>远郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371630_comment'></div>近遇国士。方伸眉头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371630_comment'></div>亦见遗草。恭辞旧府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371630_comment'></div>志气相感。必踰常伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371630_comment'></div>顾予<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1371630", 1371630, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>负衅</span>。营奉方重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371630_comment'></div>犹冀前路。望君铭旌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371630_comment'></div>古之达人。朋友则服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371630_comment'></div>今有所厌。其礼莫申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371630_comment'></div>朝晡临后。出就别次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371630_comment'></div>南望桂水。哭我故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371630_comment'></div>孰云宿草。此恸何极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371630_comment'></div>呜呼子厚。卿真死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371630_comment'></div>终我此生。无相见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371630_comment'></div>何人不达。使君终否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371630_comment'></div>何人不老。使君夭死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371630_comment'></div>皇天后土。胡宁忍此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371630_comment'></div>知悲无益。奈恨无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371630_comment'></div>君之不闻。予心不理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371630_comment'></div>含酸执笔。辄复中止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371630_comment'></div>誓使周六。同于己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371630_comment'></div>魂兮来思。知我深旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371630_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371630_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1371630_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年6月</a>　六月，有文重祭柳宗元。作品：《重祭柳员外文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷40第602页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371631' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371631' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371631?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重祭柳员外文</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371631")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371631_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371631'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371631'>呜呼。自君之没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371631_comment'></div>行已八月。每一念至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371631_comment'></div>忽忽犹疑。今以丧来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371631_comment'></div>使我临哭。安知世上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371631_comment'></div>真有此事。既不可赎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371631_comment'></div>翻哀独生。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371631_comment'></div>出人之才。竟无施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371631_comment'></div>炯炯之气。戢于一木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371631_comment'></div>形与人等。今既如斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371631_comment'></div>识与人殊。今复何托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371631_comment'></div>生有高名。没为众悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371631_comment'></div>异服同志。异音同欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371631_comment'></div>唯我之哭。非吊非伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371631_comment'></div>来与君言。不成言哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371631_comment'></div>千哀万恨。寄以一声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371631_comment'></div>唯识真者。乃相知耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371631_comment'></div>庶几傥言。君傥闻乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371631_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。君有遗美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371631_comment'></div>其事多梗。桂林旧府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371631_comment'></div>感激生持。俾君内弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371631_comment'></div>得以义胜。平昔所念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371631_comment'></div>今则无违。旅魂克归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371631_comment'></div>崔生实主。幼稚甬上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371631_comment'></div>故人抚之。敦诗退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371631_comment'></div>各展其分。安平来赗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371631_comment'></div>礼成而归。其他赴告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371631_comment'></div>咸复于素。一以诚告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371631_comment'></div>君傥闻乎。呜呼痛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371631_comment'></div>君为已矣。予为苟生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371631_comment'></div>何以言别。长号数声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371631_comment'></div>冀乎异日。展我哀诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371631_comment'></div>呜呼痛哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371631_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1371631_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年8月</a>　本年正月，宪宗为宦官陈弘志所杀，穆宗即位。八月，令狐楚贬为衡州刺史，途经洛阳，与刘禹锡会面。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　为鄂岳观察使李程代作祭文悼柳宗元。作品：《为鄂州李大夫祭柳员外文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷40第603页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371632?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为鄂州李大夫祭柳员外文</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371632")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371632'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371632'>呜呼。至人以在生为传舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371632_comment'></div>以轩冕为傥来。达于理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371632_comment'></div>未尝惑此。昔予与君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371632_comment'></div>论之详熟。孔氏四科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371632_comment'></div>罕能相备。惟公特立秀出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371632_comment'></div>几于全器。才之何丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371632_comment'></div>运之何否。大川未济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371632_comment'></div>乃失巨舰。长途始半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371632_comment'></div>而丧良骥。缙绅之伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371632_comment'></div>孰不堕泪。昔者与君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371632_comment'></div>交臂相得。一言一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371632_comment'></div>未始有极。驰声日下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371632_comment'></div>骛名天衢。射策差池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371632_comment'></div>高科齐驱。携手书殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371632_comment'></div>分曹蓝曲。心志谐同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371632_comment'></div>追欢相续。或秋月衔觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371632_comment'></div>或春日驰毂。甸服载期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371632_comment'></div>同升宪府。察视之烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371632_comment'></div>斯焉接武。君迁外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371632_comment'></div>予侍内闱。出处虽閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371632_comment'></div>音尘不亏。势变时移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371632_comment'></div>遭罹多故。中复赐环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371632_comment'></div>上京良遇。曾不踰月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371632_comment'></div>君又即路。远持郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371632_comment'></div>柳江之壖。居陋行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371632_comment'></div>疲人歌焉。予来夏口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371632_comment'></div>忽复三年。离索则久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371632_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371632", 1371632, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>音贶</span>屡传。箧盈草隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371632_comment'></div>架满文篇。钟索继美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371632_comment'></div>班扬差肩。贾谊赋鵩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371632_comment'></div>屈原问天。自古有死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371632_comment'></div>奚论后先。痛君未老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371632_comment'></div>美志莫宣。邅回世路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371632_comment'></div>奄忽下泉。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371632_comment'></div>令妻早谢。稚子四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371632_comment'></div>天丧斯文。而君永逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371632_comment'></div>翩翩丹旐。来自遐裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371632_comment'></div>闻君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371632", 1371632, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>旅榇</span>。既及岳阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371632_comment'></div>寝门一恸。贯裂衷肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371632_comment'></div>执绋礼乖。出疆路阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371632_comment'></div>故人奠觞。莫克亲举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371632_comment'></div>驰神假梦。冀获寤语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371632_comment'></div>平生密怀。愿君遣吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371632_comment'></div>遗孤之才与不才。敢同己子之相许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371632_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371632_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1371632_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　应故友吕温之子请，为吕温文集作序。作品：《唐故衡州刺史吕君集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷19第234页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371553?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故衡州刺史吕君集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371553")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371553'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371553'>五行秀气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371553_comment'></div>得之居多者为隽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371553_comment'></div>其色<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>潋滟</span>于颜间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371553_comment'></div>其声发而为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371553_comment'></div>天之所与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371553_comment'></div>有物来相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371553_comment'></div>彼由学而致者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371553_comment'></div>如工人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>染夏</span>以视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>羽畎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371553_comment'></div>有生死之殊矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371553_comment'></div>初贞元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371553_comment'></div>天子之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371553_comment'></div>焕乎垂光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371553_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>庆霄</span>在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371553_comment'></div>万物五色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371553_comment'></div>天下文人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371553_comment'></div>为气所召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371553_comment'></div>其生乃蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371553_comment'></div>灵芝萐莆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371553_comment'></div>与百果齐圻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371553_comment'></div>然煌煌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>翘翘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371553_comment'></div>出乎其类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371553_comment'></div>终为伟人者几希矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371553_comment'></div>东平吕和叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371553_comment'></div>实生是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371553_comment'></div>而绝人甚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371553_comment'></div>始以文章振三川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371553_comment'></div>三川守以为贡士之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371553_comment'></div>名声四驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371553_comment'></div>速如羽檄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371553_comment'></div>长安中诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371553_comment'></div>咸避其锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371553_comment'></div>两科连中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371553_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>铓刃</span>愈出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371553_comment'></div>德宗闻其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371553_comment'></div>自集贤殿校书郎擢为左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371553_comment'></div>明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371553_comment'></div>犬戎请和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371553_comment'></div>上问能使绝域者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371553_comment'></div>君以奇表有专对材膺选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371553_comment'></div>转殿内史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371553_comment'></div>锡之银章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371553_comment'></div>还拜尚书户部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371553_comment'></div>转司封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371553_comment'></div>迁刑部郎中兼侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371553_comment'></div>副治书之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371553_comment'></div>会中执法左迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371553_comment'></div>缘坐出为道州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371553_comment'></div>以善政闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371553_comment'></div>改衡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371553_comment'></div>年四十而殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371553_comment'></div>后十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371553_comment'></div>其子安衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371553_comment'></div>泣奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>遗草</span>来谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371553_comment'></div>咨余叙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371553_comment'></div>成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>一家言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371553_comment'></div>凡二百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371553_comment'></div>勒成十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371553_comment'></div>和叔名温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371553_comment'></div>别字化光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371553_comment'></div>祖考皆以文章至大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371553_comment'></div>早闻诗礼于先侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371553_comment'></div>又师吴郡陆贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371553_comment'></div>通春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371553_comment'></div>从安定梁肃学文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371553_comment'></div>勇于艺能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371553_comment'></div>咸有所祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371553_comment'></div>年益壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371553_comment'></div>志益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371553_comment'></div>遂拨去文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371553_comment'></div>与隽贤交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371553_comment'></div>重气概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371553_comment'></div>覈名实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371553_comment'></div>歆然以致君及物为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>大欲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371553_comment'></div>每与其徒讲疑考要皇王富强之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371553_comment'></div>臣子忠孝之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371553_comment'></div>出入上下百千年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371553_comment'></div>诋诃角逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371553_comment'></div>謺发连中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371553_comment'></div>得一善辄盱衡击节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371553_comment'></div>扬袂顿足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371553_comment'></div>信容得色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371553_comment'></div>舞于眉端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371553_comment'></div>以为桉是言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371553_comment'></div>循是理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371553_comment'></div>合乎心而气将之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371553_comment'></div>昭昭然若揭日月而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371553_comment'></div>孰能阏其势而争夫光者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371553_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371553_comment'></div>言可信而时异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371553_comment'></div>道甚长而命窄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371553_comment'></div>精气为物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371553_comment'></div>其有所归乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371553_comment'></div>古之为书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371553_comment'></div>先立言而后体物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371553_comment'></div>贾生之书首过秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371553_comment'></div>而荀卿亦后其赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371553_comment'></div>和叔年少遇君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371553_comment'></div>而卒以谪似贾生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371553_comment'></div>能明王道似荀卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371553_comment'></div>故余所先后视二书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371553_comment'></div>断自人文化成论至诸葛武侯庙记为上篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371553_comment'></div>其他咸有为而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371553_comment'></div>始学左氏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371553_comment'></div>故其文微为富艳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371553_comment'></div>夫羿之关弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371553_comment'></div>惟巴蛇九日乃能尽其彀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371553_comment'></div>而回注<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1371553", 1371553, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>鴳爵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371553_comment'></div>亦要失中于寻常之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371553_comment'></div>非羿之手弓有能有不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371553_comment'></div>所遇然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371553_comment'></div>后之达解者推而广之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371553_comment'></div>知余之素交。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_16881' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/16881?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤愚溪三首<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371489'>臣某言。王敬仁至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371489_comment'></div>奉口敕。存问微臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371489_comment'></div>即属陛下受命承天。企揖让之盛仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371489_comment'></div>隔肃雍之大礼。元英匝岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371489_comment'></div>眷甚遗簪。草木之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371489_comment'></div>何酬造化。无任感恩慕恋之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_17230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17230'>千金买绝境，永日属闲人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_17450'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17450'>远谪年犹少，初归鬓已衰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17450_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17450'>门闲故吏去，室静老僧期。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17450_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17450'>不见蜘蛛集，频为佝偻<span "poem_sentence_3_17450")'>囊未出</span>，寒甚谷难吹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17450_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17450'><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_5_17450'>商歌夜深后，听者竟为谁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17450_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17450'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_17450_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年5月</a>　在洛阳。五月某日，作汴州刺史厅壁记。作品：《汴州刺史厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第95页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371572' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371572' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371572?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汴州刺史厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371572")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371572_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371572'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371572'>本朝以浚仪为汴州刺史治所。自隋酾新渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371572_comment'></div>吸黄河而东行。州含其枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371572_comment'></div>为天下剧。内屏王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371572_comment'></div>东雄诸侯。居无事时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371572_comment'></div>常带廉察使。兵兴已还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371572_comment'></div>益以节旄。用人得否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371572_comment'></div>系国轻重。长庆四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371572_comment'></div>诏书命河南尹燉煌令狐公来莅来刺。锡之介圭使印<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371572", 1371572, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>兵符</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371572_comment'></div>汴人交贺。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371572", 1371572, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>肴醳</span>腾贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371572_comment'></div>惟是邦始都于魏惠王。始郡于宇文周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371572_comment'></div>星躔回环。天驷垂光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371572_comment'></div>地为四战。故其俗右武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371572_comment'></div>人具五都。故其气习豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371572_comment'></div>公自为宰相时。已熟四方之利病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371572_comment'></div>凡所戾止。参然前知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371572_comment'></div>既视事三日。挹群吏与之言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371572_comment'></div>吾食止圭田。吾用止公入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371572_comment'></div>凡他给过制伤廉浼洁者悉罢之。壹归乎公藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371572_comment'></div>凡曲防苛禁不情乖体者悉刬之。壹出乎令典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371572_comment'></div>凡关徵船算夺时专利者悉更之。壹遵乎诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371572_comment'></div>然后刑丽事而详。赏以时而均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371572_comment'></div>兴学以劝蓺。示宽以化勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371572_comment'></div>居数月。而汴州人恂恂然无复故态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371572_comment'></div>明年大成。议者若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371572_comment'></div>奕奕浚都。国之咽颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371572_comment'></div>咀清咽和。旁畅四支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371572_comment'></div>东夏黠马。由我以肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371572_comment'></div>是浚之治。非所泽于所履而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371572_comment'></div>初公七代祖在隋为纳言。大业中持节居此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371572_comment'></div>亦号刺史。距今馀二百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371572_comment'></div>公实能似。既拜阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371572_comment'></div>发鱼书合左右契。由阼阶跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371572_comment'></div>遐踵前武。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371572", 1371572, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>歆然</span>如闻其馨香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371572_comment'></div>肃然如睹其形容。信乎君子之泽远而有光辉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371572_comment'></div>他日。命游梁客志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371572_comment'></div>书于厅事。谨桉前贤之在此堂者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371572_comment'></div>张平原首之。陆氏撰节度使记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371572_comment'></div>揭于东壁详矣。今公命为刺史记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371572_comment'></div>书于右端。谨月而日之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371572_comment'></div>以公为冠。大和元年夏五月某日记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371572_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371572_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　在洛阳。刘蔚赴越，刘禹锡作文诫。作品：《犹子蔚适越诫》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷20第244页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371611?labeling=true' target='_blank'>犹子蔚适越诫</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371611")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371611'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371611'>犹子蔚。晨跪于席端曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371611_comment'></div>臣幼承叔父训。始勾萌至于扶疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371611_comment'></div>前日不自意。有司以名污贤能书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371611_comment'></div>又不自意。被丞相府召为从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371611_comment'></div>重兢累愧。惧贻叔父羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371611_comment'></div>今当行。乞辞以为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371611_comment'></div>余曰。若知彝器乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371611_comment'></div>始乎斲轮。因入规矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371611_comment'></div>刳中廉外。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371611", 1371611, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>枵然</span>而有容者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371611_comment'></div>理腻质坚。然后加密石焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371611_comment'></div>风戾日晞。不剖<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作副）</span>不聱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371611_comment'></div>然后青黄之。鸟兽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371611_comment'></div>饰乎瑶金。贵在清庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371611_comment'></div>其用也羃以养洁。其藏也椟以养光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371611_comment'></div>苟措非其所。一有毫发之伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371611_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371611", 1371611, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>儡然</span>与破甑为伍矣。汝之始成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371611_comment'></div>犹器之作朴。是宜力学为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371611", 1371611, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>砻斲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371611_comment'></div>亲贤为青黄。睦僚友为瑶金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371611_comment'></div>忠所奉为清庙。尽敬以为羃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371611_comment'></div>慎微以为椟。去怠以护伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371611_comment'></div>在勤而行之耳。设有人思披重霄而挹颢气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371611_comment'></div>病无阶而升有力者。揭层梯而倚泰山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371611_comment'></div>然而一举足而一高。非独揭梯者所能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371611_comment'></div>凡大位未尝旷。故世多贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371611_comment'></div>唯天爵并者。乃可伟耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371611_comment'></div>夫伟人之一顾踰乎华章。而一非亦惨乎黥刖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371611_comment'></div>行矣慎诸。吾见垂天之云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371611_comment'></div>在尔肩腋间矣。昔吾友柳仪曹尝谓吾文隽而膏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371611_comment'></div>味无穷而炙愈出也。迟汝到丞相府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371611_comment'></div>居一二日。袖吾文入谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371611_comment'></div>以取质焉。丞相吾友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371611_comment'></div>汝事所从。如事诸父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371611_comment'></div>借有不如意。推起敬之心以奉焉无忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371611_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1371611_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年6月</a>　六月，为主客郎中，分司东都。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年6月</a>　六月，授主客郎中分司后，上表举左补阙姜伦自代。作品：《举姜补阙伦自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第204页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371511?labeling=true' target='_blank'>举姜补阙伦自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371511")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371511'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371511'>东都尚书省前左补阙姜伦。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371511_comment'></div>臣蒙恩授尚书主客郎中分司东都。伏准建中元年正月五日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371511_comment'></div>常参官上后三日举一人自代者。臣伏详诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371511_comment'></div>欲达聪旁求。发扬幽远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371511_comment'></div>故人人得言所知。不当循其阶次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371511_comment'></div>臣伏以前件官有儒学士行。蒙以谏官徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371511_comment'></div>会其年老被疾。不堪上道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371511_comment'></div>有司桉视如状。不复逼迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371511_comment'></div>至今家居。而笃志无倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371511_comment'></div>臣谨举为郎吏。分司别都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371511_comment'></div>冀优贤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371511", 1371511, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>振滞</span>。两得其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371511_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1371511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年6月</a>　春，致谢启。作品：《谢裴相公启》《谢窦相公启》<div id='poem_1371542' id='poem_sentence_2_1371542_comment'></div>或有论荐。如陷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371542", 1371542, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>还泞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371542_comment'></div>动而愈沈。甘心终否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371542_comment'></div>无路自奋。岂意天未剿绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371542_comment'></div>仁人持衡。纡神虑于多方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371542_comment'></div>起堙沦于久废。居剥极之际。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371542_comment'></div>誓以死生。草木之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371542_comment'></div>惜其晼晚。章程有守。<div class='inline' class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17408'>并引：友人白乐天，去年罢吴郡，挈双鹤雏以归，余相遇于扬子津，阅玩终日，翔舞调态，一符相书，信华亭之尤物也。今年春，乐天为秘书监，不以鹤随，置之洛阳第。一旦，予入门，问讯其家人，鹤轩然来睨，如记相识，徘徊俯仰，似含情顾慕填膺而不能言者，因作〈鹤叹〉以赠乐天。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　秋，因患足疾，迁太子宾客，分司东都，上表谢恩。作品：《谢授分司表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第198页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371493' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371493' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371493?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢授分司表</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371493")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371493_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371493'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371493'>臣某言。伏奉今月十九日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371493_comment'></div>授臣太子宾客分司东都者。宠命自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371493_comment'></div>战越<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371493", 1371493, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>无地</span>。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371493_comment'></div>臣发迹书生。以文为业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371493_comment'></div>出身入仕。四十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371493_comment'></div>顷自集贤学士出守吴郡。面辞之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371493_comment'></div>亲承德音。念百姓水潦之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371493_comment'></div>示微臣政理之法。臣祗承圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371493_comment'></div>夙夜竭诚。闾里获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371493_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371493", 1371493, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>流庸</span>尽复。猥蒙朝奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371493_comment'></div>锡以金章。及迁同州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371493_comment'></div>又遇歉旱。悉心绥抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371493_comment'></div>幸免流离。今荷天慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371493_comment'></div>悯臣耆旧。列名宾护之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371493_comment'></div>分局河洛之都。老马沾束帛之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371493_comment'></div>枯株蒙雨露之泽。获居荣秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371493_comment'></div>以毕馀年。顾此微躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371493_comment'></div>实为厚幸。伏以臣始为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371493_comment'></div>逮事德宗。今忝宫僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371493_comment'></div>幸逢圣日。举四海之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371493_comment'></div>贤能则多。求六朝之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371493_comment'></div>零落将尽。虽迫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371493", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371561_comment'></div>辞不拜职。授太子少傅分务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371561_comment'></div>以遂其高。时予代居左冯。<div class='inline' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371521'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371521'>处士严毖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371521_comment'></div>右左庶子损之之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371521_comment'></div>国子司业士元之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371521_comment'></div>旧名保嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371521_comment'></div>亦有官班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371521_comment'></div>顷者李宾客渤常与之游。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1371521_comment'></div>汨没风尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371521_comment'></div>有足悲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371521_comment'></div>伏见赦文节目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371521_comment'></div>委州郡长吏搜访隐沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371521_comment'></div>夫举无它。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371521_comment'></div>唯善所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371521_comment'></div>每览珠英卷后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371521_comment'></div>列学士姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371521_comment'></div>有常州人符凤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371521_comment'></div>白衣在选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371521_comment'></div>取其艺业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371521_comment'></div>不弃远人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371521_comment'></div>某忝被儒官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371521_comment'></div>得以荐士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371521_comment'></div>亦非出位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371521_comment'></div>冀不废言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371521_comment'></div>傥宏文集贤史氏之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371521_comment'></div>采其实学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371521_comment'></div>有劝诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371521_comment'></div>伏以桂州辟之于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371521_comment'></div>某荐之于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371521_comment'></div>岂必有土长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371521_comment'></div>然后事行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371521_comment'></div>伏惟试味斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371521_comment'></div>降意详择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371521_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1371521_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　在洛阳。十一月后，许州文宣王新庙成，禹锡作碑文。作品：《许州文宣王新庙碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷3第36页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371614' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371614' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371614?labeling=true' target='_blank'>许州文宣王新庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371614")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371614_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371614'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371614'>岁在丙辰元日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371614_comment'></div>开成许州牧尚书杜公作文宣王庙暨学舍于兑隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371614_comment'></div>革故而鼎新也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371614_comment'></div>前年公受社与钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371614_comment'></div>且董淮扬汝南之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371614_comment'></div>八月上丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371614_comment'></div>释菜于宣父之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371614_comment'></div>陋宇荒阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371614_comment'></div>不足回旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371614_comment'></div>已事而叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371614_comment'></div>乃询黄发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371614_comment'></div>有乡先生前致辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371614_comment'></div>自盗起幽陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371614_comment'></div>许为兵冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371614_comment'></div>连战交捽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371614_comment'></div>率无宁岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371614_comment'></div>耳悦钲鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371614_comment'></div>不闻弦歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371614_comment'></div>目不知书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371614_comment'></div>不害为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371614_comment'></div>迩来生聚教养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371614_comment'></div>起居祖习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371614_comment'></div>一出于军容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371614_comment'></div>今幸天子怜许民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371614_comment'></div>为择贤侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371614_comment'></div>此人人思治之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371614_comment'></div>公曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371614_comment'></div>吾当先后之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371614_comment'></div>于是元年修戎律以通众志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371614_comment'></div>次年成郡政以蠲民瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371614_comment'></div>季年崇教本以厚民风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371614_comment'></div>我言既从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371614_comment'></div>乃卜新宫瀷水之濒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371614_comment'></div>城池在东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371614_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371614", 1371614, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>登登</span>其杵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371614_comment'></div>坎坎其斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371614_comment'></div>绳之墨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371614_comment'></div>凿枘枝梧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371614_comment'></div>载涂载奂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371614_comment'></div>𪐦焉陵虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371614_comment'></div>寝庙宏敞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371614_comment'></div>斋宫严閟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371614_comment'></div>轩墀厢庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371614_comment'></div>俨雅清洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371614_comment'></div>门庭墙仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371614_comment'></div>望之生敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371614_comment'></div>外饰觚棱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371614_comment'></div>中设黼幄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371614_comment'></div>向明当宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371614_comment'></div>用王礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371614_comment'></div>尧头禹身华冠象佩之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371614_comment'></div>取之自邹鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371614_comment'></div>及门睹奥偶形画像之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371614_comment'></div>取之自太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371614_comment'></div>尊彝笾豆青黄规矩之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371614_comment'></div>秉周礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371614_comment'></div>牺牲制币荐献升降之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371614_comment'></div>遵国章也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371614_comment'></div>藏经于重檐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371614_comment'></div>敛器于庋椟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371614_comment'></div>讲筵有位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371614_comment'></div>鼓箧有室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371614_comment'></div>授经有博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371614_comment'></div>督课有助教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371614_comment'></div>指踪有役夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371614_comment'></div>洒扫有庙干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371614_comment'></div>公又割隙地为广圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371614_comment'></div>莳其柔蔬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371614_comment'></div>而常菹旨蓄之御备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371614_comment'></div>舍已俸为子钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371614_comment'></div>榷其孳赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371614_comment'></div>而盐酪釭膏之用给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371614_comment'></div>济济莘莘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371614_comment'></div>化行风驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371614_comment'></div>家慕恭俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371614_comment'></div>户知敬让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371614_comment'></div>父诲其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371614_comment'></div>兄规其弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371614_comment'></div>不游学堂。<div id='poem_sentence_80_1371614_comment'></div>往往弭雄姿而观习礼义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371614_comment'></div>矜甲冑者知根于忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371614_comment'></div>服缦胡者不敢侮缝掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371614_comment'></div>教化之移人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371614_comment'></div>如置邮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371614_comment'></div>冬十一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371614_comment'></div>许人以新儒宫成来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371614_comment'></div>且乞辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371614_comment'></div>欲行乎远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371614_comment'></div>公名悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371614_comment'></div>字永裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371614_comment'></div>故丞相岐国公之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371614_comment'></div>统名曰通典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371614_comment'></div>藏在石室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371614_comment'></div>副行人间。<div id='poem_sentence_102_1371614_comment'></div>播于声诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371614_comment'></div>懿哉能世其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371614_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371614_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_113_1371614'>许介韩魏。<div id='poem_sentence_115_1371614_comment'></div>其斗㘖㘖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371614_comment'></div>亦有儒宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371614_comment'></div>轧于兵间。<div id='poem_sentence_120_1371614_comment'></div>俾人向学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371614_comment'></div>王化之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371614_comment'></div>便地爰相。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17379'>影近画梁迎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17379", 17379, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371567_comment'></div>始画天下为十道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371567_comment'></div>古荆梁之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371567_comment'></div>举曰山南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371567_comment'></div>厥后析为东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371567_comment'></div>天汉之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371567_comment'></div>实居右部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371567_comment'></div>桉梁州为都督治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371567_comment'></div>领十有五州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371567_comment'></div>县道带蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371567_comment'></div>山川扼陇蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371567_comment'></div>故二千石有采访防御之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371567_comment'></div>兵兴多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371567_comment'></div>其任益重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371567_comment'></div>澄清节钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371567_comment'></div>二柄兼委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371567_comment'></div>建中末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371567_comment'></div>德宗南巡狩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371567_comment'></div>偃翠华而徘徊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371567_comment'></div>箫勺之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371567_comment'></div>洽于巴汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371567_comment'></div>戡难清宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371567_comment'></div>六龙言旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371567_comment'></div>乃下诏复除徵繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371567_comment'></div>升州为府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371567_comment'></div>等威班制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371567_comment'></div>与岐益同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371567_comment'></div>地既尊大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371567_comment'></div>用人随异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371567_comment'></div>故自兴元至大和五十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371567_comment'></div>以勋庸佩相印者三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371567_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371567", 1371567, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>谟明</span>历真相者九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371567_comment'></div>由台席授钺未几复入相者再焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371567_comment'></div>磊落震耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371567_comment'></div>冠于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371567_comment'></div>去年夏四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371567_comment'></div>今丞相赵郡公徵还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371567", 1371567, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>泰阶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371567_comment'></div>遂命左仆射燉煌公往践其武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371567_comment'></div>向之真相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371567_comment'></div>及公而十焉。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年11月</a>　仍为太子宾客，分司东都。十一月，令狐楚卒，年七十。刘禹锡将大和五年以后与令狐楚唱和诗篇，续编入《彭阳唱和集》中。作品：《彭阳唱和集后引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第588页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371559' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371559' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371559?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371559'>贞元中。予为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371559_comment'></div>彭阳公从事于太原。以文章相往来有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371559_comment'></div>无何。予受谴南迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371559_comment'></div>十馀年间。公登用至宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371559_comment'></div>出为衡州。方获会面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371559_comment'></div>输写<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371559", 1371559, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>蕴积</span>。相视泫然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371559_comment'></div>尔后或杂赋诗赠答。编成两轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371559_comment'></div>大和五年。余领吴郡。<div
