ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年</a>　仍为太子宾客，分司东都。为人文集作序。作品：《唐故中书侍郎平章事韦公集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷19第226页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371551?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故中书侍郎平章事韦公集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371551")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371551_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371551'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371551'>汉庭以贤良文学徵有道之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371551_comment'></div>公孙宏条对第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371551_comment'></div>席其势鼓行人间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371551_comment'></div>取丞相且侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371551_comment'></div>使汉有得人之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371551_comment'></div>伊宏发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371551_comment'></div>皇唐文物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371551_comment'></div>与汉同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371551_comment'></div>故天后朝燕国张公说以词标文苑徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371551_comment'></div>玄宗朝曲江张公九龄以道侔伊吕徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371551_comment'></div>德宗朝天水姜公公辅杜陵韦公执谊河东裴公垍以贤良方正徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371551_comment'></div>宪宗朝河南元公祯京兆韦公惇以才识兼茂徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371551_comment'></div>陇西牛公僧孺李公宗闵以能直言极谏徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371551_comment'></div>咸用对策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371551_comment'></div>甲于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371551_comment'></div>继而有声宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371551_comment'></div>古今相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371551_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>落落</span>然如骑星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371551_comment'></div>与夫启<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>版筑饭牛</span>者异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371551_comment'></div>公本名淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371551_comment'></div>举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371551_comment'></div>登贤良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371551_comment'></div>既仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371551_comment'></div>更名处厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371551_comment'></div>字德载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371551_comment'></div>汉丞相扶阳侯之裔孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371551_comment'></div>后周逍遥公夐之八代孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371551_comment'></div>江陵节度参谋监察御史里行赠右仆射某之元子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371551_comment'></div>生而聪明绝人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371551_comment'></div>在提孩发言成诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371551_comment'></div>未几能赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371551_comment'></div>受经于先君仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371551_comment'></div>学文于伯舅许公孟容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371551_comment'></div>及壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371551_comment'></div>通六经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371551_comment'></div>旁贯百氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371551_comment'></div>咨天人之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371551_comment'></div>遂探历数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371551_comment'></div>明天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371551_comment'></div>穷性命之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371551_comment'></div>以至于佛书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371551_comment'></div>尤所通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371551_comment'></div>初为集贤殿校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371551_comment'></div>宰相李赵公监修国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371551_comment'></div>引公直东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371551_comment'></div>就改咸阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371551_comment'></div>迁右拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371551_comment'></div>转左补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371551_comment'></div>世称有史才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371551_comment'></div>而能谏诤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371551_comment'></div>入尚书为郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371551_comment'></div>历礼部考功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371551_comment'></div>皆人望所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371551_comment'></div>上方用威武以詟不庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371551_comment'></div>宿兵寝久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371551_comment'></div>韦丞相贯之酌人情上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371551_comment'></div>不合意册免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371551_comment'></div>因历诋所善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371551_comment'></div>公在伍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371551_comment'></div>出为开州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371551_comment'></div>居二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371551_comment'></div>执友崔敦诗为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371551_comment'></div>徵拜户部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371551_comment'></div>至阙下旬岁间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371551_comment'></div>以本官知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371551_comment'></div>穆宗新即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371551_comment'></div>注意近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371551_comment'></div>召入翰林充侍讲学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371551_comment'></div>初授谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371551_comment'></div>续换中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371551_comment'></div>侍游蓬莱池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371551_comment'></div>延问大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371551_comment'></div>退而进六经法言二十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371551_comment'></div>优诏答之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371551_comment'></div>赐以金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371551_comment'></div>寻迁权知兵部侍郎知制诰翰林侍讲史馆修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371551_comment'></div>长庆四年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371551_comment'></div>敬宗践祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371551_comment'></div>以公用经术<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>左右</span>先帝五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371551_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>稔闻</span>其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371551_comment'></div>尤所钦倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371551_comment'></div>内署故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371551_comment'></div>与外庭不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371551_comment'></div>凡言翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371551_comment'></div>必草诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371551_comment'></div>有侍讲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371551_comment'></div>专备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371551_comment'></div>虽官为中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371551_comment'></div>或它官知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371551_comment'></div>第用其班次耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371551_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>窜言</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/90/Comments/1")'>训词</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371551_comment'></div>至是上器公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371551_comment'></div>且有以宠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371551_comment'></div>乃使内谒者申命去侍讲之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371551_comment'></div>虑未谕于百执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371551_comment'></div>居数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371551_comment'></div>降命书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371551_comment'></div>重举旧官以明新意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371551_comment'></div>寻真拜夏官贰卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371551_comment'></div>由是内庭词臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371551_comment'></div>无出其右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371551_comment'></div>凡密旨必承乎权舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371551_comment'></div>故号承旨学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371551_comment'></div>上富有春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371551_comment'></div>未亲庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371551_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>疑滞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371551_comment'></div>视公如蓍龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371551_comment'></div>宝历季年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371551_comment'></div>宫壸间一夕生变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371551_comment'></div>人情大骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371551_comment'></div>虽鼎臣无所关决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371551_comment'></div>惟内署得预参画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371551_comment'></div>群议閧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371551_comment'></div>俟公一言而定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371551_comment'></div>戡难缵服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371551_comment'></div>再维乾纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371551_comment'></div>今上继统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371551_comment'></div>策勋第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371551_comment'></div>擢拜中书侍郎同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371551_comment'></div>以高才遇英主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371551_comment'></div>功显人伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371551_comment'></div>言无不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371551_comment'></div>笔端肤寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371551_comment'></div>泽及天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371551_comment'></div>尽罢冗食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371551_comment'></div>请归才人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371551_comment'></div>事先有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371551_comment'></div>物止常贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371551_comment'></div>城社无犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371551_comment'></div>岩廊益尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371551_comment'></div>感恩尽瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371551_comment'></div>不啬神用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371551_comment'></div>大和二年十二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371551_comment'></div>上前言事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371551_comment'></div>未及毕辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371551_comment'></div>疾暴作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371551_comment'></div>以朝服委地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371551_comment'></div>同列白奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371551_comment'></div>搢笏扶持之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371551_comment'></div>不能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371551_comment'></div>上命中贵人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_140_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>左右</span>翼负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371551_comment'></div>归于中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371551_comment'></div>如大醉状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371551_comment'></div>上震惊咨嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371551_comment'></div>徵医赐药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371551_comment'></div>旁午謺委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371551_comment'></div>会暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371551_comment'></div>肩舆至第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371551_comment'></div>诘旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371551_comment'></div>以疾不起闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371551_comment'></div>赠禭加常礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371551_comment'></div>后十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371551_comment'></div>嗣子蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371551_comment'></div>以太子舍人直宏文馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371551_comment'></div>编次遗文七十通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371551_comment'></div>衔哀贡诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371551_comment'></div>乞序以冠其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371551_comment'></div>谨桉公文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371551_comment'></div>未为近臣已前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371551_comment'></div>所著词赋赞论记述铭志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371551_comment'></div>皆文士之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371551_comment'></div>以才丽为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371551_comment'></div>自入为学士至宰相以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371551_comment'></div>所执笔皆经纶制置财成润色之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371551_comment'></div>以识度为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371551_comment'></div>观其发德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371551_comment'></div>福生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371551_comment'></div>沛然如时雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371551_comment'></div>褒元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371551_comment'></div>谕功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371551_comment'></div>穆然如景风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371551_comment'></div>命相之册和而庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371551_comment'></div>命将之诰昭而毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371551_comment'></div>荐贤能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371551_comment'></div>其气似孔文举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371551_comment'></div>论经学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371551_comment'></div>其博似刘子骏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371551_comment'></div>发十难以摧言利者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371551_comment'></div>其辩似管夷吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371551_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371551_comment'></div>逢时得君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371551_comment'></div>奋智谋以取高位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371551_comment'></div>而令名随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371551_comment'></div>岂不伟哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371551_comment'></div>初蕃既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_184_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>纂修</span>父书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371551_comment'></div>咨于先执李习之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371551_comment'></div>请文为领袖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371551_comment'></div>许而未就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371551_comment'></div>一旦习之悄然谓蕃曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371551_comment'></div>翱昔与韩吏部退之为文章盟主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371551_comment'></div>同时伦辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371551_comment'></div>柳仪曹宗元刘宾客梦得耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371551_comment'></div>韩柳之逝久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371551_comment'></div>今翱又被病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371551_comment'></div>虑不能自述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371551_comment'></div>有孤前言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371551_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_196_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/196/Comments/0")'>赍恨</span>无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1371551_comment'></div>将子荐诚于刘君乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371551_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1371551_comment'></div>习之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_199_1371551", 1371551, "Clauses/199/Comments/0")'>梦奠</span>于襄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1371551_comment'></div>蕃具道其语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371551_comment'></div>余感相国之平昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371551_comment'></div>且嘉蕃之虔虔孝敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1371551_comment'></div>庶几能世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1371551_comment'></div>故不敢让云尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_204_1371551_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年</a>　仍为太子宾客，分司东都。为人作碑文。作品：《唐故福建等州都团练观察处置使福州刺史兼御史中丞赠左散骑常侍薛公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷3第33页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《唐故宣歙池等州都团练观察处置使宣州刺史兼御史中丞赠左散骑常侍王公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷3第42页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故福建等州都团练观察处置使福州刺史兼御史中丞赠左散骑常侍薛公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371620")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371620'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371620'>薛在三代为侯国。介于邹鲁间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371620_comment'></div>传世三十有一。为齐所并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371620_comment'></div>其公子奔楚。锡土田于沛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371620_comment'></div>汉末避仇之成都。曹魏平蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371620_comment'></div>徙家汾阴。遂为河东临晋人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371620_comment'></div>自奚仲为夏车服大夫。距今数千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371620_comment'></div>乘轩服冕。舄奕冠世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371620_comment'></div>言氏族者。署为关内甲姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371620_comment'></div>天意若曰。始有功于车服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371620_comment'></div>锡尔子孙。世世有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371620_comment'></div>公讳謇。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371620_comment'></div>曾祖宝允。以名家子且有学行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371620_comment'></div>历尚书郎雍州司马邠州刺史。王父绘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371620_comment'></div>有隽材。刺三郡金密绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371620_comment'></div>皆以治闻。累绩至银青光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371620_comment'></div>封龙门侯。烈考承矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371620_comment'></div>以文亡害仕至大理丞。公幼承前人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371620", 1371620, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>覆露</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371620_comment'></div>补崇文生。岁满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371620_comment'></div>调主簿书于亳之谯苦二邑。又尉于东畿之河清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371620_comment'></div>贞元中。上方与丞相调兵食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371620_comment'></div>思得通吏治而习边事者。计相以公为对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371620_comment'></div>乃授监察御史里行。充京兆水运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371620_comment'></div>局居雁门。主谷籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371620_comment'></div>具舟楫。募勇壮且便弓矢者为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371620", 1371620, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>榜夫</span>千有馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371620_comment'></div>隶尺籍伍符。制如舟师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371620_comment'></div>诏以中贵人护之。声震塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371620_comment'></div>每发粟溯河北行。涉戎落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371620_comment'></div>以馈缘边诸军及乘障者。虽河塞迥远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371620_comment'></div>必尅期如合符。一岁中省费万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371620_comment'></div>累加侍御史内供奉。赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371620_comment'></div>有司条白其劳。入拜殿中内史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371620_comment'></div>未几。淮海节将以戎倅缺闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371620_comment'></div>事下丞相御史择可者。佥曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371620_comment'></div>公政事已试。遂授检校户部员外郎兼御史淮南军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371620_comment'></div>寻转驾部郎中。锡以金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371620_comment'></div>遇府迁。申命真相赵国公带中书侍郎代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371620_comment'></div>公主行台留务。赵公文茵及境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371620_comment'></div>视置邮供帐。及郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371620_comment'></div>视将迎部伍。下车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371620_comment'></div>视帘帏器备。乃曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371620_comment'></div>信奇才也。此不足以展骥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371620_comment'></div>朝廷知之。擢为泗滨守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371620_comment'></div>既报政。就加御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371620_comment'></div>俄迁福建都团练观察使。闽有负海之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371620_comment'></div>其民悍而俗鬼。居洞砦家桴筏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371620_comment'></div>与华言不通。公兼戎索以治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371620_comment'></div>五州民咸悦。元和十年某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371620_comment'></div>薨于位。年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371620_comment'></div>赠右散骑常侍。夫人赵郡李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371620_comment'></div>无儿早世。继夫人陇西李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371620_comment'></div>检校礼部尚书河东节度使说之女。生子凝为嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371620_comment'></div>季子茂宏以诸侯礼仪返葬故里蛾眉原。从周也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371620_comment'></div>后二十有三年。元曰开成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371620_comment'></div>凝为平卢从事。谨桉令甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371620_comment'></div>砻碑石来乞辞。以垂于悠久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371620_comment'></div>初公治粟于朔陲。愚方冠惠文冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371620_comment'></div>察行马外事。聆风相厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371620_comment'></div>谓可妻也。以元女归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371620_comment'></div>明年。愚入尚书为郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371620_comment'></div>职隶计司。因白计相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371620_comment'></div>公召来会府。行有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371620_comment'></div>遇内禅惟新。愚以缘坐左贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371620_comment'></div>间关外役。竟不克面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371620_comment'></div>然而公之为德善。灌注心耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371620_comment'></div>孝悌为根柢。诚明枝叶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371620_comment'></div>直方为天质。礼让缘饰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371620_comment'></div>所至蔼然。繇此道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371620_comment'></div>公初下世。故人丞相李太师志其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371620_comment'></div>略曰。宏深庄重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371620_comment'></div>干敏绝人。此与游者传信之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371620_comment'></div>岂诬也哉。故作铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371620_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1371620'>河汾奫沦。鼎气歊云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371620_comment'></div>散为昌光。凝为贤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371620_comment'></div>常侍之生。其宗孔硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371620_comment'></div>从祖昆弟。诜诜三百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371620_comment'></div>文馆入仕。幽龙未光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371620_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1371620", 1371620, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>尺木</span>为阶。俄然欲翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371620_comment'></div>司会知材。绩宣朔方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371620_comment'></div>边师万喉。俟我赢粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371620_comment'></div>溯于黄河。路出戎疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371620_comment'></div>募乃勇士。皂衣挽航。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371620_comment'></div>膺索臂弧。穹庐在旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371620_comment'></div>虏闻公名。惮不敢𣀮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371620_comment'></div>安北已南。列城相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371620_comment'></div>率有储偫。皆成金汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371620_comment'></div>入居殿中。分巡辇下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371620_comment'></div>淮海军大。往为司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371620_comment'></div>军中之治。可移诸民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371620_comment'></div>乃牧于泗。乃廉于闽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371620_comment'></div>闽悍而嚣。夷风脆急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371620_comment'></div>恩信绥之。委然如蛰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371620_comment'></div>闽方不淑。天夺其福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371620_comment'></div>公薨于寝。元赪以复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371620_comment'></div>天王废朝。赠之金貂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371620_comment'></div>莓莓晋原。郁郁中条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371620_comment'></div>大墓旧阡。松楸萧萧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371620_comment'></div>笳鼓以归。德音孔昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371620_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_97_1371620_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故宣歙池等州都团练观察处置使宣州刺史兼御史中丞赠左散骑常侍王公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371621'>常侍讳质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371621_comment'></div>字华卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371621_comment'></div>始得姓自周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371621_comment'></div>灵王太子晋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371621", 1371621, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>宾天</span>而仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371621_comment'></div>时人曰王子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371621_comment'></div>因去姬为王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371621_comment'></div>自秦汉以还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371621_comment'></div>世多显名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371621_comment'></div>由今而上十有一代名杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371621_comment'></div>仕元魏为并州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371621_comment'></div>子孙因家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371621_comment'></div>遂为太原祁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371621_comment'></div>并州六代孙名通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371621_comment'></div>字仲淹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371621_comment'></div>在隋朝诸儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371621_comment'></div>唯通能明王道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371621_comment'></div>隐居白牛溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371621_comment'></div>游其门皆天下隽杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371621_comment'></div>著书行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371621_comment'></div>既没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371621_comment'></div>谥曰文中子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371621_comment'></div>文中生福祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371621_comment'></div>为蔡州上蔡主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371621_comment'></div>上蔡生勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371621_comment'></div>举进士试贤良皆上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371621_comment'></div>仕至河中府宝鼎令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371621_comment'></div>宝鼎即公之曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371621_comment'></div>祖讳怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371621_comment'></div>渝州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371621_comment'></div>考讳潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371621_comment'></div>扬州天长县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371621_comment'></div>赠尚书吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371621_comment'></div>公其季子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371621_comment'></div>始文中先生有重名于隋末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371621_comment'></div>其弟绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371621_comment'></div>亦以有道显于国初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371621_comment'></div>自号东皋子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371621_comment'></div>文章高逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371621_comment'></div>传在人间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371621_comment'></div>议者谓兄以大中立言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371621_comment'></div>弟游方外遂性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371621_comment'></div>三百年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371621_comment'></div>君子称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371621_comment'></div>虽四夷亦闻其名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371621_comment'></div>公雅有远志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371621_comment'></div>常自忖度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371621_comment'></div>我大名之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371621_comment'></div>不宜无见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371621_comment'></div>遂力学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371621_comment'></div>厚自淬琢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371621_comment'></div>于春秋得之公是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371621_comment'></div>于礼得之约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371621_comment'></div>侨居淝水上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371621_comment'></div>躬督穑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371621_comment'></div>善积于已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371621_comment'></div>而淮楚间群彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371621_comment'></div>多与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371621_comment'></div>公慊然自少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371621_comment'></div>无进取意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371621_comment'></div>与游者激之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371621_comment'></div>卿文儒家子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371621_comment'></div>笃志如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371621_comment'></div>盍求发闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371621_comment'></div>俾家声不颓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371621_comment'></div>今夫以文字<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1371621", 1371621, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>芒洋</span>当世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371621_comment'></div>谁如华卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371621_comment'></div>庸自弃耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371621_comment'></div>入谋于闺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371621_comment'></div>咸以外言为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371621_comment'></div>因决策而西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371621_comment'></div>上在贡士籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371621_comment'></div>天和内充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371621_comment'></div>不以时尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371621", 1371621, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>屑意</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371621_comment'></div>角逐攻取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371621_comment'></div>初无此心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371621_comment'></div>如楩楠生于深林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371621_comment'></div>未始自贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371621_comment'></div>而度材者一盼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371621_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371621", 1371621, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>歆然</span>在怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371621_comment'></div>故以不争而速售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371621_comment'></div>既登第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371621_comment'></div>东诸侯交辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371621_comment'></div>从主者书记于岭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371621_comment'></div>授正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371621_comment'></div>参谋于淮右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371621_comment'></div>进协律郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371621_comment'></div>其后佐许下暨梓潼南梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371621_comment'></div>率为上介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371621_comment'></div>官至兼监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371621_comment'></div>司宪闻其贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371621_comment'></div>徵入南台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371621_comment'></div>转殿内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371621_comment'></div>历侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371621_comment'></div>改尚书户部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371621_comment'></div>复为知已所荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371621_comment'></div>迁检校司封郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371621_comment'></div>摄御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371621_comment'></div>紫衣金章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371621_comment'></div>充山南西道节度副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371621_comment'></div>入为尚书户部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371621_comment'></div>以方雅特立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371621_comment'></div>除谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371621_comment'></div>会宋丞相坐狷直为飞语所陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371621_comment'></div>抱不测之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371621_comment'></div>大寮进言无益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371621_comment'></div>公率谏官数辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371621_comment'></div>日晏伏閤上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371621_comment'></div>为不时开便殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371621_comment'></div>公于旅进中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371621_comment'></div>独感激雪涕居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371621_comment'></div>由是上怒稍懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371621_comment'></div>得从轻比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371621_comment'></div>公终以言责为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371621_comment'></div>求为虢州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371621_comment'></div>宰相惜去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371621_comment'></div>又重违诚请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371621_comment'></div>增之以兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371621_comment'></div>用示异于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371621_comment'></div>大凡以智谋而进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371621_comment'></div>有时而衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371621_comment'></div>以朴厚而知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371621_comment'></div>无迹而固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371621_comment'></div>公雅为今扬州牧赞皇公所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371621_comment'></div>人不见其迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371621_comment'></div>方在虢略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371621_comment'></div>赞皇入相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371621_comment'></div>擢为左曹给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371621_comment'></div>凡有大官缺必宠荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371621_comment'></div>居数月迁河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371621_comment'></div>又未几镇宛陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371621_comment'></div>是三者中外所注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371621_comment'></div>不旬岁而周历之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371621_comment'></div>时论不以为党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371621_comment'></div>河南帝之别京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371621_comment'></div>其治尚体度风采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371621_comment'></div>而别白区处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371621_comment'></div>宣城国之奥壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371621_comment'></div>其治在束吏惠下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371621_comment'></div>苏疲羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371621_comment'></div>詟剽轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371621_comment'></div>而劳徕澄汰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371621_comment'></div>公两得其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371621_comment'></div>不由一揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371621_comment'></div>率身以俭而素风存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371621_comment'></div>任人以诚而群务举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371621_comment'></div>遇中贵以礼而故态革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371621_comment'></div>内洁其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371621_comment'></div>下尽其忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371621_comment'></div>外无以挠其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371621_comment'></div>三者具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371621_comment'></div>求政之有秕曷由哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371621_comment'></div>在镇三载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371621_comment'></div>开成元年十二月八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371621_comment'></div>薨于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371621_comment'></div>享年六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371621_comment'></div>监军使上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371621_comment'></div>有诏轸悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371621_comment'></div>不视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371621_comment'></div>赠左散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371621_comment'></div>明年八月十一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371621_comment'></div>葬于河南府永宁县洛川乡史原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371621_comment'></div>从旧阡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371621_comment'></div>初公娶于荥阳郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371621_comment'></div>生三女而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371621_comment'></div>今盖祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371621_comment'></div>一子曰庆存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371621_comment'></div>方龀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371621_comment'></div>犹子前太原府参军扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371621_comment'></div>执宗长书来请曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371621_comment'></div>扶也早孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371621_comment'></div>蒙世父常侍之覆露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371621_comment'></div>今其嗣幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371621_comment'></div>未任克家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371621_comment'></div>姑封琴书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371621_comment'></div>司管籥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371621_comment'></div>以俟其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371621_comment'></div>窃惧世父之德音不扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371621_comment'></div>思有以垂于后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371621_comment'></div>以诚告于从叔大司农复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371621_comment'></div>命曰俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371621_comment'></div>谨砻贞石以乞辞无忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371621_comment'></div>予昔为郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371621_comment'></div>与常侍同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371621_comment'></div>已熟其行实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371621_comment'></div>及读墓志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371621_comment'></div>即今丞相益州牧赵郡李公之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371621_comment'></div>自称为忘形友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371621_comment'></div>其在宣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371621_comment'></div>李公再入相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371621_comment'></div>议以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_189_1371621", 1371621, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>第一官</span>处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371621_comment'></div>牢让不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371621_comment'></div>羔雁所礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371621_comment'></div>则河东裴夷直天水赵皙陇西李行方吴郡陆绍梁国刘蕡博陵崔珦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371621_comment'></div>人咸曰得士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371621_comment'></div>夫扬州少与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371621_comment'></div>而见器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371621_comment'></div>益州寡合也。<div 1371554, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>朗玉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371554_comment'></div>自有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371554", 1371554, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>天律</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371554_comment'></div>能事具者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371554_comment'></div>其名必高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371554_comment'></div>名由实生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371554_comment'></div>故久而益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371554_comment'></div>尚书郎卢公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371554_comment'></div>讳象字纬卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371554_comment'></div>始以章句振起于开元中。<div class='inline' "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>鼓行</span>于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371554_comment'></div>妍词一发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371554_comment'></div>乐府传贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371554_comment'></div>由前进士补秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371554_comment'></div>转右卫仓曹掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371554_comment'></div>丞相曲江公方执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371554", 1371554, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>文衡</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371574_comment'></div>繇是驶行者忘其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371574_comment'></div>吉行者徐其驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371574_comment'></div>孥行者家以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371574_comment'></div>货行者肩不病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371574_comment'></div>徒行者足不茧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371574_comment'></div>乘行者蹄不刓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371574_comment'></div>公谈私咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371574_comment'></div>溢于人听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371574_comment'></div>伊彼金其牛而诱之以利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371574_comment'></div>曷若我子其民而来之以义乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371574_comment'></div>既讫役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371574_comment'></div>南梁人书事于牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371574_comment'></div>请纪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371574_comment'></div>以附于史官地里志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1371574_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=839&endYear=839')">839年</a>　仍为太子宾客，分司东都。为人作碑文。作品：《唐故邠宁庆等州节度观察处置使朝散大夫检校户部尚书兼御史大夫赐紫金鱼袋赠右仆射史公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷3第46页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371619' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371619' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371619?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故邠宁庆等州节度观察处置使朝散大夫检校户部尚书兼御史大夫赐紫金鱼袋赠右仆射史公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（839年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371619")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371619_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371619'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371619'>仆射名孝章。字得仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371619_comment'></div>本北方之强。世雄朔野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371619_comment'></div>其后因仕中国。遂为灵武建康人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371619_comment'></div>曾祖道德。赠右散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371619_comment'></div>封怀泽郡王。祖周洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371619_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫检校太常卿兼御史中丞北海郡王。赠太子太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371619_comment'></div>考宪诚。早以武勇绝人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371619_comment'></div>积功至魏博节度使。终于河中晋绛慈隰等州节度观察使检校司徒兼侍中河中尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371619_comment'></div>赠太保。其薨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371619_comment'></div>大臣中书令晋国公裴氏为之碑。其名益显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371619_comment'></div>公即侍中之元子。母曰冀国夫人李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371619_comment'></div>幼而聪悟。父母贤而加爱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371619_comment'></div>及长。好学迁善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371619_comment'></div>秀出侪辈。邺下诸儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371619_comment'></div>号为书生。元和中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371619_comment'></div>太尉愬为魏帅。下令抡材于辕门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371619_comment'></div>取大将家翘秀者为子弟军。列于诸校之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371619_comment'></div>公独昌言。愿效文职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371619_comment'></div>太尉深奇之。遂假魏州大都督府参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371619_comment'></div>长庆二年。常山众叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371619_comment'></div>害其帅沂国公田司徒于帐下。沂公发迹于魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371619_comment'></div>人犹怀之。诏命其子布以尚书授钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371619_comment'></div>统魏兵问罪于此疆。且报家祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371619_comment'></div>布既启行。士气不振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371619_comment'></div>涣然内溃。独与冗从之旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371619_comment'></div>偃旗而归。百愤攻中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371619_comment'></div>卒自引决。先侍中时为中军都知兵马使兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371619_comment'></div>全师在野。閧然推戴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371619_comment'></div>请为假侯以镇定。中贵人飞驿上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371619_comment'></div>穆宗夜召翰林学士草诏书。以真侯命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371619_comment'></div>实有魏土。从众而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>合权</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371619_comment'></div>是岁公自摄官转本府士曹参军兼监察御史。赐朱衣银印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371619_comment'></div>推恩以及子也。一旦跪于父母前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371619_comment'></div>进苦言曰。臣窃惟大河之北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371619_comment'></div>地雄兵精。而天下贤士心侮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371619_comment'></div>目河朔间。视犹夷狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371619_comment'></div>何也。盖有土者多乘兵机际会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371619_comment'></div>非以义取。今臣家父侯母封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371619_comment'></div>化为贵门。君恩至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371619_comment'></div>非痛折节砺行。彰信于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371619_comment'></div>无以弭识者之讥。寤明君之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371619_comment'></div>节著于外。福延于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371619_comment'></div>乘时蹈机。祸不旋踵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371619_comment'></div>言讫泣下数行。父俞母赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371619_comment'></div>天性交感。三心既叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371619_comment'></div>万众潜化。天子闻而嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371619_comment'></div>曰彼真孝子。乃授检校太子左谕德兼侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371619_comment'></div>充节度副使。累迁至散骑常侍兼御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371619_comment'></div>赐金印紫绶。既贰军政事如命卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371619_comment'></div>弛张损益。得以参决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371619_comment'></div>潜革故态。人知向方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371619_comment'></div>大和二年。沧景节度使李全略卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371619_comment'></div>其子同捷窃据故地。诏下以文诰弗革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371619_comment'></div>遂用大刑。先侍中表请率先诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371619_comment'></div>使元子以督战。制曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371619_comment'></div>公承君父之命。乃捐其躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371619_comment'></div>一举而下平原。压沧垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371619_comment'></div>由是加工部尚书。及王师凯旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371619_comment'></div>上表愿一识承明庐。诏允之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371619_comment'></div>遂赴北阙下。得觌于便殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371619_comment'></div>上曰。向吾始征沧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371619_comment'></div>议者皆曰。彼魏之姻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371619_comment'></div>虑阴为寇谋。吾发使数辈以侦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371619_comment'></div>其还也。佥曰尔父<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>沥款</span>于宾筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371619_comment'></div>尔母<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>抗词</span>于帘下。愿绝姻以立效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371619_comment'></div>其经始启发。出于尔心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371619_comment'></div>今沧海砥平。策勋之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371619_comment'></div>宜贵尔三族。命尔父为侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371619_comment'></div>迁镇于近地。加尔礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371619_comment'></div>析相卫澶三州为镇以居之。俾尔一门大荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371619_comment'></div>以誇天下。公拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371619_comment'></div>谢父迁。让已爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371619_comment'></div>礼无违者。翼日下诏于明庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371619_comment'></div>人咸曰。史氏之宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371619_comment'></div>古无有也。牙旗碧幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371619_comment'></div>方指东道。侍中以帐下生变闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371619_comment'></div>泰极而否。当歌而哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371619_comment'></div>迎柩于路。仰天长号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371619_comment'></div>因葬于洛阳之北邙山。冀国夫人祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371619_comment'></div>寝苫枕块。以所仇同天为大酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371619_comment'></div>未几。诏举金革之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371619_comment'></div>起为右金吾将军。累表陈乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371619_comment'></div>有司以违命督之。舆疾即路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371619_comment'></div>间岁擢授鄜坊丹延等州节度观察处置等使。居四年迁镇于滑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371619_comment'></div>一岁入为右领军卫大将军。旋改右金吾大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371619_comment'></div>又受钺于邠土。孟秋至治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371619_comment'></div>首冬遘疾。拜章入觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371619_comment'></div>不克展和鸾鞗革之仪。薨于靖恭里之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371619_comment'></div>享龄三十有九。当开成三年十月二十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371619_comment'></div>上闻而悼之。不视朝一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371619_comment'></div>赠尚书右仆射。明年二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371619_comment'></div>归葬于洛都。夫人琅琊王氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371619_comment'></div>继室深泽县君博陵崔氏。有一子曰焕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371619_comment'></div>生七年而孤。仆射之丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371619_comment'></div>自复魄至葬。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>当门户</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371619_comment'></div>备祭祀。建碑表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371619_comment'></div>皆县君之能。且命其家老具事功来请曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371619_comment'></div>嫠不恤家。而忧幼嗣不知其先人之官业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371619_comment'></div>乞词以传于后也。君子以为知礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371619_comment'></div>谨书之。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371619_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_1371619'>斗极之下。崆峒播气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371619_comment'></div>钟于侍中。孔武且贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371619_comment'></div>奉上致命。宜昌后嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371619_comment'></div>仆射承之。良弓不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371619_comment'></div>耳烦钲鼓。心悦文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371619_comment'></div>虎穴之中。生此骐骥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371619_comment'></div>大和纪元。沧景不虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371619_comment'></div>子弄父兵。跳踉海壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371619_comment'></div>有邻阴交。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/217/Comments/0")'>猬起鸡连</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371619_comment'></div>诏下薄伐。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/219/Comments/0")'>艮隅</span>骚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371619_comment'></div>时维侍中。寔统魏师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371619_comment'></div>蓄锐未发。众心危疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371619_comment'></div>仆射为子。陈谋尽词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371619_comment'></div>兴言涕零。有感尊慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371619_comment'></div>绝姻效节。精贯神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371619_comment'></div>沧波厎宁。王命褒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371619_comment'></div>乃迁元侯。来镇近畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371619_comment'></div>乃祚元子。别建旌麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371619_comment'></div>一门四节。焜耀当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371619_comment'></div>倏忽变生。魏郊纷披。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371619_comment'></div>乔木虽大。盲风不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371619_comment'></div>干云之台。列缺焚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371619_comment'></div>哀哀孝嗣。丁此大酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371619_comment'></div>迎护<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/246/Comments/0")'>帏輤</span>。葬于东洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371619_comment'></div>诉天触地。血染缞服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371619_comment'></div>礼有金革。诏书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_125_1371619", 1371619, "Clauses/251/Comments/0")'>敦促</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371619_comment'></div>不遂枕戈。骤膺推毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371619_comment'></div>雕阴白马。暨于邠谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371619_comment'></div>虽荣三镇。不荷百禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371619_comment'></div>绮纨之间。圭组累累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371619_comment'></div>如彼晨葩。日中而萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371619_comment'></div>有妻名家。有子稚齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371619_comment'></div>行号报礼。归窆蒿里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371619_comment'></div>洛水之阳。修邙之趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371619_comment'></div>昭尊穆敬。幽显同理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371619_comment'></div>旧松新柏。亦象乔梓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371619_comment'></div>刻石记功。垂于万祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371619_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_137_1371619_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=839&endYear=839')">839年12月</a>　十二月，改秘书监、分司东都。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=839&endYear=839')">839年</a>　岁暮，患足疾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　为秘书监，分司东都。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　为秘书监，分司东都。令狐楚卒后，其子绹编次遗文成集，禹锡受请为文集作序。作品：《唐故相国赠司空令狐公集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷19第229页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div "poem_title_1371549")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371549'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371549'>起文章而陟大位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371549_comment'></div>丹青景化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371549_comment'></div>焜耀藩方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371549_comment'></div>如非烟祥风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371549_comment'></div>缘饰万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371549_comment'></div>而与令名相终始者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371549_comment'></div>有唐文臣令狐公实当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371549_comment'></div>公名楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371549_comment'></div>字壳士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371549_comment'></div>燉煌人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371549_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>占数</span>于长安右部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371549_comment'></div>天授神敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371549_comment'></div>性能无师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371549_comment'></div>始学语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371549_comment'></div>乃协宫徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371549_comment'></div>故五岁已为诗成章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371549_comment'></div>既冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371549_comment'></div>参贡士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371549_comment'></div>果有名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371549_comment'></div>时司空杜公以重德知贡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371549_comment'></div>擢居甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371549_comment'></div>琅邪王拱识公于童丱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371549_comment'></div>雅器重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371549_comment'></div>至是拱自虞部正郎领桂州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371549_comment'></div>锐于辟贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371549_comment'></div>以酬不次之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371549_comment'></div>先拜章而后告公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371549_comment'></div>既而授试宏文馆校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371549_comment'></div>公为人子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371549_comment'></div>重难远行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371549_comment'></div>禀命而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371549_comment'></div>居一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371549_comment'></div>竟迫方寸而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371549_comment'></div>家在并汾间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371549_comment'></div>急于禄养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371549_comment'></div>捧从事檄于并州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371549_comment'></div>凡更三牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371549_comment'></div>官至监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371549_comment'></div>元和初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371549_comment'></div>宪宗闻其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371549_comment'></div>徵拜右拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371549_comment'></div>历太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371549_comment'></div>入尚书为礼部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371549_comment'></div>性至孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371549_comment'></div>既孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371549_comment'></div>以善居丧闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371549_comment'></div>中月除刑部员外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371549_comment'></div>时帝女下嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371549_comment'></div>相礼阙官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371549_comment'></div>公以本官摄博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371549_comment'></div>当问名之答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371549_comment'></div>上亲临帐幄帘内以窥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371549_comment'></div>礼容甚伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371549_comment'></div>声气朗彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371549_comment'></div>上目送良久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371549_comment'></div>谓左右曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371549_comment'></div>是官可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371549_comment'></div>记其姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371549_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371549_comment'></div>改职方知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371549_comment'></div>词锋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>犀利</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371549_comment'></div>绝人远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371549_comment'></div>适有旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371549_comment'></div>选司言高第者视草内庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371549_comment'></div>宰臣以公为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371549_comment'></div>遂转本司郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371549_comment'></div>充翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371549_comment'></div>满岁迁中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371549_comment'></div>专掌内制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371549_comment'></div>武帐通奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371549_comment'></div>柏梁陪燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371549_comment'></div>嘉猷高韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371549_comment'></div>冠于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371549_comment'></div>会淮右<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>稽诛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371549_comment'></div>上遣丞相即戎以督战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371549_comment'></div>公草诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371549_comment'></div>词有涉嫌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371549_comment'></div>相府上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371549_comment'></div>有命中书参详窜定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371549_comment'></div>因罢内职归閤中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371549_comment'></div>而君心眷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371549_comment'></div>将有大用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371549_comment'></div>且出入以试之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371549_comment'></div>乃牧华州兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371549_comment'></div>锡以金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371549_comment'></div>居镇七月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371549_comment'></div>迁大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371549_comment'></div>充河阳三城怀州节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371549_comment'></div>又七月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371549_comment'></div>急召抵京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371549_comment'></div>拜中书侍郎同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371549_comment'></div>天下然后知上心倚以为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371549_comment'></div>非一朝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371549_comment'></div>是岁元和十四年秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371549_comment'></div>明年正月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371549_comment'></div>宪宗晏驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371549_comment'></div>惜其在位日浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371549_comment'></div>遭时大变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371549_comment'></div>穆宗践阼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371549_comment'></div>转门下侍郎平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371549_comment'></div>万几百度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371549_comment'></div>别有所付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371549_comment'></div>第以旧相署位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371549_comment'></div>充山陵使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371549_comment'></div>七月礼毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371549_comment'></div>部下吏有以赃状闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371549_comment'></div>朝典用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>责率</span>之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371549_comment'></div>是以左授宣歙池等州都团练观察处置使兼御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371549_comment'></div>恩顾一异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371549_comment'></div>媒孽随生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371549_comment'></div>旋又贬衡州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371549_comment'></div>移郢州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371549_comment'></div>转太子宾客分司东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371549_comment'></div>寻起为陜号观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371549_comment'></div>或有上封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371549_comment'></div>称前以奉陵寝不检下获谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371549_comment'></div>今陵土犹湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371549_comment'></div>未宜遽用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371549_comment'></div>次陜一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371549_comment'></div>重为宾客分司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371549_comment'></div>长庆四年改河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371549_comment'></div>其秋授检校礼部尚书兼汴州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371549_comment'></div>充宣武军节度管内观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371549_comment'></div>汴州为四战之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371549_comment'></div>择帅先有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371549_comment'></div>峻刑右武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371549_comment'></div>疑似沈命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371549_comment'></div>号为危邦者积年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371549_comment'></div>公始以清俭自律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371549_comment'></div>以恩信待人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371549_comment'></div>以夷坦去群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371549_comment'></div>以礼让汰惨急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371549_comment'></div>自上化下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371549_comment'></div>速于置邮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371549_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_134_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>纂服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371549_comment'></div>三年冬上表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371549_comment'></div>以大臣未识天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371549_comment'></div>愿朝正月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371549_comment'></div>制曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371549_comment'></div>操节入觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371549_comment'></div>迁户部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371549_comment'></div>俄为东都留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371549_comment'></div>又转检校尚书右仆射兼郓州刺史天平军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371549_comment'></div>后以王业之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371549_comment'></div>实为北京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371549_comment'></div>移镇太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371549_comment'></div>从人望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371549_comment'></div>以吏部尚书徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371549_comment'></div>续换太常卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371549_comment'></div>真拜尚书左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371549_comment'></div>大和九年冬十一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371549_comment'></div>京师有急兵起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371549_comment'></div>上方御正殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371549_comment'></div>即日还宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371549_comment'></div>是夕召公决事禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371549_comment'></div>以见事傅古义为对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371549_comment'></div>其词谠切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371549_comment'></div>无所顾望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371549_comment'></div>上心嘉之。<div
