id='poem_sentence_164_1371549_comment'></div>以斡利权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371549_comment'></div>既非素尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371549_comment'></div>仡仡牢让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371549_comment'></div>故复为检校左仆射兴元尹山南西道节度观察使兼御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371549_comment'></div>开成二年十一月十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371549_comment'></div>薨于汉中官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371549_comment'></div>享年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371549_comment'></div>齐终之前一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371549_comment'></div>自修<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_173_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>遗表</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371549_comment'></div>初述感恩陈力之大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371549_comment'></div>中及朝廷刑政之或阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371549_comment'></div>意切言尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371549_comment'></div>神识不昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371549_comment'></div>上深悼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371549_comment'></div>形于悯册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371549_comment'></div>未登三事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371549_comment'></div>故以赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371549_comment'></div>归全之夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371549_comment'></div>有大星陨于正寝之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371549_comment'></div>光烛于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371549_comment'></div>天意若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371549_comment'></div>既禀之而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371549_comment'></div>亦有涯而落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371549_comment'></div>其文章贵寿之气焰欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371549_comment'></div>初宪宗览国书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371549_comment'></div>见五王复辟之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371549_comment'></div>狄梁公实尸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371549_comment'></div>公为台臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371549_comment'></div>独召便殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371549_comment'></div>问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371549_comment'></div>仁杰有后乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371549_comment'></div>公以其支孙试校书郎兼谟为对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1371549_comment'></div>即日拜左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371549_comment'></div>公遂草制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1371549_comment'></div>它日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1371549_comment'></div>相衔者因抉其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1371549_comment'></div>以为非春秋讳鲁之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1371549_comment'></div>穆宗新即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1371549_comment'></div>谦让不自决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1371549_comment'></div>遂有衡州之贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1371549_comment'></div>公议冤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1371549_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1371549_comment'></div>天之于赋予也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1371549_comment'></div>甚啬而难周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1371549_comment'></div>公独富文华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1371549_comment'></div>丁良时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1371549_comment'></div>历名卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1371549_comment'></div>至元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1371549_comment'></div>盖忠廉孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1371549_comment'></div>爱才与物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1371549_comment'></div>合是粹美以将之邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1371549_comment'></div>可谓全德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1371549_comment'></div>既免丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1371549_comment'></div>嗣子左补阙绹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1371549_comment'></div>集公之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1371549_comment'></div>成一百三十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1371549_comment'></div>因长子太子左谕德宏分司东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1371549_comment'></div>负其笥来谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1371549_comment'></div>泣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1371549_comment'></div>先赠司空与丈人为显交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1371549_comment'></div>撤悬之前五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1371549_comment'></div>所赋诗寄友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1371549_comment'></div>非他人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1371549_comment'></div>今手泽尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1371549_comment'></div>言之呜咽长号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1371549_comment'></div>予为之恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1371549_comment'></div>收泪而视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1371549_comment'></div>分当编次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1371549_comment'></div>始公参<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_233_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/233/Comments/0")'>大卤</span>记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1371549_comment'></div>以文雄于边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1371549_comment'></div>议者谓一方不足以骋用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1371549_comment'></div>徵拜于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1371549_comment'></div>累迁仪曹郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1371549_comment'></div>乃登西掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1371549_comment'></div>入内署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1371549_comment'></div>吁谟密勿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1371549_comment'></div>遂委<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_241_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/241/Comments/0")'>魁柄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1371549_comment'></div>斯以文雄于国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1371549_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1371549_comment'></div>咫尺之管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1371549_comment'></div>文敏者执而运之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1371549_comment'></div>所知皆合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1371549_comment'></div>在藩耸万夫之观望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1371549_comment'></div>立朝贲群寮之颊舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1371549_comment'></div>居内成大政之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_249_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/249/Comments/0")'>风霆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1371549_comment'></div>导畎浍于章奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1371549_comment'></div>鼓洪澜于训诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1371549_comment'></div>笔端肤寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1371549_comment'></div>膏润天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1371549_comment'></div>文章之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1371549_comment'></div>极其至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1371549_comment'></div>而又馀力工于篇什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1371549_comment'></div>古文士所难兼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1371549_comment'></div>昔王珣为晋仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1371549_comment'></div>梦人授大笔如椽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1371549_comment'></div>觉而谓人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1371549_comment'></div>此必有大手笔事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1371549_comment'></div>后孝武哀册文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1371549_comment'></div>乃珣之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1371549_comment'></div>公为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1371549_comment'></div>奉诏撰宪宗圣神章武孝皇帝哀册文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1371549_comment'></div>时称乾陵崔文公之比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1371549_comment'></div>今考之而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1371549_comment'></div>故以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_268_1371549", 1371549, "Clauses/268/Comments/0")'>首冠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1371549_comment'></div>尊重事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1371549_comment'></div>其它各以类聚著于篇。</div><div id='poem_sentence_270_1371549_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　为秘书监，分司东都。为人作碑文。作品：《故朝散大夫检校尚书吏部郎中兼御史中丞赐紫金鱼袋清河县开国男赠太师崔公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷3第38页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《唐故监察御史赠尚书右仆射王公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第593页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371623' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371623' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371623?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故朝散大夫检校尚书吏部郎中兼御史中丞赐紫金鱼袋清河县开国男赠太师崔公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（840年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371623")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371623_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371623'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371623'>太师讳陲。字平仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371623_comment'></div>清河东武城人。太公望既封于营邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371623_comment'></div>子伋嗣侯。伋之孙曰穆伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371623_comment'></div>食邑于崔。遂以为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371623_comment'></div>后十四世至秦末东莱侯意如。东莱之子伯基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371623_comment'></div>始居清河。又十五叶生炎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371623_comment'></div>为魏名臣。又九叶生休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371623_comment'></div>仕后魏为七兵尚书。七兵之弟曰寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371623_comment'></div>为乐安太守。公即乐安八代孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371623_comment'></div>始以阀阅授郑州参军。力行好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371623_comment'></div>于子道以孝闻。处伯仲间以友闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371623_comment'></div>读易至编绝。以精易闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371623_comment'></div>至德中。时有边警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371623_comment'></div>从师出征。公少有奇志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371623_comment'></div>思越拘挛以自奋。乃作伐鲸鲵赋以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371623_comment'></div>既上闻。果器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371623_comment'></div>会第五丞相以善言利得幸。尽付利权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371623_comment'></div>始有盐铁使之官。慎选寮属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371623_comment'></div>表公为介。转临晋县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371623_comment'></div>处烦应卒。铓刃不顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371623_comment'></div>再迁至大理评事。府罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371623_comment'></div>历河中府司隶参军太子司议郎。韩晋公时为户部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371623_comment'></div>掌邦赋。急于用才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371623_comment'></div>荐公为监察御史。主河东租庸之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371623_comment'></div>寻转殿中侍御史。复迁侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371623_comment'></div>充京东和籴使。建中初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371623_comment'></div>德宗始亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371623", 1371623, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>万几</span>。储精治本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371623_comment'></div>有汉宣与我共此之叹。谓史臣求可当二千石良者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371623_comment'></div>遂以公带本官权知袁州刺史。期月有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371623_comment'></div>诏书显扬。就加真秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371623_comment'></div>益以金紫。居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371623_comment'></div>韩晋公为丞相。制国用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371623_comment'></div>思公前绩。乃传召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371623_comment'></div>抵京师。授检校户部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371623_comment'></div>辑池盐于蒲。修牢盆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371623_comment'></div>谨衡石。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371623", 1371623, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>煎和</span>既精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371623_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371623", 1371623, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>饴散</span>乃盈。商通而荐至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371623_comment'></div>吏惧而循法。民不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371623", 1371623, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>絓网</span>而国用益饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371623_comment'></div>岁杪会其所入。赢羡什伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371623_comment'></div>诏下褒其能。转吏部侍郎兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371623_comment'></div>且加五等之爵。方倚以重任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371623_comment'></div>天富其才而不遐其福。享龄六十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371623_comment'></div>贞元七年二月二日。遘疾卒于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371623_comment'></div>上闻悼之。即降悯策赠郑州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371623_comment'></div>赍钱五百万。以备饰终之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371623_comment'></div>明年八月二日。返葬于成周之偃师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371623_comment'></div>从世墓也。夫人陇西李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371623_comment'></div>汾州司户参军咸一之女。生才子六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371623_comment'></div>长曰邠。及公终时已为左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371623_comment'></div>后至太常卿。次曰酆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371623_comment'></div>至太府卿。次曰郾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371623_comment'></div>至外台尚书。次曰郇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371623_comment'></div>今为廷尉。次曰鄯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371623_comment'></div>至执金吾。季曰郸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371623_comment'></div>自太常卿加同中书门下平章事。今为尚书侍郎平章事如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371623_comment'></div>惟夫人为姑臧冠族。以蘋蘩组紃辅佐君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371623_comment'></div>为令妻积三十馀年。以慈俭忠厚训诫诸子为贤母二十有三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371623_comment'></div>当永贞之初。顺宗践阼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371623_comment'></div>泽流百叶。长子邠时为词臣草册书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371623_comment'></div>以文当晋阶。遂上疏乞移荣于亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371623_comment'></div>上俞之。特封清河郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371623_comment'></div>士林<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1371623", 1371623, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>耸慕</span>。皆自痛其不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371623_comment'></div>邠为太常。酆为大农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371623_comment'></div>咸白发贵绶。以奉膳羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371623_comment'></div>诸季皆翩翩人杰。各以簪裾给事左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371623_comment'></div>愉愉然承顺无违。鼎钟致养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371623_comment'></div>居然一室雍熙太和。言世荣者举无以比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371623_comment'></div>以子贵累封赠至凉国太夫人。元和八年三月十六日捐馆舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371623_comment'></div>寿七十有九。是岁十月十八日合祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371623_comment'></div>惟太常及尚书暨今相国。皆自中书舍人为礼部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371623_comment'></div>凡五贡贤能书。得士百四十有八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371623_comment'></div>言兄弟者。许为人瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371623_comment'></div>崔氏之门六人。皆入南宫赐金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371623_comment'></div>其间三人历入侍郎。统而论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371623_comment'></div>四卿一相。两连率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371623_comment'></div>二翰林学士。一执金吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371623_comment'></div>言冠冕者。许为世雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371623_comment'></div>与姑臧李范杨卢世为婚媾。入于婚党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371623_comment'></div>无第二流。言门阀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371623_comment'></div>许为时表。太常二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371623_comment'></div>亦以才能同入尚书。璜为吏部郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371623_comment'></div>瓘为司勋郎。其他支孙未登金闺籍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371623_comment'></div>诜诜然鱼贯而进。文业甚富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371623_comment'></div>而孝谨不衰。猗欤君子之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371623_comment'></div>其所从来。远而有光已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371623_comment'></div>开成已未岁七月甲辰。相君受诏于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371623_comment'></div>始操国柄。冬仲月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371623_comment'></div>奉常事于家。礼成起慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371623_comment'></div>悄然永怀曰。古者卿大夫庙有鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371623_comment'></div>墓有碑。皆铭之以纪先德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371623_comment'></div>今备位宰相。敢不扬前人之耿光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371623_comment'></div>乃俾家老条白事功。资于学古者徵其词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371623_comment'></div>尚信也。又命宗祝卜柔日告于庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371623_comment'></div>尽诚也。仪甚备而敬有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371623_comment'></div>斯所谓达礼之君子。遂刊勒如式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371623_comment'></div>揭于道周。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371623_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1371623'>奕奕四姓。崔为之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371623_comment'></div>瞻其门墙。倬若云汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371623_comment'></div>善积家肥。子孙多才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371623_comment'></div>如彼榱栋。必生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1371623", 1371623, "Clauses/199/Comments/0")'>徂徕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371623_comment'></div>太公之后。弥二千祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371623_comment'></div>累如贯珠。倬见图史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371623_comment'></div>显允太师。丕承德基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371623_comment'></div>构于其堂。亦既塈茨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371623_comment'></div>生逢艰虞。中外交师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371623_comment'></div>献赋伐叛。忠存乎词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371623_comment'></div>兵兴事丛。飞挽四驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371623_comment'></div>历践剧职。视险如夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371623_comment'></div>乃主平籴。乃分符使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371623_comment'></div>治粟为邦。其道一致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371623_comment'></div>蒲实近地。盐为利浤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371623_comment'></div>使车来思。刬弊立程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371623_comment'></div>吏廉商通。岁倍其赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371623_comment'></div>奏课连最。德音张明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371623_comment'></div>就加执法。好爵兼荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371623_comment'></div>天付之才。不与寿并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371623_comment'></div>生树德本。殁扬淑声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371623_comment'></div>孕和合粹。濯润本根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371623_comment'></div>景亳之原。图书之川。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371622'>公讳俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371622_comment'></div>字真长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371622_comment'></div>其先叶黄帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371622_comment'></div>夫圣人之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371622_comment'></div>与庶姓不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371622_comment'></div>如河出昆崙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371622_comment'></div>潜于厚地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371622_comment'></div>欻焉振起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371622_comment'></div>奋为洪澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371622_comment'></div>环回自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371622_comment'></div>非众川也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371622_comment'></div>故自黄帝八代而生舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371622_comment'></div>武王克殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371622_comment'></div>求有妫之允满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371622_comment'></div>封于陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371622_comment'></div>是为胡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371622_comment'></div>十三叶生完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371622_comment'></div>自以公子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371622_comment'></div>国难不得立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371622_comment'></div>乃抱乐器奔齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371622_comment'></div>桓公以卿礼接之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371622_comment'></div>下又十一叶和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371622_comment'></div>以久为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371622_comment'></div>阴浃于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371622_comment'></div>遂有齐国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371622_comment'></div>三代称王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371622_comment'></div>至建为秦所灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371622_comment'></div>项羽入秦。<div id='poem_sentence_29_1371622_comment'></div>齐人谓之王家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371622_comment'></div>因以为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371622_comment'></div>安子涓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371622_comment'></div>仕汉为镇东将军青州牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371622_comment'></div>封剧县伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371622_comment'></div>自涓至彤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371622_comment'></div>凡一十九代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371622_comment'></div>两汉公卿牧守如家牒然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371622_comment'></div>十代祖猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371622_comment'></div>字景略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371622_comment'></div>符秦尚书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371622_comment'></div>伉秦成霸业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371622_comment'></div>与孔明佐蜀同功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371622_comment'></div>故时人谓之王葛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371622_comment'></div>史云北海剧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371622_comment'></div>至北齐五代祖⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（田斤）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371622_comment'></div>七兵尚书。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371622_comment'></div>高祖顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371622_comment'></div>字君粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371622_comment'></div>北齐著作郎燕郡太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371622_comment'></div>曾祖敬忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371622_comment'></div>成州刺史。<div id='poem_sentence_122_1371622_comment'></div>充汴宋亳等州节度观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371622_comment'></div>北海县开国子。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371522'>处士王龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371522_comment'></div>古者选公族大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371522_comment'></div>必以惇惠者教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371522_comment'></div>文敏者道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371522_comment'></div>果敢者谂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371522", 1371522, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>镇静</span>者循之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371522_comment'></div>孜孜于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371522_comment'></div>盖膏粱之性难正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371522_comment'></div>而惧公侯之允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371522_comment'></div>不能嗣其耿光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371522_comment'></div>可以深惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371522_comment'></div>然则成宣之后而老为大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371522_comment'></div>非耻乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371522_comment'></div>此智武子诫文子既冠而见之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371522_comment'></div>是知古之取士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371522_comment'></div>不专寒族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371522_comment'></div>必参用世冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371522_comment'></div>以广得人之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371522_comment'></div>今见处士王龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371522_comment'></div>即居守之第三子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371522_comment'></div>天性贞静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371522_comment'></div>操心甚危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371522_comment'></div>不由门资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371522_comment'></div>誓志自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371522_comment'></div>乐处士之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371522_comment'></div>不汨绮襦之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371522_comment'></div>自到洛都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371522_comment'></div>便居山寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371522_comment'></div>耽玩坟籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371522_comment'></div>放情烟霞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371522_comment'></div>曾邀与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371522_comment'></div>如锯木屑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371522_comment'></div>信有禀受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371522_comment'></div>居然出群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371522_comment'></div>以比在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371522_comment'></div>甚足知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371522_comment'></div>谏院有状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371522_comment'></div>名流亟言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371522_comment'></div>某流滞周南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371522_comment'></div>静阅时辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371522_comment'></div>身虽不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371522_comment'></div>心甚爱才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371522_comment'></div>况遇相公持衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371522_comment'></div>敢有所启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1371522", 1371522, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>诚悬</span>之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371522_comment'></div>轻重难欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371522_comment'></div>伏惟深赐详择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371522_comment'></div>知卿族之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371522_comment'></div>有遗逸焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371522_comment'></div>谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371522_comment'></div>正议大夫检校礼部尚书兼太子宾客分司东都刘某状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371522_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　春，同东都留守王起诗歌唱和。作品：《同留守王仆射各赋春中一物从一韵至七》<span id='poem_sentence_0_17491'>莺，能语，多情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17491'>春将半，天欲明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17491'>始逢南陌，复集东城。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17491'>林疏时见影，花密但闻声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17491'>营中缘催短笛，楼上来定哀筝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17491'>千门万户垂杨里，百转如簧烟景晴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_17491_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　春，与王起、白居易宴，即事联句作诗。作品：《会昌春连宴即事联句》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷34第505页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　秋，感怀作赋。作品：《秋声赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷1第17页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371398' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371398")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371398_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371398'>相国中山公赋秋声。以属天官太常伯。唱和俱绝。然皆得时行道之馀兴。犹有光阴之叹。况伊郁老病者乎。吟之斐然。以寄孤愤。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371398'>碧天如水兮窅窅悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371398_comment'></div>百虫迎莫兮万叶吟秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371398_comment'></div>欲辞林而萧飒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371398_comment'></div>潜命侣以啁啾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371398_comment'></div>送将归兮临水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371398_comment'></div>非吾土兮登楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371398_comment'></div>晚枝多露蝉之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371398_comment'></div>夕草起寒螀之愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371398_comment'></div>至若松竹含韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371398_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371398", 1371398, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>梧楸</span>蚤脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371398_comment'></div>惊绮疏之晓吹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371398_comment'></div>堕碧砌之凉月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371398_comment'></div>念塞外之征行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371398_comment'></div>顾闺中之骚屑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371398_comment'></div>夜蛩鸣兮机杼促。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371398_comment'></div>朔雁叫兮音书绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371398_comment'></div>远杵续兮何泠泠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371398_comment'></div>虚窗静兮空切切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371398_comment'></div>如吟如啸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371398_comment'></div>非竹非丝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371398_comment'></div>合自然之宫徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371398_comment'></div>动终岁之别离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371398_comment'></div>废井苔冷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371398_comment'></div>荒园露滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371398_comment'></div>草苍苍兮人寂寂。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371629'>子刘子名禹锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371629_comment'></div>字梦得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371629_comment'></div>其先汉景帝贾夫人子胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371629_comment'></div>封中山王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371629_comment'></div>谥曰靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371629_comment'></div>子孙因封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371629_comment'></div>为中山人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371629_comment'></div>七代祖亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371629_comment'></div>事北朝为冀州刺史散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371629_comment'></div>遇迁都洛阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371629_comment'></div>为北部都昌里人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371629_comment'></div>世为儒而仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371629_comment'></div>坟墓在洛阳北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371629_comment'></div>其后地狭不可依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371629_comment'></div>乃葬荥阳之檀山原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371629_comment'></div>由大王父已还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371629_comment'></div>一昭一穆如平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371629_comment'></div>曾祖凯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371629_comment'></div>官至博州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371629_comment'></div>祖锽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371629_comment'></div>由洛阳主簿察视行马外事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371629_comment'></div>岁满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371629_comment'></div>转殿中丞侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371629_comment'></div>赠尚书祠部郎中。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371629_comment'></div>遇疾不讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371629_comment'></div>小子承夙训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371629_comment'></div>禀遗教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371629_comment'></div>眇然一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371629_comment'></div>奉尊夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371629_comment'></div>不敢殒灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371629_comment'></div>后忝登朝或领郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371629_comment'></div>蒙恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371629_comment'></div>先府君累赠至吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371629_comment'></div>先太君卢氏。<div id='poem_sentence_48_1371629_comment'></div>一幸而中试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371629_comment'></div>间岁又以文登吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371629_comment'></div>取士科。<div id='poem_sentence_63_1371629_comment'></div>遂请为掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371629_comment'></div>捧檄入告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371629_comment'></div>太夫人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371629_comment'></div>以善奕棋得通籍博望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371629_comment'></div>因閒隙得言及时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371629_comment'></div>上大奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371629_comment'></div>如是者积久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371629_comment'></div>众未知之。<div id='poem_sentence_149_1371629_comment'></div>数之奇兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371629_comment'></div>天与所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371629_comment'></div>不使施兮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17451'>废书缘惜眼，多炙为随年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17451'>经事还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17451", 17451, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>谙事</span>，阅人如阅川。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17451'>细思皆幸矣，下此便翛然。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17451'>莫道桑榆晚，微<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作为）</span>霞尚满天。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17451'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_17451_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　在洛阳，与白居易联句作诗以期解闷。作品：《乐天是月长斋鄙夫此时愁卧里闾非远云雾难披因以寄怀遂为联句所期解闷焉敢驚禅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷34第508页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_3_17424'>尘埃宾位静，香火道场深<span class='inlineComment2'>（居易）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17424'>我静驯狂象，餐馀施众禽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17424'>定知于佛佞，岂复向书淫<span class='inlineComment2'>（禹锡）</span>。<div 徐州（彭城）

class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371446_comment'></div>高品吴千金至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371446_comment'></div>奉制加臣银青光禄大夫同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371446_comment'></div>兼徐泗濠等州节度观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371446_comment'></div>馀如故者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371446_comment'></div>初受恩荣。<div 1371446, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>尘忝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371446_comment'></div>如履春冰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371446_comment'></div>臣诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371446_comment'></div>臣闻以德诏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371446_comment'></div>以劳定赏。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371457_comment'></div>不兼调鼎之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371457_comment'></div>授受维艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371457_comment'></div>伊昔犹尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371457_comment'></div>况臣庸琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371457_comment'></div>何以克堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371457_comment'></div>陛下元造曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371457_comment'></div>大明私照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371457_comment'></div>俾掌戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371457_comment'></div>复参庙谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371457_comment'></div>宠光之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371457_comment'></div>在臣已极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371457_comment'></div>毫发之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371457_comment'></div>于国何施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371457_comment'></div>谨当罄竭微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371457_comment'></div>奉遵至教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371457_comment'></div>仗天威以慑不顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371457_comment'></div>敷圣泽以遂群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371457_comment'></div>上分旰食之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371457_comment'></div>下塞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371457", 1371457, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>素餐</span>之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371457_comment'></div>力诚不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371457_comment'></div>心实念兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371457_comment'></div>伏乞皇明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371457_comment'></div>俯赐昭鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371457_comment'></div>臣恪居官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371457_comment'></div>遐守藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371457_comment'></div>不获伏谢彤庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371457_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371457", 1371457, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>陈露</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371457", 1371457, "Clauses/43/Comments/1")'>丹慊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371457_comment'></div>心存阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371457_comment'></div>同犬马之恋恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371457_comment'></div>身在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1371457", 1371457, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>淮濆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371457_comment'></div>仰云天而结思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371457_comment'></div>无任恳悃屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1371457_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　在徐泗濠节度使掌书记任，经历戎马生活数月。<br /></div>

兴平

-----title
凤翔（雍县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='0a2ccc53f816442d81b817c007c1554d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0a2ccc53f816442d81b817c007c1554d");'><span id='0a2ccc53f816442d81b817c007c1554d_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　秋，游岐州，有赋咏三良冢。作品：《三良冢赋有序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》诗文补遗卷第616页，中华书局1990年版；此页记此诗为自长安西行所作，时间为贞元九年或十年，姑系于贞元十年。）</span><div id='poem_1371399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三良冢赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（794年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371399")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371399_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371399'>鲁文六年。秦伯任好卒。以子车氏之三子奄息仲行针虎为殉。皆秦之良也。国人哀之。为之赋黄鸟。君子曰。秦穆之不为盟主也宜哉。先王违世。犹贻之法。而况夺之善人乎。是以知秦之不复东征也。秋季月。吾西游汧渭。出于岐雍之间。于古道傍得三良冢。心甚哀之。涕泗者久之而去。辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371399'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371399'>昨宿岐城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371399_comment'></div>晓涉渭东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371399_comment'></div>霜凌雪结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371399_comment'></div>飞沙乱蓬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371399_comment'></div>中野踌躇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371399_comment'></div>届此古墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371399_comment'></div>野人曰即车氏之冢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371399_comment'></div>方驱驾班如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371399_comment'></div>久而咤曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371399_comment'></div>吾尝读旧史矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371399_comment'></div>古者秦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371399_comment'></div>大于穆公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371399_comment'></div>出师则宁东夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371399_comment'></div>用贤则霸西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371399_comment'></div>大邦服其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371399_comment'></div>小邦畏其雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371399_comment'></div>谋已集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371399_comment'></div>战亦武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371399_comment'></div>不能勤王不为盟主者何居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371399_comment'></div>以灭天之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371399_comment'></div>丧人之特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371399_comment'></div>百夫仰系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371399_comment'></div>一朝而踣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371399_comment'></div>可哀也哉。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1371399_comment'></div>主已即世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371399_comment'></div>身皆靡全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371399_comment'></div>指冥茫而为期。<div id='poem_sentence_30_1371399_comment'></div>且哀哀而号天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371399_comment'></div>□从有言于寒原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371399_comment'></div>莽荡千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371399_comment'></div>回眺无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371399_comment'></div>上刺衰德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371399_comment'></div>下伤幽魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371399_comment'></div>挂骖垄树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371399_comment'></div>脱剑山门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371399_comment'></div>掇野芳以为荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371399_comment'></div>汲行潦而充樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371399_comment'></div>矧今情之犹悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371399_comment'></div>谅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371399", 1371399, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>古恨</span>之潜吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371399_comment'></div>死而不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371399_comment'></div>吾谁与言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371399_comment'></div>代事浩溔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371399_comment'></div>人寿尔夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371399_comment'></div>言念君子。<div id='poem_sentence_49_1371399_comment'></div>赴永夕之莫晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371399_comment'></div>归去来兮不可留。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371458_comment'></div>超升独坐之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371458_comment'></div>户领三千。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371492_comment'></div>曲覃霈泽。鸾鹤回翔而变态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371492_comment'></div>烟云舒卷以呈姿。赋彩飞文。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为杜相公贺除虔王表</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371436")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371436'>臣某言。中使李国真至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371436_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨存问。兼赐臣墨诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371436_comment'></div>鸿泽浃下。大明烛幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371436_comment'></div>晓谕便藩。慰安稠謺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371436_comment'></div>中谢。臣伏睹天书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371436_comment'></div>恭承睿旨。宏爱人屈己之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371436_comment'></div>酌因时适变之宜。择贤王作镇徐方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371436_comment'></div>俾张愔便主留务。上则成邦家磐石之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371436_comment'></div>下则副士众拜章之请。戚藩之寄斯重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371436_comment'></div>旧勋之祀获全。丕变猖狂之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371436_comment'></div>咸跻仁寿之域。既宏在宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371436_comment'></div>坐见止戈。率土人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371436_comment'></div>孰不欣说。臣素乏方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371436_comment'></div>谬荷宠光。猥尘将相之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371436_comment'></div>无施分寸之绩。遭逢若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371436_comment'></div>报效蔑闻。官谤已兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371436_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371436", 1371436, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>渥刑</span>宜及。陛下恩深覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371436_comment'></div>道务含宏。恤公私馈饷之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371436_comment'></div>念吏士锋镝之苦。特纡神算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371436_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371436", 1371436, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>昭发</span>德音。危疑获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371436_comment'></div>重微臣素餐之责。周章跼蹐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371436_comment'></div>胡颜自安。但以遐守藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371436_comment'></div>恪居官次。不获仰谢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371436", 1371436, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>云陛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371436_comment'></div>陈露血诚。未遂周任知止之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371436_comment'></div>敢逃臧文窃位之咎。无任战越之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371436_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1371436_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为杜相公贺复吴少诚官爵表</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371435'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371435'>臣某言。中使宋惟澄至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371435_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨存问。兼赐臣墨诏及昭示洗雪吴少诚等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371435_comment'></div>天地宏覆焘之恩。雷雨施涣汗之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371435_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371435", 1371435, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>瑕累</span>咸涤。危疑获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371435_comment'></div>中谢。臣伏以少诚擅兴兵戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371435_comment'></div>事生诖误。自王师致讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371435_comment'></div>天威下临。曾无悖辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371435_comment'></div>亟闻引咎。初怀疑惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371435_comment'></div>虽拥众以偷生。旋感圣神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371435_comment'></div>屡拜章而请命。陛下仁深解网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371435_comment'></div>虑轸纳隍。念馈饷飞挽之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371435_comment'></div>闵战争暴露之苦。举兹宥过之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371435_comment'></div>副彼效顺之诚。一方承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371435", 1371435, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>再造</span>之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371435_comment'></div>九有睹惟新之化。敷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371435", 1371435, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>鸿霈</span>而覃及蠢类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371435_comment'></div>鼓仁风而臻于太和。罢柝销锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371435_comment'></div>自兹而始。臣谬膺重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371435_comment'></div>虔守遐藩。不获称庆瑶墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371435_comment'></div>陈露<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371435", 1371435, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>丹恳</span>。仰瞻宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371435_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371435", 1371435, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>倍百</span>常情。无任庆抃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371435_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1371435_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371487' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371487' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371487?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为淮南杜相公谢诏许濠泗两州割属淮南表</a><span class='authorDate'>（800年11月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371487_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371487'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371487'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371487_comment'></div>伏奉十一月二十九日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371487_comment'></div>其濠泗两州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371487_comment'></div>令臣依前收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371487_comment'></div>臣谬承宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371487_comment'></div>作镇淮海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371487_comment'></div>位均九伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371487_comment'></div>权总<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371487", 1371487, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>十连</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371487_comment'></div>内省无堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371487_comment'></div>常恐不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371487_comment'></div>岂谓恩私曲被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371487_comment'></div>封略有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371487_comment'></div>惭无报政之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371487_comment'></div>重受分忧之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371487_comment'></div>伏以兵戎方息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371487_comment'></div>闾里未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371487_comment'></div>谨当奉宣皇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371487_comment'></div>慰彼黔首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371487_comment'></div>且责成于牧宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371487_comment'></div>期不失于澄清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371487_comment'></div>伏惟圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371487_comment'></div>俯赐昭鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371487_comment'></div>臣无任感戴屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371487_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=800&endYear=800')">800年</a>　在淮南节度使掌书记任。冬，作表。作品：《为淮南杜相公谢赐历日面脂口脂表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷12第144页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371480' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371480'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371480'>臣某言。中使霍子璘至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371480_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。存问臣及将佐官吏僧道耆寿百姓等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371480_comment'></div>兼赐臣墨诏及贞元十七年新历一轴。腊日面脂口脂红雪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371480", 1371480, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>紫雪</span>并金花银合二金棱合二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371480_comment'></div>皇明远烛。殊锡荐臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371480_comment'></div>抃舞失容。捧戴无措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371480_comment'></div>臣某中谢。伏惟皇帝陛下立极御天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371480_comment'></div>顺时布政。礼崇大蜡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371480_comment'></div>泽浃遐藩。臣叨荣日深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371480_comment'></div>窃位时久。谬回宸眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371480_comment'></div>猥降王人。天书下临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371480_comment'></div>睹三光之照耀。玉历爰授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371480_comment'></div>知四气之环周。雕奁既开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371480_comment'></div>珍药斯见。膏凝雪莹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371480_comment'></div>含液腾芳。顿光蒲柳之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371480_comment'></div>永去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371480", 1371480, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>疠疵</span>之患。命轻恩重。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　在杜佑幕府一年余。识窦常，刘伯刍。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_1371442_comment'></div>天授忠节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371442_comment'></div>奋扬义勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371442_comment'></div>茂建勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371442_comment'></div>秩冠朝端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371442_comment'></div>参燮和于台铉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371442_comment'></div>姻连戚里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371442_comment'></div>承嘉庆于云霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371442_comment'></div>荣掩华夷。<div id='poem_title_1371496' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371496?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为淮南杜相公论西戎表</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371496")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371496_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371496'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371496'>臣佑言。臣一辞阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371496_comment'></div>已经二载。官当重任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371496_comment'></div>身受厚恩。既怀子牟恋阙之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371496_comment'></div>又负臧文窃位之责。思所以歌颂圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371496_comment'></div>俾补箴规。尘露至微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371496_comment'></div>不任恳迫。臣远祖诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371496_comment'></div>显名汉代。出牧南阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371496_comment'></div>谠言善策。随事献纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371496_comment'></div>忠醇之至。闻于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371496_comment'></div>遗风可袭。有激愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371496_comment'></div>臣是以辄竭闻见。粗陈梗概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371496_comment'></div>虽不尽陛下圣明万分之一。然臣子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371496_comment'></div>有直必献。伏惟皇帝陛下德合天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371496_comment'></div>道跻文武。弛张普博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371496_comment'></div>上法阴阳。气均生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371496_comment'></div>人沾亭育。凡是氛沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371496_comment'></div>覆以春和。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371496", 1371496, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>销除</span>容纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371496_comment'></div>皆如圣意。宽宥肆赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371496_comment'></div>实赖皇明。河中诛锄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371496_comment'></div>不劳兵革。淮右底定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371496_comment'></div>不戮一人。庆浃万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371496_comment'></div>事出千古。近又西戎背约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371496_comment'></div>寇犯王师。陛下宏贷豺狼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371496_comment'></div>矜其凶悍。布以恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371496_comment'></div>果此知惭。功因德成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371496_comment'></div>不以兵革。故诗云猃狁孔炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371496_comment'></div>书称蛮夷猾夏。臣观自古帝王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371496_comment'></div>不忍小忿贻大患。故竭耗中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371496_comment'></div>尽心边陲。至必灭昆明之城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371496_comment'></div>平大宛之种。岂足发辉皇猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371496_comment'></div>增荣简册。故贤哲之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371496_comment'></div>薄卫霍之功。陛下镜历代无益之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371496_comment'></div>修大君文德之教。遂得北狄深藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371496_comment'></div>五城晏闭。百蛮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371496", 1371496, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>向化</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371496_comment'></div>四海无虞。惟此小蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371496_comment'></div>尚迷圣教。陛下示之大信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371496_comment'></div>宏以旧恩。虽关防暂惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371496_comment'></div>而烽燧旋罢。臣负恩方镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371496_comment'></div>初惧寇戎。正于忧迫之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371496_comment'></div>果闻仁圣之谕。攘却凶孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371496_comment'></div>不劳干戈。臣静思远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371496_comment'></div>为国久计。莫若存信施惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371496_comment'></div>多愧其心。岁通玉帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371496_comment'></div>待以客礼。昭宣圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371496_comment'></div>择奉谊之臣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1371496", 1371496, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>恢拓</span>皇威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371496_comment'></div>选谨边之将。积粟塞下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371496_comment'></div>坐甲关中。以逸待劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371496_comment'></div>以高御下。重以金玉之赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371496_comment'></div>结以舅甥之欢。小来则慰安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371496_comment'></div>大至则严备。明其斥候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371496_comment'></div>不挠不侵。则戎狄为可封之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371496_comment'></div>沙场无战死之骨。若天下无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371496_comment'></div>人安岁稔。然后训兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371496_comment'></div>命将破虏。摧衡原州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371496_comment'></div>营田灵武。尽复旧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371496_comment'></div>通使安西。国家长算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371496_comment'></div>悉在于此。计熟事定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371496_comment'></div>举必有功。苟未可图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371496_comment'></div>岂宜容易。此皆陛下朝夕倦谈之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371496_comment'></div>前后立验之谋。臣质性顽疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371496_comment'></div>筹画庸近。受恩非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371496_comment'></div>敢忘献忠。犬马之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371496_comment'></div>实所罄尽。谨遣某官奉表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371496_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_63_1371496_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371494' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_2_1371494_comment'></div>恳诚所至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371494_comment'></div>敢不罄陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371494_comment'></div>伏惟圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371494_comment'></div>俯赐矜察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371494_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371494_comment'></div>臣代受国恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371494_comment'></div>忝承门荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371494_comment'></div>脱巾筮仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371494_comment'></div>敢期荣名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371494_comment'></div>陈力效官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371494_comment'></div>靡树<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371494", 1371494, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>声绩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371494_comment'></div>远违辇下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371494_comment'></div>十有四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371494_comment'></div>恪守淮濆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371494_comment'></div>于今一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371494_comment'></div>犬马恋主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371494_comment'></div>寝兴匪遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371494_comment'></div>蒲柳易衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371494_comment'></div>迟暮俄及。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1371494_comment'></div>况历任以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371494_comment'></div>四十八考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371494_comment'></div>祗奉朝谒。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1371494_comment'></div>伏惟睿鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371494_comment'></div>俯亮愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371494_comment'></div>早赐择人。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1371478_comment'></div>臣与大将无任感戴踊跃之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371478_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为淮南杜相公谢赐钟馗历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（801年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371483")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371483'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371483'>臣某言。高品某乙至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371483_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。赐臣画钟馗一新历日一轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371483_comment'></div>星纪方回。虽逢岁暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371483_comment'></div>恩辉忽降。已觉春来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371483_comment'></div>臣某中谢。伏以图写威神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371483_comment'></div>驱除群厉。颁行律历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371483_comment'></div>敬授四时。施张有严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371483_comment'></div>既增门户之贵。动用叶吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371483_comment'></div>常为掌握之珍。瞻仰披寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371483_comment'></div>皆知圣泽。无任欣戴之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371485_comment'></div>今月九日军器使梁延寿奉宣进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371485_comment'></div>付所司准省牒赐臣门戟十二竿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371485_comment'></div>恩降云天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371485_comment'></div>荣加门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371485_comment'></div>承旨庆抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371485_comment'></div>省躬惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371485_comment'></div>伏以礼著等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371485_comment'></div>朝有命数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371485_comment'></div>是昭懋赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371485_comment'></div>必在畴庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371485_comment'></div>臣谬荷宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371485_comment'></div>素无绩效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371485_comment'></div>旌旄之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371485_comment'></div>巳忝外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371485_comment'></div>棨戟爰列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371485_comment'></div>更光私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371485_comment'></div>贲于枨闑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371485_comment'></div>庆及子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371485_comment'></div>睹兹盛仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371485_comment'></div>实愧虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371490_comment'></div>又以臣所奏罗珦及裴靖政理有方。今各赐手诏激赏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371490_comment'></div>恩降重霄。泽流下土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371490_comment'></div>义敦奖劝。荣冠等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371490_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣昨以罗珦裴靖励精吏理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371490_comment'></div>效用著明。人感悦安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371490_comment'></div>俗致殷阜。恐须甄录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371490_comment'></div>以劝在官。辄献封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371490_comment'></div>具陈成绩。伏蒙睿览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371490_comment'></div>俯亮愚衷。嘉理行之尤光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371490_comment'></div>示丝纶之深旨。守道者益以固志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371507_comment'></div>臣得新罗贺正使忭如言状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371507_comment'></div>请前件方状一部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371507_comment'></div>将归本国者。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1371507_comment'></div>药必易求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371507_comment'></div>疾无隐状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371507_comment'></div>搜方技之秘要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371507_comment'></div>拯生灵之夭瘥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371507_comment'></div>坐此华胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371507_comment'></div>咸跻仁寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371507_comment'></div>遂令绝域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371507_comment'></div>逖听风声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371507_comment'></div>美兹丰功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371507_comment'></div>爰有诚请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_17608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17608'>萧条长风至，千里孤云生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371486_comment'></div>伏奉诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371486_comment'></div>以臣所请畿内折籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371486_comment'></div>宜令度支计会定数奏来者。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1371486_comment'></div>臣自理京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371486_comment'></div>不先威刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371486_comment'></div>唯务<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371486", 1371486, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>便安</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371486_comment'></div>所期富庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371486_comment'></div>每因赐对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371486_comment'></div>常奉德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371486_comment'></div>府县之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371486_comment'></div>巨细令奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371486_comment'></div>伏以圣明在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371486_comment'></div>风雨应时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371486_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371486", 1371486, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>顺成</span>之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371486_comment'></div>谷籴常贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371486_comment'></div>若无轻重之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371486_comment'></div>必利兼并之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371486_comment'></div>辄敢上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371486_comment'></div>请行折籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371486_comment'></div>天光下烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371486_comment'></div>人隐无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371486_comment'></div>宣付所司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371486_comment'></div>允臣所奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371486_comment'></div>事关理本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371486_comment'></div>惠及生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371486_comment'></div>臣忝尹京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371486_comment'></div>倍百欣荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371486_comment'></div>无任欢跃屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1371486_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　在渭南县主簿任，作状。作品：《为京兆韦尹进野猪状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第201页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371503' 江陵
-----detail

/><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17625_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17625'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8300, "poem_allusion_17625")'>天盖</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17625_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17625'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17625'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17625", 17625, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>楚望</span>何苍然，曾澜七百里。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17625'>孤城寄远目，一写无穷已。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17625'>荡漾浮<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8300, "poem_sentence_2_17625")'>天盖</span>，四环宣地理。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17625'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17625", 17625, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>积涨</span>在三秋，混成非一水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17625'>冬游见清浅，春望多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_17625", 17625, id='poem_sentence_5_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17625'>火星忽南见，月硖方东迤。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17625'>雪波西山来，隐若长城起。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17625'>独专朝宗路，驶悍不可止。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17625'>支川让其威，蓄缩至南委。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17625'>熊武走蛮落<span class='inlineComment2'>（熊、武，二溪名）</span>，潇湘来奥鄙。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17625'>炎蒸动泉源，积潦搜山趾。<div id='poem_sentence_11_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_17625'>归往无旦夕，包含通远迩。<div id='poem_sentence_12_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_17625'>行当白露时，眇视秋光里。<div id='poem_sentence_13_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_17625'>曙色未昭晰，露华遥斐舋。<div id='poem_sentence_14_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_17625'>浩尔神骨清，如观混元始。<div id='poem_sentence_15_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_17625'>北风忽震荡，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_17625", 17625, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>惊浪</span>迷津涘。<div id='poem_sentence_16_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_17625'>怒激鼓铿訇，蹙成山岿硊。<div id='poem_sentence_17_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_17625'>鹍鹏疑变化，罔象何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_17625", 17625, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>恢诡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_17625'>嘘吸写楼台，腾骧露鬐尾。<div id='poem_sentence_19_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_17625'>景移群动息，波静繁音弭。<div id='poem_sentence_20_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_17625'>明月出中央，青天绝纤滓。<div id='poem_sentence_21_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_17625'>素光淡无际，绿静平如砥。<div id='poem_sentence_22_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_17625'>空影渡鹓鸿，秋声思芦苇。<div id='poem_sentence_23_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_17625'>鲛人弄机杼，贝阙骈红紫。<div id='poem_sentence_24_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_17625'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_17625", 17625, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>珠蛤</span>吐玲珑，文鳐翔旖旎。<div id='poem_sentence_25_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_17625'>水乡吴蜀限，地势东南庳。<div id='poem_sentence_26_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_17625'>翼轸粲垂精，衡巫屹环峙。<div id='poem_sentence_27_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_17625'>名雄七泽薮，国辨三苗氏。<div id='poem_sentence_28_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_17625'>唐羿断修蛇，荆王惮<span class='inlineComment2'>（丁达反）</span>青兕。<div id='poem_sentence_29_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_17625'>秦狩迹犹在，虞巡路从此。<div id='poem_sentence_30_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_17625'>轩后奏宫商，骚人咏兰芷。<div id='poem_sentence_31_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_17625'>茅岭潜相应，橘洲傍可指。<div id='poem_sentence_32_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_17625'>郭璞验幽经，罗含著前纪。<div id='poem_sentence_33_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_17625'>观津<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作律）</span>戚里族，按道侯家子。<div id='poem_sentence_34_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_17625'>联袂登高楼，临轩笑相视。<div id='poem_sentence_35_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_17625'>假守亦高卧<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝时权领郡事）</span>，墨曹正垂耳<span class='inlineComment2'>（韩亦量移江陵法曹）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_17625'>契阔话凉温，壶觞慰迁徙。<div id='poem_sentence_37_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_17625'>地偏山水秀，客重杯盘侈。<div id='poem_sentence_38_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_17625'>红袖花欲然，银灯昼相似。<div id='poem_sentence_39_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_17625'>兴酣更抵掌，乐极同启齿。<div id='poem_sentence_40_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_17625'>笔锋不能休，藻思一何绮。<div id='poem_sentence_41_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_17625'>伊余负微尚，夙昔惭知己。<div id='poem_sentence_42_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_17625'>出入金马门，交结青云士。<div id='poem_sentence_43_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_17625'>袭芳践兰室，学古游槐市。<div id='poem_sentence_44_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_17625'>策慕宋前军，文师汉中垒。<div id='poem_sentence_45_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_17625'>陋容昧俯仰，孤志无依倚。<div id='poem_sentence_46_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_17625'>卫足不如葵，漏川空叹蚁。<div id='poem_sentence_47_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_17625'>幸逢万物泰，独处穷途否。<div id='poem_sentence_48_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_17625'>锻翮重叠伤，兢魂再三褫。<div id='poem_sentence_49_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_17625'>蘧瑷亦屡化，左丘犹有耻。<div id='poem_sentence_50_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_17625'>桃源访仙宫，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_17625", 17625, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>薜服</span>祠山鬼。<div id='poem_sentence_51_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_17625'>故人南台旧，一别如弦矢。<div id='poem_sentence_52_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_17625'>今朝会荆峦，斗酒相宴喜。<div id='poem_sentence_53_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_17625'>为余出新什，笑抃随伸纸。<div id='poem_sentence_54_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_17625'>晔若观五色，欢然臻四美。<div id='poem_sentence_55_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_17625'>委曲风涛事，分明穷达旨。<div id='poem_sentence_56_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_17625'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_17625", 17625, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>洪韵</span>发华钟，凄音激清徵。<div id='poem_sentence_57_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_17625'>羊浚要<span class='inlineComment2'>（平声）</span>共和，江淹多杂拟。<div id='poem_sentence_58_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_17625'>徒欲仰高山，焉能追逸轨。<div id='poem_sentence_59_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_17625'>湘洲路四达，巴陵城百雉。<div id='poem_sentence_60_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_17625'>何必颜光禄，留诗张内史。<div id='poem_sentence_61_17625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_17625'></div><div id='poem_sentence_62_17625_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

荆州

-----title
岳阳（巴陵）

-----title
常德（武陵）
-----detail
