id='poem_title_1371593_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371593'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371593'>贞元季年夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371593_comment'></div>大水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371593_comment'></div>熊武五溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371593_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371593", 1371593, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>斗决</span>于沅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371593_comment'></div>突旧防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371593_comment'></div>毁民家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371593_comment'></div>跻高望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371593_comment'></div>溟涬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371593", 1371593, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>葩华</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371593_comment'></div>山腹为坁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371593_comment'></div>林端如莎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371593_comment'></div>湍道驶悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371593_comment'></div>不风而怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371593_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371593", 1371593, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>崱嶷</span>前迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371593_comment'></div>浸淫旁掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371593_comment'></div>柔者靡之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371593_comment'></div>固者脱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371593_comment'></div>规者旋环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371593_comment'></div>矩者颠倒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371593_comment'></div>轻而汎浮者硠磕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371593_comment'></div>重而高大者前却之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371593_comment'></div>生者力音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371593_comment'></div>殪者弛形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371593_comment'></div>蔽流而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371593_comment'></div>若木柹然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371593_comment'></div>有僧愀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371593_comment'></div>誓于路曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371593_comment'></div>浮屠之慈悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371593_comment'></div>救生最大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371593_comment'></div>能援彼于溺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371593_comment'></div>我当为魁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371593_comment'></div>里中儿愿从三四辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371593_comment'></div>皆狎川勇游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371593_comment'></div>相与乘坚舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371593_comment'></div>挟善器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371593_comment'></div>维以修䋏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371593_comment'></div>杙于崇邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371593_comment'></div>水当洄洑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371593_comment'></div>人易寘力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371593_comment'></div>凝矑执用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371593_comment'></div>俟可而拯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371593_comment'></div>大凡室处之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371593_comment'></div>穴居之汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371593_comment'></div>在牧之群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371593_comment'></div>在豢之驯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371593_comment'></div>上罗黔首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371593_comment'></div>下逮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1371593", 1371593, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>毛物</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371593_comment'></div>拔乎洪澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371593_comment'></div>致诸生地者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371593_comment'></div>数十百焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371593_comment'></div>适有挚兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371593_comment'></div>如鸱夷而前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371593_comment'></div>攫持流蘖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371593_comment'></div>首用不陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371593_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371593", 1371593, id='poem_sentence_55_1371593_comment'></div>其徒将取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371593_comment'></div>僧趣诃之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371593_comment'></div>第无济是为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371593_comment'></div>目之可里所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371593_comment'></div>而不能有所持矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371593_comment'></div>舟中之人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371593_comment'></div>吾闻浮图之教贵空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371593_comment'></div>空生普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371593_comment'></div>普生慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371593_comment'></div>不求报施之谓空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371593_comment'></div>不择善恶之谓普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371593_comment'></div>不逆穷困之谓慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371593_comment'></div>向也生必救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371593_comment'></div>而今也穷见废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371593_comment'></div>无乃计善恶而忘普与慈乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371593_comment'></div>僧曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371593_comment'></div>甚矣问之迷且妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371593_comment'></div>吾之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371593_comment'></div>恶乎无善恶哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371593_comment'></div>六尘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371593_comment'></div>在身之不善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371593_comment'></div>佛以贼视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371593_comment'></div>末伽声闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371593_comment'></div>在彼之未寤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371593_comment'></div>佛以邪目之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371593_comment'></div>佛恶乎无善恶耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371593_comment'></div>吾向也所援而出死地者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371593_comment'></div>形乾气还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371593_comment'></div>各复本状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371593_comment'></div>蹄者踯躅然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371593_comment'></div>羽者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1371593", 1371593, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>翘萧</span>然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371593_comment'></div>而言者諓諓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371593_comment'></div>随其所之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371593_comment'></div>吾不尸其施也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371593_comment'></div>不德吾则已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371593_comment'></div>乌能害为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371593_comment'></div>彼形之乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371593_comment'></div>髬髵之姿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371593_comment'></div>彼气之还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371593_comment'></div>暴悖之用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371593_comment'></div>心足反噬而齿甘最灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371593_comment'></div>必肉吾属矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371593_comment'></div>庸能踯躅諓諓之比欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371593_comment'></div>夫虎之不可使知恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371593_comment'></div>犹人之不可使为虎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371593_comment'></div>非吾自遗患焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371593_comment'></div>且将遗患于众多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371593_comment'></div>吾罪大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371593_comment'></div>子刘子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371593_comment'></div>余闻善人在患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371593_comment'></div>不救不祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371593_comment'></div>恶人在位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371593_comment'></div>不去亦不祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371593_comment'></div>僧之言远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371593_comment'></div>故志之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1371593_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　在朗州司马任，居招屈亭之旁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　在朗州司马任，与顾彖、董侹等论学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年1月</a>　正月，改元元和，大赦。禹锡因读《改元元和赦文》，致书杜佑，要求量移。作品：《上杜司徒书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第116页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371523' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371523' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371523?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杜司徒书</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371523")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371523_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371523'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371523'>月日。故吏守朗州司马员外置同正员刘某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371523_comment'></div>谨斋沐致诚。命仆夫持书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371523_comment'></div>敢献于司徒相公閤下。昔称韩非善著书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371523_comment'></div>而说难孤愤尤为激切。故司马子长深悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371523_comment'></div>为著于篇。显白其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371523_comment'></div>夫以非之书。可谓善言人情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371523_comment'></div>使逢时遇合之士观之。固无以异于它书矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371523_comment'></div>而独深悲之者。岂非遭罹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>世故</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371523_comment'></div>益感其言之至邪。小人受性颛蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371523_comment'></div>涉道未至。末学见浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371523_comment'></div>少年气粗。常谓尽诚可以绝嫌猜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371523_comment'></div>徇公可以弭谗愬。谓慎独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>防微</span>为近隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371523_comment'></div>谓艰贞用晦为废忠。刍狗已陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371523_comment'></div>刻舟徒识。罟获随足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371523_comment'></div>怅然无知。事去凝想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371523_comment'></div>时时自笑。然后知韩非之善说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371523_comment'></div>司马子长之深悲。迹符理会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371523_comment'></div>千古相见。虽欲勿悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371523_comment'></div>可乎。大凡恒人之所以灵于庶类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371523_comment'></div>以其能群以胜物也。烈士之所以异于恒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371523_comment'></div>以其仗节以死谊也。然则交相丧者世与道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371523_comment'></div>难合并者机与时。是以有死谊之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371523_comment'></div>而卒不获其所者。世人悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371523_comment'></div>获其所矣。而一旦如不得终焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371523_comment'></div>君子悲之。世人之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371523_comment'></div>悲其不遇。无成而亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371523_comment'></div>故其感也近。君子之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371523_comment'></div>悲其不幸。既得而丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371523_comment'></div>故其感也深。其悲则同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371523_comment'></div>其所以为悲则异。若小人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371523_comment'></div>其不幸欤。间者昧于藩身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371523_comment'></div>推致危地。始以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>飞谤</span>生衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371523_comment'></div>终成公议抵刑。旬朔之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371523_comment'></div>再投裔土。外黩相公知人之鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371523_comment'></div>内贻慈亲非疾之忧。常恐恩义两乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371523_comment'></div>家国同负。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>寒心销志</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371523_comment'></div>以生为惭。虽欲沥血以自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371523_comment'></div>吁天以自诉。适足来众多之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371523_comment'></div>岂复有特达见知者耶。遂用诅盟于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371523_comment'></div>不获自白。以内咎为弭谤之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371523_comment'></div>以吞声为窒隙之媒。庶乎日月至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371523_comment'></div>而是非乃辨。会友人江陵法曹掾韩愈以不幸相悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371523_comment'></div>且曰。相国扶风公之遇子也厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371523_comment'></div>非独余知之。天下之人皆知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371523_comment'></div>余闻初子之横为口语所中。独相国深明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371523_comment'></div>及不得已而退。则为之流涕以诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371523_comment'></div>又不得已而谴。则为之择地以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371523_comment'></div>求之于今。难与侔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371523_comment'></div>抑余又闻曩子之介于司徒府。奉诚敬于山园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371523_comment'></div>上公亟称于人。以为不懈于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371523_comment'></div>今则有修仪以赞其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>诏相</span>者。有备物以赞其容卫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371523_comment'></div>七月礼毕。一朝庆行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371523_comment'></div>诰言扬之。授以显秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371523_comment'></div>子独足趾一跌。而前劳并捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371523_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>祝网</span>之辰。动絓疏目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371523_comment'></div>可封之代。乃为穷人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371523_comment'></div>斯常情之所悲。矧知子之厚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371523_comment'></div>夫踣者思起。必謼而求拯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371523_comment'></div>疾者思愈。必呻而求医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371523_comment'></div>子宜謼于有力而呻于有术。如何以钳口自绝为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371523_comment'></div>以甘心受诬为贤。嗛然自咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371523_comment'></div>求知于默。彼李斯逐焉而为上卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371523_comment'></div>邹阳囚焉而为上客。二子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371523_comment'></div>岂默以求知者邪。若可诉而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371523_comment'></div>则陷于畏。可言而不辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371523_comment'></div>则邻于怨。畏与怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371523_comment'></div>君子之所不处。子其处之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371523_comment'></div>韩生之言未及竟。而小人不知感从中来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371523_comment'></div>始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>赧然</span>以愧。又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>缺然</span>以慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371523_comment'></div>终悄然以悲。悲斯叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371523_comment'></div>叹斯愤。愤必有泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371523_comment'></div>故见乎词。敢闻左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371523_comment'></div>投所闵也。嗟夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371523_comment'></div>人之至信者心目也。天性者父子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371523_comment'></div>不惑者圣贤也。然而于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>窃鈇</span>而知心目之可乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371523_comment'></div>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>掇蜂</span>而知父子之可间。于拾煤而知圣贤之可疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371523_comment'></div>况乎道谢孔颜。恩异天性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371523_comment'></div>是非之际。爱恶相攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371523_comment'></div>争先利途。虞相轧则衅起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371523_comment'></div>希合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>贵意</span>。虽无嫌而谤生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371523_comment'></div>鲁酒致邯郸之围。飞鸢生博者之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371523_comment'></div>伯仁之杀由偶对。伯奢之冤以器声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371523_comment'></div>动罹险中。皆出意表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371523_comment'></div>虽欲周防。亦难曲施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371523_comment'></div>加以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>吠声</span>者多。辨实者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371523_comment'></div>飞语一发。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/171/Comments/0")'>胪言</span>四驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371523_comment'></div>萌牙始奋。枝叶俄茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371523_comment'></div>方谓语怪。终成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>祸梯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371523_comment'></div>呜呼。人必求知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371523_comment'></div>不能自达。何投分效节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371523_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/180/Comments/0")'>积尘</span>之难。何谮行爱弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371523_comment'></div>有决防之易。何将进之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371523_comment'></div>必自见其可而后亲。何将退之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371523_comment'></div>乃人言其否而遂弃。良由邪人必微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371523_comment'></div>邪谋必阴。阴则难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371523_comment'></div>微则易信。罔极大甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371523_comment'></div>古今同途。是以前修鉴其若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371523_comment'></div>姑以推心取信。不以循迹生嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371523_comment'></div>由是求忠臣于孝子。求良妇于骂已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371523_comment'></div>食子尽节也。推其忍可以疑心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371523_comment'></div>放麛违命也。推其仁可以属国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371523_comment'></div>若谓其孝于亲。未必能忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371523_comment'></div>专于夫。未必能贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371523_comment'></div>忍于子。未必能忍于其它。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371523_comment'></div>仁于兽。未必能仁于其类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371523_comment'></div>则是天下之人。尽不可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371523_comment'></div>而尽可诬。固不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371523_comment'></div>凡人之行巳。必恒于所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371523_comment'></div>苟非狂易。不能甚异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371523_comment'></div>小人自居门下。仅踰十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371523_comment'></div>未尝信宿而不侍坐。率性所履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371523_comment'></div>固无遁逃。言行之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371523_comment'></div>足见真态。伏惟推心以明其迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371523_comment'></div>追往以鉴于今。苟谓其尝掩人以自售矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371523_comment'></div>尝近名以冒进矣。尝欺谩于言说矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371523_comment'></div>尝沓贪于求售矣。尝狎比其琐细矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371523_comment'></div>尝媒孽其僚友矣。尝矫激以买直矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371523_comment'></div>尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/234/Comments/0")'>詀讘</span>以取容矣。尝漏言于咨诹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371523_comment'></div>尝败务以簿书矣。有一于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371523_comment'></div>虽人谓其贤。我得而刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371523_comment'></div>岂止于弃乎。苟或反是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371523_comment'></div>虽人谓其盗。我得而任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371523_comment'></div>庸可而弃乎。由是而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371523_comment'></div>小人之善否。不在众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371523_comment'></div>所以受谴已还。行及半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371523_comment'></div>当食而叹。闻弦尚惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371523_comment'></div>不以众人之善为是非。唯以相公之意为衡准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371523_comment'></div>自违间左右。亟蒙简书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371523_comment'></div>慰诲勤勤。穷悴增感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371523_comment'></div>伏想仁念。必思有以拯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371523_comment'></div>况礼道贵终。人情尚旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371523_comment'></div>尝尽其力。必加以仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371523_comment'></div>于犬马之微。有帷盖之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371523_comment'></div>顾异于是。岂无庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371523_comment'></div>傥浮言可以事久而明。众嗤可以时久而息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371523_comment'></div>宏我大信。以袪群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371523_comment'></div>使煢煢微志。无已矣之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371523_comment'></div>觊乎异日。得夷平民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371523_comment'></div>然后裹足西向。谢恩有所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371523_comment'></div>复以尘缨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_139_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/278/Comments/0")'>黧貌</span>。称故吏于相门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371523_comment'></div>此言朝遂。可以夕死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371523_comment'></div>何则。复于变者其义重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371523_comment'></div>拯于危者其感深。暌而后合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371523_comment'></div>示终不可暌也。否而后泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371523_comment'></div>示终不及否也。获宝于已丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371523_comment'></div>得途于既迷。与夫平居不为艰故所激者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371523_comment'></div>其味异矣。伏以大君继明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371523_comment'></div>元宰柄用。鸿钧播平分之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371523_comment'></div>悬象廓无私之照。涣汗大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371523_comment'></div>与人惟新。昭回汪濊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371523_comment'></div>旁下郡国。投荒为民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371523_comment'></div>咸释拲梏。遂还里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371523_comment'></div>系于稍食。犹在羁绊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371523_comment'></div>伏读赦令。许移近郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371523_comment'></div>今武陵距京师。赢二千者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371523_comment'></div>小人祖先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_155_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/310/Comments/0")'>壤树</span>。在京索间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371523_comment'></div>瘠田可耕。陋室未毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371523_comment'></div>濡露增感。临风永怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371523_comment'></div>伏希闵其至诚。而少加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_158_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/317/Comments/0")'>推恕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371523_comment'></div>命东曹补吏。置籍于荥阳伍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371523_comment'></div>得奉安舆而西拜先人松槚。誓当赍志没齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371523_comment'></div>尽力于井臼之间。斯遂心之愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371523_comment'></div>如或官谤未塞。私欲未从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371523_comment'></div>虽为裔民。乃有善地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371523_comment'></div>则北距澧浦。资宿舂而可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371523_comment'></div>无道途之勤。蠲仆赁之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371523_comment'></div>重以镇南。用和辅理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371523_comment'></div>扇仁风于上游。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_167_1371523", 1371523, "Clauses/335/Comments/0")'>霁严</span>施惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371523_comment'></div>得以自遂。斯便家之愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371523_comment'></div>伏惟降意详察。择可行者处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371523_comment'></div>乞恩于指顾之间。为惠有生成之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371523_comment'></div>虽百谷之仰膏雨。岂喻其急焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371523_comment'></div>嗟哉小生。仕逢圣日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371523_comment'></div>岂曰不辰。知有相居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371523_comment'></div>岂曰不遇。而乘运钟否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371523_comment'></div>俾躬罹灾。同生无手足之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371523_comment'></div>终岁有病贫之厄。孰不求达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371523_comment'></div>而独招嫌。孰不求安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371523_comment'></div>而独乖次。赋命如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371523_comment'></div>虽悔可追。湘沅之滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371523_comment'></div>寒暑一候。阳雁才到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1371523_comment'></div>华言罕闻。猿哀鸟思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1371523_comment'></div>啁啾响异。莫夜之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1371523_comment'></div>并来愁肠。怀乡倦越吟之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371523_comment'></div>举目多似人之喜。俯视遗体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371523_comment'></div>仰安高堂。悲愁惴慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371523_comment'></div>常集方寸。尽意之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371523_comment'></div>固不在言。身远与寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371523_comment'></div>舍兹何托。是以因言以见意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371523_comment'></div>恃旧以求哀。敢希末光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371523_comment'></div>下烛幽蛰。孤志多感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371523_comment'></div>重恩难忘。顾瞻门馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371523_comment'></div>惭恋交会。伏纸流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371523_comment'></div>不知所云。禹锡惶悚再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371523_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_194_1371523_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　抵朗州司马任后未久，作诗感怀。作品：《武陵书怀五十韵并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷22第277页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武陵书怀五十韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17444")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_17444_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17444'>按《天官书》，武陵当翼轸之分，其在春秋及战国时，皆楚地，后为秦惠王所并。置黔中郡，汉兴，更名曰武陵，东徙于今治所。《常林义陵记》云：「初项籍杀义帝于郴。武陵人曰：『天下怜楚而兴，今吾王何罪？』乃见杀。郡民缟素，哭于招屈亭，高祖闻而异之，故亦曰义陵。」今郡城东南亭舍，其所也，晋、宋、齐、梁间，皆以分王子弟，事存于其书。永贞元年，余始以尚书外郎出补连山守，道贬为是郡司马，至则以方志所载，而质诸其人民，顾山川风物，皆骚人所赋，乃具所闻见而成是诗，因自述其出处之所以然，故用书怀为目云。</div><div id='poem_preface_17444_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17444'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(86, "poem_allusion_17444")'>二毛</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(827, "poem_allusion_17444")'>泉客泣</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1408, "poem_allusion_17444")'>巢幕</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2263, "poem_allusion_17444")'>登门</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6938, "poem_allusion_17444")'>戊己尉</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17444'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17444'>西汉开支郡，南朝号戚藩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17444'>四封当列宿，百雉俯清沅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17444'>高岸朝霞合，惊湍激箭奔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17444'>积阴春暗度，将霁雾先昏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17444'>俗尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_17444", 17444, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>东皇</span>祀，谣传义帝冤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17444'>桃花迷隐迹，楝<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作练）</span>叶慰忠魂。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17444'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_17444", 17444, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>户算</span>资渔猎，乡豪恃子孙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17444'>照山畬火动，踏月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_17444", 17444, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>俚歌</span>喧。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17444'>拥楫舟为市，连甍竹覆轩。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17444'>披沙金粟见，拾羽翠翘翻。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17444'>茗折苍溪秀，蘋生枉渚暄<span id='poem_sentence_11_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_17444'>沈约台榭故，李衡墟落存<span class='inlineComment2'>（隐侯台，木奴洲并在）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_17444'>湘灵悲鼓瑟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(827, id='poem_sentence_14_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_17444'>虎咆空野震，鼍作满川浑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_17444'>邻里皆迁客，儿童习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_17444", 17444, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>左言</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_17444'>炎天无冽井，霜月见芳荪。<div id='poem_sentence_17_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_17444'>问卜安冥数，看方理病源。<div id='poem_sentence_44_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_17444'>来忧御魑魅，归愿牧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_17444", 17444, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>鸡豚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_47_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_17444'>就日秦京远，临风楚奏烦。<div id='poem_sentence_48_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_17444'>南登无灞岸，旦夕上高原。<div id='poem_sentence_49_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_17444'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_17444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_17444'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_17444_0'>⑴ 按《本草经》曰：“鹧鸪，声如钩辀格磔者是也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_37_17444_0'>⑵ 时以本官判度支盐铁等兼崇陵使判官</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_17444_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年8月</a>　八月诏：“左降官韦执谊、韩泰、陈谏、柳宗元、刘禹锡、韩晔、凌准、程异等八人，纵逢恩赦，不在量移之限。”禹锡殊为失望。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　在朗州司马任，感言语之伤人甚于五兵，有文。作品：《口兵戎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷20第243页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　在朗州司马任。朗州旱灾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　在朗州司马任。有文。作品：《观市》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷20第247页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观市</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371607")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371607'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371607'>由命士以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371607_comment'></div>不入于市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371607_comment'></div>周礼有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371607_comment'></div>由今观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371607_comment'></div>盖有因也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371607_comment'></div>元和二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371607_comment'></div>沅南不雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371607_comment'></div>自季春至于六月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371607_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>毛泽</span>将尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371607_comment'></div>郡守有志于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371607_comment'></div>诚信而雩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371607_comment'></div>遂遍山川方社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371607_comment'></div>又不雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371607_comment'></div>遂迁市于城门之逵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371607_comment'></div>予得自丽谯而俯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371607_comment'></div>肇下令之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371607_comment'></div>布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>市籍</span>者咸至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371607_comment'></div>夹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>轨道</span>而分次焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371607_comment'></div>其左右前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371607_comment'></div>班閒错跱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371607_comment'></div>如在阛阓之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371607_comment'></div>其列题区别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371607_comment'></div>榜揭价名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371607_comment'></div>物参外夷之货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371607_comment'></div>马牛有牵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371607_comment'></div>私属有闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371607_comment'></div>在巾笥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371607_comment'></div>织文及素焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371607_comment'></div>在几阁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371607_comment'></div>彫彤及质焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371607_comment'></div>在筐筥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371607_comment'></div>白黑巨细焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371607_comment'></div>业于饔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371607_comment'></div>列饔饎陈饼饵而苾然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371607_comment'></div>业于酒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371607_comment'></div>举酒旗涤杯盂而泽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371607_comment'></div>鼓刀之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371607_comment'></div>设膏俎解豕羊而赫然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371607_comment'></div>华寔之毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371607_comment'></div>畋鱼之生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371607_comment'></div>交蜚走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371607_comment'></div>错水陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371607_comment'></div>群状夥名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371607_comment'></div>人隧而分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371607_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>韫藏</span>而待价者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371607_comment'></div>负絜而求沽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371607_comment'></div>乘射其时者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371607_comment'></div>奇赢以游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371607_comment'></div>坐贾禺禺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371607_comment'></div>行贾遑遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371607_comment'></div>利心中惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371607_comment'></div>贪目不瞬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371607_comment'></div>于是质剂之曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371607_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>较固</span>之伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371607_comment'></div>合彼此而腾跃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371607_comment'></div>易良苦于巧言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371607_comment'></div>斁量衡于险手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371607_comment'></div>杪忽之差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371607_comment'></div>鼓舌伧儜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371607_comment'></div>诋欺相高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371607_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>诡态</span>横出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371607_comment'></div>鼓嚣哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371607_comment'></div>坌烟埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371607_comment'></div>奋膻腥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371607_comment'></div>謺巾履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371607_comment'></div>齧而合之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371607_comment'></div>异致同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371607_comment'></div>鸡鸣而争赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371607_comment'></div>日午而骈阗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371607_comment'></div>万足一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371607_comment'></div>恐人我先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371607_comment'></div>交易而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371607_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>阳光</span>西徂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371607_comment'></div>幅员不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371607_comment'></div>径术如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371607_comment'></div>中无求隙地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371607_comment'></div>俱唯守犬鸟乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371607_comment'></div>乐得腐馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371607_comment'></div>是日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371607", 1371607, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>倚衡</span>而阅之三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371607_comment'></div>感其盈虚之相寻也速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371607_comment'></div>故著于篇云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1371607_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年5月</a>　在朗州司马任。为乘广禅师撰碑文。作品：《袁州萍乡县杨岐山故广禅师碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷4第56页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371625?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁州萍乡县杨岐山故广禅师碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（807年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371625")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371625_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371625'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371625'>天生人而不能使情欲有节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371625_comment'></div>君牧人而不能去威势以理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371625_comment'></div>至有乘天工之隙以补其化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371625_comment'></div>释王者之位以迁其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371625_comment'></div>则素王立中枢之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371625_comment'></div>懋建大中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371625_comment'></div>慈氏起西方之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371625_comment'></div>习登正觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371625_comment'></div>至哉乾坤定位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371625_comment'></div>而圣人之道参行乎其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371625_comment'></div>亦犹水火异气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371625_comment'></div>成味也同德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371625_comment'></div>辕轮异象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371625_comment'></div>至远也同功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371625_comment'></div>然则儒以中道御群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371625_comment'></div>罕言性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371625_comment'></div>故世衰而寖息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371625_comment'></div>佛以大慈救诸苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371625_comment'></div>广起因业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371625_comment'></div>故劫浊而益尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371625_comment'></div>自白马东来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371625_comment'></div>而人知像教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371625_comment'></div>佛衣始传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371625_comment'></div>而人知心法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371625_comment'></div>宏以权实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371625_comment'></div>示其摄修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371625_comment'></div>味真实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371625_comment'></div>即清净以观空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371625_comment'></div>存相好者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371625_comment'></div>布威神而迁善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371625_comment'></div>厚于求者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371625_comment'></div>植因以觊福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371625_comment'></div>罹于苦者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371625_comment'></div>證业以销冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371625_comment'></div>革盗心于冥昧之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371625_comment'></div>泯爱缘于死生之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371625_comment'></div>阴助教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371625_comment'></div>总持人天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371625_comment'></div>所谓生成之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371625_comment'></div>别有陶冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371625_comment'></div>刑政不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371625_comment'></div>曲为调柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371625_comment'></div>其方可言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371625_comment'></div>其旨不可得而言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371625_comment'></div>惟四海之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371625_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1371625", 1371625, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>群伦</span>之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371625_comment'></div>必有以得其门而会其宗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371625_comment'></div>为世导师焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371625_comment'></div>禅师讳乘广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371625_comment'></div>其生容州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371625_comment'></div>姓张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371625_comment'></div>七岁尚儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371625_comment'></div>以俎豆为戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371625_comment'></div>十三<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371625", 1371625, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>慕道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371625_comment'></div>遵怀削之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371625_comment'></div>至衡阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371625_comment'></div>依天柱想公以启初地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371625_comment'></div>至洛阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371625_comment'></div>依荷泽会公以契真乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371625_comment'></div>洪钟蕴声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371625_comment'></div>扣之斯应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371625_comment'></div>阳燧含焰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371625_comment'></div>晞之乃明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371625_comment'></div>始由见性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371625_comment'></div>终得自在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371625_comment'></div>常谓机有浅深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371625_comment'></div>法无高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371625_comment'></div>分二宗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371625_comment'></div>众生存顿渐之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371625_comment'></div>说三乘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371625_comment'></div>如来开方便之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371625_comment'></div>名自外得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371625_comment'></div>故生分别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371625_comment'></div>道由内證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371625_comment'></div>则无异同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371625_comment'></div>遂以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1371625", 1371625, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>摄化</span>为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371625_comment'></div>经行不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371625_comment'></div>悯彼南裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371625_comment'></div>不闻佛经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371625_comment'></div>由是结庐此山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371625_comment'></div>心与境寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371625_comment'></div>应念以起教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371625_comment'></div>随方而立因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371625_comment'></div>居涉旬而善根者知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371625_comment'></div>逮周月而带缚者惭悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371625_comment'></div>以月倍日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371625_comment'></div>以年倍时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371625_comment'></div>瘖矇洞开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371625_comment'></div>荒憬潜革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371625_comment'></div>邑中长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371625_comment'></div>十方善众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371625_comment'></div>咸发信愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371625_comment'></div>大其藩垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371625_comment'></div>法堂四阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371625_comment'></div>复引僧舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371625_comment'></div>身心恒寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371625_comment'></div>象马交驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371625_comment'></div>随其去来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371625_comment'></div>皆得利益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371625_comment'></div>踰岭之北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371625_comment'></div>涉湘而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371625_comment'></div>仰兹高山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371625_comment'></div>知道有所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371625_comment'></div>此地缘尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371625_comment'></div>翛然化俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371625_comment'></div>神归佛境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371625_comment'></div>悲结人世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371625_comment'></div>自趺坐而灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371625_comment'></div>至于茶毗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371625_comment'></div>三百有六旬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371625_comment'></div>爪发加长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371625_comment'></div>容泽差衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371625_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1371625", 1371625, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>真子</span>号呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371625_comment'></div>围绕薪火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371625_comment'></div>得舍利如珠玑者数十百焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371625_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371625_comment'></div>肖圆方之形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371625_comment'></div>故寂灭以示尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371625_comment'></div>入菩提之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371625_comment'></div>故殊相以现灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371625_comment'></div>亦犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_120_1371625", 1371625, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>凤毛</span>成字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371625_comment'></div>麟角生肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371625_comment'></div>必有以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371625_comment'></div>不知其然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371625_comment'></div>于是服勤闻法之上首曰甄升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371625_comment'></div>乃率其徒圆寂道宏如亮如海等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371625_comment'></div>相与抆泪具役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371625_comment'></div>建塔于禅室之右端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371625_comment'></div>从众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371625_comment'></div>初广公始生之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371625_comment'></div>岁在丁巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371625_comment'></div>当玄宗之中元也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371625_comment'></div>生三十而受具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371625_comment'></div>更腊五十二而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371625_comment'></div>终之夕岁直戊寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371625_comment'></div>当德宗之后元三月既望之又十日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371625_comment'></div>后九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371625_comment'></div>其门人还源以为崇塔以存神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371625_comment'></div>与建铭以垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371625_comment'></div>皆凭像寄怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371625_comment'></div>不可以阙一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371625_comment'></div>缪谓予为习于文者。<div id='poem_sentence_143_1371625_comment'></div>大惧其先师德音与时寖远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371625_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371625_comment'></div>白月中黑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371625_comment'></div>东川无还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371625_comment'></div>飏于金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371625_comment'></div>传信百劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371625_comment'></div>彼堕泪之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371625_comment'></div>岂儒者流专之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371625_comment'></div>敬酬斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371625_comment'></div>铭示真俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371625_comment'></div>文曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371625_comment'></div>如来说法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371625_comment'></div>遍满大千。<div id='poem_sentence_157_1371625_comment'></div>强名为禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371625_comment'></div>至道不二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371625_comment'></div>至言无辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371625_comment'></div>心法东行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371625_comment'></div>群迷丕变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371625_comment'></div>七叶无嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371625_comment'></div>四魔潜扇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371625_comment'></div>佛衣生尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371625_comment'></div>佛法如线。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371625_comment'></div>吾师觉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371625_comment'></div>冥极道枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371625_comment'></div>承受密印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371625_comment'></div>端如贯珠。<div id='poem_sentence_172_1371625_comment'></div>为法来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371625_comment'></div>千百人俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371625_comment'></div>裔民嗤嗤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371625_comment'></div>户有犀渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371625_comment'></div>摄以方便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371625_comment'></div>家藏佛书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1371625_comment'></div>愿力既普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1371625_comment'></div>度门斯盛。<div id='poem_sentence_182_1371625_comment'></div>即动求静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1371625_comment'></div>故能常定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1371625_comment'></div>绝缘离觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1371625_comment'></div>乃得究竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1371625_comment'></div>生非我乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1371625_comment'></div>死非我病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1371625_comment'></div>现灭者身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1371625_comment'></div>常圆者性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1371625_comment'></div>本无言说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1371625_comment'></div>付属其谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1371625_comment'></div>等空无碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1371625_comment'></div>后觉得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1371625_comment'></div>像閟灵塔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1371625_comment'></div>迹留仁祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1371625_comment'></div>十方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_197_1371625", 1371625, "Clauses/197/Comments/0")'>四辈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1371625_comment'></div>瞻礼于斯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_198_1371625_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　在朗州司马任。闻道士弹琴，有诗思归。作品：《闻道士弹思归引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷38第572页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_16999' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_16999' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/16999?labeling=true' id='poem_content_16999'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_16999'>仙公<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作翁）</span>一奏思归引，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6976, "poem_sentence_0_16999")'>逐客</span>初闻自泫然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_16999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_16999'>莫怪殷勤悲此曲，越声长苦已三年。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在朗州司马任。与永州司马柳宗元通信讨论文学。作品：《答柳子厚书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第127页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答柳子厚书</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371530")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371530'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371530'>禹锡白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371530_comment'></div>零陵守以函置足下书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371530_comment'></div>爰来屑末三幅小章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371530_comment'></div>书仅千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371530_comment'></div>申申亹亹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371530_comment'></div>茂勉甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371530_comment'></div>相思之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371530", 1371530, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>苦怀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371530_comment'></div>胶结<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371530", 1371530, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>赘聚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371530_comment'></div>至是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371530", 1371530, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>泮然</span>以销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371530_comment'></div>所不如晤言者亡几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371530_comment'></div>书竟获新文二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371530_comment'></div>且戏予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371530_comment'></div>将子为巨衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371530_comment'></div>以揣其钧石铢黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371530_comment'></div>予吟而绎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371530_comment'></div>顾其词甚约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371530_comment'></div>而味渊然以长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371530_comment'></div>气为干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371530_comment'></div>文为支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371530_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371530", 1371530, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>跨跞</span>古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371530_comment'></div>鼓行乘空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371530_comment'></div>附离不以凿枘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371530_comment'></div>咀嚼不有文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371530_comment'></div>端而曼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371530_comment'></div>苦而腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371530_comment'></div>佶然以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371530_comment'></div>癯然以清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371530_comment'></div>予之衡诚悬于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371530_comment'></div>其揣也如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371530_comment'></div>子之戏予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371530_comment'></div>果何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371530_comment'></div>夫矢发乎羿彀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371530_comment'></div>而中微存乎它人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371530_comment'></div>子无曰必我之师而后我衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371530_comment'></div>苟然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371530_comment'></div>则誉羿者皆羿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371530_comment'></div>可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371530_comment'></div>索居三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371530_comment'></div>俚言芜而不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371530_comment'></div>临书轧轧不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371530_comment'></div>禹锡白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　在朗州司马任，作文。作品：《复荆门县记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷9第112页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371575' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371575' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371575?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复荆门县记</a><span class='authorDate'>（808年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371575")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371575_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371575'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371575'>直故郢北走之道。其聚邑曰荆门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371575_comment'></div>揭起重关。殿于乐都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371575_comment'></div>名视县内之制。居殷形束之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371575_comment'></div>故吏师重焉。通外夷之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>底贡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371575_comment'></div>会南藩之述职。故宾礼繁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371575_comment'></div>其肇允经营。实王孙昌夔居荆以表之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371575_comment'></div>命行名建。而缔构之弗暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371575_comment'></div>无几何。有由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>勇爵</span>而授赤社于兹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371575_comment'></div>徼驰名于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>省啬</span>。谓相沿为非智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371575_comment'></div>因请罢去其号。发践更以董之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371575_comment'></div>有司不能端究事本。循空言而可其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371575_comment'></div>繇是分地徵以归它邑。野之人有回远之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371575_comment'></div>废文吏而颛戍督。行之旅有谁何之艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371575_comment'></div>是利不及下也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>黎民</span>病之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371575_comment'></div>自鄢而南。斯为画疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371575_comment'></div>抵郡之路。贯其七舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371575_comment'></div>持瑞节而衔急宣之使。盖阴相交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371575_comment'></div>遂使服缦胡者备问俗之对。执刀匕者申饩牵之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371575_comment'></div>是敬之不及宾也。君子病之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371575_comment'></div>如是几二十岁。距永贞元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371575_comment'></div>江陵尹裴公政成上游。德及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>矜人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371575_comment'></div>大建长利。俾无遗害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371575_comment'></div>乃外济群欲。内张全模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371575_comment'></div>周图经制。条白于状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371575_comment'></div>昌言既从。公议攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371575_comment'></div>忘劳之徒。乐用之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371575_comment'></div>载大其门。载高其墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371575_comment'></div>径术脉分。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>阛闾</span>架空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371575_comment'></div>然后析便地以肥之。建具官以司之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371575_comment'></div>糜羡财以偿其力役。汰冗食以资其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>秩稍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371575_comment'></div>田里不闻于徵令。县官无减于岁入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371575_comment'></div>越某月。既成而落之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371575_comment'></div>官修其方。人乐其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371575_comment'></div>将迎犒饫之仪展。厩置符繻之事举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371575_comment'></div>戍夫有伍。公吏有职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371575_comment'></div>由汇而分。率无踰闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371575_comment'></div>入其封者。可以知教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371575_comment'></div>元和元年。四海会同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371575_comment'></div>天子命公师长南宫。三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371575_comment'></div>公以介圭入觐。途出斯邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371575_comment'></div>邑人之华皓幼童。咸须于道周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371575_comment'></div>距跃而谣曰。起我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>堙废</span>而完之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371575_comment'></div>徕我荡析而安之。昔室于墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371575_comment'></div>风摇雨濡。自公优柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371575_comment'></div>郛闬盈兮。昔饮于洿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371575_comment'></div>夏溷冬枯。自公感通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371575_comment'></div>觱沸生兮。淑旂之华兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371575_comment'></div>四牡之騑。徯公之还兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371575_comment'></div>觞以祝之。郤略蹁跹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371575_comment'></div>百形一音。公为驻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>错衡</span>而劳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371575_comment'></div>有以文从公者。纪事于牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371575_comment'></div>且曰民可怀也。盍命夫学旧史之事以志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371575_comment'></div>公不得让而从之。走是以有授简之辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371575_comment'></div>初公以县之之便闻于上也。禹锡方以郎位<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>贴职</span>于计曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371575_comment'></div>章下之日。得以省事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371575_comment'></div>逮今以迁人获宥于善部。工休之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371575_comment'></div>得以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371575", 1371575, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>践履</span>。故于拜命无牢让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371575_comment'></div>于传信无愧词。以为古之创物建庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371575_comment'></div>宜于人民而得其时者。则必歌其事功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371575_comment'></div>为后代法。雅有营谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371575_comment'></div>美召伯也。传称城沂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371575_comment'></div>贤蔿敖也。赋水泉原隰之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371575_comment'></div>志虑事命日之规。当书而咏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371575_comment'></div>细亦弗可略也。是用谨其本始而存乎篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371575_comment'></div>俾后之视今者。知楚郊之令典云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371575_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1371575_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第213页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371546' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371546' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371546?labeling=true' "poem_title_1371546")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371546'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371546'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371546_comment'></div>某向以昧于周身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371546_comment'></div>措足危地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371546_comment'></div>骇机一发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371546_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371546", 1371546, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>浮谤</span>如川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371546_comment'></div>巧言奇中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371546_comment'></div>别白无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371546_comment'></div>祝网之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371546_comment'></div>漏恩者三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371546_comment'></div>咋舌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371546", 1371546, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>兢魂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371546_comment'></div>分终<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371546", 1371546, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>裔壤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371546_comment'></div>岂意天未剿绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371546_comment'></div>仁人登庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371546_comment'></div>施一阳于剥极之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371546_comment'></div>拔众溺于坎深之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371546_comment'></div>南箕播物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371546_comment'></div>不胜昌言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371546_comment'></div>危心铩翮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371546_comment'></div>繇是自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371546_comment'></div>阴施之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371546_comment'></div>已然乃闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371546_comment'></div>受恩同人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371546_comment'></div>盟以死答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371546_comment'></div>私感窃抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371546_comment'></div>积于穷年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371546_comment'></div>化权礼绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371546_comment'></div>孤志莫展。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371546_comment'></div>今幸伍中牵复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371546_comment'></div>司存宇下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371546_comment'></div>伏虑因是记其姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371546_comment'></div>谨献诗二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371546_comment'></div>敢闻左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371546_comment'></div>古之所以导<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371546", 1371546, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>下情</span>而通比兴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371546_comment'></div>必文其言以表之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371546_comment'></div>虽氓谣俚音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371546_comment'></div>可俪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371546", 1371546, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>风什</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371546_comment'></div>伏惟降意详择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371546_comment'></div>斯大幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371546_comment'></div>谨因杨子程留后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371546_comment'></div>谨奉启不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371546_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_title_1371555' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371555?labeling=true' target='_blank'>董氏武陵集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1371555_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371555'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371555'>片言可以明百意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371555_comment'></div>坐驰可以役万景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371555_comment'></div>工于诗者能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371555_comment'></div>风雅体变而兴同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371555_comment'></div>古今调殊而理冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371555_comment'></div>达于诗者能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371555_comment'></div>工生于才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371555_comment'></div>达生于明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371555_comment'></div>二者还相为用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371555_comment'></div>而后诗道备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371555_comment'></div>余尝执斯评为公是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371555_comment'></div>且衡而度之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371555_comment'></div>诚悬乎心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371555_comment'></div>默揣群才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371555_comment'></div>钧铢寻尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371555_comment'></div>随限而尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371555_comment'></div>如是所阅者百态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371555_comment'></div>一旦得董生之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371555_comment'></div>杳如抟翠屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371555_comment'></div>浮层澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371555_comment'></div>视听所遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371555_comment'></div>非风尘间物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371555_comment'></div>亦犹明金綷羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371555_comment'></div>得于遐裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371555_comment'></div>虽欲勿宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371555_comment'></div>可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371555_comment'></div>生名挺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371555_comment'></div>字庶中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371555_comment'></div>幼嗜属诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371555_comment'></div>晚而不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371555_comment'></div>心源为垆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371555_comment'></div>笔端为炭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371555_comment'></div>锻鍊元本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371555_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1371555", 1371555, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>雕砻</span>群形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371555_comment'></div>糺纷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1371555", 1371555, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>舛错</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371555_comment'></div>逐意奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371555_comment'></div>因故沿浊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371555_comment'></div>协为新声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371555_comment'></div>尝所与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371555_comment'></div>皆青云之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371555_comment'></div>闻名如卢杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371555_comment'></div>高韵如包李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371555_comment'></div>迭以章句扬于当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371555_comment'></div>末路寡徒。<div
