id='poem_sentence_6_1371627_comment'></div>董姓出于豢龙氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371627_comment'></div>至辛有而分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371627_comment'></div>在晋为良史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371627_comment'></div>在赵佐简子为能臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371627_comment'></div>项羽主盟为翟王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371627_comment'></div>高皇帝举兵汉中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371627_comment'></div>劫其兵众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371627_comment'></div>不克其土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371627_comment'></div>后裔遂为陇西人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371627_comment'></div>凡称字不称名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371627_comment'></div>不待事而彰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371627_comment'></div>始予谪于武陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371627_comment'></div>人多中之贤有董生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371627_comment'></div>为守令客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371627_comment'></div>既而以士相见之礼成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371627_comment'></div>与之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371627_comment'></div>能言坟典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371627_comment'></div>数旁捃百氏之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371627_comment'></div>弱年嗜属诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371627_comment'></div>工奕棋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371627_comment'></div>用是索合于贵游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371627_comment'></div>多所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371627", 1371627, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>慰荐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371627_comment'></div>中年奉浮图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371627_comment'></div>说三乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371627_comment'></div>用是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371627", 1371627, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>贡诚</span>于清贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371627_comment'></div>多被辟书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371627_comment'></div>脱巾为宏文馆校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371627_comment'></div>再选至大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371627_comment'></div>咸视真秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371627_comment'></div>而不累其章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371627_comment'></div>职系于外是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371627_comment'></div>晚节尚道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371627_comment'></div>故投劾于幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371627_comment'></div>治扁舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371627_comment'></div>浮江沱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371627_comment'></div>泛洞庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371627_comment'></div>登熊耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371627_comment'></div>访浮邱以探异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371627_comment'></div>赋枉渚以寄傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371627_comment'></div>居数岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371627_comment'></div>投老于南荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371627_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371627", 1371627, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>迷邦</span>纵性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371627_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371627", 1371627, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>委和</span>从化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371627_comment'></div>逮夫寝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1371627", 1371627, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>巨室</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371627_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371627", 1371627, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>含襚</span>至于卜竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371627_comment'></div>皆仁人之赙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371627_comment'></div>是岁五月十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371627_comment'></div>卜葬于龙山之某冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371627_comment'></div>外姻至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371627_comment'></div>君名侹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371627_comment'></div>字庶中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371627_comment'></div>大父曰思简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371627_comment'></div>位至汝南太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371627_comment'></div>父承祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371627_comment'></div>殁于试守太子舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371627_comment'></div>始为君求妇于郑之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371627_comment'></div>生嗣子夏卿殷卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371627_comment'></div>既立而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371627_comment'></div>今未之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371627_comment'></div>其后又娶于阎氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371627_comment'></div>生二子曰周卿云卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371627_comment'></div>嫠也繐裳髽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371627_comment'></div>有正家之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371627_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371627_comment'></div>道愈富而室愈贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371627_comment'></div>志甚修而知甚寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371627_comment'></div>士以陇西为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371627_comment'></div>将在令名与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371627_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371627_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_1371627'>学待问而文藻身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371627_comment'></div>艺不试兮名孰闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371627_comment'></div>大道甚夷兮非我辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371627_comment'></div>何生不茂兮非我春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371627_comment'></div>修门之达兮连冈膴膴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371627_comment'></div>蔓草如茵兮新坟若斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371627_comment'></div>吁嗟董生兮于焉终古。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371627_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年7月</a>　在朗州司马任。秋七月，顾彖卒。作墓表。作品：《绝编生墓表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷40第597页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371628' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371628' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371628?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绝编生墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371628")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371628_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371628'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371628'>顾彖。吴郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371628_comment'></div>食力于武陵沅水上。以读易闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371628_comment'></div>病且死。饬其子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371628_comment'></div>吾年十有五而受易于师。积六十三年于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371628_comment'></div>未尝一日不吟乎系象。里中儿从吾读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371628_comment'></div>其文多矣。死则必葬吾于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371628", 1371628, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>党庠</span>之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371628_comment'></div>尚其有知。且闻吾书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371628_comment'></div>君子曰。若彖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371628_comment'></div>可谓志笃于学矣。因以绝编生谥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371628_comment'></div>且表其墓。后之读功令者或采焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371628_comment'></div>予既谪居是邦。始至之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371628_comment'></div>问能道古语可与言者。邑子以生为对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371628_comment'></div>既而执贽请见。之生危冠大袂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371628_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371628", 1371628, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>阔视</span>雅拜。及门知让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371628_comment'></div>候肃而后入。又肃而跻阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371628_comment'></div>心存圣言。润彻眉睫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371628_comment'></div>有野态而亡苟容。问其所执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371628_comment'></div>曰幼学易。老而尤嗜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371628_comment'></div>问安学。曰始闻于师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371628_comment'></div>晚熟于心。自尼父兼三才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371628_comment'></div>绌八索。系辞焉以通微言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371628_comment'></div>与伏羲文王并行。犹天三辰同丽太极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371628_comment'></div>秦脱大患。完文显行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371628_comment'></div>汉之田丁京刘。而东京有马郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371628_comment'></div>魏之何荀两王。而吴有韦陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371628_comment'></div>前者导源。后者洒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371628_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371628", 1371628, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>沨融</span>混合。百派奔凑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371628_comment'></div>唐兴。沙门一行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371628_comment'></div>方泄天机以探古人。神友造物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371628_comment'></div>智斟人事。制动也有柅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371628_comment'></div>变道也亡方。向之支流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371628_comment'></div>委输于我。其它䌷绎祖述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371628_comment'></div>三十有馀家。朱蓝之朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371628_comment'></div>斲之为羽翼。为鼓吹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371628_comment'></div>畴咨天人之际。旁魄上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371628_comment'></div>骛精于捃摭。匮巧于穿凿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371628_comment'></div>犹制氏之于乐。铿锵而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371628_comment'></div>徐氏之于礼。善容而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371628_comment'></div>然而前修之尽心也。得以味腴搴芳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371628_comment'></div>手胝于运管。目胝于临烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371628_comment'></div>而气耗于咏呻。家居亡訾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371628_comment'></div>不能与计偕。地偏且远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371628_comment'></div>亡有能晤语者。心愈苦而迹愈卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371628_comment'></div>寒肤嗛腹。以至于耋老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371628_comment'></div>微夫子之问。持是安施乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371628_comment'></div>它日。予造其室庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371628_comment'></div>瓢箪在左。污尊在右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371628_comment'></div>有龟枵然。有筴甚泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371628_comment'></div>予擪蓍指骨而讯之曰。是亹亹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371628_comment'></div>曾不予欺乎。生攸尔而对云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371628_comment'></div>古先圣人知道之妙。不可搏而得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371628_comment'></div>故设象以致意。梯有以取亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371628_comment'></div>取当其粗。用当其精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371628_comment'></div>夫权衡所以揣轻重。不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1371628", 1371628, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>捶钩</span>者设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371628_comment'></div>寻尺所以商远迩。不为运斤者设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371628_comment'></div>龟筴所以决群疑。不为知几者设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371628_comment'></div>几存乎人。是则以天时为卦体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371628_comment'></div>以地理为爻位。外附人事以象焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371628_comment'></div>内取诸身以彖焉。得枢于寰中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371628_comment'></div>迎数于象外。自然之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371628_comment'></div>不知其然。虽欲强名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371628_comment'></div>措说亡地。彼枯茎朽壳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371628_comment'></div>安能与于此乎。今夫揲之以至刓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371628_comment'></div>灼之以殆尽。徒与夫蚩蚩者问歉穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371628_comment'></div>占<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1371628", 1371628, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>熊虺</span>。起讼需食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371628_comment'></div>亡羊丧牛之间耳。资其握粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371628_comment'></div>以糊予口。乌足为夫子道哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371628_comment'></div>予以斯言邃于易。故书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371628_comment'></div>噫。国有大学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371628_comment'></div>学有馆。以延颛门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371628_comment'></div>若生者。苦形役志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371628_comment'></div>如是其颛也。茹经于腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371628_comment'></div>湮灭粪壤。壁水汤汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371628_comment'></div>不闻其声。摧藏朴遫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371628_comment'></div>与山木同朽。岂地远然耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371628_comment'></div>彼文甲綷毛。剽筋寿革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371628_comment'></div>岭峤之华实。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1371628", 1371628, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>炎溟</span>之蜃虾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371628_comment'></div>飞苞驿篚。所至而贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371628_comment'></div>夫岂贵迩也哉。悦者众故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371628_comment'></div>生之死在元和七年秋七月。由死之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371628_comment'></div>推而上求。直治生之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371628_comment'></div>得四百有七十甲子。葬在征渚西右矶上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371628_comment'></div>其坟可隐东望里塾。尚行其志云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371628_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_83_1371628_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　在朗州司马任。与朗州刺史窦常宴游唱和。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　在朗州司马任。丘绛遇害，禹锡作诗伤悼。作品：《伤丘中丞并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第409页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17104?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤丘中丞<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17104")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17104_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17104'>并引：河南丘绛有词藻，与余同升进士科，从事邺下，不幸遇害，故为伤词。</div><div id='poem_preface_17104_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17104'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2264, "poem_allusion_17104")'>龙门</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17104_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17104'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17104'>邺下杀才子，苍茫冤气凝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17104'>枯杨映漳水，野火上西陵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17104'>马鬣今无所，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2264, "poem_sentence_2_17104")'>龙门</span>昔共登。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17104'>何人为吊客，唯是有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17104", 17104, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>青蝇</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17104'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17104_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　在朗州司马任。作诗送别。作品：《送僧元暠东游并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第392页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧元皓东游</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17289")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17289_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17289'>予策名二十年，百虑而无一得，然后知世所谓道，无非畏途，唯出世间法可尽心耳。繇是在席砚者（繇是在席观者），多旁行四句之书，备将迎者，皆赤髭白足之侣，深入智地，静通还源，客尘观尽，妙气来宅，内视胸中，犹煎鍊然。开士元皓，姓陶氏，本丹阳名家，世有人爵，不藉其资，于毗尼禅那，极细密之义，于初中后日，习总持之门，妙音奋迅，愿力昭答。雅闻予事佛而佞，亟来相从，或问师隳形之自，对曰：「小失怙恃，推棘心以求上乘，积四十年有赢，老将至而不懈，始悲浚泉之有冽。今痛防墓之未迁，涂刍莫备，薪火恐灭，诸相皆离，此心长悬。虽万姓归佛，尽为释种。如河入海，无复水名。然具一切智者，岂惟遣百行。求无量义者，宁容断闻思。今闻南诸侯雅多大士，思扣以苦调，而希其末光。无容至前，有足悲者。”予闻是说已，力不足而悲有馀，因为诗以送之。庶乎践霜露者听（一作聆）之有恻。</div><div id='poem_preface_17289_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17289'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(11095, "poem_allusion_17289")'>传灯</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17289'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17289'>宝书翻译学初成，振锡如飞白足轻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17289'>彭泽因家凡几世，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17289", 17289, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>灵山</span>预会是前生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17289'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(11095, "poem_sentence_2_17289")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17289", 17289, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>传灯</span></span>已悟无为理，濡露犹怀罔极情。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17289'>从此多逢大居士，何人不愿解<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17289", 17289, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>珠璎</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17289'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17289_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　在朗州司马任。感伤作赋。作品：《伤往赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷1第9页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371393?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤往赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371393")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371393_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371393'>人之所以取贵于蜚走者情也。而诞者以遣情为智。岂至言耶。予授室九年而鳏。痛若人之夭阏弗遂也。作赋以伤之。冀夫览者有以增伉俪之重云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371393_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371393'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371393'>叹独处之悒悒兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371393_comment'></div>愤伊人之我遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371393_comment'></div>情可杀而犹毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371393_comment'></div>境当欢而复悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371393_comment'></div>人或朝叹而暮息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371393_comment'></div>夫何越月而踰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371393_comment'></div>太极运乎三辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371393_comment'></div>转寒暑而下驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371393_comment'></div>有归于无兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371393_comment'></div>盛复于衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371393_comment'></div>犹昧爽之必暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371393_comment'></div>又安得而怨咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371393_comment'></div>我今怨夫若人兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371393_comment'></div>曾旭旦而潜晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371393_comment'></div>飘零日及之萼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371393_comment'></div>倏忽蜉蝣之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371393_comment'></div>川走下而不还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371393_comment'></div>露迎阳而易晞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371393_comment'></div>恩已甚兮难绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371393_comment'></div>见无期兮永思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371393_comment'></div>我行其野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371393_comment'></div>农民桑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371393_comment'></div>举桉来馌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371393_comment'></div>亦在林下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371393_comment'></div>我观于途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371393_comment'></div>裨贩之夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371393_comment'></div>同荷均挈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371393_comment'></div>荆钗布襦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371393_comment'></div>羽毛之蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371393_comment'></div>鳞介之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371393_comment'></div>和鸣灌丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371393_comment'></div>双泳涟漪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371393_comment'></div>薨薨伊虫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371393_comment'></div>蠢蠢伊豸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371393_comment'></div>游空穴深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371393_comment'></div>两两相比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371393_comment'></div>何动类之万殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371393_comment'></div>必雄雌而与俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371393_comment'></div>物莫失俪以孤处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371393_comment'></div>我方踽踽而焉如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371393_comment'></div>我复虚室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371393_comment'></div>目凄凉兮心伊郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371393_comment'></div>心伊郁兮将语谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371393_comment'></div>坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371393", 1371393, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>匡床</span>兮抚婴儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371393_comment'></div>何所丐沐兮何从仰饴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371393_comment'></div>襦裤在身兮昔围蹉跌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371393_comment'></div>鞶囊附臂兮馀馥葳蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371393_comment'></div>诚天性之潜感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371393_comment'></div>顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371393", 1371393, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>童心</span>兮如疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371393_comment'></div>哓然有难继之慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371393_comment'></div>漠然减好弄之姿。<div id='poem_sentence_52_1371393_comment'></div>我入寝宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371393_comment'></div>痛人亡兮物改其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371393_comment'></div>宝瑟僵兮弦柱绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371393_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371393", 1371393, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>瑶台</span>倾兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371393", 1371393, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>镜奁</span>空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371393_comment'></div>寒炉委灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371393_comment'></div>阅刀尺之馀泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371393_comment'></div>见巾箱之故封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371393_comment'></div>玩服俨兮犹具。<div id='poem_sentence_67_1371393_comment'></div>求𭔎𡨧与冥蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371393_comment'></div>信奇术之可致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371393_comment'></div>嗟此生兮不逢。<div id='poem_sentence_72_1371393_comment'></div>还抱影以独出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371393_comment'></div>纷百哀而攻中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371393_comment'></div>系曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371393_comment'></div>龙门风霜苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371393_comment'></div>别鹤哀鸣夜。<div class='inline' 1371393, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>遗音</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371393_comment'></div>悲之来兮愦予心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371393_comment'></div>汹如行波荐浸淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371393_comment'></div>怅缘情而莫极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371393_comment'></div>思执礼以自箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371393_comment'></div>已焉哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371393_comment'></div>苒苒生死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371393_comment'></div>悠悠古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371393_comment'></div>乘彼一气兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371393_comment'></div>聚散相寻。<div class='inline' "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>蒙庄</span>兮何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371393_comment'></div>予独累叹而长吟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1371393_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　在朗州司马任。本年或稍前，有诗伤友房启良伎卒。作品：《伤秦姝行并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第413页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17488' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤秦姝行</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17488")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17488_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17488'>河南房开士，前为虞部郎中，为余语曰：「我得善筝人于长安怀远里。」其后开士为赤县，牧容州，求国工而诲之，艺工而夭。今年开士遗余新诗，有悼佳人之句，顾余知所自也，惜其有良妓，获所从而不克久，乃为伤词以贻开士。</div><div id='poem_preface_17488_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17488'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2442, "poem_allusion_17488")'>东山</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3032, "poem_allusion_17488")'>冯夷</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17488_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17488'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17488'>长安二月花满城，插花女儿弹<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作弄）</span>银筝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17488'>南宫仙郎下朝晚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17488", 17488, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>曲头</span>驻马闻新声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17488'>马蹄逶迟心荡漾，高楼已远犹频望。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17488'>此时意重千金轻，鸟传消息绀轮迎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17488'>芳筵银烛一相见，浅笑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_17488", 17488, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>低鬟</span>初目成。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17488'>蜀弦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_17488", 17488, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>铮摐</span>指如玉，皇帝弟子韦家曲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17488'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_17488", 17488, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>青牛文梓</span>赤金簧，玫瑰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_17488", 17488, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>宝柱</span>秋雁行。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17488'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_17488", 17488, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>敛蛾</span>收袂凝清光，抽弦缓调怨且长。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17488'>八鸾锵锵渡银汉，九雏威<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作成）</span>凤鸣朝阳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17488'>曲终韵尽意不足，馀思悄绝愁空堂。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17488'>从郎镇南别城阙，楼船理曲潇湘月。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17488'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3032, "poem_sentence_11_17488")'>冯夷</span>蹁跹舞渌波，鲛人出听停绡梭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_17488'>北池含烟瑶草短，万松亭下清风满<span class='inlineComment2'>（北池、万松，皆容州胜概）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_17488'>秦声<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作歌）</span>一曲此时闻，岭泉呜咽南云<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作肠堪）</span>断。<div id='poem_sentence_13_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_17488'>来自长陵小市东，蕣华零落瘴江风。<div id='poem_sentence_14_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_17488'>侍儿掩泣收<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作悲）</span>银甲，鹦鹉不言愁玉笼。<div id='poem_sentence_15_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_17488'>博山炉中香自灭，镜奁尘暗同心结。<div id='poem_sentence_16_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_17488'>从此<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2442, "poem_sentence_17_17488")'>东山</span>非昔游，长嗟人与弦俱绝。<div id='poem_sentence_17_17488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_17488'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_17488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　在朗州司马任。有诗和李景俭。作品：《和李六侍御文宣王庙释奠作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷35第512页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和李六侍御文宣王庙释奠作</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17435")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_17435_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17435'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17435'>叹息鲁先师，生逢周室卑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17435'>有心律天道，无位救陵夷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17435'>历聘不能用，领徒空尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17435'>儒风正礼乐，旅<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作旋，又作易）</span>象入蓍龟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17435'>西狩非其应，中都安足施。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17435'>世衰由我贱，泣下为人悲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17435'>遗教光文德，兴王叶梦期。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17435'>土田封后胤，冕服饰虚仪。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17435'>钟鼓胶庠荐，牲牢郡邑祠。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17435'>闻君喟然叹，偏在上丁时。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17435'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_17435_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在朗州司马任。朝廷原有诏，以禹锡等为远郡刺史，因武元衡等反对而中止。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在朗州司马任。致书于李绛，求迁于近地。作品：《上中书李相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第216页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371545?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上中书李相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371545")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371545_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371545'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371545'>某启。去年国子主簿杨归厚致书相庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371545_comment'></div>伏承相公言及废锢。悯色甚深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371545_comment'></div>哀仲翔之久谪。恕元直之方寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371545_comment'></div>思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371545", 1371545, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>振淹</span>之道。广锡类之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371545_comment'></div>远聆一言。如受华衮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371545_comment'></div>伏自不窥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371545", 1371545, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>墙仞</span>。九年于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371545_comment'></div>高卑邈殊。礼数<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371545", 1371545, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>悬绝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371545_comment'></div>虽身居废地。而心恃至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371545_comment'></div>伏以相公久以吁谟。参于宥密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371545_comment'></div>材既为时而出。道以得君而专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371545_comment'></div>令发于流水之源。化行犹偃草之易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371545_comment'></div>习强伉者。自纳于轨物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371545_comment'></div>困杼轴者。咸跻于仁寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371545_comment'></div>六辔在手。平衡居心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371545_comment'></div>运思于陶冶之间。宣猷于鱼水之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371545_comment'></div>然能轸念废物。远哀穷途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371545_comment'></div>嗟哉小生。有足悲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371545_comment'></div>内无手足之助。外乏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371545", 1371545, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>强近</span>之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371545_comment'></div>为学苦心。本求荣养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371545_comment'></div>得罪由已。翻乃贻忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371545_comment'></div>扪躬自劾。愧入肌骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371545_comment'></div>祸起飞语。刑极沦胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371545_comment'></div>心因病怯。气以愁耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371545_comment'></div>近者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371545", 1371545, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>否运</span>将泰。仁人持衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371545_comment'></div>伏惟推曾闵之怀。怜乌鸟之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371545_comment'></div>处夔龙之位。伤屈贾之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371545_comment'></div>沛然垂光。昭振幽蛰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371545_comment'></div>言出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371545", 1371545, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>口吻</span>。泽濡寰区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371545_comment'></div>昔者行苇勿伤。枯骼犹掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371545_comment'></div>哀老以出弊。悯穷而开怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371545_comment'></div>无情异类。尚或婴虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371545_comment'></div>顾惟江干逐客。曾是相府故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371545_comment'></div>言念材能。诚无所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371545_comment'></div>譬诸飞走。庸或知恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371545_comment'></div>呜呼。以不驻之光阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371545_comment'></div>抱无涯之忧悔。当可封之至理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371545_comment'></div>为永废之穷人。闻弦尚惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371545_comment'></div>危心不定。垂耳斯久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371545_comment'></div>长鸣孔悲。肠回泪尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371545_comment'></div>言不宣意。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371545_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1371545_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　在朗州司马任。致书于武元衡，求迁于近地。作品：《上门下武相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第214页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371547' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371547' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371547?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371547'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371547_comment'></div>去年本州吏人自蜀还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371547_comment'></div>伏奉示问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371547_comment'></div>兼赐衣服缯䌽等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371547_comment'></div>云水路遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371547_comment'></div>缄縢贶厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371547_comment'></div>恭承惠下之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371547_comment'></div>熙如阳和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371547_comment'></div>列在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371547", 1371547, id='poem_sentence_11_1371547_comment'></div>惊神驿思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371547_comment'></div>若侍颖杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371547_comment'></div>伏以圣上注意理本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371547_comment'></div>锐求国桢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371547_comment'></div>念外台<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371547", 1371547, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>报政</span>之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371547_comment'></div>追宣室前席之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371547_comment'></div>重下丹诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371547_comment'></div>再升黄枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371547_comment'></div>群情合符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371547_comment'></div>和气来应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371547_comment'></div>况八柄所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371547_comment'></div>三人同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371547_comment'></div>叶台座之精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371547_comment'></div>膺俊杰之数。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1371547_comment'></div>物皆由仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371547_comment'></div>人识所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371547_comment'></div>某久罹宪网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371547_comment'></div>兀若枯株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371547_comment'></div>当万类咸悦之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371547_comment'></div>抱穷途终恸之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371547_comment'></div>清朝无绛灌之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371547_comment'></div>至理绝椒兰之嫌。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1371547_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371547_comment'></div>一身主祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371547_comment'></div>万里望枌榆之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371547_comment'></div>高堂有亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371547_comment'></div>九年居蛮貊之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371547_comment'></div>从坐之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371547_comment'></div>固有等差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371547_comment'></div>同类之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371547_comment'></div>又寻牵复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371547_comment'></div>顷在台日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371547_comment'></div>获奉准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371547_comment'></div>指吏途于桉谳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371547_comment'></div>遵文律于章奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371547_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371547", 1371547, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>藻鉴</span>之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371547_comment'></div>难逃陋容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371547_comment'></div>炎凉载移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371547_comment'></div>足见真态。<div id='poem_sentence_55_1371547_comment'></div>沈沦遐荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371547_comment'></div>岁月滋深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371547_comment'></div><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_59_1371547_comment'></div>他人不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371547_comment'></div>属山园事繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371547_comment'></div>孱懦力竭。<div id='poem_sentence_95_1371547_comment'></div>好生之德远彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371547_comment'></div>群蛰应南山之雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371547_comment'></div>穷鳞得西江之水。<div id='poem_sentence_100_1371547_comment'></div>伏惟发肤寸之阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371547_comment'></div>成弥天之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371547_comment'></div>回一瞬之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371547_comment'></div>致再造之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371547_comment'></div>诚无补于多事之时。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　禹锡谪朗州九年余。与密友通讯、论学外，惟从事于写作。柳宗元是刘禹锡通讯最多、论学最契之人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。与僧友远源、元暠、仲剬、鸿举、慧则、景玄等交游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。谪居九年，作赋伤怀。作品：《谪九年赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷1第13页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谪九年赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371400")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371400'>古称思妇。已历<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371400", 1371400, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>九秋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371400_comment'></div>未必有是。举为深愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371400_comment'></div>莫高者天。莫浚者泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371400_comment'></div>推以极数。无踰九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371400_comment'></div>伊我之谪。至于数极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371400_comment'></div>长沙之悲。三倍其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371400_comment'></div>廷尉不调。行当跂而。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371400_comment'></div>天有寒暑。闰馀三变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371400_comment'></div>朝有考绩。明幽三见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371400_comment'></div>顾尧之民兮。亦昏垫而有叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371400_comment'></div>叹息兮徜徉。登高高兮望苍苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371400_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371400", 1371400, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>突弁</span>之夫。我来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371400", 1371400, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>始黄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371400_comment'></div>合抱之木。我来犹芒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371400_comment'></div>山增昔容。水改故坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371400_comment'></div>童者郁郁兮。涸者洋洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371400_comment'></div>天覆地生。蓊兮无伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371400_comment'></div>彼族而居。向之投荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371400_comment'></div>彼轩而游。昨日桁杨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371400_comment'></div>信及泽濡。俄然复常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371400_comment'></div>稽天道与人纪。咸一偾而一起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371400_comment'></div>去无久而不还。棼无久而不理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371400_comment'></div>何吾道之一穷兮。贯九年而犹尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371400_comment'></div>噫不可得而知。庸讵得而悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371400_comment'></div>苟变化之莫及兮。又安用夫肖天地之形为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371400_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。武陵北亭建成，作记文。作品：《武陵北亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷9第114页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武陵北亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371577")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371577_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371577'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371577'>郡北有短亭。繇旧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371577_comment'></div>亭孤其名。地藏其胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371577_comment'></div>前此二千石全然见之。建言而莫践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371577_comment'></div>去之日。率遗恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371577_comment'></div>七年冬。诏书以竹使符授尚书水曹外郎窦公常曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371577_comment'></div>命尔为武陵守。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>莅止</span>三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371577_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>硕画</span>佐元侯。平裔夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371577_comment'></div>降渠魁。又三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371577_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>顺令</span>率蒸民。增水坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371577_comment'></div>表<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>火道</span>。是岁大穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371577_comment'></div>明年政成。农缘亩以勇劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371577_comment'></div>工执技以思贾。因民之馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371577_comment'></div>乘日之多暇。乃顾其属曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371577_comment'></div>郊道有候亭。示宾以不慁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371577_comment'></div>虽闻兹地。韬美未发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371577_comment'></div>岂有待邪。自吾之治于斯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371577_comment'></div>购徒庀材。大起堙废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371577_comment'></div>未尝植私庭。砻燕寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371577_comment'></div>役必先公。人不余瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371577_comment'></div>调赋幸均矣。城池幸完矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371577_comment'></div>而重浃辰之役。掠苟简之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371577_comment'></div>卒使胜躅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>冒没</span>。犹璞而不攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371577_comment'></div>惧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>换符</span>之日。遂复赍恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371577_comment'></div>无乃遗诮于来者乎。言得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371577_comment'></div>智愚同赞。于是撤故材以移用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371577_comment'></div>相便地而居要。去凡木以显珍茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371577_comment'></div>汰污池以通沦涟。自天而胜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371577_comment'></div>列于骋望。由我而美者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371577_comment'></div>生于颐指。箕张筵楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371577_comment'></div>股引房栊。斧斤息响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371577_comment'></div>风物异态。大道出乎左藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371577_comment'></div>澄湖浸乎前垠。仙舟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>祖軷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371577_comment'></div>繇是区处。九月壬午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371577_comment'></div>工告休。亭长受成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371577_comment'></div>赤车威迟。于以落之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371577_comment'></div>肃宾而入。圜视有适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371577_comment'></div>沈水北澳。阳山南麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371577_comment'></div>𪐦焉蘧蘧。雄殿郊隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371577_comment'></div>前轩舒阳。朱槛环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371577_comment'></div>舞衣回旋。乐簴参差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371577_comment'></div>北庑延阴。外阿旁注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371577_comment'></div>芊眠清泚。罗入洞户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371577_comment'></div>初筵修平。彫俎静嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371577_comment'></div>林风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>天籁</span>。与金奏合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371577_comment'></div>亦既醉止。州从事举白而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371577_comment'></div>室成于私。古有发焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371577_comment'></div>矧成于公。庸敢无词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371577_comment'></div>观乎棼楣有严。丹雘相宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371577_comment'></div>象公之文律。煜然而光也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371577_comment'></div>望之宏深。即之坦夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371577_comment'></div>象公之酒德。温然而达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371577_comment'></div>庭芳万本。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1371577", 1371577, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>跗萼</span>交映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371577_comment'></div>如公之家。肥炽而昌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371577_comment'></div>门辟户阖。连机弛张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371577_comment'></div>似公之政经。便而通也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371577_comment'></div>因高而基。因下而池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371577_comment'></div>跻其高。可以广吾视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371577_comment'></div>泳其清。可以濯吾缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371577_comment'></div>俯于逵。惟行旅讴吟是采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371577_comment'></div>瞰于野。惟稼穑艰难是知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371577_comment'></div>云山多状。昏旦异候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371577_comment'></div>百壶先韦之饯迎。退食私辰之宴嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371577_comment'></div>观民风于啸咏之际。展宸恋于天云之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371577_comment'></div>动合于谊。匪唯写忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371577_comment'></div>公曰。夫言之必可书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371577_comment'></div>公言也。从事不以私视予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371577_comment'></div>予从而让之。是自远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371577_comment'></div>其可乎。乃授简于放臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371577_comment'></div>俾书以示后。后之思公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371577_comment'></div>虽灌丛葽草。尚勿剪拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371577_comment'></div>矧翚飞之革然。石刻之隐然欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_17577'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_17577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_17577'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_17577_0'>⑴ 自注：中丞为博士，制相国柳宜城谥议，识者韪之。顷授予以其本，厥后牧和州，节度使杜司徒以中丞材誉俱高，欲令军装以重戎府，故授以本州团练使。满座观腰鞬，礼成，驩甚，相视而笑。后房燕乐，卜夜纵谈。予忝司徒之实，时获末坐。初，中丞自尚书屯田员外郎出守，踵其武者，今给事中穆公，代给事者，右丞段公。予不佞，继右丞之后，故曰袭馀芳焉</div></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。秋，闰八月，作诗送僧友鸿举法师赴江陵。作品：《秋日过鸿举法师寺院便送归江陵并引》<span id='poem_title_17250' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17250?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋日过鸿举法师寺院便送归江陵</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17250")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17250_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17250'>引：梵言沙门，犹华言去欲也。能离欲，则方寸地虚，虚而万象入，入必有所泄，乃形乎词，词妙而深者，必依于声律，故自近古而降，释子以诗闻于世者相踵焉。因定而得境，故翛然以清；由慧而遣辞，故粹然以丽，信禅林之蘤萼，而戒河之珠玑耳。初鸿举学诗于荆郢间，私试窃咏，发于馀习，盖榛楛之翠羽，弋者未之眄焉。今年至武陵，二千石始奇之，有起予之叹，以方袍亲绛纱者十有馀旬，繇是名稍闻而艺愈变。闰八月，余步出城东门谒仁祠，而鸿举在焉，与之言移时，因告以将去，且曰：「贫道雅闻东诸侯之工为诗者，莫若武陵，今幸承其话言，如得法印。宝山之下，宜有所持。岂徒衣薍之中众花而已。余闻是说，乃叩商而吟成一章，章八句，郡守以坐啸馀咏，激清徵而应之。师其行乎，足以资一时之学矣。</div><div id='poem_preface_17250_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17250'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17250'>看<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作学）</span>画长廊遍，寻僧一径幽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17250_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17250'>小池兼鹤净，古木带蝉秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17250_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17250'>客至茶烟起，禽归讲席收。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17250_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17250'>浮杯明日去，相望水悠悠。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17420?labeling=true' target='_blank'>衢州徐员外使君遗以缟纻兼竹书箱因成一篇用答佳贶<sup class='reference id='poem_sentence_2_17420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17420'>闻说天台有遗爱，人将琪树比<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(61, id='poem_sentence_4_17420_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。本年有书答窦群。作品：《答容州窦中丞书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第126页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371528' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371528' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371528?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答容州窦中丞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371528")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371528_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371528'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371528'>健步刘子良至。猥奉书教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371528_comment'></div>以愚为希儒之徒。重言一发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371528_comment'></div>华衮非贵。世之服儒衣冠道古语居学官者为不鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371528_comment'></div>求其知所以然者几何人。借曰有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371528_comment'></div>未必不诟病耳。今夫挟弓注矢溯空而发者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371528_comment'></div>人自以为皆羿可矣。移之于泽宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371528_comment'></div>则噤而不敢言。何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371528_comment'></div>有的不可欺故也。今夫儒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371528_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371528", 1371528, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>函矢相攻</span>。蜩螗相喧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371528_comment'></div>不啻于彀弓射空矢者。孰为其的哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371528_comment'></div>异日兄道大行。则言益重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371528_comment'></div>使儒者之的。悬于舌端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371528_comment'></div>不得让也。由是知辱教之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371528_comment'></div>可胜既乎。间承得一二易生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371528_comment'></div>列侍绛帐。荒服之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371528_comment'></div>持经鼎来。争捐珠玑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371528_comment'></div>以易编简。不疾而速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371528_comment'></div>其君子之德风欤。而裔憬俗已丕变矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371528_comment'></div>顾其风候。非民和可移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371528_comment'></div>地泄恒燠。冬无严气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371528_comment'></div>其在啬神以佐药。兼味以御祲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371528_comment'></div>所谓养贤以及万民。颐之时义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371528_comment'></div>不可不顺。苟以有待及物为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371528_comment'></div>则养巳与养民。非二道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371528_comment'></div>矧群情之禺禺乎。禹锡再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371528_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1371528_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。约于本年，旧游段平仲卒，有诗伤悼。作品：《遥伤段右丞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第409页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371391'>邈不语兮临风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371391_comment'></div>境自外兮感从中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371391_comment'></div>晦明转续兮八极鸿蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371391_comment'></div>上下交气兮群生异容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371391_comment'></div>发孤照于寸眸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371391_comment'></div>骛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371391", 1371391, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>遐情</span>乎太空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371391_comment'></div>物乘化兮多象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371391_comment'></div>人遇时兮不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371391_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371391_comment'></div>有目者必骋望以尽意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371391_comment'></div>当望者必缘情而感时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371391_comment'></div>有待者瞿瞿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371391_comment'></div>忘怀者熙熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371391_comment'></div>虑深者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371391", 1371391, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>瞠然</span>若丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371391_comment'></div>乐极者冲然无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371391_comment'></div>外徙倚其如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371391_comment'></div>中糺纷兮若斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371391_comment'></div>望如何其望最乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371391_comment'></div>睎庆霄兮溯阿阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371391_comment'></div>如云兮天颜咫尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371391_comment'></div>如草兮臣心踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371391_comment'></div>扇交翟兮葳蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371391_comment'></div>旗升龙兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371391", 1371391, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>蠖略</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371391_comment'></div>日转黄道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371391_comment'></div>天开碧落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371391_comment'></div>凝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371391", 1371391, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>瑞景</span>于庭树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371391_comment'></div>掬非烟于殿幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371391_comment'></div>望如何其望且欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371391_comment'></div>登灞岸兮见长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371391_comment'></div>纷扰扰兮红尘合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371391_comment'></div>郁葱葱兮佳气盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371391_comment'></div>池象汉兮昭回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371391_comment'></div>城依斗兮阑干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371391_comment'></div>避御史之骢马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371391_comment'></div>逐倖臣之金丸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371391_comment'></div>望如何其望攸好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371391_comment'></div>宗万灵兮越四隩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371391_comment'></div>汉帝仙台兮秦皇海峤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371391_comment'></div>霓裳踊于河上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371391_comment'></div>马迹穷乎越徼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371391_comment'></div>紫气度关而斐亹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371391_comment'></div>神光属天而照耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371391_comment'></div>皖眷眷以驰情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371391_comment'></div>耸专专而观妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371391_comment'></div>望如何其望有形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371391_comment'></div>视蠢蠢兮穷冥冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371391_comment'></div>楚塞氛恶兮萧关燧明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371391_comment'></div>晕笼孤月兮角奋长庚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371391_comment'></div>沙多似雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371391_comment'></div>碛有疑城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371391_comment'></div>烟云非女子之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371391_comment'></div>草木尽王者之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371391_comment'></div>审曳柴之虚警。<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>何卜赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a
