class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371392'>余既幼惑力命之说兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371392_comment'></div>身久放而愈疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371392_comment'></div>心回穴其莫晓兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371392_comment'></div>将取质夫秉龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371392_comment'></div>楚人俗巫而好术兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371392_comment'></div>叟有鬻卜而来思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371392_comment'></div>乃招而讯之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371392_comment'></div>嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371392_comment'></div>人莫不塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371392_comment'></div>有时而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371392_comment'></div>伊我兮久而愈穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371392_comment'></div>人莫不病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371392_comment'></div>有时而閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371392_comment'></div>伊我兮久而滋蔓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371392_comment'></div>吾闻人肖五行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371392_comment'></div>动止有则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371392_comment'></div>四时转续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371392_comment'></div>变于所极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371392_comment'></div>一岁之旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371392_comment'></div>人斯具舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371392_comment'></div>三月之热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371392_comment'></div>人斯具裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371392_comment'></div>极必反焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371392_comment'></div>其犹合符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371392_comment'></div>子首圆而足方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371392_comment'></div>子腹阴而背阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371392_comment'></div>胡形象之有肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371392_comment'></div>而变化之殊常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371392_comment'></div>经曰剥极则贲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371392_comment'></div>居贲而未尝剥者其谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371392_comment'></div>否极受泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371392_comment'></div>居否而未尝泰者又其谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371392_comment'></div>鹤胡不截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371392_comment'></div>凫胡不裨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371392_comment'></div>夔何罚而踸踔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371392_comment'></div>蚿何功而扶持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371392_comment'></div>纷纭恣睢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371392_comment'></div>交作舛驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371392_comment'></div>似与似夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371392_comment'></div>似信似欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371392_comment'></div>孰主张之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371392_comment'></div>问于子龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371392_comment'></div>卜者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371392_comment'></div>招我以粗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371392_comment'></div>问我以微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371392_comment'></div>有天下之是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371392_comment'></div>有仁人之是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371392_comment'></div>在此为美兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371392_comment'></div>在彼为蚩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371392_comment'></div>或昔而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371392_comment'></div>或今而亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371392_comment'></div>君问曷由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371392_comment'></div>主张其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371392_comment'></div>时乎时乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371392_comment'></div>去不可邀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371392_comment'></div>来不可逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371392_comment'></div>淹兮□孰舍孰操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371392_comment'></div>豕喙之毒堇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371392_comment'></div>鸡首之贱毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371392_comment'></div>各于其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371392_comment'></div>而伯其曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371392_comment'></div>屠龙之伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371392_comment'></div>非曰不伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371392_comment'></div>时无所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371392_comment'></div>莫若履狶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371392_comment'></div>作俑之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371392_comment'></div>非曰可珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371392_comment'></div>时有所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371392_comment'></div>贵于斲轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371392_comment'></div>络首縻足兮骥不能跬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371392_comment'></div>前无所阻兮跛鳖千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371392_comment'></div>同涉于川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371392_comment'></div>其时在风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371392_comment'></div>沿者之吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371392_comment'></div>溯者之凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371392_comment'></div>同艺于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371392_comment'></div>其时在泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371392_comment'></div>伊穜之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371392_comment'></div>乃穋之厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371392_comment'></div>故曰是耶非耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371392_comment'></div>主者时耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371392_comment'></div>谅淑恶之同出兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371392_comment'></div>顾所卜之若何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371392_comment'></div>夫如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371392_comment'></div>得非我美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371392_comment'></div>失非我耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371392_comment'></div>其去曷思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371392_comment'></div>其来曷期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371392_comment'></div>姑蹈常而俟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371392_comment'></div>夫何卜为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371392_comment'></div>言讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371392_comment'></div>执龟而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371392_comment'></div>予退而作何卜赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371392_comment'></div>于是蹈道之心一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371392_comment'></div>而俟时之志坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371392_comment'></div>内视群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371392_comment'></div>犹冰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1371392", 1371392, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>释然</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1371392_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371395' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371395?labeling=true' target='_blank'>砥石赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371395")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371395_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371395'>南方气泄而雨淫。地慝而伤物。媪神噫湿。渝色坏味。虽金之坚。亦失恒性。始予有佩刀甚良。至是涩不可拔。剖其室乃出。溯阳眇视。传刃蒙脊。鳞然如痏痂。如黑子。如青蝇之恶。锐气中锢。犹人被病然。客有闻焉。裒密石以遗予。沃之草腴。杂以鸟膏。切劘下上。真质焯见。踌躇四顾。逌尔谢客。微子之贻。几丧吾宝。客曰。吾闻诸梅福曰。爵禄者。天下之砥石也。高皇帝所以砺世磨钝。有是邪。予退感其言。作砥石赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371395_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371395'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371395'>我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371395", 1371395, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>利金</span>兮。以利为佩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371395_comment'></div>遭土卑而慝作兮。雄芒为之潜晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371395_comment'></div>如景昏而蚀既兮。与肌漆而为厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371395_comment'></div>顾秋蓬之不可刜兮。尚何游乎髋髀之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371395_comment'></div>利物蒙蔽。材人惆怅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371395_comment'></div>俾百汰之至精。蟠一检而多恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371395_comment'></div>岂害气之独然兮。将久不试而然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371395_comment'></div>彼屠者之刀兮。猎者之鋋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371395_comment'></div>不灌不淬兮。糅错衔铅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371395_comment'></div>日鼓月挥兮。刲腴击鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371395_comment'></div>睨㸌𤐰以耀芒。滃淫夷而腾膻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371395_comment'></div>岂不以涉暑而蒙沴兮。鼎用之而成妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371395_comment'></div>有客自东。遗予<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371395", 1371395, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>越砥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371395_comment'></div>圭形石质。苍色腻理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371395_comment'></div>刬其鳞皴。滑以滫瀡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371395_comment'></div>如衣浣垢。如鼎出否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371395_comment'></div>雾尽披天。萍开见水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371395_comment'></div>拭寒燄以破眦。击清音而振耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371395_comment'></div>故态复还。宝心再起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371395_comment'></div>既赋形而终用。一蒙垢焉何耻感利钝之有时兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371395_comment'></div>寄雄心于瞪视。嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371395_comment'></div>石以砥焉。化钝为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371395_comment'></div>法以砥焉。化愚为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371395_comment'></div>武王得之。商俗以厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371395_comment'></div>高帝得之。杰才以奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371395_comment'></div>得既有自。失岂无因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371395_comment'></div>汉氏已还。三光景分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371395_comment'></div>随道阔狭。用之得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371395_comment'></div>五百馀年。唐风始振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371395_comment'></div>悬此大砥。以砻兆民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371395_comment'></div>播生在天。成器在君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371395_comment'></div>天为物天。君为人天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371395_comment'></div>安有执砺世之具。而患乎无贤欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371395_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1371395_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371397' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371397' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371397?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楚望赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371397")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371397_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371397'>予既谪于武陵。其地故郢之裔邑。与夜郎诸夷错杂。系乎天者。阴伏阳骄。系乎人者。风巫气窳。是以嚣雰浮浮。利于楼居。城之丽谯。实邻所舍。四垂无蔽。万景坌入。因道其远迩所得。为楚望赋云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371397_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371397'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371397'>翼轸之野。祝融所司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371397_comment'></div>阴迫而专。专实生沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371397_comment'></div>天濡而雺。土泄而泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371397_comment'></div>气罕淑清兮。淫氛曀曀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371397_comment'></div>中人支体兮。为瘥为瘵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371397_comment'></div>以旷涤烦兮。利居高于物外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371397_comment'></div>我卜我居。于城之隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371397_comment'></div>宛在藩落。丽谯渠渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371397_comment'></div>四阿垂空。洞户发枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371397_comment'></div>眸子不运。坐陵虚无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371397_comment'></div>岁更周流。时极惨舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371397_comment'></div>万象起灭。森来贶予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371397_comment'></div>棂轩之外。群山巃嵷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371397_comment'></div>冈陵靡陁。势若相拱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371397_comment'></div>出云见怪。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>窈蔚</span>森耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371397_comment'></div>露夕霞朝。望如飞动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371397_comment'></div>檐庑之下。大江澒洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371397_comment'></div>支流合输。泄入云梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371397_comment'></div>羲和望舒。出没两涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371397_comment'></div>涵泳之族。聱耴𣤮呀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371397_comment'></div>秋水灌盈。漩石飘沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371397_comment'></div>流蘖轩昂。舞于盘涡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371397_comment'></div>逮及收潦。澹如醁醽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371397_comment'></div>白石磷磷。倒影罗生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371397_comment'></div>蘋末风起。有文无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371397_comment'></div>悠远烟绵。与空苍然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371397_comment'></div>湘沅之春。先令而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371397_comment'></div>腊月寒尽。温风发荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371397_comment'></div>土膏如濡。言鸟嘤嘤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371397_comment'></div>三星嘒其晓中。植物飒以飘英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371397_comment'></div>云归高唐。草蔽洞庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371397_comment'></div>目与天尽。神将化并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371397_comment'></div>圆方相函。游气杳冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371397_comment'></div>熙熙蔼蔼。藻饰群形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371397_comment'></div>蘖树童邱。积空凝青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371397_comment'></div>环洲曲塘。含景曜明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371397_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>恢台</span>之气。发于春季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371397_comment'></div>涉夏如铄。逮秋愈炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371397_comment'></div>土山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>焦熬</span>。止水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>瀵沸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371397_comment'></div>翔禽跕堕。呀喙垂翅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371397_comment'></div>曦赫歊蒸。阳极召阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371397_comment'></div>二仪交精。下上相歆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371397_comment'></div>云兴天际。歘若车盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371397_comment'></div>凝矑未瞬。弥漫霮䨴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371397_comment'></div>惊雷出火。乔木糜碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371397_comment'></div>殷地爇空。万夫皆废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371397_comment'></div>悬霤绠缒。日中见昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371397_comment'></div>移晷而收。野无完块。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371397_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>少阴</span>之中。景物澄鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371397_comment'></div>丹叶星房。烛耀川原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371397_comment'></div>夕月既望。曜于丹泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371397_comment'></div>上镜下冰。湔尘濯烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371397_comment'></div>宿丽潜芒。独行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>高躔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371397_comment'></div>皓一气之悠悠。洁有形而溢清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371397_comment'></div>元杳微明以斐亹。想游目于化先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371397_comment'></div>夜无眹以徂征。金霞晕乎海壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371397_comment'></div>明星方扬。斜汉西悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371397_comment'></div>璿柄如堕。半沈层澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371397_comment'></div>鸡啁唽而晨鸣兮。日荏苒以腾晶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371397_comment'></div>动植瞭兮已分。山川郁乎不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371397_comment'></div>复人寰之諠卑。汹浩浩以营营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371397_comment'></div>追向时之景光。不可骤得以再更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371397_comment'></div>意华胥之梦还。犹仿像而驰精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371397_comment'></div>日次于房。天未降霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371397_comment'></div>百卉犹泽。水泉收脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371397_comment'></div>故道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>朘削</span>。衍为广斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371397_comment'></div>水禽嬉戏。引吭伸翮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371397_comment'></div>纷惊鸣而决起。拾䌽翠于砂砾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371397_comment'></div>于时北风。振槁扬埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371397_comment'></div>萧条边声。与雁俱来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371397_comment'></div>寒氛委积。万窍交激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371397_comment'></div>楚云改容。飞雨凝滴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371397_comment'></div>洒林递响。淅沥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>梢槭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371397_comment'></div>飞电照雪以腾光。柔蔬傲霜而透坼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371397_comment'></div>躔次殊气。川谷异宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371397_comment'></div>民生其间。俗鬼言夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371397_comment'></div>招三闾以成谣。德伏波而构祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371397_comment'></div>投<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>粔籹</span>以鼓楫。豢鳣鲂而如牺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371397_comment'></div>蟠木靓深。孽妖凭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371397_comment'></div>祈年去厉。蠲敬祗威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371397_comment'></div>击鼓肆筵。河旁水湄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371397_comment'></div>荐诚致祝。却略躨跜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371397_comment'></div>渚居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>鲜食</span>。大掩水物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371397_comment'></div>罟张饵啖。不可遁伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371397_comment'></div>显举潜缒。昼撞夜触。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371397_comment'></div>设机沈深。如拾于陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371397_comment'></div>彼游鯈之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>琐类</span>。咸跳脱于窘束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371397_comment'></div>虽三趾与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>六眸</span>。时或加乎一目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371397_comment'></div>亦有轻舟。轩轾汎浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371397_comment'></div>拖纶往复。驯鸥相逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371397_comment'></div>暮夜澄寂。啸歌群族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371397_comment'></div>伧音俚态。幽怨委曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371397_comment'></div>逗疏柝于江城。引哀猿于山木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371397_comment'></div>巢山之徒。抨木开田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371397_comment'></div>灼龟伺泽。兆食而蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371397_comment'></div>郁攸起于岩阿。腾绛气而蔽天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371397_comment'></div>熏歇雨濡。颖垂林颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371397_comment'></div>盗天和而藉地势。谅无劳而有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371397_comment'></div>罢士闲人。逸为末作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371397_comment'></div>求金渚涘。淘汰瀺灂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371397_comment'></div>流注瀢沱。繁光熠爚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371397_comment'></div>贪贾来贸。发于怀握。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371397_comment'></div>无翼而飞。润于丰屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371397_comment'></div>哂耘耕之悒悒。徒胼胝以自鞠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371397_comment'></div>我处层轩。日星回环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371397_comment'></div>阅天数而视民风。百态变见乎其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371397_comment'></div>非耳剽以臆说兮。固幽求而纵观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371397_comment'></div>观物之馀。遂观我生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371397_comment'></div>何广覆与厚载。岂有形而无情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371397_comment'></div>高莫高兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1371397", 1371397, "Clauses/218/Comments/0")'>九阍</span>。远莫远兮故园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371397_comment'></div>舟有楫兮车有辖。江山坐兮不可越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371397_comment'></div>吾又安知其所如。恍临高以观物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371397_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1371397_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。与饶州元使君通书论政理。作品：《答饶州元使君书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第123页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371527' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371527' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371527?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答饶州元使君书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371527")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371527_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371527'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371527'>传使至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371527_comment'></div>蒙致书一函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371527_comment'></div>辱示政事与治兵之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371527_comment'></div>明体以及用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371527_comment'></div>通经以知权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371527_comment'></div>视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>阴阳惨舒</span>之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371527_comment'></div>取震虩泽濡之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371527_comment'></div>知天而不泥于神怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371527_comment'></div>知人而不遗于委琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371527_comment'></div>先乡社之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371527_comment'></div>以浃于举郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371527_comment'></div>首队伍之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371527_comment'></div>以及于成师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371527_comment'></div>犹言数者起一而至万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371527_comment'></div>操律者本黄钟以极八音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371527_comment'></div>诚通人之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371527_comment'></div>章章必可行者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371527_comment'></div>鄙生涉吏日浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371527_comment'></div>尝耳剽老成人之言熟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371527_comment'></div>今研覈至论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371527_comment'></div>渊乎有味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371527_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>游言</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>架空</span>之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371527_comment'></div>喜未尝不至抃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371527_comment'></div>故杨榷所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371527_comment'></div>以累下执事云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371527_comment'></div>盖丰荒异政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371527_comment'></div>系乎时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371527_comment'></div>夷夏殊法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371527_comment'></div>牵乎俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371527_comment'></div>因时在乎善相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371527_comment'></div>因俗在乎便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371527_comment'></div>不知发叙重轻之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371527_comment'></div>虽岁有顺成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371527_comment'></div>犹水旱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371527_comment'></div>不知日用乐成之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371527_comment'></div>虽俗方阜安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371527_comment'></div>犹荡析也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>徙木</span>之信必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371527_comment'></div>则民不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371527_comment'></div>此政之先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371527_comment'></div>置水之清必励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371527_comment'></div>则人知敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371527_comment'></div>此政之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>缿筒</span>之机或行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371527_comment'></div>则奸不敢欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371527_comment'></div>此政之助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371527_comment'></div>则有以其弛张雄雌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371527_comment'></div>唯变所适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371527_comment'></div>古之贤而治者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371527_comment'></div>称谓各异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371527_comment'></div>非至当有二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371527_comment'></div>顾遭时不同耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371527_comment'></div>夫民足则怀安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371527_comment'></div>安则自重而畏法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371527_comment'></div>乏则思滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371527_comment'></div>滥则迫利而轻禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371527_comment'></div>故文景之民厚其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371527_comment'></div>为吏者率以仁恕显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371527_comment'></div>武宣之民亟于役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371527_comment'></div>为吏者率以武健称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371527_comment'></div>其宽猛迭用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371527_comment'></div>犹质文循环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371527_comment'></div>必稽其弊而矫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371527_comment'></div>是宜审其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>救夺</span>耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371527_comment'></div>太史公云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371527_comment'></div>身修者官未尝乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371527_comment'></div>然则修身而不能及治者有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371527_comment'></div>未有不自已而能及民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371527_comment'></div>今之号为有志于治者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371527_comment'></div>咸能知民困于杼柚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371527_comment'></div>罢于征徭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371527_comment'></div>则曰司牧之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371527_comment'></div>莫先于简廉奉法而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371527_comment'></div>其或材拘于局促。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371527_comment'></div>智限于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>罢懦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371527_comment'></div>不能斟酌盈虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371527_comment'></div>使人不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371527_comment'></div>以不知事为简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371527_comment'></div>以清一身为廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371527_comment'></div>以守旧弊为奉法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371527_comment'></div>是心清于枨闑之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371527_comment'></div>而柄移于胥吏之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371527_comment'></div>岁登事简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371527_comment'></div>偷可理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371527_comment'></div>岁札理丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371527_comment'></div>则溃然携矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371527_comment'></div>故曰身修而不及理者有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371527_comment'></div>若执事之言政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>诣理</span>切情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371527_comment'></div>斥去迂缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371527_comment'></div>简而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371527_comment'></div>和而毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371527_comment'></div>其修整非止乎一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371527_comment'></div>必将及物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371527_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>程督</span>非务乎一切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371527_comment'></div>必将经远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371527_comment'></div>坊民之理甚周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371527_comment'></div>而不至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>皎察</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371527_comment'></div>字民之方甚裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371527_comment'></div>而不使侵牟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371527_comment'></div>知革故之有悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371527_comment'></div>审料民之多挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371527_comment'></div>厚发奸之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371527_comment'></div>峻欺下之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371527_comment'></div>调赋之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371527_comment'></div>不关于猾吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371527_comment'></div>逋亡之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371527_comment'></div>不迁于丰室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371527_comment'></div>因有年之利以补败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371527_comment'></div>汰不急之用以啬财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371527_comment'></div>为邦之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371527_comment'></div>深切著明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371527_comment'></div>若此其悉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371527_comment'></div>推是言桉是理而笃行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371527_comment'></div>乌有不及治耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371527_comment'></div>古称言之必可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371527_comment'></div>非乐垂空文耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371527_comment'></div>有人民社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371527_comment'></div>固可践其言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371527_comment'></div>濒江之郡饶为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371527_comment'></div>履番君之故地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371527_comment'></div>渐瓯越之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>遗俗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371527_comment'></div>馀干有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>亩钟</span>之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371527_comment'></div>武林有千章之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1371527_comment'></div>其民牟利斗力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1371527_comment'></div>狃于轻悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371527_comment'></div>故用暴虐闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371527_comment'></div>重以山茂槚楛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371527_comment'></div>金丰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>镣铣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371527_comment'></div>齐民往往投镃錤而即铲铸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371527_comment'></div>损丝枲而工搴撷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371527_comment'></div>乘时诡求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371527_comment'></div>其息倍称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1371527_comment'></div>间闻主分土者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1371527_comment'></div>尽笼其利而斡之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1371527_comment'></div>坐簿书舛错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1371527_comment'></div>为中执法所劾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1371527_comment'></div>事下三府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1371527_comment'></div>以受赇论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1371527_comment'></div>其刑甚渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1371527_comment'></div>于今列郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1371527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>不寒而慄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1371527_comment'></div>彼邦人聆其风声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1371527_comment'></div>固曰彼浚民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1371527_comment'></div>上罪之若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1371527_comment'></div>其念民也至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1371527_comment'></div>今二千石以前失职非其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1371527_comment'></div>执事者即人心而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1371527_comment'></div>彼邦人是必翘然须其至而安矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1371527_comment'></div>以思治之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1371527_comment'></div>遇习治之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1371527_comment'></div>欲不至于富庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1371527_comment'></div>得乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1371527_comment'></div>昌黎韩宣英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1371527_comment'></div>好实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_154_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>蹈中</span>之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1371527_comment'></div>前为司封郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1371527_comment'></div>以馀刃鄟剧于计曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1371527_comment'></div>号无逋事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1371527_comment'></div>能承其家法而绍明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1371527_comment'></div>庭坚仲容之族也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1371527_comment'></div>坐事为彼郡司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1371527_comment'></div>更闰馀者再焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1371527_comment'></div>是必能知风俗之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_162_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>良窳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1371527_comment'></div>采寮之善否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1371527_comment'></div>盍尝问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1371527_comment'></div>足为群疑之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_165_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>宝龟</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1371527_comment'></div>至于否臧文律戢玩之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1371527_comment'></div>均权以制动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1371527_comment'></div>函隶以稔勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1371527_comment'></div>平居使不堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1371527_comment'></div>萃聚使不哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1371527_comment'></div>坐作疾徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1371527_comment'></div>心和气振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1371527_comment'></div>诚纤悉于所示也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1371527_comment'></div>故置之以须执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1371527_comment'></div>异日承进律之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1371527_comment'></div>握兽符而驾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_176_1371527", 1371527, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>寅车</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1371527_comment'></div>然后贡其瞽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1371527_comment'></div>重晓左右耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_178_1371527_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。作文自伤。作品：《伤我马词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷20第241页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。与友柳宗元论学。作品：《天论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷5第67页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。作文论学。作品：《辩迹论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷5第63页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《明贽论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷5第66页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《华佗论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷5第66页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371583?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩迹论</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371583")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371583'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371583'>客有能通本朝之雅故者。曰时之污隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371583_comment'></div>视辅臣之用否。房与杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371583_comment'></div>迹何观焉。建官取士之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371583_comment'></div>地徵口赋之令。礼乐刑罚之章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371583_comment'></div>因隋而已矣。二公奚施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371583_comment'></div>余愀然曰。三王之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371583_comment'></div>犹夫循环。非必变焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371583_comment'></div>审所当救而已。隋之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371583_comment'></div>岂制置名数之间耶。顾名与事乖耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371583_comment'></div>因之何害焉。夫上材之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371583_comment'></div>非务所举。必的然可使户晓为迹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371583_comment'></div>吾观梁公之迹。章章如县宇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371583_comment'></div>曷然哉。请借一以明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371583_comment'></div>史不云乎。初太宗怒浑戎之横于塞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371583_comment'></div>度诸将不足以必取。当宁而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371583_comment'></div>得李靖为师。快哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371583_comment'></div>靖时告老且病矣。梁公虚其心以起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371583_comment'></div>靖忘老与病。一举虏其君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371583_comment'></div>郡县其地而还。夫非伐国之难能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371583_comment'></div>起靖之难能也。靖非不克之为虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371583_comment'></div>居功之为虑也。古之为将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371583_comment'></div>度柄轻不足以遂事。重则嫌生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371583_comment'></div>是以有辞第以见志。有多产以取信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371583_comment'></div>有子质以灭贰。有嬖监以虞谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371583_comment'></div>其多患也如是。若靖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371583_comment'></div>名既成。位既崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371583_comment'></div>重失畏偪。其患又甚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371583_comment'></div>微梁公之能尽才。能捍患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371583_comment'></div>能去忌。能照私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371583_comment'></div>彼姑藉旧劳。居素贵足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371583_comment'></div>恶乎起哉。夫岂感空言而起耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371583_comment'></div>心相见久矣。夫岂饰小信而要耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371583_comment'></div>道相笼久矣。其后敬元擅能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371583_comment'></div>失材臣而败随之。林甫自便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371583_comment'></div>进蕃将而乱随之。由是而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371583_comment'></div>固相万矣。子方规规然窥上材以户晓之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371583_comment'></div>此吾之所不取也。若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1371583", 1371583, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>杜莱公</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371583_comment'></div>在相位日浅。将史失其传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371583_comment'></div>然以梁公之鉴裁。自天策府遂以王佐材许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371583_comment'></div>则是又能以道笼房公者矣。房之许与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371583_comment'></div>迹孰甚焉。客无以应而作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371583_comment'></div>子刘子曰。观书者当观其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371583_comment'></div>慕贤者当慕其心。循迹而求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371583_comment'></div>虽博寡要。信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371583_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371583_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371584' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371584' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371584?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明贽论</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371584")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371584'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371584'>古之人动必有以将意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371584_comment'></div>故执贽之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371584_comment'></div>自天子达焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371584_comment'></div>夫芬芳在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371584_comment'></div>臭达于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371584_comment'></div>而温粹无择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371584_comment'></div>有似乎圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371584_comment'></div>鬯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371584_comment'></div>故用于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371584_comment'></div>清越而瑕不自掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371584_comment'></div>洁白而物莫能污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371584_comment'></div>内坚刚而外温润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371584_comment'></div>有似乎君子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371584_comment'></div>玉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371584_comment'></div>故用乎诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371584_comment'></div>执之不鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371584_comment'></div>刑之不嗥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371584_comment'></div>似死义者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371584_comment'></div>乳必能跪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371584_comment'></div>似知礼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371584_comment'></div>羔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371584_comment'></div>故卿执焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371584_comment'></div>在人之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371584_comment'></div>而有先后行列者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371584_comment'></div>雁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371584_comment'></div>故大夫执焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371584_comment'></div>耿介而一志者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371584_comment'></div>雉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371584_comment'></div>故士执焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371584_comment'></div>视其所执而知其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371584_comment'></div>是故食愈重而志愈卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371584_comment'></div>位弥尊而道弥广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371584_comment'></div>耿介之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371584_comment'></div>惟士得以行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371584_comment'></div>何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371584_comment'></div>务细而所试者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371584_comment'></div>齿卑而所蔽者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371584_comment'></div>言未足以动听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371584_comment'></div>故必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1371584", 1371584, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>激发</span>以取异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371584_comment'></div>行未足以应远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371584_comment'></div>故必砥砺以沽闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371584_comment'></div>借令由士为大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371584_comment'></div>舍雉而执雁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371584_comment'></div>其志也随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371584_comment'></div>故耿介之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371584_comment'></div>不施于大夫矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371584_comment'></div>况其上乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371584_comment'></div>然则为士也不思雉之介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371584_comment'></div>为卿也能思羔之礼欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371584_comment'></div>今夫或者不明分推理而观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371584_comment'></div>则曰此居下而嗜直者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371584_comment'></div>是必得志而稔其讦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371584_comment'></div>彼当介而务宏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371584_comment'></div>是必处高而肥其德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371584_comment'></div>曾不知讦当其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371584_comment'></div>则地易而自迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371584_comment'></div>宏非其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371584_comment'></div>则志遂而无制矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371584_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371584_comment'></div>责士以卿大夫之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371584_comment'></div>犹喻君以士之行耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371584_comment'></div>余以执贽之道得其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371584_comment'></div>苟推分明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371584_comment'></div>求刑罚之僭滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371584_comment'></div>得乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1371584_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>华佗论</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371585")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371585'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371585'>史称华佗以恃能厌事为曹公所怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371585_comment'></div>荀文若请曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371585_comment'></div>佗术实工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371585_comment'></div>人命系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371585_comment'></div>宜议能以宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371585_comment'></div>曹公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371585_comment'></div>忧天下无此鼠辈耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371585_comment'></div>遂考竟佗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371585_comment'></div>至苍舒病且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371585_comment'></div>见医不能生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371585_comment'></div>始有悔之之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371585_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371585_comment'></div>以操之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371585", 1371585, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>明略</span>见几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371585_comment'></div>然犹轻杀材能如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371585_comment'></div>文若之智力地望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371585_comment'></div>以的然之理攻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371585_comment'></div>然犹不能反其恚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371585_comment'></div>执柄者之恚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371585_comment'></div>真可畏诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371585_comment'></div>亦可慎诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371585_comment'></div>原夫史氏之书于册也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371585_comment'></div>是使后之人宽能者之刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371585_comment'></div>纳贤者之喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371585_comment'></div>而惩暴者之轻杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371585_comment'></div>故自恃能至有悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371585_comment'></div>悉书焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371585_comment'></div>后之惑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371585_comment'></div>复用是为口实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371585_comment'></div>悲哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371585_comment'></div>夫贤能不能无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371585_comment'></div>苟寘于理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371585_comment'></div>或必有宽之之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371585_comment'></div>彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371585", 1371585, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>壬人</span>皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371585_comment'></div>忧天下无材耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371585_comment'></div>曾不知悔之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371585_comment'></div>方痛材之不可多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371585_comment'></div>或必有惜之之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371585_comment'></div>彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1371585", 1371585, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>壬人</span>皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371585_comment'></div>譬彼死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371585_comment'></div>将若何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371585_comment'></div>曾不知悔之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371585_comment'></div>方痛生之不可再也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371585_comment'></div>可不谓大哀乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371585_comment'></div>夫以佗之不宜杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371585_comment'></div>昭昭然不足言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371585_comment'></div>独病夫史书之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371585_comment'></div>是将推此而广耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371585_comment'></div>吾观自曹魏以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371585_comment'></div>执死生之柄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371585_comment'></div>用一恚而杀材能众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371585_comment'></div>又焉用书佗之事为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371585_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371585_comment'></div>前事之不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371585_comment'></div>期有劝且惩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371585_comment'></div>而暴者复藉口以快意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371585_comment'></div>孙权则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371585_comment'></div>曹孟德杀孔文举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371585_comment'></div>孤于虞翻何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371585_comment'></div>而孔融亦以应泰山杀孝廉自譬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371585_comment'></div>仲谋近霸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371585_comment'></div>文举有高名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371585_comment'></div>然犹以可惩为故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371585_comment'></div>矧他人哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1371585_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17567", 17567, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>霜纨</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17567_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17567'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17567", 17567, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>故侣</span>不可追，凉风日已寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17567_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17567'>远逢杜陵士，别尽平生欢。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17567_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment2'>（一作君时暇游）</span>，长铗不复弹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17567_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17567'>阅书南轩霁<span id='poem_sentence_22_17567'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_17567_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。读《张九龄文集》，感而作诗。作品：《读张曲江集作并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷21第263页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读张曲江集作<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17314")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17314_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17314'>并引：世称张曲江为相，建言放臣不宜与善地，多徙五溪不毛之乡。及今读其文，自内职牧始安，有瘴疠之叹，自退相守荆门，有拘囚之思，托讽禽鸟，寄词草树，郁然有骚人风。嗟夫！身出于遐陬，一失意而不能堪，矧华人士族而必致丑地，然后快意哉。议者以曲江为良臣，识胡雏有反相，羞凡器与同列，密启廷争。虽古哲人不及，而燕翼无似，终为馁魂，岂忮心失恕，阴谪最大，虽二美莫赎邪。不然，何袁公一言明楚狱而钟祉四叶，以是相较，神可诬乎？予读其文，因为诗以吊。</div><div id='poem_preface_17314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17314'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17314'>圣言贵忠恕，至道重观身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17314'>法在何所恨，色相<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作伤）</span>斯为仁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17314'>良时难久恃，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17314", 17314, id='poem_sentence_3_17614'>勉修贵及早，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17614", 17614, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>狃捷</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作健）</span>不知退。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17614'>锱铢扬芬馨，寻尺招瑕颣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_17614", 17614, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>名网</span>，有如翾飞辈。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17614'>瞳瞳揭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_17614", 17614, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>智烛</span>，照使出昏昧。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17614'>静见玄关启，歆然初心会。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_17619'>幽寻如梦想，绵思属空阒。<div id='poem_sentence_24_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_17619'>祥禽舞葱茏，珠树摇玓瓅<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作的皪）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_17619'>羽人顾我笑，劝我税归轭。<div id='poem_sentence_28_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_17619'>霓裳何飘飖，童颜洁白皙。<div id='poem_sentence_29_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_17619'>重岩是<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_31_17619'>楼居弥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作迩）</span>清霄，萝茑成翠帟。<div id='poem_sentence_31_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_17619'>仙翁遗<span "poem_sentence_33_17619")'>姹女</span>飞丹砂，青童护金液。<div id='poem_sentence_33_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_17619'>宝气浮<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_35_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_17619'>丹丘肃朝礼，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_17619", 17619, id='poem_sentence_38_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_17619'>因话近世仙，耸然心神惕。<div id='poem_sentence_39_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_17619'>如何庭庑际，白日振飞翮。<div id='poem_sentence_57_17619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17586'>拖<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作垂）</span>纶掷饵信流去，误入桃源行数里。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17586'>须臾皆破冰雪颜，笑言<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作语）</span>委曲问人<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作世）</span>间。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17586'>因嗟隐身来种玉，不知人世<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作间）</span>如风烛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17586'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_17586", 17586, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>筵羞</span>石髓劝客餐，灯爇松脂留客宿。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17586'>鸡声犬声遥相闻，晓色葱茏开五云。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17586'>渔人振衣起出户，满庭无路花纷纷。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17586'>翻然恐失<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作迷）</span>乡悬处，一息不肯桃源住。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17586'>桃花满溪水似镜，尘心如垢洗不去。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。作诗。作品：《洞庭秋月行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷26第344页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17560' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17560' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17560?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洞庭秋月行</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17560")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17560_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17560'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8309, "poem_allusion_17560")'>天鸡</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17560_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17560'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17560'>洞庭秋月生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17560", 17560, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>湖心</span>，层波万顷如<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作豁）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17560", 17560, "Clauses/1/Comments/2")'>镕金</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作镕黄金）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17560'>孤轮徐转光不定，游气濛濛隔寒镜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17560'>是时白露三秋中，湖平月上天地空。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17560'>岳阳楼<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作城）</span>头<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17560", 17560, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>暮角</span>绝，荡漾已过君山东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17560'>山<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作孤）</span>城苍苍夜寂寂，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_17560", 17560, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>水月</span>逶迤绕城白。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17560'>荡桨巴童歌竹枝，连樯估客吹羌笛。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17560'>势高夜久阴力全，金<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作爽）</span>气肃肃开星<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作清）</span>躔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17560'>浮云野马归四裔，遥望星斗当中天。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17560'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8309, "poem_sentence_8_17560")'>天鸡</span>相呼曙霞出，敛影<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_17560", 17560, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>含光</span>让朝日。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17560'>日出喧喧人不闲，夜来清景非人间。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17560'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_17560_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任，作诗。作品：《泰娘歌并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷27第350页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《龙阳县歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷27第352页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《竞渡曲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷26第341页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17587' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17587' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17587?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泰娘歌<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17587")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17587_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17587'>并引：泰娘本韦尚书家护讴者，初尚书为吴郡，得之，命乐工诲之琵琶，使之歌且舞，无几何，尽得其术，居一二岁，携之以归京师。京师多新声善工，于是又捐去故技，以新声度曲，而泰娘名字，往往见称于贵游之间。元和初，尚书薨于东京，泰娘出居民间，久之，为蕲州刺史张逊所得。其后逊坐事，谪居五武陵郡，逊卒，泰娘无所归，地荒且远，无有能知其容与艺者，故日抱乐器而哭，其音焦杀以悲（其音焦杀以悲雒）。客闻之，为歌其事以续于乐府云。</div><div id='poem_preface_17587_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17587'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7456, "poem_allusion_17587")'>占鵩</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17587_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17587'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17587'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17587", 17587, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>泰娘</span>家本阊门西，门前绿水环金堤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17587'>有时妆成好天气，走上皋<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作高）</span>桥折花戏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17587'>风流太守韦尚书，路傍忽见停<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17587", 17587, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>隼旟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17587'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17587", 17587, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>斗量</span>明珠鸟传意，绀幰迎入专城居。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17587'>长鬟如云衣似雾，锦茵<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_6_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17587'>低鬟缓视抱明月，纤指破拔生胡风。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17587'>繁华一旦有消歇，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_17587", 17587, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>题剑</span>无光履声绝。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17587'>洛阳旧宅生草莱，杜陵萧萧松柏哀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17587'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_17587", 17587, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>妆奁</span>虫网厚如茧，博山炉侧倾寒灰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17587'>蕲州刺史张公子，白马新到铜驼里。<div id='poem_sentence_11_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_17587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_17587'>秦嘉<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作家）</span>镜有前时结，<span class='link' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17597' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17597?labeling=true' target='_blank'>竞渡曲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17597")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17597_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_17597_0'>① 竞渡始于武陵，及今举楫而相和之，其音咸呼云何在，斯招屈之义，事见《图经》。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17597'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17597'>沅<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作湘）</span>江五月平堤流，邑人相将浮䌽舟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17597'>灵均何年歌已矣，哀谣振楫从此起。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17597'>杨桴<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作枹）</span>击节雷阗阗，乱流齐进声轰然。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17597'>蛟龙得雨鬐鬣动，螮蝀饮河形影联。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任，送僧友东游，作诗以别。作品：《送僧仲剬东游兼寄呈灵澈上人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第391页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17579' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17579")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17579_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17579'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17579'>释子道成神气闲，住持曾上清凉山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17579_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17579'>晴空<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作清室）</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_2_17579_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17579'>松间白月照宝书，竹下香泉洒瑶席。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17579_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_17579", 17579, "Clauses/14/Comments/1")'>弥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作诸）</span>天</span>，南朝塔庙犹依然。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17579_comment'></div></div><div class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17290")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17290_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17290'>并引：佛示灭后，大弟子演圣言而成经，传心印曰法，乘法而能专曰宗，由宗而分教曰支，坐而摄化者，胜义皆空之宗也，行而宣教者，摧破邪山之支也。释子慧则，生于像季，思济劫溺，乃学于一支。开彼群迷，以为尽妙理者莫如法门，变凡夫者莫如佛土，悟无染者莫如散花，故业于净名。深达实相，自京诗涉汉沔，历鄢郢，登衡湘，听徒百千，耳感心化，法无住道，行而归顾。予有社内之因，故言别之日，爱缘瞥起，时也秋尽，咏江淹杂拟以送之，前见宣上人，为我致谢。</div><div id='poem_preface_17290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17290'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17290'>昨日东林<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作邻）</span>看讲时，都人象<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作乘）</span>马蹋琉璃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17290'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17290", 17290, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>雪山童子</span>应前世，金粟如来是本师。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17290'>休公久别如相问，楚客逢秋心更悲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17290'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17290_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在朗州司马任。送僧友景玄法师，作诗以别。作品：《送景玄师东归并引》<span ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17287")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17287_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17287'>并引：庐山僧景玄，袖诗一幅来谒，往往有句，轻而遒，如鹤雏襹褷，未有六翮，而步舒视远，戛然一唳，乃非泥滓间物。献诗已，敛裓而辞，且曰：「其来也，与故山秋为期。夫丐者，僧事也，今无他请，唯文是求。」故赋一篇，以代璎珞耳。</div><div id='poem_preface_17287_comment'></div><div id='poem_preface_17602'>并引：里有富豪翁，厚自奉养，而严督臧获，力屈形削，犹役之无艺极（犹役之无艺）。一旦不堪命，亡者过半，追亡者亦不来复，翁悴沮而追昨非之莫及也。予感之，作〈调瑟词〉。</div><div id='poem_preface_17602_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_sentence_3_17320_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17320'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17320_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_17543' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17543' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17543?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昏镜词<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17543")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17543_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17543'>并引：镜之工列十镜于贾奁，发奁而视，其一皎如，其九雾如，或曰：「良苦之不侔甚矣（良楛之不侔甚矣）。」工解颐谢曰：「非不能尽良也。」盖贾之意，唯售是念。今夫来市者，必历鉴周睐（必历览周睐），求与己宜。彼皎者不能隐芒杪之瑕，非美容不合是用，什一其数也。余感之。作〈昏镜词〉。</div><div id='poem_preface_17543_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17543'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17543'>昏镜非美金，漠然丧其晶<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作精）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17543'>陋容多自欺，谓若他镜明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17543'>瑕疵既<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作闇）</span>不见，妍态随意生。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17543'>一日四五照，自言美倾城。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17543'>饰带以纹<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作绮）</span>绣，装匣以<span ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17415")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17415_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17415'>并引：曩予习礼之《中庸》，至不勉而中，不思而得，双然知圣人之德，学以至于无学。然而斯言也，犹示行者以室庐之奥耳，求其径术而布武，未易得也。冕读佛书，见大雄念佛之普级宝山而梯之，高揭慧火，巧镕恶见，广疏便门，旁东邪径，其所證入，如舟沿川，未始念于前而日远矣，夫何勉而思之耶？是余知穾奥于《中庸》（是余知突奥于《中庸》），启键关于内典，会而归之，犹初心也。不知余者，诮予困而后援佛，谓道有二焉。夫悟不因人，在心而已，其證也，犹喑人之享太牢，信知其味，而不能形于言以闻于耳也，口耳之间兼寸耳，尚不可使闻，他人之不吾知，宜矣。开士君素，偶得余于所亲，一麻栖草，千里来访，素以道眼视予。予以所视视之，不由陛级，携手智地。居数日，告有得而行。乃为诗以见志云。</div><div id='poem_preface_17415_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17415'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17415'>穷巷唯秋草，高僧独扣门。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17415'>相欢如旧识，问法到无言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17415'>水为<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作与）</span>风生浪，珠非尘可昏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17415'>悟<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作去）</span>来皆是道，此别不销魂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17415'></div><div -----title
连州（桂阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ba8175f0e3c64c8d9c4dba6d9c66c73e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ba8175f0e3c64c8d9c4dba6d9c66c73e");'><span id='ba8175f0e3c64c8d9c4dba6d9c66c73e_link' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17553?labeling=true' target='_blank'>度桂岭歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17553")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17553'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17553'>桂阳岭，下下复高高。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17553'>人稀鸟兽骇，地远草木豪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17553'>寄言千金子，知余歌者劳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17553'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_17553_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年5月11日</a>　抵任连州，作《谢上表》呈上。作品：《连州刺史谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第582页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371452' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371452' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371452?labeling=true' target='_blank'>连州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年5月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371452")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371452_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371452'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371452'>臣某言。伏奉去年三月七日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371452_comment'></div>授臣使持节连州刺史。恭承睿旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371452_comment'></div>跪奉诏书。皇恩重于邱山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371452_comment'></div>圣泽深于雨露。抃舞失次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371452_comment'></div>神魂再扬。臣某诚欢诚惧顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371452_comment'></div>臣性本愚拙。谬学文词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371452_comment'></div>幸遇休明。累登科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371452_comment'></div>出身入仕。并不因人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371452_comment'></div>德宗临御之时。臣忝御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371452_comment'></div>陛下龙飞之日。臣忝郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371452_comment'></div>恭守章程。勤修职业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371452_comment'></div>权臣奏用。盖闻虚名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371452_comment'></div>实非曲求。可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371452", 1371452, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>覆视</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371452_comment'></div>迹卑易枉。无路自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371452_comment'></div>亦缘臣有微才。所以嫉臣者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371452_comment'></div>竞生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371452", 1371452, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>口语</span>。广肆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371452", 1371452, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>加诬</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371452_comment'></div>伏赖陛下至仁。特从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371452", 1371452, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>宽典</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371452_comment'></div>举以缘坐。贬佐遐藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371452_comment'></div>屡易星霜。频经恩赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371452_comment'></div>犬马怀恋。寝兴匪宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371452_comment'></div>惟读佛经。愿延圣算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371452_comment'></div>昨蒙诏命。追赴上都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371452_comment'></div>随例授官。俾居远郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371452_comment'></div>在臣之分。荣幸已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371452_comment'></div>伏荷陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371452", 1371452, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>孝理</span>宏深。皇明照烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371452_comment'></div>哀臣老母羸疾。闵臣一身零丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371452_comment'></div>特降新恩。移臣善郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371452_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371452", 1371452, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>光荣</span>广被。母子再生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371452_comment'></div>凡在人臣。皆感圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371452_comment'></div>凡为人子。皆荷圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371452_comment'></div>岂惟贱臣。独蒙恩造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371452_comment'></div>不觉喜极。至于涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371452_comment'></div>昔殷王俯念于前禽。且闻解网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371452_comment'></div>汉帝有哀于少女。爰命罢刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371452_comment'></div>方之圣朝。不足多尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371452_comment'></div>感召和气。慰安群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371452_comment'></div>非臣殒越。所能上报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371452_comment'></div>伏以南方疠疾。多在夏中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371452_comment'></div>自发郴州。便染瘴疟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371452_comment'></div>扶策在道。不敢停留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371452_comment'></div>即以今月十一日到州上讫。谨宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371452_comment'></div>以示远人。恭述诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371452_comment'></div>所期安复。无任感恩恋阙之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371452_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1371452_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年5月</a>　抵任连州，作谢启呈门下省武相公。作品：《谢门下武相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第217页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div
