class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371539'>某启。某一坐飞语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371539_comment'></div>废锢十年。昨蒙徵还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371539_comment'></div>重罹不幸。诏命始下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371539_comment'></div>周章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371539", 1371539, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>失图</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371539", 1371539, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>吞声</span>咋舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371539_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371539", 1371539, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>显白</span>无路。岂谓乌鸟微志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371539_comment'></div>恻于深仁。恤然动拯溺之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371539_comment'></div>煦然存道旧之旨。言念觳觫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371539_comment'></div>慰安苍黄。推以恕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371539_comment'></div>期于造膝。重言一发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371539_comment'></div>睿听克从。回<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371539", 1371539, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>阳曜</span>于肃杀之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371539_comment'></div>沃天波于蹭蹬之际。俾移善地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371539_comment'></div>获奉安舆。率土知孝治之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371539_comment'></div>群生识人伦之厚。感召和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371539_comment'></div>发扬皇风。岂惟匹夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371539_comment'></div>独受其赐。某即以今月十一日到州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371539_comment'></div>守在要荒。拘于印绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371539_comment'></div>巾鞲诣谢。有志莫从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371539_comment'></div>诚知微生。不足酬德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371539_comment'></div>捐躯之外。无地寄言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371539_comment'></div>效节肃屏。虔然心祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371539_comment'></div>无任恳悃屏营之至。谨勒军事衙官守左威卫慈州吉昌府别将员外置同正员常恳奉启起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371539_comment'></div>不宣。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371539_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371539_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年5月</a>　抵任连州，作谢启呈中书省张弘靖相公。作品：《谢中书张相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第218页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371540_comment'></div>一坐飞语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371540_comment'></div>如冲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371540", 1371540, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>骇机</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371540_comment'></div>昨者诏书始下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371540_comment'></div>惊惧<span class='link' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371540_comment'></div>戚见于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371540_comment'></div>密旨未下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371540_comment'></div>神理孔昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371540_comment'></div>报应斯必。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371540_comment'></div>身侔蝉翼。<div id='poem_sentence_41_1371540_comment'></div>固得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371540_comment'></div>卑守有限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371540_comment'></div>拜谢末由。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年5月</a>　在连州刺史任。夏五月，南海泛潮，感而作诗。作品：《踏潮歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷27第356页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17638' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17638?labeling=true' target='_blank'>踏潮歌<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（815年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", id='poem_sentence_0_17638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17638'>轰如鞭矻石且摇，亘空欲驾鼋鼍桥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年6月</a>　在连州刺史任。本年六月，武元衡被刺，禹锡听闻感而作诗。作品：《代靖安佳人怨二首并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第411页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《有感》<span target='_blank'>代靖安佳人怨二首<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（815年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_16869")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_16869_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_16869'>并引：靖安，丞相武公居里名也。元和十一年六月，公将朝，夜漏未尽三刻，骑出里门，遇盗，薨于墙下。初公为郎，余为御史，繇是有旧故。今守远服，贱不可以诔，又不得为歌诗声于楚挽，故代作〈佳人怨〉以裨于乐府云。</div><div id='poem_preface_16869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_16869'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_16869'>宝马鸣珂踏晓尘，鱼文匕首犯车茵。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在连州刺史任，建吏隐亭，作文以记。作品：《吏隐亭述》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第585页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371595' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371595_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371595'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371595'>元和十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371595_comment'></div>再牧于连州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371595_comment'></div>作吏隐亭海阳湖壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371595_comment'></div>入自外间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371595_comment'></div>不知藏山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371595_comment'></div>历级东望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371595_comment'></div>恍非人寰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371595_comment'></div>前有四榭。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371595_comment'></div>架险通蹊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371595_comment'></div>有梁如蜺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371595_comment'></div>轻泳徐转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371595_comment'></div>有舟如翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371595_comment'></div>澄霞漾月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371595_comment'></div>若在天汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371595_comment'></div>视彼广轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371595_comment'></div>千亩之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371595_comment'></div>翠丽于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371595_comment'></div>与世殊贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371595_comment'></div>澄明峭绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371595_comment'></div>藿靡葱茜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371595_comment'></div>炎景有宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371595_comment'></div>昏旦迭变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371595_comment'></div>疑昔神鳌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371595_comment'></div>负山而忭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371595_comment'></div>摧其别岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371595_comment'></div>置此高岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371595_comment'></div>海阳之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371595_comment'></div>自元先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371595_comment'></div>先生元结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371595_comment'></div>有铭其碣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371595_comment'></div>元维假符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371595_comment'></div>余维左迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371595_comment'></div>其间相距。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371595_comment'></div>十五馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371595_comment'></div>对境怀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371595_comment'></div>其犹比肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371595_comment'></div>天下山水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371595_comment'></div>非无美好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371595_comment'></div>地偏人远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371595_comment'></div>空乐鱼鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371595_comment'></div>谢公开山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371595_comment'></div>涉月忘还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371595_comment'></div>岂曰无娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371595_comment'></div>伊险且艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371595_comment'></div>溪山尤物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371595_comment'></div>城池为伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371595_comment'></div>却倚佛寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371595_comment'></div>左联仙府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371595_comment'></div>势拱台殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371595_comment'></div>光含厢庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371595_comment'></div>窈如壶中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371595_comment'></div>别见天宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371595_comment'></div>石坚不老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371595_comment'></div>水流不腐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371595_comment'></div>不知何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371595_comment'></div>为今为古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371595_comment'></div>坚焉终泐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371595_comment'></div>流焉终竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371595_comment'></div>不知何时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371595_comment'></div>再融再结。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1371595_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年7月24日</a>　在连州刺史任。七月二十四日，作厅壁记文。作品：《连州刺史厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第108页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371569' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371569' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371569?labeling=true' target='_blank'>连州刺史厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（816年7月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371569")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371569'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371569'>此郡于天文与荆州同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371569", 1371569, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>星分</span>。田壤制与番禺相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1371569", 1371569, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>犬牙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371569_comment'></div>观民风与长沙同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371569", 1371569, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>祖习</span>。故尝隶三府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371569_comment'></div>中而别合。乃今最久而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371569_comment'></div>得人统也。桉宋高祖世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371569_comment'></div>始析郴之桂阳为小桂郡。后以州统县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371569_comment'></div>更名如今。其制谊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371569_comment'></div>郡从岭。州从山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371569_comment'></div>而县从其郡。邑东之望曰顺山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371569_comment'></div>由顺以降。无名而相钦者以万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371569_comment'></div>回环郁绕。迭高争秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371569_comment'></div>西北朝拱于九疑。城下之浸曰湟水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371569_comment'></div>由湟之外交流而合输以百数。沦涟汨潏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371569_comment'></div>擘山为渠。东南入于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371569_comment'></div>山秀而高。灵液渗漉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371569_comment'></div>故石钟乳为天下甲。岁贡三百铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371569_comment'></div>原鲜而膴。卉物柔泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371569_comment'></div>故纻蕉为三服贵。岁贡十笥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371569_comment'></div>林富桂桧。土宜陶旊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371569_comment'></div>故候居以壮闻。石侔琅玕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371569_comment'></div>水孕金碧。故境物以丽闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371569_comment'></div>环峰密林。激清储阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371569_comment'></div>海风驱温。交战不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371569_comment'></div>触石转柯。化为凉飔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371569_comment'></div>城压赭冈。踞高负阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371569_comment'></div>土伯嘘湿。抵坚而散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371569_comment'></div>袭山逗谷。化为鲜云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371569_comment'></div>故罕罹呕泄之患。亟有华皓之齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371569_comment'></div>信荒服之善部。而炎裔之凉地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371569_comment'></div>永贞元年。予始以尚书员外郎坐党累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371569_comment'></div>出补兹郡。居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371569_comment'></div>吏议以是迁也。不足偿其责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371569_comment'></div>故道贬为朗州司马。后十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371569_comment'></div>诏书徵还。抵京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371569_comment'></div>俄复前命。佩故印绶而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371569_comment'></div>曩之骑竹马北向相徯者。咸仕郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371569_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371569", 1371569, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>巾鞲</span>来迎。下车之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371569_comment'></div>私唁且笑。既视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371569_comment'></div>得前二千石名姓于壁端。宰臣王晙倖卿刘晃儒官严士元闻人韩泰佥拜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371569_comment'></div>或久于其治。功利存乎人民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371569_comment'></div>或不之厥官。翘禺载于歌谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371569_comment'></div>余不佞。从群公之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371569_comment'></div>肇武德距于今。凡五十有七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371569_comment'></div>所举者四君子。犹振裘之于领袖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371569_comment'></div>元和十一年七月二十四日。刺史中山刘某记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371569_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1371569_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_17436_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17436'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_1_17436'>城头鹤立处，驿树凤栖来<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17436'>旧路芳尘在，新恩驲骑催。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17436'>里闾风偃草，鼓舞抃成雷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17436'>吏散山禽啭，庭香夏蕊开。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17436'>郡斋堪四望，壁记有三台。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17436'>人讶徵黄晚，文非吊屈哀。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17436'>一吟梁甫曲，知是<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3292, "poem_sentence_7_17436")'>卧龙</span>才。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17436'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_17436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_17436'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_17436_0'>⑴ 苏耽传云：“后化为仙鹤，止城东北隅楼上。”又州北栖凤驿，《图经》云：“常有威凤降于庭梧也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_17436_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　在连州刺史任。郴州刺史杨於陵玩花作诗以寄，禹锡遥相唱和。作品：《和郴州杨侍郎玩郡斋紫薇花十四韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷35第519页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='authorDate'>（816年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17285")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17285_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17285'>并引：余为连州，诸生以进士书刺者，浩不可纪，独曹生崖然自称为山夫。及与语，以徵其实，则曰：「所嗜者名。尝远游以索之，抗喉舌，胝挴脢，以干东诸侯，见之日。」率莞然曰：「秀才者，天下是，不礼，庸何伤？今方依名山以扬其声，将挂帻于南岳。」生之言未及休。余遽曰：「在己不在山。若子之言，依山而为高，是练神叩寂，捐日月而不顾，名闻而老至，持是焉用？」生闻言，愀然如悔，色见于眉睫，因留止道士院，从余求书以观。居三时，而功倍一岁。读史书，自黄帝至吴、魏间（自皇帝至吴、魏间），班班能言之，然而绝口不敢言衡山，知山夫不贩而赢也。十一月，告余归隐于会稽。且曰: 知求名之自矣。乞词以发之，遂赋七言诗，以鉴其志。</div><div id='poem_preface_17285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17285'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17285'>行尽潇湘万里馀，少逢知己忆吾庐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17285'>数间茅屋閒临水，一盏秋灯夜读书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17285'>地远何当随计吏，策成终自诣公车。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17285'>剡中若问连州事，唯有千山画不如。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17285'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17285_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　在连州刺史任。作诗送别僧友。作品：《送僧方及南谒柳员外并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第395页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧方及南谒柳员外</a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17578")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17578_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17578'>九江僧方及，既出家，依匡山，一时中颇属诗以摅思。古诗人暨今号为能赋，有辄求其词吟呻之，拳拳然，多多益嗜，影不出山者十年。尝登最高峰，四望天海，冲然有远游之志，顿锡而言曰：「神驰而形阂者，方内之徒，及吾无方，阂于何者，由是耳得必目探之。」意行必身随之，云游岛仙，无迹而远。予为连州，居无而何方及至，出戒中诗一篇以贶予，其词甚富。留一岁，观其行，节矩如教，益多之。一旦以行日来告，且曰：「雅闻鸟咮之下有贤诸侯，愿跻其门，如蹈十地，敢乞词以抵之。」予唯而赋，顾其有重请之色见于颜间耳。</div><div id='poem_preface_17578_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17578'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6938, class='inlineComment2'>（一作日）</span>庐山远，精舍虎溪东。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17578'>朝阳照瀑水，楼阁虹霓中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17578'>骋望羡游云，振衣若秋蓬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17578'>旧房闭松月，远思吟江风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17578'>古寺历头陀，奇峰扳<span 按狙公宜斥赋芧者，而《越绝书》有猿公。张衡赋《南都》，有“猿父长啸”之句。繇是而言，谓猿为公旧矣</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_17578_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第128页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371529?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与柳子厚书</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371529")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371529_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371529'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371529'>间发书。得筝郭师墓志一篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371529_comment'></div>以为其工。独得于天姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371529_comment'></div>使木声丝声。均其所自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371529_comment'></div>抑折愉绎。学者无能如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371529_comment'></div>繁休伯之言薛访车子。不能曲尽如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371529_comment'></div>能令鄙夫冲然南望。如闻善音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371529_comment'></div>如见其师。寻文寤事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371529_comment'></div>神骛心得。倘佯伊郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371529_comment'></div>久而不能平。嗟夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371529_comment'></div>郭师与不可传者死矣。弦张柱差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371529_comment'></div>枵然貌存。中有至音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371529", 1371529, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>含糊</span>弗闻。噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371529_comment'></div>人亡而器存。布方册者是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371529_comment'></div>予之伊郁也。岂独为郭师发耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371529_comment'></div>想足下因仆书。重有慨耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371529_comment'></div>不宣。禹锡白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371529_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1371529_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　在连州刺史任。与薛景晦通信讨论“书仪”作品：《答连州薛郎中论书仪书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第131页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371533?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答连州薛郎中论书仪书</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371533")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371533_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371533'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371533'>吾兄不知愚无似。猥以书见攻其非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371533_comment'></div>且曰。我与子中外属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371533_comment'></div>当为伯仲。其抵我书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371533_comment'></div>执礼太卑。桉旧仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371533_comment'></div>凡兄姊之齿。有唯无伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371533_comment'></div>它以是为衰。其于匹敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371533_comment'></div>即前云愿后云白而已。大历初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371533_comment'></div>李赞皇贾常侍犹守之无渝。二公何人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371533_comment'></div>我与子何人也。乌有从末俗以姑息为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371533_comment'></div>而不虞识者所窥耶。其旨云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371533_comment'></div>愚得书。退而思惟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371533_comment'></div>愀然自贺曰。在恒人为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371533_comment'></div>而在愚为过。岂不能幸欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371533_comment'></div>故尽言于兄。期有以相畅耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371533_comment'></div>夫礼之文为著定。宜尊宜卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371533_comment'></div>犹四方上下左右前后。称谓一立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371533_comment'></div>古先圣贤所不敢移。管敬仲不敢当命卿之飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371533_comment'></div>虞人不敢承士之招。先礼而后身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371533_comment'></div>汲黯不为大将军而亏九卿。王祥不为录尚书而屈三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371533_comment'></div>先道而后时也。是则非据之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371533_comment'></div>虽君命有所不受。非道之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371533_comment'></div>虽众尚有所不为。兄长于大历初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371533_comment'></div>尝接前辈游。故其风采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371533_comment'></div>去承平时不甚相远。愚长于贞元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371533_comment'></div>所与游皆后来诸生。然犹于稠人广坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371533_comment'></div>时闻老成人之说。灌注耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371533_comment'></div>斑斑然不绝如线。其后为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371533_comment'></div>四方诸侯悉以书来贺。校其礼皆駮不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371533_comment'></div>唯洪州牧李常侍巽潭州牧杨中丞凭始言执事。其它如仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371533_comment'></div>而同在宪司者。咸以二牧为不逊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371533_comment'></div>愚时与其寮柳宗元昌言于众曰。监察八品也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371533_comment'></div>当衣碧。言执事为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371533_comment'></div>不当经怪。众咸听然而咍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371533_comment'></div>复谓愚云。子奚不碧其服耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371533_comment'></div>其不堪执事色深不可以言解。及谪官十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371533_comment'></div>居僻陋不闻世论。所以书相问讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371533_comment'></div>皆眤亲密友。不容变更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371533_comment'></div>而时态高下。无从知耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371533_comment'></div>前年祗召抵京师。偶故人席夔谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371533_comment'></div>因及是事。乃知与十年前大殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371533_comment'></div>至有同姓属尊。致书于属卑而贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371533_comment'></div>其纸尾言起居新妇。夔独窃笑之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371533_comment'></div>然犹不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371533", 1371533, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>显言</span>诋之。今有人谓东为西者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371533_comment'></div>一言发则凡人嗤为騃且狂。苟不众非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371533_comment'></div>则东西易位久矣。尊卑失其仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371533_comment'></div>恬而不怪。安得使人如东西不敢易之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371533_comment'></div>曾子有云。君子之爱人也以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371533_comment'></div>细人之爱人也以姑息。谓古人悉朴且贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371533_comment'></div>则斯言不当发于洙泗间耳。盖三代之尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371533_comment'></div>未尝无弊。由野以至僿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371533_comment'></div>岂一日之为。渐靡使之然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371533_comment'></div>嫉其弊而救之。以归于中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371533_comment'></div>以俟乎荐绅先生德与位并者。揭然建明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371533_comment'></div>斯易也。语曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371533_comment'></div>俟自直之箭。则百代无一矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371533_comment'></div>俟自圆之木。则千岁无一轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371533_comment'></div>执矫揉之器者。视之灌丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371533_comment'></div>无非良材耳。窃观今之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371533_comment'></div>于文章无不慕古。甚者或失于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371533_comment'></div>于书疏独陋古而汨于浮。二者同出于言而背驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371533_comment'></div>非不能尽如古也。盖为古文者得名声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371533_comment'></div>为今书者无悔吝。如水走□为□<span class='inlineComment2'>（下阙）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371533_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1371533_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月23日</a>　在连州刺史任。十二月二十三日，闻收蔡州，上表以贺。作品：《贺收蔡州表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第167页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371428' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371428' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371428?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺收蔡州表</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年12月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371428")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371428_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371428'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371428'>臣某言。伏见诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371428_comment'></div>以唐州节度使李愬生擒逆贼吴元济献俘。文武百僚于兴安门列班称贺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371428_comment'></div>天威<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371428", 1371428, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>远被</span>。元恶就诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371428_comment'></div>一方既平。万国咸庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371428_comment'></div>中贺。伏惟睿圣文武皇帝陛下德超邃古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371428_comment'></div>道合上元。临御以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371428_comment'></div>天人协赞。削平吴蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371428_comment'></div>扫荡塞垣。车书大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371428_comment'></div>夷狄来贡。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371428", 1371428, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>蕞尔</span>元济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371428_comment'></div>敢怀野心。辄聚犬羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371428_comment'></div>苟偷时月。陛下圣谟独运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371428_comment'></div>睿感潜通。天助神兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371428_comment'></div>人生勇气。既擒凶逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371428_comment'></div>爰正刑书。伏三纪之逋诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371428_comment'></div>成九衢之壮观。宗社昭告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371428_comment'></div>华夷式瞻。行吊伐而在礼无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371428_comment'></div>烜威声而何城不尅。楚氛改色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371428_comment'></div>淮水安流。汉上疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371428_comment'></div>尽沾雨露。汝南遗老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371428_comment'></div>重睹升平。凡在具臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371428_comment'></div>孰不欣抃。臣久辞朝列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371428_comment'></div>忝守遐藩。不获称庆阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371428_comment'></div>陈露<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371428", 1371428, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>丹悃</span>。仰瞻宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371428_comment'></div>倍万群情。无任踊跃庆快之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371428_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1371428_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　在连州刺史任。闻平蔡州、斩吴元济，感而作诗。作品：《城西行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷25第328页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《平蔡州三首》<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371426_comment'></div>伏奉今月一日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371426_comment'></div>大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371426_comment'></div>盛德广运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371426_comment'></div>浃于华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371426_comment'></div>天光下临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371426_comment'></div>照被幽蛰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371426_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚跃顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371426_comment'></div>伏惟睿圣文武皇帝陛下神扶宝祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371426_comment'></div>天赞鸿猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371426_comment'></div>意有所之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371426_comment'></div>事无不尅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371426_comment'></div>当淮甸凯旋之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371426_comment'></div>是域中庆幸之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371426_comment'></div>顺阳和以发生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371426_comment'></div>施霈泽于寰海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371426_comment'></div>网开三面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371426_comment'></div>危疑者许以自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371426_comment'></div>耳达<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371426", 1371426, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>四聪</span>。<div class='inline' "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>庶位</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371426_comment'></div>虑遗材于放臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371426_comment'></div>旌忠烈之家。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371426_comment'></div>率土人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371426_comment'></div>不胜大庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371426_comment'></div>臣久辞阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371426_comment'></div>恪守海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371426_comment'></div>犬马之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371426_comment'></div>倍百恒品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371426_comment'></div>无任抃跃屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1371426_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年1月</a>　在连州刺史任。因淮西平，正月，朝廷大赦，作牋贺皇太子。作品：《贺赦牋》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1371536_comment'></div>皇恩远降。乾坤交泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371536_comment'></div>寰宇廓清。伏惟皇太子殿下道贯元良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371536_comment'></div>德兼忠孝。承颜拜庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371536_comment'></div>荣耀古今。某职守有限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371536_comment'></div>不获<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371537'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371537_comment'></div>伏以相公含道杰出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371537_comment'></div>降神挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371537_comment'></div>坐筹以弼睿谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371537_comment'></div>秉钺以行天讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371537_comment'></div>风云助气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371537_comment'></div>山岳效灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371537_comment'></div>制胜于樽俎之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371537_comment'></div>指踪于鞲緤之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371537_comment'></div>萧斧既定。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年1月</a>　在连州刺史任。韩愈于平淮西役有功，迁官刑部侍郎。正月，刘禹锡致书以贺。作品：《与刑部韩侍郎书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第130页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371532'>退之从丞相平戎还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371532_comment'></div>以功为第一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371532_comment'></div>然犹议者嗛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371532_comment'></div>如未迁陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371532_comment'></div>此非特用文章学问有以当众心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371532_comment'></div>乃在恢廓器度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371532_comment'></div>以推贤尽材为孜孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371532_comment'></div>故人心乐其道行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371532_comment'></div>行必及物故耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371532_comment'></div>前日赦书下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371532_comment'></div>郡国有弃过之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371532_comment'></div>以大国材富而失职者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371532_comment'></div>千钧之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371532_comment'></div>固省度而释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371532_comment'></div>岂鼷鼠所宜承当。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1371532_comment'></div>其化也益速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371532_comment'></div>雷且奋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371532_comment'></div>其知风之自乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371532_comment'></div>既得位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371532_comment'></div>当行之无忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371532_comment'></div>禹锡再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1371532_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在连州刺史任。春，作诗答谢友人遗赠山姜花。作品：《崔元受少府自贬所还遗山姜花以诗答之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷23第291页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17606' id='poem_sentence_0_1371437'>臣某言。伏见四月二十七日德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371437_comment'></div>以王承宗效顺著明。复其官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371437_comment'></div>所献二郡。别置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371437", 1371437, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>藩垣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371437_comment'></div>圣德动天。鸿恩及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371437_comment'></div>瑕累咸涤。蒸黎永安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371437_comment'></div>伏惟睿圣文武皇帝陛下自承宝位。克振皇纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371437_comment'></div>既以四海为家。每念一夫不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371437_comment'></div>昨因大庆。爰降殊私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371437_comment'></div>广<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371437", 1371437, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>宥过</span>之科。开自新之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371437_comment'></div>纶言一发。神圣潜通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371437_comment'></div>遂令迷误之徒。顿释<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371437", 1371437, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>忧危</span>之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371437_comment'></div>命允子以入侍。献名都以效诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371437_comment'></div>臣心既明。天网为解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371437_comment'></div>因析四郡。别为一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371437_comment'></div>惟怀永图。尽去前弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371437_comment'></div>大河以北。化为礼乐之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371437_comment'></div>率土之滨。重见升平之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371437_comment'></div>臣恪居官次。遐守岭隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371437_comment'></div>不获称庆阙庭。无任踊跃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371437_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1371437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在连州刺史任。与薛景晦通信讨论医方及焙药法。因景晦之请，编集《传信方》二卷。作品：《答道州薛侍郎论方书书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷10第128页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371531?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答道州薛侍郎论方书书</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371531'>禹锡再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371531_comment'></div>初兄出中台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371531_comment'></div>守江华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371531_comment'></div>人咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371531_comment'></div>函牛之鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371531_comment'></div>以之烹小鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371531_comment'></div>惜乎馀地澶漫而无庸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371531_comment'></div>愚独心有慨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371531_comment'></div>以为君子受乾阳健行之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371531_comment'></div>不可以息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371531_comment'></div>苟吾位不足以充吾道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371531_comment'></div>是宜寄馀术百艺以泄神用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371531_comment'></div>其无暇日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371531_comment'></div>与得位同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371531_comment'></div>久欲以是理求有得于兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371531_comment'></div>而未有路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371531_comment'></div>会崔生来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371531_comment'></div>辱书教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371531_comment'></div>果惠以所著奇方十通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371531_comment'></div>商古今之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371531_comment'></div>而去其并猥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371531_comment'></div>以一物足以了病者居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371531_comment'></div>非累试辄效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371531_comment'></div>不在是族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371531_comment'></div>或取诸屑近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371531_comment'></div>亦以捃拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371531_comment'></div>虑恒人多怠忽不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371531_comment'></div>必建言显白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371531_comment'></div>扬其功于已然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371531_comment'></div>其它立论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371531_comment'></div>率以弭病于将然为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371531_comment'></div>而攻治为后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371531_comment'></div>言君臣必以时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371531_comment'></div>言宣补必以性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371531_comment'></div>言砭火必本其输荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371531_comment'></div>言祓禳必因其风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371531_comment'></div>齐和之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371531_comment'></div>炮剔之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371531_comment'></div>暴炙有阴阳之候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371531_comment'></div>煎烹有少多之取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371531_comment'></div>挠劳以制驶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371531_comment'></div>露置以养洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371531_comment'></div>味有所走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371531_comment'></div>薰有所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371531_comment'></div>存诸孅悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371531_comment'></div>易则生患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371531_comment'></div>非博极遐览之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371531_comment'></div>孰能知其所从来哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371531_comment'></div>愚少多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371531_comment'></div>犹省为童儿时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371531_comment'></div>夙具襦裤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371531_comment'></div>保姆抱之以如医巫家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371531_comment'></div>针烙灌饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371531_comment'></div>咺然啼号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371531_comment'></div>巫妪辄阳阳满志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371531_comment'></div>引手直求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371531_comment'></div>竟未知何等方何等药饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371531_comment'></div>及壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371531_comment'></div>见里中儿年齿比者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371531_comment'></div>必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1371531", 1371531, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>睨然</span>武健可爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371531_comment'></div>羞已之不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371531_comment'></div>遂从世医号富于术者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371531_comment'></div>借其书伏读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371531_comment'></div>得小品方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371531_comment'></div>于群方为最古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371531_comment'></div>又得药对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371531_comment'></div>知本草之所自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371531_comment'></div>考素问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371531_comment'></div>识荣卫经络百骸九窍之相成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371531_comment'></div>学切脉以探表候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371531_comment'></div>而天机昏浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371531_comment'></div>布指于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371531_comment'></div>不能分累菽之重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371531_comment'></div>第知息至而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371531_comment'></div>然于药石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371531_comment'></div>不为懵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371531_comment'></div>尔来垂三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371531_comment'></div>其术足以自卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371531_comment'></div>或行乎门内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371531_comment'></div>疾辄良已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371531_comment'></div>家之婴儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371531_comment'></div>未尝诣医门求治者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371531_comment'></div>顷因欲编次已试者为一家方书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371531_comment'></div>顾力不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371531_comment'></div>今兄能我先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371531_comment'></div>所以辱贶之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371531_comment'></div>信踰拱璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371531_comment'></div>有以赏音适道耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371531_comment'></div>常思世人居平不读一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371531_comment'></div>病则委千金于庸夫之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371531_comment'></div>至于甚殆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371531_comment'></div>而曰不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371531_comment'></div>岂真不幸耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371531_comment'></div>甚者或乘少壮之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371531_comment'></div>笑人言医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371531_comment'></div>以为非急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371531_comment'></div>昌言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371531_comment'></div>饴口饱腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371531_comment'></div>药其如我何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371531_comment'></div>所承之气有时而既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371531_comment'></div>于祷神佞佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371531_comment'></div>遂甘心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371531_comment'></div>兄以愚言覆观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371531_comment'></div>其人固比肩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371531_comment'></div>前蒙示药焙法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371531_comment'></div>谨如教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371531_comment'></div>地之慝果不能伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371531_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1371531", 1371531, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>茈胡</span>水泻喜速朽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371531_comment'></div>率久居而无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371531_comment'></div>万物不可以无法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371531_comment'></div>谓生不由养致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371531_comment'></div>其诬乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371531_comment'></div>山川匪遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371531_comment'></div>事使之远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371531_comment'></div>形不接而谕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371531_comment'></div>莫贤乎书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371531_comment'></div>临纸怊怅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371531_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371531_comment'></div>禹锡再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_118_1371531_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年6月8日</a>　在连州刺史任。六月八日，与薛景晦通信讨论医方及焙药法。因景晦之请，编集《传信方》，并作文记述。作品：《传信方述》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第587页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371596' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371596' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371596?labeling=true' target='_blank'>传信方述</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371596")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371596_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371596'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371596'>余为连州四年。江华守河东薛景晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371596_comment'></div>以所著古今集验方十通为赠。其志在于拯物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371596_comment'></div>余故申之以书。异日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371596_comment'></div>景晦复寄声相谢。且咨所以补前方之阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371596_comment'></div>医拯道贵广。庸可以学浅为辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371596_comment'></div>遂于箧中得已试者五十馀方。用塞长者之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371596_comment'></div>皆有所自。故以传信为目云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371596_comment'></div>元和十三年六月八日。中山刘禹锡述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371596_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1371596_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　在连州刺史任。与薛景晦通信讨论医方及焙药法。因景晦之请，作文。作品：《含辉洞述》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷39第583页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371594' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371594' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371594?labeling=true' target='_blank'>含辉洞述</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371594")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371594_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371594'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371594'>河东薛公景晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371594_comment'></div>以文无害为尚书刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371594_comment'></div>以讪为道州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371594_comment'></div>居郡大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371594_comment'></div>至于无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371594_comment'></div>清机羡溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371594_comment'></div>尽付山水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371594_comment'></div>一旦以书来誇曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371594_comment'></div>吾得异境于近郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371594_comment'></div>自城西门并南山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371594_comment'></div>俯江水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371594_comment'></div>有石穹然如夏屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371594_comment'></div>其左右前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371594_comment'></div>又如回廊曲房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371594_comment'></div>藻绣彫彤之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371594_comment'></div>云生日入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371594_comment'></div>怪状迭发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371594_comment'></div>水石卉木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371594_comment'></div>杳非人寰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371594_comment'></div>意其当为食霞御气者之所游息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371594_comment'></div>委蜕而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371594_comment'></div>不知其几千百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371594_comment'></div>逮今得诸黄冠野夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371594_comment'></div>及请而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371594_comment'></div>因名其地曰含辉洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371594_comment'></div>盖诗家流所谓山水含清辉者是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371594_comment'></div>吾子常以词雄于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371594_comment'></div>盍为我志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371594_comment'></div>愚得书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371594_comment'></div>退而深惟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371594_comment'></div>若薛公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371594_comment'></div>少居江湖间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371594_comment'></div>游名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371594_comment'></div>东探禹穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371594_comment'></div>历四明句曲金华阳羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371594_comment'></div>南过九江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371594_comment'></div>薄匡庐以涉彭蠡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371594_comment'></div>天下山水之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371594_comment'></div>存乎胸中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371594_comment'></div>第其高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371594_comment'></div>铢两不失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371594_comment'></div>及是而口呿不能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371594_comment'></div>顾谓奇信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371594_comment'></div>若江华者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371594_comment'></div>九疑三湘之佳丽地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371594_comment'></div>前此二千石御史中执法河南元次山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371594_comment'></div>谏议大夫北平阳亢宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371594_comment'></div>司刑大夫东平吕和叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371594_comment'></div>皆硕人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371594_comment'></div>考槃招隐之致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371594_comment'></div>恒汲汲然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371594_comment'></div>卒使兹境贵于异日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371594_comment'></div>岂地爱其宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371594_comment'></div>有时而发耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371594_comment'></div>顾谓异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371594_comment'></div>信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371594_comment'></div>夫物之有作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371594_comment'></div>俟言而远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371594_comment'></div>故述焉以书于洞阴曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371594_comment'></div>营阳郁郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371594_comment'></div>山水第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371594_comment'></div>洞有含辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371594_comment'></div>游人忘归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371594_comment'></div>忘归孔乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371594_comment'></div>请言其朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371594_comment'></div>先是斯境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371594_comment'></div>翳于榛薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371594_comment'></div>天姿孤绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371594_comment'></div>凡目所忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371594_comment'></div>閟其清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371594_comment'></div>有待而发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371594_comment'></div>公之来思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371594_comment'></div>探异玩奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371594_comment'></div>茇野憩林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371594_comment'></div>而民悦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371594_comment'></div>既悦其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371594_comment'></div>益知所嗜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371594_comment'></div>扪陉历岘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371594_comment'></div>来适公志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371594_comment'></div>偶得奇绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371594_comment'></div>聿来告公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371594_comment'></div>驾言从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371594_comment'></div>谷岸溟濛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371594_comment'></div>有石如门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371594_comment'></div>又如垣墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371594_comment'></div>樛蔓交木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371594_comment'></div>似纶似组。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1371594_comment'></div>乃芟乃治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371594_comment'></div>乃可布武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371594_comment'></div>伸脰掉臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1371594_comment'></div>空洞无阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1371594_comment'></div>左右回环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1371594_comment'></div>俨若廊庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1371594_comment'></div>飞泉出窦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1371594_comment'></div>练缒花吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1371594_comment'></div>触石吹沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1371594_comment'></div>佩摇弦抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1371594_comment'></div>侧径寅缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1371594_comment'></div>豁然见天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1371594_comment'></div>有石如堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1371594_comment'></div>度之五筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1371594_comment'></div>东西二门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1371594_comment'></div>与日明昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1371594_comment'></div>奥者如室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1371594_comment'></div>宣者如轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1371594_comment'></div>因其高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1371594_comment'></div>爰构亭榭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1371594_comment'></div>匠生于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1371594_comment'></div>随指如化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1371594_comment'></div>开山剪木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1371594_comment'></div>役以私属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1371594_comment'></div>结构塈茨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1371594_comment'></div>子来嬉嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1371594_comment'></div>无事而就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1371594_comment'></div>邦人不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1371594_comment'></div>淑清之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1371594_comment'></div>休浣之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1371594_comment'></div>雅步幅巾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1371594_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1371594", 1371594, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>琴壶</span>以随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1371594_comment'></div>前无俗人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1371594_comment'></div>与白云期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1371594_comment'></div>耳目尽适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1371594_comment'></div>形神不羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1371594_comment'></div>元气颢然。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_125_1371594", 1371594, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>遵渚</span>之鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1371594_comment'></div>有时而飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1371594_comment'></div>石门之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1371594_comment'></div>可以栖迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1371594_comment'></div>此谷而盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1371594_comment'></div>彼邱而夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1371594_comment'></div>维公之羭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1371594_comment'></div>迹永在斯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_132_1371594_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年9月27日</a>　在连州刺史任。九月二十七日，智严大师卒，刘禹锡应其弟子之请作碑文。作品：《唐故衡岳律大师湘潭唐兴寺俨公碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷4第53页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371626' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371626' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371626?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故衡岳律大师湘潭唐兴寺俨公碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年9月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371626")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371626_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371626'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371626'>佛法在九州间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371626_comment'></div>随其方而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371626_comment'></div>中夏之人汨于荣利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371626_comment'></div>破荣莫若妙觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371626_comment'></div>故言禅寂者宗嵩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371626_comment'></div>北方之人锐以武力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371626_comment'></div>摄武莫若示现。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371626_comment'></div>故言神通者宗清凉山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371626_comment'></div>南方之人剽而轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371626_comment'></div>制轻莫若威仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371626_comment'></div>故言律藏者宗衡山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371626_comment'></div>是三名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371626_comment'></div>为庄严国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371626_comment'></div>必有达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371626_comment'></div>与山比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371626_comment'></div>南岳律门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371626_comment'></div>以津公为上首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371626_comment'></div>津之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371626_comment'></div>云峰證公承之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371626_comment'></div>證公之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371626_comment'></div>湘潭俨公承之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371626_comment'></div>星月丽天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371626_comment'></div>珠玑同贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371626_comment'></div>由其门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371626_comment'></div>为正法焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371626_comment'></div>公号智俨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371626_comment'></div>曹氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371626_comment'></div>世为柳之右姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371626_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371626", 1371626, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>兆形</span>在孕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371626_comment'></div>母不嗜荤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371626_comment'></div>成童在侣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371626_comment'></div>独不嗜戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371626_comment'></div>其夙植固厚者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371626_comment'></div>生九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371626_comment'></div>乐为僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371626_comment'></div>父不能夺其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371626_comment'></div>抱经笥入岣嵝山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371626_comment'></div>从名师执业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371626_comment'></div>凡进品受具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371626_comment'></div>闻经传印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371626_comment'></div>皆当时大长老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371626_comment'></div>我入名门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371626_comment'></div>不住诸乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371626_comment'></div>我得觉路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371626_comment'></div>径入智地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371626_comment'></div>居室方丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371626_comment'></div>名闻大千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371626_comment'></div>护法大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371626_comment'></div>多所宾礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371626_comment'></div>我以有为应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371626_comment'></div>凡建宝幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371626_comment'></div>修废寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371626_comment'></div>饰大像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371626_comment'></div>皆极其工。<div id='poem_sentence_65_1371626_comment'></div>具汤沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371626_comment'></div>剃颐顶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371626_comment'></div>与门人告别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371626_comment'></div>既即寂而视身与色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371626_comment'></div>无有坏相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371626_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371626_comment'></div>岂生能全吾真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371626_comment'></div>故死不速朽。<div id='poem_sentence_86_1371626_comment'></div>非夫有道不可止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1371626_comment'></div>中有毗尼出尘士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1371626_comment'></div>以津视俨犹孙子。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺平淄青表</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年3月24日）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371438_comment'></div>伏见制旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371438_comment'></div>魏博节度使所奏逆贼李师道并男二人并枭斩讫。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371438_comment'></div>旬月之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371438_comment'></div>鲸鲵就诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371438_comment'></div>泰岳既宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371438_comment'></div>登封有日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371438_comment'></div>伏惟睿圣文武皇帝陛下有征必克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371438_comment'></div>举意无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371438_comment'></div>天地协神算之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371438_comment'></div>雷霆助成师之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371438_comment'></div>蠢尔孽竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371438_comment'></div>敢生野心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371438_comment'></div>萧斧一临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371438_comment'></div>妖氛自灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371438_comment'></div>皆由圣慈广被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371438_comment'></div>睿略潜通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371438_comment'></div>献俘者尽许生还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371438_comment'></div>得地者复令安堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371438_comment'></div>感我仁化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371438_comment'></div>复归仁寿之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371438_comment'></div>捷书既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371438_comment'></div>传首继来。<div id='poem_sentence_38_1371438_comment'></div>方观饮至之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371438_comment'></div>东岳烟云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371438_comment'></div>已望告成之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371438_comment'></div>臣恪居远服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371438_comment'></div>尝忝班行。<div class='inline' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371624")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371624_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371624'>元和十一年某月日。诏书追褒曹溪第六祖能公。谥曰大鉴。实广州牧马总以疏闻。繇是可其奏。尚道以尊名。同归善善。不隔异教。一字之褒。华夷孔怀。得其所故也。马公敬其事。且谨始以垂后。遂咨于文雄今柳州刺史河东柳君为前碑。后三年。有僧道琳率其徒由曹溪来。且曰。愿立第二碑。学者志也。惟如来灭后。中五百岁。而摩腾竺法兰以经来华。人始闻其言。犹夫重昏之见曶爽。复五百岁。而达摩以法来华。人始传其心。犹夫昧旦之睹白日。自达摩六传至大鉴。如贯意珠。有先后而无异同。世之言真宗者。所谓顿门。初达摩与佛衣俱来。得道传付。以为真印。至大鉴置而不传。岂以是为筌蹄耶刍狗耶。将人人之莫已若而不若置之耶。吾不得而知也。桉大鉴生新州。三十出家。四十七年而殁。既殁百有六年而谥。始自蕲州东山。从弟五师得授记以归。高宗使中贵人再徵。不奉诏。第以言为贡。上敬行之。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371624_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371624'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371624'>至人之生。无有种类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371624_comment'></div>同人者形。出人者智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371624_comment'></div>蠢蠢南裔。降生杰异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371624_comment'></div>父乾母坤。独肖元气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371624_comment'></div>一言顿悟。不践初地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371624_comment'></div>五师相承。授以宝器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371624_comment'></div>宴坐曹溪。世号南宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371624_comment'></div>学徒爰来。如水之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371624_comment'></div>饮以妙药。瘥其瘖聋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371624_comment'></div>诏不能致。许为法雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371624_comment'></div>去佛日远。群言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371624", 1371624, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>积亿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371624_comment'></div>著空执有。各走其域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371624_comment'></div>我立真筌。揭起南国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371624_comment'></div>无修而修。无得而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371624_comment'></div>能使学者。还其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371624", 1371624, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>天识</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371624_comment'></div>如黑而迷。仰见斗极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371624_comment'></div>得之自然。竟不可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371624_comment'></div>口传手付。则碍于有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371624_comment'></div>留衣空堂。得者天授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371624_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1371624_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在连州刺史任。有铭文。作品：《佛衣铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷4第52页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371612' class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1371612_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371612'>吾既为僧琳撰曹溪第二碑。且思所以辩六祖置衣不传之旨。作佛衣铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371612_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371612'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371612'>佛言不行，<span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在连州刺史任。作诗赠别僧友。作品：《赠别约师并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第399页，中华书局1990年版。）</span>《海阳湖别浩初师并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第397页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17414' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17414' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17414?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠别约师<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17414")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17414_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17414'>并引：荆州人文约，市井生而云鹤性，故去荤为浮图，生悟而證入。南抵六祖初生之墟，得遗教，甚悉。今年访余于连州，且曰：「贫道昔浮湘川，会柳仪曹谪零陵，宅于佛寺，幸联栋而居者有年，由是时人大士得落耳界。」夫闻为见因，今日之来，曩时之因耳，时仪曹牧柳州，与八句赠别。</div><div id='poem_preface_17414_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17414'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17414'>师逢吴兴守<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作寺）</span>，相伴住<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17414", 17414, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>禅扃</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17414_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17414", 17414, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>柳星</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17414_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17414'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17414_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_17595' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17595' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17595?labeling=true' target='_blank'>海阳湖别浩初师</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17595")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_17595_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17595'>引：潇湘间，无土山，无浊水，民乘是气，往往清慧而文。长沙人浩初，生既因地而清矣，故去荤洗虑，剔颠毛而壤其衣。居一都之殷，易与士会，得执外教，尽捐苛礼。自公侯守相，必赐其清问，耳目灌注，习浮于性，而里中儿贤适与浩初比者，婴冠带，豢妻子，吏得以乘凌之，汨没天慧，不得自奋，莫可望浩初之清光于侯门上座，第自吟羡而已。浩初益自多其术，尤勇于近达者而归之，往年之临贺，唁侍郎杨公。留岁馀，公遗以七言诗，手笔于素。前年，省柳仪曹于龙城，又为赋三篇，皆章书。今复来连山，以前所得双南金，出于裓，亟请余赓之。按师为诗颇清，而弈棋至第三品，二道皆足以取幸于士大夫，宜熏馀习以深入也。会吴郡以山水冠世，海阳又以奇甲一州。师慕道，于泉石为笃，故携之以嬉。及言旋，复引与共载于湖上，弈于树石间，以植沃州之因缘，宜赋诗具道其事。</div><div id='poem_preface_17595_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17595'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17595'>近郭看<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作有）</span>殊境，独游常鲜欢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17595_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17595'>逢君驻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17595", 17595, id='poem_sentence_2_17595_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17595'>爱泉移席近，闻石辍棋看。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17595_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 湘东架险凡四桥，山下出泉，逗岩为池，泓澄可爱者不可遍举，故状其境，以贻好事</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_17595_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在连州刺史任。有诗酬国子博士崔立之。作品：《酬国子崔博士立之见寄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷35第527页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17359' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17359' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17359?labeling=true' target='_blank'>詶国子崔博士立之见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17359")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_17359_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17359'>遍看今日乘轩客，多是昔年呈卷人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17359_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
