ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在连州刺史任。作赋抒怀。作品：《问大钧赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷1第1页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>问大钧赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371401")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371401_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371401'>始余失台郎为刺史。又贬州司马。俟罪朗州。三见闰月。人咸曰。数之极。理当迁焉。因作谪九年赋以自广。是岁腊月诏追。明年。自阙下重领连山郡印绶。人咸曰。美恶周必复。第行无恤。岁杪其复乎。居五年不得调。岁二月。有事于社。前一日致斋。孤居虑静。滞念数起。伊人理之不可以晓也。将质诸神乎。谨贡诚驰精。敢问大钧。其夕有遇。寤而次第其辞以为赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371401'>圆方相函兮。浩其无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371401_comment'></div>窅冥翕辟兮。走三辰以腾振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371401_comment'></div>孰主张是兮。有工其神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371401_comment'></div>迎随不见兮。强名之曰大钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371401_comment'></div>欹以临下兮。巍乎雄尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371401_comment'></div>天为独阳。高不可问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371401_comment'></div>工居其中。与人差近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371401_comment'></div>身执其权。心平其运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371401_comment'></div>循名想像。或可以讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371401_comment'></div>曰嘻。蒙之未生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371401_comment'></div>其犹泥耳。落乎埏埴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371401_comment'></div>惟钧所指。忽然为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371401_comment'></div>为幸大矣。工赋其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371401_comment'></div>七情与俱。啬智不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371401_comment'></div>之以愚。坦坦之衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371401_comment'></div>万人所趋。蒙一布武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371401_comment'></div>化为畏途。人或誉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371401_comment'></div>百说徒虚。人或排之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371401_comment'></div>半言有馀。物壮则老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371401_comment'></div>乃惟其常。否终则倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371401_comment'></div>亦不可长。老先期而骤至兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371401_comment'></div>否踰数而叵量。虽一夫之不获兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371401_comment'></div>亦大化之攸病。谨荐诚上问兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371401_comment'></div>俛伏以听。是夕寝熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371401_comment'></div>梦游乎无何有之乡。抗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>陛级</span>乎重霄兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371401_comment'></div>异人间之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>景光</span>。中有威神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371401_comment'></div>巾金甲而炜煌。命之使前兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371401_comment'></div>其音琅琅。曰吾大化之一工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371401_comment'></div>居上临下。廉其不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371401_comment'></div>汝今有辞。吾一以听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371401_comment'></div>播形肖貌。生类积亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371401_comment'></div>橐籥圈匡。镕鍊消息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371401_comment'></div>我之司智。初不尔啬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371401_comment'></div>不守以愚。覆为汝贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371401_comment'></div>既赋汝形。辅之聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371401_comment'></div>盍求世师。资适攸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371401_comment'></div>胡然抗志。遐想前烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371401_comment'></div>倚梯青冥。举足斯跌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371401_comment'></div>韬尔智斧。无为自伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371401_comment'></div>凿窍太繁。天和乃泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371401_comment'></div>利径前诱。多逢覆辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371401_comment'></div>名肠内煎。外火非热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371401_comment'></div>今哀汝穷。将厚汝愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371401_comment'></div>剔去刚健。纳之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>柔濡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371401_comment'></div>塞前窍之伤痍兮。招太和而与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371401_comment'></div>贳以待人兮。急以自拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371401_comment'></div>道存壸奥。无示四隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371401_comment'></div>轧物之势不作兮。见伤之机自无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371401_comment'></div>汝不善用。吾焉啬乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371401_comment'></div>且夫贞而腾气者膴膴。健而垂精者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>昊昊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371401_comment'></div>我居其中。犹轮是蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371401_comment'></div>以不息为体。以日新为道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371401_comment'></div>裸鳞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>蜚走</span>。灌莽苞皂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371401_comment'></div>乃牙乃甲。乃殈乃剖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371401_comment'></div>阳荣阴悴。生濡死槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371401_comment'></div>各乘气化。不以意造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371401_comment'></div>赋大运兮无有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>淑恶</span>。彼多方兮自生丑好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371401_comment'></div>尔奚不德余以骤壮。姑尤我以速老耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371401_comment'></div>观汝百为。又或不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371401_comment'></div>赤子哇哇。忽其能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371401_comment'></div>亦既名物。几时蹁跹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371401_comment'></div>春耕其邱。投种之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371401_comment'></div>释耒而叹。何时实栗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371401_comment'></div>望所未至。谓余舒舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371401_comment'></div>欲其久留。谓我瞥如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371401_comment'></div>我一子二。谁之曲与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371401_comment'></div>彼蒹葭之苍苍兮。霜霰苦而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>中坚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371401_comment'></div>松竹之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>皲皴</span>索箨兮。不若榯笋之可怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371401_comment'></div>纳材苇而构明堂兮。固容消而力完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371401_comment'></div>扬且之皙兮。不可以常然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371401_comment'></div>当锡尔以老成。苍眉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>皓髯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371401_comment'></div>山立时行。去敌气与矜色兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371401_comment'></div>噤危言以端诚。俾人望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371401_comment'></div>侮黩不生。尔之所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371401_comment'></div>孰与壮多。不善处老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371401_comment'></div>问余而何。授教而回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371401_comment'></div>蘧蘧形开。向之威神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371401_comment'></div>孰为来哉。乃遽衣促盥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371401_comment'></div>端虑涤想。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>委佩</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371401", 1371401, "Clauses/157/Comments/1")'>低簪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371401_comment'></div>持簿叩颡而言曰。楚臣天问不詶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371401_comment'></div>今臣过幸。一献三售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371401_comment'></div>始厚以愚。终期以寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371401_comment'></div>忘上问之罪。濯已然之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371401_comment'></div>心增故术。腹饱新授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371401_comment'></div>驰神清元。拜手稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_17538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17538'>真人昔来游，翠凤相随翔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_17323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄杨<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作韩）</span>八寿州</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17323'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17323'>风猎红旗入寿春，满城歌舞向朱轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17323'>八公山下清淮水，千骑尘中白面人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17323'>桂岭雨馀多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17323", 17323, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>鹤迹</span>，茗园晴望似龙鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17323'>圣朝方用敢言者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17323", 17323, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>次第</span>应须旧谏臣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17323'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17323_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　在连州刺史任。后辈赴举，作诗以送。作品：《送周鲁儒赴举诗并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷38第566页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送周鲁儒赴举诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17277")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17277_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17277'>并引：书居外次。晨门曰：「有九疑生持一刺来谒，立西阶以须。生危冠方袂，浅拱舒拜，且前致辞称，贽其文，颇涉猎前言。居五六日，复袖来，益引古事以相劘切，与之言，能言其得姓因家之所自，暨县道乡亭之风俗，望山名水之概状，罗含所未记，朱赣之未条，咸得之于生。由是始列于宾籍，临觞而司斟，观博而窜言，有日矣。初，邑中人闻有生来而二千石客之，骈然来观，迁客裴御史遇生于坐，抵掌曰：『人固有貌类而族殊者。』周生疑罗玠也。众咸冁然而熟视生，疑也愈甚。」夫形似，古所有也。优孟似叔敖，而楚君欲以为相。人殊而貌肖，犹或欲用之。玠生于衡山，而生生于九疑，其似诚匹也。无乃蹑其武，升俊造，仕甸服，佐君藩，为御史乎。古文人无避事，即有而书之，尚实也。行李之贶，则征夫诗曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_17277_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17277'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(545, "poem_allusion_17277")'>握蛇珠</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5331, "poem_allusion_17277")'>问羊酪</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17277'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17277'>宋日营阳内史孙，因家占得九疑村。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17277'>童心便有爱书癖，手指今馀把笔痕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17277'>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(545, "poem_sentence_2_17277")'>握<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17277", 17277, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>蛇珠</span></span>辞白屋，欲凭鸡卜谒金门。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17277'>若逢广坐<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作知）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5331, "poem_sentence_3_17277")'>问羊酪</span>，从此知名在一言。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17277'></div><div class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷38第563页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>海阳十咏<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>吏隐亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17307")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17307_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17307'>并引：元次山始作海阳湖，后之人或立亭榭，率无指名。及余而大备，每疏凿搆置，必揣称以标之，人咸曰有旨。异日迁官，裴侍御为十咏以示余，颇明丽而不虚美，因捃拾裴诗所未道者，从而和之。</div><div id='poem_preface_17307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17307'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17307'>结构得奇势，朱门交碧浔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17307_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----end

武昌（江夏）

id='poem_sentence_2_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17545'>当时买材恣搜索，典却身上乌貂裘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17545'>古苔苍苍封老节，石上<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作山）</span>孤生饱风雪。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17545'>商声五音<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作商音五声）</span>随指发，水中龙应行云绝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17545'>曾将黄鹤楼上吹，一声占尽秋江月。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17545'>如今老去语尤<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作兴犹）</span>迟，音韵高低耳不知。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17545'>气力已微心尚在，时时一曲梦中吹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17545'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_17545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_17545'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(17545)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
松滋
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='811891d97c1349a199b320c54f3b86ac_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("811891d97c1349a199b320c54f3b86ac");'><span id='811891d97c1349a199b320c54f3b86ac_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>，50岁</div><div id='811891d97c1349a199b320c54f3b86ac' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赴夔州途中，经松滋渡，作诗。作品：《松滋渡望峡中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷24第305页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>松滋渡<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作洞）</span>望峡中</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17218")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17218'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17218'>渡头轻雨洒寒梅，云际溶溶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17218", 17218, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>雪水</span>来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17218'>梦渚草长迷楚望，夷陵土黑有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17218", 17218, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>秦灰</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17218'>巴人泪应猿声落，蜀客船从鸟道回。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17218'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17218", 17218, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>十二碧峰</span>何处所，永安宫外是<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作有）</span>荒台。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17218'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_17218'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(17218)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赴夔州途中，经松滋碧涧寺，见元稹诗，题壁以和。作品：《碧涧寺见元九侍御和展上人诗有三生之句因以和》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷30第412页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17054' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17054' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17054?labeling=true' target='_blank'>碧涧寺见元九侍御和展上人诗有三生之句因以和</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17054")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_17054_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17054'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8626, "poem_allusion_17054")'>王文度重见竺道人</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17054_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17054'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17054'>廊下题诗满壁尘，塔前松树已皴鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17054_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17054'>古来唯有王文度，重见平生竺道人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17054_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17054'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_17054_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
奉节
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a26f68b57d7d478ca4f827a692824ff5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a26f68b57d7d478ca4f827a692824ff5");'><span id='a26f68b57d7d478ca4f827a692824ff5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=824')">822-824年</a>，51-53岁</div><div id='a26f68b57d7d478ca4f827a692824ff5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年1月</a>　正月，到夔州。作谢表上呈。作品：《夔州刺史谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第171页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371451' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371451' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371451?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371451")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371451_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371451'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371451'>臣某言。伏奉某月日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371451_comment'></div>授臣使持节都督夔州诸军事守夔州刺史。跪受天诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371451_comment'></div>神魂震惊。伏惟文武孝德皇帝陛下垂衣穆清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371451_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371451", 1371451, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>睿鉴</span>旁达。三统交泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371451_comment'></div>百神降祥。浃于华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371451_comment'></div>尽致仁寿。臣家本儒素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371451_comment'></div>业在艺文。贞元年中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371451_comment'></div>三忝科第。德宗皇帝记其姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371451_comment'></div>知无党援。擢为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371451_comment'></div>在台三载。例迁省官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371451_comment'></div>权臣奏用。分判钱谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371451_comment'></div>竟坐连累。贬在遐方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371451_comment'></div>先朝追还。方念淹滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371451_comment'></div>又遭谗嫉。出牧远州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371451_comment'></div>家祸所钟。沈伏草土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371451_comment'></div>礼经有制。羸疾仅存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371451_comment'></div>甘于畎亩。以乐皇化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371451_comment'></div>伏遇陛下大明御宇。照烛无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371451_comment'></div>念以残生。举其彝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371451_comment'></div>获居善部。伏感天慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371451_comment'></div>臣即以今月二日到任上讫。硖水千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371451_comment'></div>巴山万重。空怀向日之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371451_comment'></div>未有朝天之路。无任感恩恋阙之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371451_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1371451_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在夔州刺史任。春，韦绚自襄阳来谒，求在左右学问。刘禹锡允之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在夔州刺史任。春，朗州刺史温造因谪至，刘禹锡寄诗。作品：《寄朗州温右史曹长》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷35第525页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄朗州温右史曹长</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17328")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17328'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17328'>暂别瑶墀鸳鹭行，䌽旗双引到沅湘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17328'>城边流水桃花过，帘外春风杜若香。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17328'>史笔枉将书纸尾，朝缨不称濯沧浪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17328'>云台公业家声在，徵诏何时出建章。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17328'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17328_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年3月</a>　三月，杜佑子杜式方卒于桂州。“柩过渚宫”，刘禹锡遣使前往祭奠，有祭文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年3月</a>　在夔州刺史任。三月，裴度复入中书知政事，刘禹锡上启以贺。作品：《上门下裴相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第220页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上门下裴相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371548")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371548'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371548'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371548_comment'></div>向者淮右逋诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371548_comment'></div>即戎岁久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371548_comment'></div>天子斋戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371548_comment'></div>以命元臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371548_comment'></div>登坛之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371548_comment'></div>上略前定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371548_comment'></div>从九天而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371548_comment'></div>纵以神兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371548_comment'></div>分六符之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371548_comment'></div>扫其长彗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371548_comment'></div>授钺于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>西颢</span>之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371548_comment'></div>策勋于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>北陆</span>之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371548_comment'></div>功成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>偃节</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371548_comment'></div>复执大柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371548_comment'></div>君臣相遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371548_comment'></div>播于乐章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371548_comment'></div>山河<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>启封</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371548_comment'></div>载在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>盟府</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371548_comment'></div>上方注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371548_comment'></div>人益具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371548_comment'></div>因鱼水之叶符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371548_comment'></div>极夔龙之事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371548_comment'></div>时属四始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371548_comment'></div>恩覃万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371548_comment'></div>致君及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371548_comment'></div>其德两大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371548_comment'></div>古先俊贤所未备者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371548_comment'></div>我从容而保之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371548_comment'></div>殆非人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371548_comment'></div>抑有幽赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371548_comment'></div>夫异同之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371548_comment'></div>我以独见剖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371548_comment'></div>文武之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371548_comment'></div>我以全材统之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371548_comment'></div>崇高之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371548_comment'></div>我以大功居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371548_comment'></div>造物之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371548_comment'></div>我以虚心运之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371548_comment'></div>然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>持盈</span>之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371548_comment'></div>古所难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371548_comment'></div>实在阴施拯物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371548_comment'></div>厚其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>德基</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371548_comment'></div>以左右功庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371548_comment'></div>而百禄是荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371548_comment'></div>人所欣戴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371548_comment'></div>久而愈宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371548_comment'></div>昔袁太尉不忍锢人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371548_comment'></div>而楚狱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>衰息</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371548_comment'></div>一言之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371548_comment'></div>而子孙丕承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371548_comment'></div>以今日将明之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371548_comment'></div>行前修博施之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371548_comment'></div>笔端肤寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371548_comment'></div>泽及九垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371548_comment'></div>犹夫疾耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371548_comment'></div>必有滞穗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371548_comment'></div>某顷堕危厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371548_comment'></div>常受厚恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371548_comment'></div>谊盟于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371548_comment'></div>要之自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371548_comment'></div>常惧废死荒服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371548_comment'></div>永孤愿言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371548_comment'></div>敢因贺笺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371548_comment'></div>一寄丹恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371548_comment'></div>顾非奇理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371548_comment'></div>不足以萦于冲襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371548_comment'></div>然利于行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371548_comment'></div>固在乎常谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371548_comment'></div>而卓诡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1371548", 1371548, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>孤特</span>之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371548_comment'></div>未必利于行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371548_comment'></div>伏惟以愚言与贤者参之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371548_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1371548_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年5月1日</a>　在夔州刺史任。五月一日，作厅壁记。作品：《夔州刺史厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷9第107页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371568' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371568' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371568?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州刺史厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年5月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371568")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371568_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371568'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371568'>夔在春秋为子国。楚并为楚九县之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371568_comment'></div>秦为鱼复。汉为固陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371568_comment'></div>蜀为巴东。梁为信州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371568_comment'></div>初城于瀼西。后周大总管龙门王公述登白帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371568_comment'></div>叹曰。此奇势可居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371568_comment'></div>遂移府于今治所。是岁建德五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371568_comment'></div>隋初杨素以越公领总管。又张大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371568_comment'></div>唐兴。武德二年诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371568_comment'></div>其以信州为夔州。七年增名都督府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371568_comment'></div>督黔巫一十九郡。开元中犹领七州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371568_comment'></div>天宝初罢州置郡。号云安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371568_comment'></div>至德二年。命嗣道王鍊为太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371568_comment'></div>赐之旌节。统峡中五郡军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371568_comment'></div>乾元初复为州。偃节于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371568_comment'></div>第以防御使为称。寻罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371568_comment'></div>以支郡隶江陵。桉版图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371568_comment'></div>方轮不足当通邑。而今秩与上郡齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371568_comment'></div>特以带蛮夷故也。故相国安阳公乾曜尝参军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371568_comment'></div>修图经言风俗甚备。今以郡国更名之所以然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371568_comment'></div>著于壁云。凡名殊必以国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371568_comment'></div>事建必以年。谨始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371568_comment'></div>长庆二年五月一日。刺史中山刘禹锡记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371568_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1371568_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在夔州刺史任。与韩愈、白居易诗文唱和。作品：《始至云安寄兵部韩侍郎中书白舍人二公近曾远守故有属焉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷31第417页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17541' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17541' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17541?labeling=true' target='_blank'>始至云安寄兵部韩侍郎中书白舍人二公近曾远守故有属焉</a><span /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17541_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17541'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17541'>天外巴子国，山头白帝城。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17541'>波清蜀柹尽，云散楚台倾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17541'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17541", 17541, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>迅濑</span>下哮吼，两岸势争衡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17541'>阴风鬼神过，暴雨蛟龙生。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17541'>望阙遥拜舞，分庭备将迎。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在夔州刺史任。感俗作诗。作品：《竹枝词九首并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷27第358页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_16893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_16893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/16893?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杂曲歌辞<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>竹枝<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作竹枝词九首 一）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_16893")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_16893_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_16893'>并引：四方之歌，异音而同乐。岁正月，余来建平，里中儿联歌竹枝，吹短笛击鼓以赴节。歌者扬袂睢舞，以曲多为贤。聆其音，中黄钟之羽，卒章激讦如吴声，虽伧儜不可分，而含思宛转，有淇澳之艳音。昔屈原居沅湘间，其民迎神，词多鄙陋，乃为作〈九歌〉，到于今荆楚歌舞之，故余亦作〈竹枝〉九篇，俾善歌者飏之，附于末。后之聆巴歈，知变风之自焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_16893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_16893'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_16893'>白帝城头春草生，白盐山下蜀江清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_16893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_16893'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_16893", 16893, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>南人</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_16893", 16893, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>上来</span>歌一曲，北人莫上动乡情。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在夔州刺史任。作诗和东川节度使王涯。作品：《和东川王相公新涨驿池八韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷35第526页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17521?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和东川王相公新涨驿池八韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_17521_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17521'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_0_17521'>今日池塘上，初移造物权。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17521'>苞藏成别岛，沿浊致清涟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17521'>变化生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17521", 17521, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>言下</span>，蓬瀛落眼前。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17521'>泛觞惊翠羽，开幕对红莲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17521'>远写风光入，明含气象全。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17521'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_17521", 17521, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>渚烟</span>笼驿树，波日漾宾筵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17521'>曲岸留缇骑，中流转䌽船。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17521'>无因接元礼，共载比神仙。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17521'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_17521_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　在夔州刺史任。本年，裴昌禹至夔州来访。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年1月</a>　在夔州刺史任。正月日，上表贺册皇太子。作品：《贺册皇太子表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第172页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371419' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371419' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371419?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺册皇太子表</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371419")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371419_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371419'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371419'>臣某言。伏见制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371419_comment'></div>以十二月二十日册皇太子。盛礼斯毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371419_comment'></div>德音遐宣。万国以贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371419_comment'></div>庶类咸说。中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371419_comment'></div>伏惟文武孝德皇帝陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1371419", 1371419, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>体元立极</span>。垂训御时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371419_comment'></div>既阐王猷。思安国本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371419_comment'></div>前星位定。拱宸极以昭彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371419_comment'></div>苍震气宣。与天地而长久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371419_comment'></div>礼光匕鬯。泽被华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371419_comment'></div>宗祏有无疆之休。生灵怀莫大之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371419_comment'></div>臣恪居官次。遐守巴南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371419_comment'></div>不获称庆阙庭。无任踊跃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371419_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1371419_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年1月</a>　在夔州刺史任。正月日，上牋贺皇太子。作品：《贺皇太子牋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第174页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371535' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371535' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371535?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇太子笺</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371535")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371535_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371535'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371535'>使持节都督夔州刺史刘某叩头。伏惟皇太子殿下祗膺诏册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371535_comment'></div>光启储闱。展至性于三朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371535_comment'></div>承本枝于百代。宗祏永固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371535_comment'></div>神人以和。四岳仰维嵩之高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371535_comment'></div>百川承少海之润。某限以职守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371535_comment'></div>不获随例称庆宫庭。无任抃跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371535_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1371535_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　在夔州刺史任。当地始兴寺修大殿，移铁像，作文以记。作品：《夔州始兴寺移铁像记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷4第59页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371564' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371564?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州始兴寺移铁像记</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371564")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371564_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371564'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371564'>佛薪尽于乾竺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371564_comment'></div>而像教东行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371564_comment'></div>是法平等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371564_comment'></div>故所至为净土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371564_comment'></div>是身应供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371564_comment'></div>故随念如降生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371564_comment'></div>先是鱼复人有以利金为弥勒像者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371564_comment'></div>重千钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371564_comment'></div>睟容瑞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371564_comment'></div>人天两足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371564_comment'></div>凫氏卒事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371564_comment'></div>而他工未备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371564_comment'></div>故寓于西偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371564_comment'></div>不知其几年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371564_comment'></div>寺僧法照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371564_comment'></div>瞻礼发信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371564_comment'></div>赤肩白足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371564_comment'></div>入诸大城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371564_comment'></div>乃至聚落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371564_comment'></div>无空过者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371564_comment'></div>积十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371564_comment'></div>得信财无量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371564_comment'></div>繇是购工以尝巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371564_comment'></div>募徒而毕力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371564_comment'></div>四辈增增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371564_comment'></div>工麾以肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371564_comment'></div>中枢外脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371564_comment'></div>阴转阳动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371564_comment'></div>歘如地涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371564_comment'></div>岌如山行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371564_comment'></div>大匠无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371564_comment'></div>尊容向明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371564_comment'></div>青莲承趺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371564_comment'></div>金兽捧持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371564_comment'></div>藻井花鬘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371564_comment'></div>葱茏四垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371564_comment'></div>邑人膜拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371564_comment'></div>如佛出世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371564_comment'></div>法照以愿力能就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371564_comment'></div>泣于佛前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371564_comment'></div>因持片石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371564_comment'></div>乞词以示后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371564_comment'></div>桉此寺始于宇文周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371564_comment'></div>初濒江埤庳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371564_comment'></div>皇唐神龙中为水所坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371564_comment'></div>有波那赖耶国僧广照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371564_comment'></div>浮海而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371564_comment'></div>顿锡不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371564_comment'></div>遂移于今道场所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371564_comment'></div>山曰磨刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371564_comment'></div>岭曰虎冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371564_comment'></div>其经始与克终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371564_comment'></div>皆蕃僧是力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371564_comment'></div>后之有志者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371564_comment'></div>岂无人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371564_comment'></div>法照夔人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371564_comment'></div>姓穆氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371564_comment'></div>年十有五出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371564_comment'></div>依江陵名僧受具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371564_comment'></div>肇自贞元二十年甲申归此寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371564_comment'></div>愿崇建有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371564_comment'></div>凡修大殿立菩萨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371564_comment'></div>大弟子侍佛左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371564_comment'></div>逮长庆癸卯有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371564_comment'></div>其善植德本者欤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1371564_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　在夔州刺史任。有记文。作品：《机汲记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第109页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371579' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371579' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371579?labeling=true' target='_blank'>机汲记</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371579")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371579_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371579'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371579'>濒江之俗。不饮于凿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371579_comment'></div>而皆饮之流。余谪居之明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371579_comment'></div>主人授馆于百雉之内。江水茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371579_comment'></div>周墉閒之。一旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371579_comment'></div>有工爰来。思以技自贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371579_comment'></div>且曰。观今之室庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371579_comment'></div>及江之涯。閒不容亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371579_comment'></div>顾积块峙焉而前耳。请用机以汲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371579_comment'></div>俾矗然之状。莫我遏已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371579_comment'></div>余方异其说。且命之饬力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371579_comment'></div>工也<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371579", 1371579, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>储思</span>环视。相面势而经营之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371579_comment'></div>由是比竹以为畚。寘于流中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371579_comment'></div>中植数尺之臬。辇石以壮其趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371579_comment'></div>如建标焉。索绹以为縆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371579_comment'></div>縻于标垂。上属数仞之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371579_comment'></div>亘空以峻其势。如张弦焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371579_comment'></div>锻铁为器。外廉如鼎耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371579_comment'></div>内键如乐鼓。牝牡相函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371579_comment'></div>转于两端。走于索上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371579_comment'></div>且受汲具。及泉而修绠下缒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371579_comment'></div>盈器而圆轴上引。其往有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371579", 1371579, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>建瓴</span>之驶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371579_comment'></div>其来有推毂之易。瓶繘不羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371579_comment'></div>如搏而升。枝长澜出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371579_comment'></div>高岸拂林。杪踰峻防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371579_comment'></div>刳蟠木以承澍。贯修筠以达脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371579_comment'></div>走下潺潺。声寒空中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371579_comment'></div>通洞环折。唯用所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371579_comment'></div>周除而沃盥以蠲。入爨而锜釜以盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371579_comment'></div>饪餗之馀。移用于汤沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371579_comment'></div>涑浣之末。泄注于圃畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371579_comment'></div>虽瀵涌于庭。莫尚其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371579", 1371579, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>霈洽</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371579_comment'></div>昔余尝登陴然。念悬流之莫可遽挹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371579_comment'></div>方勉保庸督臧获。而挈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371579_comment'></div>至于裂肩龟手。然犹家人视水如酒醪之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371579_comment'></div>今也一任人之智。又从而信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371579_comment'></div>机发于冥冥。而形于用物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371579_comment'></div>浩溔东流。赴海为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371579_comment'></div>斡而迁焉。逐我颐指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371579_comment'></div>向之所谓阻且艰者。莫能高其高而深其深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371579_comment'></div>观夫流水之应物。植木之善建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371579_comment'></div>绳以柔而有立。金以刚而无固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371579_comment'></div>轴卷而能舒。竹圆而能通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371579_comment'></div>合而同功。斯所以然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371579_comment'></div>今之工咸盗其古先工之遗法。故能成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371579_comment'></div>不能知所以为我也。智尽于一端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371579_comment'></div>功止于一名而已。噫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371579_comment'></div>彼经始者。其取诸小过欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371579_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1371579_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　在夔州刺史任。春，礼部放榜，禹锡与友诗文唱和。作品：《宣上人远寄贺礼部王侍郎放榜后诗因而继和》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷24第313页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17232?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣上人远寄和礼部王侍郎放榜后诗因而继和</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17232")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17232_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17232'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年11月7日</a>　在夔州刺史任。十一月七日，有文。作品：《夔州论利害第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第178页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371498' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371498' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371498?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州论利害第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年11月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371498")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371498_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371498'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371498'>臣某言。伏准元和十二年四月十八日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371498_comment'></div>诸州刺史如有利害可言者。不限时节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371498_comment'></div>任自上表闻奏者。臣伏见贞观中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371498_comment'></div>诏许群臣各上书言利便。马周时一布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371498_comment'></div>遂因中郎将常何献策二十馀事。太宗深奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371498_comment'></div>尽行其言。擢周为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371498_comment'></div>至龙朔中。璧州刺史邓宏庆进平素看精四字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371498_comment'></div>堪为酒令。高宗嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371498_comment'></div>亦行其言。迁宏庆为朗州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371498_comment'></div>则知苟有所见。虽布衣之贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371498_comment'></div>远守之微。亦可施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371498_comment'></div>况臣早受国恩。德宗朝忝为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371498_comment'></div>逮今历事四圣。频领藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371498_comment'></div>当陛下至明之时。是微臣竭节之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371498_comment'></div>伏以守在遐郡。不敢广有所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371498_comment'></div>准敕上利害及当州公务。各具别状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371498_comment'></div>伏乞圣慈。俯赐昭鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371498_comment'></div>无任感激屏营之至。谨差当州军事衙官守易州安义府别将员外置同正员云骑尉冯随谨奉表以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371498_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1371498_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年3月</a>　在夔州刺史任。三月，诏书征贤良。有诗送裴昌禹应制举。作品：《送裴处士应制举诗并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷28第378页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17580' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17580' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17580?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送裴处士应制举诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17580")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17580_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17580'>并引：晋人裴昌禹，读书数千卷。于《周官》、《小戴礼》尤邃，性是古敢言，虽候王不能卑下，故与世相参差。凡抵有位以索合，行天下几遍，常叹诸侯莫可游，欲一见天子而未有路，会今年诏书徵贤良。昌禹大喜，以为可以尽豁平生，搏髀跃曰：「一观云龙庭足矣。」繇是裹三月粮而西徂，咨予以七言为游之资藉耳。</div><div target='_blank'>送张盥赴举诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17569")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17569_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17569'>并引：古人以偕受学为同门友，今人以偕升名为同年友，其语熟见，缙绅者皆道焉。余张盥为丈人（于张盥为丈人）（与张盥为丈人），由是道也。曩吾见尔之始生，以老成为祝；今吾见尔之成人，以未立为忧。吾不幸，向所谓同年友，当其盛时，联袂齐镳，亘绝九衢，若屏风然。今来落落，如曙星之相望；昔日会合，不烦异席，可长太息哉，然而尚书右丞卫大受、兵部侍郎武廷硕二君者，当时伟人，咸万夫之望，足以订十朋之多也，第如京师，无骚骚尔，无忻忻尔。时秋也，吾为若叩商之讴，幸有感夫二君子。</div><div id='poem_preface_17569_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17569'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8196, "poem_allusion_17569")'>汤饼客</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9498, "poem_allusion_17569")'>悬弧</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17569'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17569'>尔生始<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9498, "poem_sentence_0_17569")'>悬弧</span>，我作座上宾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17569'>引箸举汤饼，祝词天麒麟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17569'>今成一丈夫，坎坷愁风尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17569'>长裾来谒我，自号庐山人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17569'>道旧与抚孤，悄然伤我神。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17569'>依依见眉睫，嘿嘿含悲辛。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17569'>永怀同年友，追想出谷晨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17569'>三十二君子，齐飞凌烟旻<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作冥）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17569'>曲江一会时，后会已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_17569", 17569, id='poem_sentence_9_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17569'>盛时一已过，来者日日新。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17569'>不如摇落树，重有明年春。<div id='poem_sentence_11_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_17569'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_17569", 17569, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>火后</span>见琮璜，霜馀识松筠。<div id='poem_sentence_12_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_17569'>肃风<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作机）</span>乃独秀，武部<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作抱）</span>亦绝伦。<div id='poem_sentence_13_17569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_17569'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_17569_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　禹锡在夔州两年余，为柳宗元编辑遗集，撰集纪。作品：《唐故尚书礼部员外郎柳君集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷19第236页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故尚书礼部员外郎柳君文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371552")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371552'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371552'>八音与政通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371552_comment'></div>而文章与时高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371552_comment'></div>三代之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371552_comment'></div>至战国而病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371552_comment'></div>涉秦汉复起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371552_comment'></div>汉之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371552_comment'></div>至列国而病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371552_comment'></div>唐兴复起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371552_comment'></div>夫政厖而土裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371552_comment'></div>三光五岳之气分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371552_comment'></div>太音不完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371552_comment'></div>故必混一而后大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371552_comment'></div>初贞元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371552_comment'></div>上方向文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371552_comment'></div>昭回之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371552_comment'></div>下饰万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371552_comment'></div>天下文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371552_comment'></div>争执所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371552_comment'></div>与时而奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371552_comment'></div>粲焉如繁星<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1371552", 1371552, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>丽天</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371552_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1371552", 1371552, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>芒寒色正</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371552_comment'></div>人望而敬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371552_comment'></div>五行而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371552_comment'></div>河东柳子厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371552_comment'></div>斯人望而敬者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371552_comment'></div>子厚始以童子有奇名于贞元初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371552_comment'></div>至九年为名进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371552_comment'></div>十有九年为材御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371552_comment'></div>二十有一年以文章称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371552_comment'></div>入尚书为礼部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371552_comment'></div>是岁以疏隽少检获讪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371552_comment'></div>出牧邵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371552_comment'></div>又谪佐永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371552_comment'></div>居十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371552_comment'></div>诏书徵不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371552_comment'></div>遂为柳州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371552_comment'></div>五岁不得召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371552_comment'></div>病且革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371552_comment'></div>留书抵其友中山刘禹锡曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371552_comment'></div>我不幸卒以谪死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371552_comment'></div>以遗草累故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371552_comment'></div>禹锡执书以泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371552_comment'></div>遂编次为三十二通行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371552_comment'></div>子厚之丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371552_comment'></div>昌黎韩退之志其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371552_comment'></div>且以书来吊曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371552_comment'></div>哀哉若人之不淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371552_comment'></div>吾尝评其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371552_comment'></div>雄深雅健似司马子长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371552_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371552", 1371552, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>崔蔡</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371552", 1371552, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>不足多</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371552_comment'></div>安定皇甫湜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371552_comment'></div>于文章少所推让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371552_comment'></div>亦以退之言为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371552_comment'></div>凡子厚名氏与仕与年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371552_comment'></div>暨行已之大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371552_comment'></div>有退之之志若祭文在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371552_comment'></div>今附于第一通之末云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1371552_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年5月14日</a>　在夔州刺史任。五月十四日，有文。作品：《夔州论利害第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第179页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371499' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371499' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371499?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州论利害第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年5月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371499")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371499_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371499'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371499'>臣某言。伏准今年四月五日德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371499_comment'></div>宜令诸道观察使刺史各具当处利害附驿以闻者。伏惟皇帝陛下睿哲自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371499_comment'></div>缵承列圣。善述先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371499_comment'></div>发扬德音。率土人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371499_comment'></div>不胜庆幸。臣虔奉诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371499_comment'></div>宣示蒸黎。伏以华夏不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371499_comment'></div>事宜各异。详求利病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371499_comment'></div>谨具奏闻。伏乞圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371499_comment'></div>俯赐昭鉴。臣伏览国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371499_comment'></div>窃见开元十八年朝集使至京。玄宗临轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371499_comment'></div>亲问利害。时宣州刺史裴耀卿上便宜事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371499_comment'></div>论转运甚详。竟不行下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371499_comment'></div>至二十一年耀卿为京兆尹。再以前奏论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371499_comment'></div>方见允纳。比及三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371499_comment'></div>漕运七百万石。省脚费三十馀万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371499_comment'></div>当耀卿前不见纳。必有人非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371499_comment'></div>及后数年。方展其效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371499_comment'></div>臣僻守远郡。敢望言行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371499_comment'></div>祗奉诏书。或冀万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371499_comment'></div>伏惟明主择之。无任恳悃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371499_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371499_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_17169'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17169'>柘枝本出楚王家，玉面添娇舞态奢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17176'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17176'>薝卜林中黄土堆，罗襦绣黛已成灰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在夔州刺史任。有文发论。作品：《因论七篇》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷6第76页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371598' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371598' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371598?labeling=true' target='_blank'>因论七篇<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>鉴药</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371598")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371598_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1371598'>刘子閒居作因论。或问其旨曷归欤。对曰。因之为言。有所自也。夫造端乎无形。垂训于至当。其立言之徒。放词乎无方。措旨于至当。其寓言之徒。蒙之智不逮于是。造形而有感。因感而有词。匪立匪寓。以因为目。因论之旨也云尔。</div><div id='poem_preface_1371598_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371598'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371598'>刘子閒居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371598_comment'></div>有负薪之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371598_comment'></div>食精良弗知其旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371598_comment'></div>血气交沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371598_comment'></div>炀然焚如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371598_comment'></div>客有谓予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371598_comment'></div>子病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371598_comment'></div>病积日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371598_comment'></div>乃今我里有方士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371598_comment'></div>沦迹于医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371598_comment'></div>厉者造焉而美肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371598_comment'></div>蹶者造焉而善驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371598_comment'></div>矧常病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371598_comment'></div>将子诣诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371598_comment'></div>予然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371598_comment'></div>之医所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371598_comment'></div>切脉观色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371598_comment'></div>聆声参合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371598_comment'></div>而后言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371598_comment'></div>子之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371598_comment'></div>其兴居之节舛衣食之齐<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>乖所由致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371598_comment'></div>今夫藏鲜能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1371598", 1371598, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>安谷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371598_comment'></div>府鲜能<span class='link' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371598_comment'></div>以授予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371598_comment'></div>服是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371598_comment'></div>足以瀹昏烦而锄蕴结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371598_comment'></div>消<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1371598", 1371598, id='poem_sentence_32_1371598_comment'></div>过当则伤和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371598_comment'></div>是以微其齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371598_comment'></div>予受药以饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371598_comment'></div>过信而腿能轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371598_comment'></div>痹能和。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371598_comment'></div>听察微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371598_comment'></div>蹈危如平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371598_comment'></div>嗜粝如精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371598_comment'></div>或闻而庆予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371598_comment'></div>且閧言曰。<div id='poem_sentence_72_1371598_comment'></div>昧于节宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371598_comment'></div>奚独吾侪小人理身之弊而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1371598_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371599' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371599' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371599?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>讯氓</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371599_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371599'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371599'>刘子如京师。过徐之右鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371599_comment'></div>其道旁午。有氓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371599", 1371599, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>增增</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371599_comment'></div>扶班白。絜羁角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371599_comment'></div>赍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371599", 1371599, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>生器</span>。荷农用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371599_comment'></div>摩肩而西。仆夫告予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371599_comment'></div>斯宋人梁人亳人颍人之逋者。今复矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371599_comment'></div>予愕而讯云。予闻陇西公畅毂之止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371599_comment'></div>方踰月矣。今尔曹之来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371599_comment'></div>欣欣然似恐后者。其间有劳来之簿欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371599_comment'></div>蠲复之条欤。赈赡之恩欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371599_comment'></div>硕鼠亡欤。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371599", 1371599, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>瘈狗</span>逐欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371599_comment'></div>曰。皆未闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371599_comment'></div>且夫浚都。吾政之上游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371599_comment'></div>自巨盗间衅。而武臣颛焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371599_comment'></div>牧守由将校以授。皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371599", 1371599, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>虎而冠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371599_comment'></div>子男由胥徒以出。皆鹤而轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371599_comment'></div>故其上也。子视卒而芥视民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371599_comment'></div>其下也。鸷其理而蛑其赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371599_comment'></div>民弗堪命。是轶于他土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371599_comment'></div>然咸重迁也。非阽危挤壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371599_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371599_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371600' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371600' class='poemTitle class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371600_comment'></div>今闻吾帅故为丞相也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371600_comment'></div>能清静画一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371600_comment'></div>必能以仁苏我矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371600_comment'></div>其佐尝宰京邑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371600_comment'></div>能诛锄<span id='poem_sentence_9_1371600_comment'></div>奉斯二必而来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371600_comment'></div>恶待事实之及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371600_comment'></div>予因浩叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371600_comment'></div>行积于彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371600_comment'></div>而化行于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371600_comment'></div>实未至而声先驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371600_comment'></div>声之感人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371600_comment'></div>若是之速欤。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1371600_comment'></div>试尝论声实之先后曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371600_comment'></div>民黠政烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371600_comment'></div>须理而后劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371600_comment'></div>斯实先声后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371600_comment'></div>民离政乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371600_comment'></div>须感而后化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371600_comment'></div>斯声先实后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371600_comment'></div>立实以致声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371600_comment'></div>则难在经始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371600_comment'></div>由声以循实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371600_comment'></div>则难在克终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371600_comment'></div>操其柄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371600_comment'></div>能审是理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371601_comment'></div>今觳觫然将安之欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371601_comment'></div>叟揽縻而对云。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371601_comment'></div>莫敢尸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371601_comment'></div>甫闻邦君飨士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371601_comment'></div>若之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371601_comment'></div>予方窭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371601_comment'></div>且无长物。<div id='poem_sentence_52_1371601_comment'></div>乃以杖叩牛角而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371601_comment'></div>所求尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371601_comment'></div>所利移矣。<div
