class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371601_comment'></div>功成祸归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371601_comment'></div>可不悲哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371601_comment'></div>可不悲哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371601_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371601_comment'></div>执不匮之用而应夫无方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371601_comment'></div>使时宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371601_comment'></div>莫吾害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371601_comment'></div>苟拘于形器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371601_comment'></div>用极则忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371601_comment'></div>明矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1371601_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371602' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371602' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371602?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>儆舟</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371602_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371602'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371602'>刘子浮于汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371602_comment'></div>涉淮而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371602_comment'></div>亦既释<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371602", 1371602, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>绋纚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371602_comment'></div>榜人告予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371602_comment'></div>方今湍悍而舟盬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371602_comment'></div>宜谨其具以虞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371602_comment'></div>予闻言若厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371602_comment'></div>繇是袽以窒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371602_comment'></div>灰以墐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371602_comment'></div>以乾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371602_comment'></div>仆怠而躬行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371602_comment'></div>夕惕而昼勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371602_comment'></div>景<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371602", 1371602, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>霾晶</span>而莫进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371602_comment'></div>风异响而遄止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371602_comment'></div>兢兢然累辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371602_comment'></div>是用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371602", 1371602, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>获济</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371602_comment'></div>偃樯弭棹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371602_comment'></div>次于淮阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371602_comment'></div>于是舟之工咸霈然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371602_comment'></div>自暇自逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371602_comment'></div>或游肆而觞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371602_comment'></div>或拊桥而歌矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371602_comment'></div>隶也休役以尚寝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371602_comment'></div>吾曹无虞以宴息矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371602_comment'></div>逮夜分而窾隙潜澍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371602_comment'></div>涣然阴溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371602_comment'></div>至乎淹箦濡荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371602_comment'></div>方卒愕传呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371602_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1371602", 1371602, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>跣跳</span>登墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371602_comment'></div>仅以身脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371602_comment'></div>目未及瞬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371602_comment'></div>而楼倾轴垫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371602_comment'></div>抵于泥沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371602_comment'></div>力莫能支也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371602_comment'></div>刘子缺然自视而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371602_comment'></div>乡予兢惕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371602_comment'></div>汨洪波而无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371602_comment'></div>今予宴安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371602_comment'></div>蹈常流而致危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371602_comment'></div>畏之途果无常所哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371602_comment'></div>不生于所畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371602_comment'></div>而生于所易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371602_comment'></div>是以越子膝行吴君忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371602_comment'></div>晋宣尸居魏臣怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371602_comment'></div>白公厉剑子西哂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371602_comment'></div>李园养士春申易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371602_comment'></div>至于覆国夷族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371602_comment'></div>可不警哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371602_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371602_comment'></div>祸福之胚胎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371602_comment'></div>其动甚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371602_comment'></div>倚伏之矛楯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371602_comment'></div>其理甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371602_comment'></div>困而后儆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371602_comment'></div>斯弗及已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1371602_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371603' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371603' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371603?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>原力</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371603_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371603'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371603'>刘子于迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371603_comment'></div>舟次泗滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371603_comment'></div>维䋏迩之于传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371603_comment'></div>传吏适传呼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371603_comment'></div>乘驿者方来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371603_comment'></div>谁何之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371603_comment'></div>则曰力人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371603_comment'></div>雅以力闻于吴楚间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371603_comment'></div>中贵人器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371603_comment'></div>谓宜为爪士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371603_comment'></div>献言于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371603_comment'></div>有旨趣如京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371603_comment'></div>顷其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371603_comment'></div>则仡焉五辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371603_comment'></div>咸硕其体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371603_comment'></div>毅其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371603_comment'></div>动睛煜如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371603_comment'></div>曳趾岌如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371603_comment'></div>顾瞻迟回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371603_comment'></div>饮啜有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371603_comment'></div>泗滨守伾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371603_comment'></div>由将授也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371603_comment'></div>说而劳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371603_comment'></div>飨以太牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371603_comment'></div>饮以百壶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371603_comment'></div>酒酣气振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371603_comment'></div>求试自矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371603_comment'></div>傍如无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371603_comment'></div>中若有凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371603_comment'></div>有荡舟如沿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371603_comment'></div>抉鼎如飞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371603_comment'></div>绹键如麻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371603_comment'></div>开两弧而脉不偾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371603_comment'></div>屣巨石而齐如流者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371603_comment'></div>异哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371603_comment'></div>果以力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1371603", 1371603, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>骇世</span>而闻于上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371603_comment'></div>异日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371603_comment'></div>话于儒家者流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371603_comment'></div>有客悱然自奋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371603_comment'></div>斯诚力矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371603_comment'></div>上之不过夸胡人而戏角抵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371603_comment'></div>次之不过倅期门而振<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1371603", 1371603, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>袀服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371603_comment'></div>我之力异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371603_comment'></div>然以道用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371603_comment'></div>可以格三苗而宾左衽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371603_comment'></div>以威用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371603_comment'></div>可以系六骡而断右臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371603_comment'></div>由是而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371603_comment'></div>彼力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371603_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1371603", 1371603, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>长雄</span>于匹夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371603_comment'></div>然由驿其騑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371603_comment'></div>饩其食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371603_comment'></div>我力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371603_comment'></div>无敌于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371603_comment'></div>亦当蒲其轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371603_comment'></div>鹤其书矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371603_comment'></div>予诘之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371603_comment'></div>彼之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371603_comment'></div>用于形者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371603_comment'></div>子之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371603_comment'></div>用于心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371603_comment'></div>形近而易见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371603_comment'></div>心远而难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371603_comment'></div>理乎而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371603_comment'></div>则子之力大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371603_comment'></div>时乎而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371603_comment'></div>则彼之力大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371603_comment'></div>且夫小大迭用曷常哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371603_comment'></div>彼固有小矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371603_comment'></div>子固有大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371603_comment'></div>予所不能齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371603_comment'></div>客于邑垂涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371603_comment'></div>刘子解之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371603_comment'></div>屠羊于肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371603_comment'></div>适味于众口也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371603_comment'></div>攻玉于山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371603_comment'></div>俟知于独见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371603_comment'></div>贪日得则鼓刀利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371603_comment'></div>要岁计而韫椟多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371603_comment'></div>客闻之破涕曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371603_comment'></div>吾方俟多于岁计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371603_comment'></div>岁欤岁欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371603_comment'></div>其吾与欤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1371603_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1371604' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371604' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371604?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>说骥</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371604_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371604'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371604'>伯氏佐戎于朔陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371604_comment'></div>获良马以遗予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371604_comment'></div>予不知其良也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371604_comment'></div>秣之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371604", 1371604, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>稊秕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371604_comment'></div>饮之污池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371604_comment'></div>厩枥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371604_comment'></div>上痹而下蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371604_comment'></div>羁络也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371604_comment'></div>缀索而续韦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371604_comment'></div>其易之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371604_comment'></div>予方病且窭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371604_comment'></div>求沽于肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371604_comment'></div>肆之驵亦不知其良也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371604_comment'></div>评其价六十缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371604_comment'></div>将剂矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371604_comment'></div>有裴氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371604_comment'></div>赢其二以求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371604_comment'></div>谓善价也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371604_comment'></div>卒与裴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371604_comment'></div>裴所善李生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371604_comment'></div>雅挟相术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371604_comment'></div>于马也尤工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371604_comment'></div>睹之周体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371604_comment'></div>眙然视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371604_comment'></div>听然笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371604_comment'></div>既而抃随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371604_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371604_comment'></div>久矣吾不睹于是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371604_comment'></div>是何柔心劲骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371604_comment'></div>奇精妍态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371604_comment'></div>宛如锵如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371604_comment'></div>煜如翔如之备耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371604_comment'></div>今夫马之德也全然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371604_comment'></div>顾其为驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371604_comment'></div>藏锐于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371604_comment'></div>且秣之乖方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371604_comment'></div>是用不说于常目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371604_comment'></div>须其齿备而气振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371604_comment'></div>则众美灼见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371604_comment'></div>上可以献帝闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371604_comment'></div>次可以鬻千金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371604_comment'></div>裴也闻言竦焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371604_comment'></div>遂儆其仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371604_comment'></div>蠲其皂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371604_comment'></div>筐其恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371604_comment'></div>蜃其溲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371604_comment'></div>⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（禾崔）</span>以美荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371604_comment'></div>秣以芗粒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371604_comment'></div>起之居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371604_comment'></div>澡之挋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371604_comment'></div>无分阴之怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371604_comment'></div>斯以马养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371604_comment'></div>养马之至分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371604_comment'></div>居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371604_comment'></div>果以骥德闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371604_comment'></div>客有唁予以丧其宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371604_comment'></div>且讥其所贸也微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371604_comment'></div>予洒然曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371604_comment'></div>始予有是马也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371604_comment'></div>予常马畜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371604_comment'></div>今予鬻是马也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371604_comment'></div>彼宝马畜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371604_comment'></div>宝与常在所遇耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371604_comment'></div>且夫昔之翘陆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371604_comment'></div>谓将蹄将齧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371604_comment'></div>抵以挝策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371604_comment'></div>不知其籋云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371604_comment'></div>昔之嘘吸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371604_comment'></div>谓为疵为厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371604_comment'></div>投以药石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371604_comment'></div>不知其喷玉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371604_comment'></div>夫如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371604_comment'></div>则虽旷日历月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371604_comment'></div>将至顿踣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371604_comment'></div>曾何宝之有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371604_comment'></div>繇是而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371604_comment'></div>方之于士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371604_comment'></div>则八十其缗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371604_comment'></div>不犹愈于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1371604", 1371604, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>五羖皮</span>乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371604_comment'></div>客谡而竦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371604_comment'></div>予遂言马之德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371604_comment'></div>存乎形者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371604_comment'></div>可以目取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371604_comment'></div>然犹违之若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1371604_comment'></div>矧德蕴于心者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1371604_comment'></div>斯从古之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1371604_comment'></div>予不敢叹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1371604_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在夔州刺史任。作文论学事上奏丞相。作品：《奏记丞相府论学事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷20第252页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371500' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371500' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371500?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏记丞相府论学事</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371500")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371500_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371500'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371500'>十一月七日。使持节都督夔州诸军事夔州刺史刘某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371500_comment'></div>谨奏记相公閤下。凡今能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371500_comment'></div>皆谓天下少士。而不知养材之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371500_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1371500", 1371500, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>郁堙</span>而不扬。非天不生材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371500_comment'></div>亦犹不耕者不叹廪庾之无馀。非地不产百谷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371500_comment'></div>伏以贞观中增筑学舍千二百区。生徒三千馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371500_comment'></div>时外夷上疏。请遣子弟入附于三雍者五国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371500_comment'></div>虽菁菁者莪。育材之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371500_comment'></div>不足比也。今之胶庠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371500_comment'></div>不闻弦歌。而室庐圯废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371500_comment'></div>生徒衰少。非学官不欲振学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371500_comment'></div>病无赀财以给其用。鲰生今有一见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371500_comment'></div>使大学立富。幸遇相公在位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371500_comment'></div>可以索言之。礼云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371500_comment'></div>凡学官春释奠于其先师。斯礼止于辟廱頖宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371500_comment'></div>非及天下也。今四海郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371500_comment'></div>咸以春秋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371500", 1371500, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>上丁</span>有事孔子庙。其礼不应于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371500_comment'></div>且非孔子意也。炎汉初定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371500_comment'></div>群臣皆起屠贩为公卿。故孝惠高后之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371500_comment'></div>置原庙于郡国。逮孝元时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371500_comment'></div>韦元成以硕儒为丞相。遂建议罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371500_comment'></div>夫以子孙尚不敢违礼以飨其祖。况后学师先圣之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371500_comment'></div>而首违之乎。祭义曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371500_comment'></div>祭不欲数。语云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371500_comment'></div>祭神如神在。与其烦于旧飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371500_comment'></div>孰若行其教道。今夫子之教日颓靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371500_comment'></div>而以非礼之祀媚之。斯儒者所宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1371500", 1371500, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>愤悱</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371500_comment'></div>窃观历代。无有是事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371500_comment'></div>皇家武德二年。诏于国学立周公孔子庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371500_comment'></div>四时致祭。贞观十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371500_comment'></div>又诏修宣尼庙于兖州。至二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371500_comment'></div>许敬宗等奏。乃遣天下诸州县置三献官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371500_comment'></div>其他如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371500", 1371500, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>方社</span>。敬宗非通儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371500_comment'></div>不能稽典礼。开元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371500_comment'></div>玄宗飨学。与儒臣议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371500_comment'></div>繇是发德音。其罢郡县释奠牲牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371500_comment'></div>唯酒脯以荐。后数年定令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371500_comment'></div>时王孙林甫为宰相。不涉学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371500_comment'></div>委御史中丞王敬从校刊之。敬从非文儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371500_comment'></div>遂以明衣牲牢编在学令。是首失于敬宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371500_comment'></div>而终失于林甫。习以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371500_comment'></div>罕有敢非之者。谨桉本州四县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371500_comment'></div>一岁释奠物之直。缗钱十六万有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371500_comment'></div>举天下之郡县。当千七百不啻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371500_comment'></div>羁縻者不在数中。凡岁中所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371500_comment'></div>于经费过四千万。适资三献官饰衣裳饴妻子而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371500_comment'></div>于尚学之道。无有补焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371500_comment'></div>前日诏书许列郡守臣得以上言便事。今谨条奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371500_comment'></div>某乞下礼官博士详议典制。罢天下县邑牲牢衣币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371500_comment'></div>如有生徒。春秋依开元敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371500_comment'></div>用酒醴腶脩腒䐹榛栗。示敬其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371500_comment'></div>而州府许如故仪。然后籍其资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371500_comment'></div>半附益所隶州。使增学校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371500_comment'></div>其半率归国庠。犹不下万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371500_comment'></div>筑学室。具器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371500_comment'></div>丰篹食。增掌固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371500_comment'></div>以备使令。凡儒官各加稍食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371500_comment'></div>其纸笔铅黄。视所出州率令折入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371500_comment'></div>学徒既备。明经日课缮书若干纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371500_comment'></div>进士命雠校亦如之。则贞观之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371500_comment'></div>粲然不殊。其它郡国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371500_comment'></div>皆立程督。投绂怀玺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371500_comment'></div>棫朴菁莪。良可咏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371500_comment'></div>伏惟相公发迹。咸自诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371500_comment'></div>其尊素王之道。仪刑四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371500_comment'></div>宜在今日。是以小生敢沿故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371500_comment'></div>以奏记于左右。姑举其大较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371500_comment'></div>至于證据纤悉。条奏具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371500_comment'></div>章下之日。乞留神省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371500_comment'></div>不胜大愿。惶恐拜手稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371500_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1371500_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在夔州刺史任。感俗作诗。作品：《畬田行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷27第353页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>畬田行</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17620")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17620'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17620'>何处好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17620", 17620, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>畬田</span>，团团缦山腹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17620'>钻龟得雨卦，上山烧卧木。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17620'>惊麇走且顾，群雉<span id='poem_sentence_4_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17620'>青林望靡靡，赤光低复起。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17620'>照潭出老蛟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_17620", 17620, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>爆竹</span>惊山鬼。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17620'>夜色不见山，孤明星汉间。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17620'>下种暖灰中，乘阳拆牙<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作芽）</span>孽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作檗）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_17620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_17620'>苍苍一雨后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_17620", 17620, target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>浪淘沙</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17009'>流水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17009", 17009, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>淘沙</span>不暂停，前波未灭后波生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17009'>令人忽忆潇湘渚，回唱迎神三两声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17009'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_17009_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在夔州刺史任。作诗送僧友鸿举游江西。作品：《送鸿举师游江西》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第400页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17576' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17576' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17576?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送鸿举游江西<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17576")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17576_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17576'>并引：始余谪朗州，尔时，是师振麻衣，裴然而前，持文篇以为僧贽，唧唧而清，如虫吟秋，自然之响，无有假合，有足佳者，故为赋二章以声之。距今年遇于建平，赤髭益蕃，文思益深，而内外学益富。既讯已，探械中出前与诗阅之，纸劳墨瘁。与我同来，因思夫冉冉之光，浑浑之轮，时而言，有初中后之分；日而言，有今昨明之称；身而言，有幼壮艾之期，乃至一謦欬，一弹指，中际皆具，何必求三生已异身耶？然而视予之文，昔与今有莛楹之别；视予之书，昔与今有钧石之悬；视予之任，昔与今乃唯阿之差耳，岂有工拙之数存乎其间哉？盖可勉而进者，与日月而至矣。彼倘来外物，虽日月无能至焉。是岁，师告予游江西，复为赋七言以为游地耳。</div><div id='poem_preface_17576_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17576'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17576'>禅客学禅兼学文，出山初似无心云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17576'>从风卷舒来何处，缭绕巴山不得去。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17576'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17576", 17576, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>山州</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作川）</span>古寺好闲居，读尽龙王宫里书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17576'>使君滩头拣石砚，白帝城边寻野蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17576'>忽然登高心瞥起，又欲浮杯信流水。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17576'>烟波浩淼鱼鸟情，东去三千三百里。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17576'>荆门峡<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作硖）</span>断无盘涡，湘平汉阔清光多。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17576'>庐山雾开见瀑布，江西月净闻渔歌。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17576'>钟陵八郡多名守，半是西方社中友。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17576'>与师相见便谈空，想得<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作伫听）</span>高斋<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作声）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_17576", 17576, "Clauses/19/Comments/2")'>狮子吼</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17576_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17576'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_17576_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在夔州刺史任。作诗送僧友还黔州。作品：《送义舟师却还黔南并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第401页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送义舟师却还黔南<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17261")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17261_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17261'>并引：黔之乡，在秦楚为争地，近世人多过言其幽荒以谈笑，闻者又从而张皇之，犹夫东蕴逐原燎，或近乎语妖。适有沙门义舟，道黔江而来，能画地为山川，及条其风俗，纤悉可信，且曰贫道以一锡游他方众矣，至黔而不知其远。始遇前节使，而闻今节使益贤而文，故其佐多才士。麾围之下，曳裾秉笔，彬然与兔园同风。蕃僧以外学嗜篇章，时或摄衣为末至客，其来也，约主人乘秋风而还，今乞词以飏之，如捧意珠，行住坐卧，知相好耳，余曰唯，命笔为七言以应之。</div><div id='poem_preface_17261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17261'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17261'>黔江秋水浸云霓，独泛慈航路不迷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17261'>猿狖窥斋林叶动，蛟龙闻咒浪花低。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17261'>如莲半偈心常悟，问菊新诗手自携。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17261'>常说摩围似<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17261", 17261, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>灵鹫</span>，却将山屐上丹梯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17261'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17261_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　夏，转和州刺史。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　离夔州时，作诗别。作品：《别夔州官吏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷38第571页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别夔州官吏</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17145")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17145_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17145'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5047, "poem_allusion_17145")'>九歌</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17145'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17145'>三年楚国巴城守，一去扬州扬子津。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17145'>青帐联延喧驿步，白头俯伛到江滨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17145'>巫山暮色常含雨，峡水秋来不恐人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17145'>惟有<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5047, "poem_sentence_3_17145")'>九歌</span>词数首，里中留与赛蛮神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17145_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
巫山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4edeedf2cc8b4f5bb2bb067e3e9a5a7f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4edeedf2cc8b4f5bb2bb067e3e9a5a7f");'><span id='4edeedf2cc8b4f5bb2bb067e3e9a5a7f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>，53岁</div><div id='4edeedf2cc8b4f5bb2bb067e3e9a5a7f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　离夔州时，于巫山神女庙，遍览古今题诗，从一千多首中，选出四首绝唱。<br /></div>

-----title
九江（浔阳）
-----detail

-----title
青阳（秋浦）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a1106b6cf979413481f5fe2f4d82ef04_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a1106b6cf979413481f5fe2f4d82ef04");'><span id='a1106b6cf979413481f5fe2f4d82ef04_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>，53岁</div><div id='a1106b6cf979413481f5fe2f4d82ef04' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　赴和州途中，沿途游览名胜古迹。过九华山，作诗。作品：《九华山歌并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷26第347页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17458' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17458' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17458?labeling=true' target='_blank'>九华山歌<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17458")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17458_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17458'>并引：九华山在池州清阳县西南，九峰竞秀，神采奇异。昔予仰太华，以为此外无奇，爱女几荆山，以为此外无秀。及今年见九华，始悼前言之容易也，惜其地偏且远，不为世所称，故歌以大之。</div><div id='poem_preface_17458_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_17458'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2062, "poem_allusion_17458")'>大炉</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_17458_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17458'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17458'>奇峰一见惊魂魄，意想洪垆始开辟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17458'>疑是九龙夭矫欲攀天，忽逢霹雳一声化为石。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17458'>不然何至今，悠悠亿万年，气势不死如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17458", 17458, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>腾仙</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（音骞，轻举貌。一音嫣）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17458'>云含幽兮月添冷，月凝晖兮江漾影。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17458'>结根不得要路津，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_17458", 17458, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>迥秀</span>长在无人境。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17458'>轩皇封禅登云亭，大禹会寄临东溟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17458'>乘樏<span class='inlineComment2'>（力最反，山行具）</span>不来广乐绝，独与猿鸟愁青荧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17458'>君不见敬亭之山黄<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作广）</span>索漠，兀如断岸无棱角。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17458'>宣城谢守<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作眺）</span>一首诗，遂使声名齐五岳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_17458'>九华山，九华山。<div id='poem_sentence_9_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_17458'>自是造化一尤物，焉能籍甚乎人间。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_17458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_17458'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(17458)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
宣城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e9c2ced14d6245ceb559077ab7de2a77_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e9c2ced14d6245ceb559077ab7de2a77");'><span id='e9c2ced14d6245ceb559077ab7de2a77_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>，53岁</div><div id='e9c2ced14d6245ceb559077ab7de2a77' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赴和州途中，应宣歙观察使崔群之邀，至宣州宴游。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赴和州途中，至宣州与崔群会。作诗谢赠马。作品：《谢宣州崔相公赐马》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷38第574页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣州崔相公赐马</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17341")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17341'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17341'>浮云金络膝<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作脑）</span>，昨日别朱轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17341'>衔草如怀恋，嘶风尚意频。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17341'>曾将此君子，不是换佳人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17341'>从此西归路，应容蹑后尘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17341'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赴和州途中，至宣州与崔群会。早发作诗。作品：《秋江早发》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷23第297页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17562' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17562' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17562?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋江早发</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17562")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17562_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17562'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17562'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_17562", 17562, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>轻阴</span>迎晓日，霞霁秋江明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17562'>草树含远思，襟怀有馀清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17562'>凝睇万象起，郎吟孤愤平。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17562'>渚鸿未矫翼，而我已遐征。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17562'>因思市朝人，方听晨鸡鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_17562'>昏昏恋衾枕，安见元气英<span class='inlineComment2'>（元气二字，一作天地）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_17562'>纳爽耳目变，玩奇筋骨轻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_17562'>沧洲有奇趣，浩然<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作荡）</span>吾将行。<div id='poem_sentence_7_17562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_17562'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_17562_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赴和州途中，至宣州与崔群会。晚泊作诗。作品：《秋江晚泊》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷25第323页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17253?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋江晚泊</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17253")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_17253_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17253'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17253'>长泊起秋色，空江涵霁晖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17253'>暮霞千万状，宾鸿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17253", 17253, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>次第</span>飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17253'>古戍见旗迥，荒村闻犬稀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17253'>轲<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作岢）</span>峨艑上客，劝酒夜相依。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17253'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_17253'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(17253)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
和县（历阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='0aa199f726b845e9873c89a5dca22170_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0aa199f726b845e9873c89a5dca22170");'><span id='0aa199f726b845e9873c89a5dca22170_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=826')">824-826年</a>，53-55岁</div><div id='0aa199f726b845e9873c89a5dca22170' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年8月26日</a>　八月二十六日，抵和州，替段平仲。作谢表以上。作品：《和州刺史谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第176页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371453' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371453' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年8月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371453")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371453_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371453'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371453'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371453_comment'></div>伏奉制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371453_comment'></div>授臣使持节和州诸军事守和州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371453_comment'></div>臣自理巴賨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371453_comment'></div>不闻善政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371453_comment'></div>恩私忽降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371453_comment'></div>庆抃失容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371453_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371453_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下丕承宝祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371453_comment'></div>光阐鸿猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371453_comment'></div>有汉武天人之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371453_comment'></div>禀周成睿哲之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371453_comment'></div>发言合古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371453_comment'></div>举意通神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371453_comment'></div>委用得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371453_comment'></div>动植咸悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371453_comment'></div>理平之速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371453_comment'></div>从古无伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371453_comment'></div>微臣何幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371453_comment'></div>获睹昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371453_comment'></div>臣业在词学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371453_comment'></div>早岁策名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371453_comment'></div>德宗尚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371453_comment'></div>擢为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371453_comment'></div>出入中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371453_comment'></div>事五朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371453_comment'></div>累承恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371453_comment'></div>三换符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371453_comment'></div>在分忧之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371453_comment'></div>禄秩非轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371453_comment'></div>而素蓄所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371453_comment'></div>效用无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371453_comment'></div>臣闻一物失所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371453_comment'></div>前王轸怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371453_comment'></div>今逢圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371453_comment'></div>岂患无位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371453_comment'></div>臣即以今月二十六日到所任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371453_comment'></div>伏以地在江淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371453_comment'></div>俗参吴楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371453_comment'></div>灾旱之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371453_comment'></div>绥抚诚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371453_comment'></div>谨当奉宣皇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371453_comment'></div>慰彼黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371453_comment'></div>久于其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371453_comment'></div>冀彼知方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371453_comment'></div>伏乞圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371453_comment'></div>俯赐昭鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371453_comment'></div>臣远守藩服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371453_comment'></div>不获拜舞阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371453_comment'></div>无任恳悃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371453_comment'></div>谨差当州军事衙官章兴奉表陈谢以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1371453_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在和州刺史任。有表谢差中使。作品：《谢差中使谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第166页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371461' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371461' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371461?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢差中使送上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371461")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371461_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371461'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371461'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371461_comment'></div>中使吐突仕晓至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371461_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨慰谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371461_comment'></div>并送臣至本任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371461_comment'></div>深山远郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371461_comment'></div>忽降王人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371461_comment'></div>跪受恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371461_comment'></div>仰瞻宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371461_comment'></div>伏以发自巴峡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371461_comment'></div>至于南荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371461_comment'></div>涉水陆湍险之途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371461_comment'></div>当炎夏郁蒸之候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371461_comment'></div>山川<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371461", 1371461, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>萦转</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371461_comment'></div>晨夜奔驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371461_comment'></div>幸无他疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371461_comment'></div>得至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1371461", 1371461, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>本管</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371461_comment'></div>九重结恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371461_comment'></div>遥倾捧日之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371461_comment'></div>万里获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371461_comment'></div>皆荷自天之祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371461_comment'></div>无任感戴屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371461_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年9月23日</a>　在和州刺史任。九月二十三日，有文记亭。作品：《洗心亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷9第111页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洗心亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年9月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371578")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371578_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371578'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371578'>天下闻寺数十辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371578_comment'></div>而吉祥尤彰彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371578_comment'></div>蹲名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371578_comment'></div>俯大江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371578_comment'></div>荆吴云水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371578_comment'></div>交错如绣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371578_comment'></div>始余以不到为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371578_comment'></div>今方弭所恨而充所望焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371578_comment'></div>既周览赞叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371578_comment'></div>于竹石间最奇处得新亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371578_comment'></div>彤焉如巧人画鳌背上物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371578_comment'></div>即之四顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371578_comment'></div>远迩细大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371578_comment'></div>杂然陈乎前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371578_comment'></div>引人目去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371578_comment'></div>求瞬不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371578_comment'></div>徵其经始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371578_comment'></div>曰僧义然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371578_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1371578", 1371578, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>啸侣</span>为工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371578_comment'></div>即山求材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371578_comment'></div>槃高孕虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371578_comment'></div>万景坌来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371578_comment'></div>词人处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371578_comment'></div>思出常格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371578_comment'></div>禅子处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371578_comment'></div>遇境而寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371578_comment'></div>忧人处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371578_comment'></div>百虑冰息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371578_comment'></div>鸟思猿情。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在和州刺史任。与李德裕唱和。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　在和州刺史任。作诗。作品：《历阳书事七十韵并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷38第577页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17465?labeling=true' target='_blank'>历阳书事七十韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17465")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_17465_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17465'>并引：长庆四年八月，余自夔州转历阳，浮岷江（浮岷山），观洞庭，历夏口，涉浔阳而东。友人崔敦诗罢丞相，镇宛陵，缄书来招曰：「必我觌而之藩，不十日饮，不置子。」故余自池州道宛陵，如其素。敦诗出祖于敬亭祠下，由姑孰西渡江，乃吾圉也，至则考《图经》，参见事，为之诗，俟采风之夜讽者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_17530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_17530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_17530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年11月</a>　在和州刺史任。冬十一月，作诗送惟良上人。作品：《送惟良上人并引》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷29第403页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_17575' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_17575' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/17575?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送惟良上人<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_17575")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_17575_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_17575'>并引：以貌窥天者曰：「乾然健（乾然而健），于然而高（单于然而高）。」以数迎天者曰：「其用四十有九，天果以有形而不能脱乎数。立象以推策，既成而遗之。」古所谓神交造物者，非空言耳。轩皇受天命，其佐皆圣人，故得之。惟唐继天，德如皇帝，有外臣一行，亦圣之徒与。刊历考元，书成化去。今丹徒人惟良，生而能知，非自外求，以乾坤之筴，当十期之数，凝神运指，上感躔次。视玄皇溟涬，无倪有常，绝机泯知，独以神会。数起于复之初九，音生于黄钟之宫，积微本隐，言与化合。夫天人之数，极而含变，变而靡不通，神趋鬼慑，不足骇也。惟良得一行之道，故亦慕其为外臣。谬谓余为世间聪明，孑孑来访。初以说合，至于不言。言息而理冥，复申之以嗟叹。曰: 师其庶几乎。信神与之而不能测神之所以付，信术通之而不能知术之所以至，浅哉余闻乎，曾井蛙醯鸡之不若也。长庆四年冬十一月甲子，语至夜艾，遂为诗以志焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_17575_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_17575'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_17575'>高斋洒<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作映）</span>寒水，是夕山僧至。<div id='poem_sentence_0_17575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_17575'>玄牝无关锁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_17575", 17575, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>琼书</span>舍<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作拾）</span>文字。<div id='poem_sentence_1_17575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17575'>灯明香满室，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17575", 17575, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>月午</span>霜凝地。<div id='poem_sentence_2_17575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_17575'>语到不言时，世间人尽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作自）</span>睡。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年2月16日</a>　在和州刺史任。正月改元，大赦。二月十六日，上表贺。作品：《贺改元赦表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷14第177页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371423' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371423_comment'></div>伏见今月七日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371423_comment'></div>大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_17236_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_17236'>野草芳菲红锦地，游丝撩乱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_17236", 17236, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17236", 17236, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>诗魔</span>即<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_17236", 17236, "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>酒<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作醉）</span>颠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_17236_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_17236'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_17236_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_17236'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(17236)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年6月21日</a>　在和州刺史任。六月二十一日，作厅壁记。作品：《和州刺史厅壁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第102页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371570' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371570' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371570?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和州刺史厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（825年6月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371570")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371570_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371570'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371570'>历阳古扬州之邑。于天文直南斗魁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371570_comment'></div>在春秋实句吴之封。后为楚所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371570_comment'></div>秦并天下。以隶九江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371570_comment'></div>而亦为九江治所。晋平吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371570_comment'></div>复隶淮南。至永兴初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371570_comment'></div>自析为郡。益之以乌江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371570_comment'></div>宋台建。目为南豫州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371570_comment'></div>又益之以龙亢。梁之亡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371570_comment'></div>北齐图霸功。拥贞阳侯以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371570_comment'></div>王僧辩来迎。会于兹地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371570_comment'></div>二国和协。故更名和州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371570_comment'></div>陈隋间无所革。国朝因隋武德中更龙亢为含山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371570_comment'></div>初开元诏书以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1371570", 1371570, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>口算</span>第郡县为三品。是为下州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371570_comment'></div>元和中复命有司参校之。遂进品第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371570_comment'></div>桉见户万八千有奇。输缗钱十六万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371570_comment'></div>岁贡纤纻二篚。吴牛苏二钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371570_comment'></div>糁鲟九瓮茅蒐七千两。镇曰梁山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371570_comment'></div>浸曰历湖。田蓺四谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371570_comment'></div>豢全六扰。庐有旨酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371570_comment'></div>庖有腴鱼。神仙故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371570_comment'></div>在郊在薮。元元有台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371570_comment'></div>彭铿有洞。名山曰鸡笼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371570_comment'></div>名坞曰濡须。异有血阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371570_comment'></div>祥有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1371570", 1371570, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>沸井</span>。城高而坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371570_comment'></div>亚父所营。州师五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371570_comment'></div>环峙于东南。濒江划中流为水疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371570_comment'></div>揭旗树蕝。十有六戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371570_comment'></div>自孙权距陈。出入六代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371570_comment'></div>常为宿兵之地。多以材能人处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371570_comment'></div>本朝混一。号为善部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371570_comment'></div>然用人差轻。非复曩时之比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371570_comment'></div>始余以尚书郎得谴刺连山。今也由巴东来牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371570_comment'></div>考前二邦之籍与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1371570", 1371570, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>版图</span>。才什五六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371570_comment'></div>而地征三之。究其所从来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371570_comment'></div>生植有本。女工尚完坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371570_comment'></div>一经一纬。无文章交错之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371570_comment'></div>男夫尚垦辟。功苦恋本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371570_comment'></div>无即山近盬之逸。市无嗤眩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371570_comment'></div>工无彫彤。无游人异物以迁其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371570_comment'></div>副徵令者。率非外求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371570_comment'></div>凡百为一出于农桑故也。繇是而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371570_comment'></div>瘠天下者。其在多巧乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371570_comment'></div>宝历元年六月二十一日。刺史中山刘某记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371570_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1371570_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　在和州刺史任。致谢启与李绛。作品：《谢仆射李相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷18第222页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371541' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371541")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371541_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371541'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371541'>某启。州吏还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371541_comment'></div>伏蒙摆落常态。手笔具书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371541_comment'></div>言及贞元中登朝人。逮今无十辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371541_comment'></div>又发中书相公一函。具道阁下亟言曩游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371541_comment'></div>颜间颇有哀色。夫沟中之木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371541_comment'></div>与牺象同体。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371541", 1371541, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>追琢</span>不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371541_comment'></div>则坐成枯薪。朱而蓝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371541_comment'></div>犹足为器。苟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371541", 1371541, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>液樠</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371541", 1371541, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>曲戾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371541_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　在和州刺史任。作文祭韩愈。作品：《祭韩吏部文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷40第604页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371633?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371633'>高山无穷。太华削成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371633_comment'></div>人文无穷。夫子挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371633_comment'></div>典训为徒。百家抗行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371633_comment'></div>当时勍者。皆出其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371633_comment'></div>古人中求。为敌盖寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371633_comment'></div>贞元之中。帝鼓薰琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371633_comment'></div>奕奕金马。文章如林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371633_comment'></div>君自幽谷。升于高岑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371633_comment'></div>鸾凤一鸣。蜩螗革音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371633_comment'></div>手持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1371633", 1371633, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>文柄</span>。高视寰海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371633_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1371633", 1371633, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>权衡</span>低昂。瞻我所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371633_comment'></div>三十馀年。声名塞天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371633_comment'></div>公鼎侯碑。志隧表阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371633_comment'></div>一字之价。辇金如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371633_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1371633", 1371633, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>权豪</span>来侮。人虎我鼠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371633_comment'></div>然诺洞开。人金我土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371633_comment'></div>亲亲尚旧。宜其寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371633_comment'></div>天人之学。可与论道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371633_comment'></div>二者不至。至者其谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371633_comment'></div>岂天与人。好恶背驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371633_comment'></div>昔遇夫子。聪明勇奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371633_comment'></div>常操利刃。开我混沌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371633_comment'></div>子长在笔。予长在论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371633_comment'></div>持矛举楯。卒不能困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371633_comment'></div>时惟子厚。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1371633", 1371633, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>窜言</span>其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371633_comment'></div>赞词愉愉。固非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1371633", 1371633, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>颜颜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371633_comment'></div>磅礡上下。羲农以还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371633_comment'></div>会于有极。服之无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371633_comment'></div>□岐山威凤不复鸣。华亭别鹤中夜惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371633_comment'></div>畏简书兮拘印绶。思临恸兮志莫就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371633_comment'></div>生刍一束酒一杯。故人故人歆此来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371633_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1371633_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　在和州刺史任。汴州刺史令狐楚修葺新亭，禹锡作文以记。作品：《汴州郑门新亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷8第98页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371576'>亭于西门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371576_comment'></div>尊阙路也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371576_comment'></div>实相公以心规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371576_comment'></div>群僚以辞叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371576_comment'></div>而百工以乐成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371576_comment'></div>斧斤无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371576_comment'></div>丹素有严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371576_comment'></div>主人肃客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371576_comment'></div>落以金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371576_comment'></div>走郑之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371576_comment'></div>嵚为右垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371576_comment'></div>黄河一支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371576_comment'></div>滉漾北轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371576_comment'></div>前瞻东顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371576_comment'></div>甍动轨直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371576_comment'></div>含景生姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371576_comment'></div>溯空欲翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371576_comment'></div>汴城具八方之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371576_comment'></div>殊形诡言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371576_comment'></div>而耳目一说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371576_comment'></div>初公来临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371576_comment'></div>拥节及门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371576_comment'></div>驭吏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371576_comment'></div>此郑州门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371576_comment'></div>公心非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371576_comment'></div>若曰野哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371576_comment'></div>居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371576_comment'></div>即旧号而更之曰郑门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371576_comment'></div>故事王公大僚之去来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371576_comment'></div>元侯前驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371576_comment'></div>翊门而旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371576_comment'></div>率立马尘坌中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371576_comment'></div>挹策为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371576_comment'></div>公心不然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371576_comment'></div>乃下亭令于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371576_comment'></div>桉亭东西函丈者三之有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371576_comment'></div>而南北五之有赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1371576_comment'></div>乐县宴豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371576_comment'></div>前后以位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371576_comment'></div>棋阖对明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1371576_comment'></div>弭掀顺时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1371576_comment'></div>修梁衡建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1371576_comment'></div>中虚上荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1371576_comment'></div>圆脊方廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1371576_comment'></div>高卑中经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1371576_comment'></div>帘炉茵帟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1371576_comment'></div>文椸睆榻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1371576_comment'></div>储以应猝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1371576_comment'></div>周用而宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1371576_comment'></div>乃命尹阍视亭长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1371576_comment'></div>抱关视掌固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1371576_comment'></div>启闭拚除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1371576_comment'></div>是谨是孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1371576_comment'></div>锡命赐胙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1371576_comment'></div>劳迎赠饯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1371576_comment'></div>我当躬行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1371576_comment'></div>汝先汝蠲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1371576_comment'></div>挟膳提醪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1371576_comment'></div>生刍缟衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1371576_comment'></div>我寮展事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1371576_comment'></div>靡问文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1371576_comment'></div>汝惟汝从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1371576_comment'></div>凡入而修容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1371576_comment'></div>凡出而修軷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1371576_comment'></div>裼袭威仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1371576_comment'></div>勿籍勿诃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1371576_comment'></div>繇是贵人称诸朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1371576_comment'></div>群吏咏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1371576_comment'></div>行者誇于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1371576_comment'></div>与人同其安者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1371576_comment'></div>人人驿其声而吟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1371576_comment'></div>始乎諓諓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1371576_comment'></div>而成乎庞鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1371576_comment'></div>欲无文字不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1371576_comment'></div>公遂条白其所以然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1371576_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1371576", 1371576, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>远命</span>学古者书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1371576_comment'></div>公姓令狐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1371576_comment'></div>以文章典内外书命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1371576_comment'></div>以谟明登左右相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1371576_comment'></div>以飞语策免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1371576_comment'></div>以思材复徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1371576_comment'></div>自有浚师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1371576_comment'></div>无如今治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1371576_comment'></div>文武两炽。<div 南京（上元）

-----title
汝州（梁县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d0e2948449ba40cf9497948a1e73caf4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d0e2948449ba40cf9497948a1e73caf4");'><span id='d0e2948449ba40cf9497948a1e73caf4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=835')">834-835年</a>，63-64岁</div><div id='d0e2948449ba40cf9497948a1e73caf4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　抵任汝州，上表谢恩。作品：《汝州刺史谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第191页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371455' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371455?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汝州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371455")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371455_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371455'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371455'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371455_comment'></div>伏奉去年七月十四日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371455_comment'></div>授臣使持节汝州诸军事守汝州刺史兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371455_comment'></div>充本道防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371455_comment'></div>馀如故者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371455_comment'></div>臣久居远服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371455_comment'></div>恋阙常深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371455_comment'></div>忽降新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371455_comment'></div>近乡为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371455_comment'></div>承旨庆抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371455_comment'></div>省躬惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371455_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371455_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下垂衣清穆之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371455_comment'></div>旁照寰瀛之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371455_comment'></div>车书所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371455_comment'></div>动植咸安。<div 大荔（冯翊）

id='poem_sentence_0_1371439'>臣某言。伏奉前月二十五日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371439_comment'></div>示逆贼郑注已枭首讫。妖氛殄灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371439_comment'></div>华夏乂安。伏以逆贼郑注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371439_comment'></div>本出细微。潜怀枭獍之心。<div class='inline'
