id='poem_sentence_9_1371439_comment'></div>不胜庆快。臣恪居官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371439_comment'></div>不获称贺阙庭。无任欣欢抃跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371439_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1371439_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年12月4日</a>　初抵同州任，十二月四日，上状举人自代。作品：《同州举萧谏议自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第208页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371518?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同州举萧谏议自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年12月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371518")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371518'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371518'>同州防御使前谏议大夫萧俶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371518_comment'></div>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371518_comment'></div>臣蒙恩授同州刺史兼御史中丞充本州防御长春宫等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371518_comment'></div>伏准贞元二年正月二十四日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371518_comment'></div>上后三日举一人自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371518_comment'></div>伏以前件官生于贵族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371518_comment'></div>伏膺儒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371518_comment'></div>搢绅之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371518_comment'></div>号为端士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371518_comment'></div>昨蒙朝奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371518_comment'></div>冠于谏垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371518_comment'></div>时方被病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371518_comment'></div>不果上道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371518_comment'></div>长告已满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371518_comment'></div>块然家居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371518_comment'></div>今闻疾瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371518_comment'></div>可以录用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371518_comment'></div>臣与俶久同班列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371518_comment'></div>知其材能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371518_comment'></div>为官择人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371518_comment'></div>敢举自代。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1371518_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年12月21日</a>　初抵同州任，十二月二十一日，上表谢恩。作品：《同州刺史谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第192页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371456' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371456' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371456?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年12月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371456")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371456_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371456'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371456'>臣某言。伏奉去年十月二十二日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371456_comment'></div>授臣使持节同州诸军事守同州刺史兼御史中丞。充本州防御长春宫等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371456_comment'></div>恩降九重。荣忝三辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371456_comment'></div>承旨庆抃。省躬惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371456_comment'></div>臣某中谢。伏惟皇帝陛下丕承列圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371456_comment'></div>光阐鸿猷。氛祲扫除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371456_comment'></div>乾坤交泰。臣幸逢昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371456_comment'></div>累沐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371456", 1371456, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>殊私</span>。空荷生成之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371456_comment'></div>宁酬雨露之泽。即以今月二日到州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371456_comment'></div>谨宣睿旨。安慰蒸黎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371456_comment'></div>伏以本州四年以来。连遭旱损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371456_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1371456", 1371456, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>闾阎</span>凋瘵。远近共知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371456_comment'></div>臣顷任苏州之年。亦遭大水之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371456_comment'></div>面辞之日。亲奉德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371456_comment'></div>至于抚绥。皆承圣教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371456_comment'></div>二年之后。百姓获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371456_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371456", 1371456, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>本部</span>灾荒。物力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1371456", 1371456, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>困涸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371456_comment'></div>忝为长吏。敢不竭诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371456_comment'></div>即须条疏。续具闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371456_comment'></div>臣恪居官次。幸接王畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371456_comment'></div>不获拜舞彤庭。陈露丹慊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371456_comment'></div>犬马怀恋。寝兴匪宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371456_comment'></div>瞻魏阙之容。朝天尚阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371456_comment'></div>望长安之路。近日为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371456_comment'></div>臣无任感激屏营之至。谨差防御知衙官试殿中监杨克乂奉表陈谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371456_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1371456_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年12月</a>　十二月，初抵同州任后，上表贺斩郑注之德音。作品：《贺德音表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第194页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371425' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371425?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺德音表</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年12月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371425_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371425'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371425'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371425_comment'></div>伏见今月十六日德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371425_comment'></div>布告遐迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371425_comment'></div>天道下济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371425_comment'></div>人情大安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371425_comment'></div>中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371425_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下凝旒思理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371425_comment'></div>垂衣择材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371425_comment'></div>以日月无私之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371425_comment'></div>照寰区有截之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371425_comment'></div>贵使下情尽达。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1371425_comment'></div>一昨李训郑注等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371425_comment'></div>敢有逆心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371425_comment'></div>兼连凶党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371425_comment'></div>陛下睿谋神断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371425_comment'></div>左右协同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371425_comment'></div>顷刻之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371425_comment'></div>扫除已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371425_comment'></div>重臣毕力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371425_comment'></div>禁旅竭忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371425_comment'></div>氛祲廓清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371425_comment'></div>华夷咸悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371425_comment'></div>言念正刑之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371425_comment'></div>或有诖误之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371425_comment'></div>再发德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371425_comment'></div>广宣圣泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371425_comment'></div>当星纪回天之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371425_comment'></div>迎阳和煦物之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371425_comment'></div>怀危疑者。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1371425_comment'></div>望风知惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371425_comment'></div>非同谋者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371425_comment'></div>一切不问。<div id='poem_sentence_36_1371425_comment'></div>含生之伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1371425_comment'></div>普天同感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1371425_comment'></div>臣恪居官次。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年12月23日</a>　初抵同州任，十二月二十三日，上状贺斩郑注之德音。作品：《上宰相贺德音状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷17第208页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371519' id='poem_sentence_3_1371519_comment'></div>特宏在宥。瑕累咸涤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371519_comment'></div>危疑获安。此皆庙算弼谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371519_comment'></div>致君及物。事光前史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371519_comment'></div>功格上元。某限以守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371519_comment'></div>不获随例拜贺。无任忭跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371519_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1371519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　禹锡在同州，不满一年。同州“连遭旱损”，刘禹锡请得朝廷赈贷，并放免开成元年夏季青苗钱及旧欠斛斗等。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　在同州刺史任。州遭旱损，朝廷赐粟麦以赈，上表谢恩。作品：《谢恩赐粟麦表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第196页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371469?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢恩赐粟麦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371469")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371469_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371469'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371469'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371469_comment'></div>伏奉今月一日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371469_comment'></div>以臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1371469", 1371469, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>当州</span>连年歉旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371469_comment'></div>特放开成元年夏青苗钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371469_comment'></div>并赐斛㪷六万硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371469_comment'></div>仰长吏逐急济用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371469_comment'></div>不得非时量有抽敛于百姓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371469_comment'></div>恩降九天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371469_comment'></div>泽周万姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371469_comment'></div>优诏才下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371469_comment'></div>群情顿安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371469_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371469_comment'></div>伏以灾沴流行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371469_comment'></div>阴阳常数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371469_comment'></div>物力既竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371469_comment'></div>人心匪遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1371469_comment'></div>辄敢奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1371469_comment'></div>本求赈贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1371469_comment'></div>皇恩广被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1371469_comment'></div>元造曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1371469_comment'></div>既免在田之征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1371469_comment'></div>仍颁发廪之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1371469_comment'></div>臣谨宣赦文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1371469", 1371469, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>节目</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1371469_comment'></div>彰示兆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1371469_comment'></div>鼓舞欢谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1371469_comment'></div>自中徂外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1371469_comment'></div>臣初莅所部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1371469_comment'></div>便遇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1371469", 1371469, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>俭时</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1371469_comment'></div>今蒙圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1371469_comment'></div>特有赈恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1371469_comment'></div>主恩及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1371469_comment'></div>已为寿域之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1371469_comment'></div>众意感天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1371469_comment'></div>必有丰年之应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1371469_comment'></div>臣恪居官业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1371469_comment'></div>不获拜舞阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1371469_comment'></div>臣无任感激。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1371469_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年6月</a>　在同州刺史任。州遭旱损，朝廷放免同州旧欠斛斗，上表谢恩。作品：《谢恩放先贷斛斗表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（卞孝萱校订《刘禹锡集》卷16第197页，中华书局1990年版。）</span><div id='poem_1371470' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1371470' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1371470?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢恩放先贷斛斗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14603, "中唐", "刘禹锡", "poem_title_1371470")'>刘禹锡</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1371470_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1371470'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1371470'>臣某言。臣奉五月二十九日敕牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1371470_comment'></div>据度支所奏诸道节度观察使及州府<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1371470", 1371470, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>借便</span>省司钱物斛斗等数内。当州欠三万六千二十三贯石并放免者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1371470_comment'></div>殊私忽降。逋债涤除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1371470_comment'></div>藩方永安。遐迩咸悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1371470_comment'></div>臣某诚欢诚喜顿首顿首。伏以关辅之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1371470_comment'></div>频年歉旱。田租既须<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1371470", 1371470, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>矜放</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1371470_comment'></div>公用又不支持。承前长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1371470_comment'></div>例有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1371470", 1371470, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>借便</span>。以救一时之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1371470_comment'></div>皆成积欠之名。既未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1371470", 1371470, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>支填</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1371470_comment'></div>常怀忧惧。圣恩周洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1371470_comment'></div>洞见物情。爰命有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1371470_comment'></div>使之条奏。去其旧弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1371470_comment'></div>众已获安。严立新规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1371470_comment'></div>人知所措。臣恪居官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1371470_comment'></div>不获拜舞阙庭。臣无任抃跃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1371470_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1371470_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
